locale.translation: And [even] if We opened to them a gate from the heaven and they continued therein to ascend

locale.transliteration: Laqaloo innama sukkirat absaruna bal nahnu qawmun mashooroona
locale.translation: They would say, "Our eyes have only been dazzled. Rather, we are a people affected by magic

locale.transliteration: Walaqad jaAAalna fee alssamai buroojan wazayyannaha lilnnathireena
locale.translation: And We have placed within the heaven great stars and have beautified it for the observers

locale.transliteration: Wahafithnaha min kulli shaytanin rajeemin
locale.translation: And We have protected it from every devil expelled [from the mercy of Allah]

locale.transliteration: Illa mani istaraqa alssamAAa faatbaAAahu shihabun mubeenun
locale.translation: Except one who steals a hearing and is pursued by a clear burning flame

locale.transliteration: Waalarda madadnaha waalqayna feeha rawasiya waanbatna feeha min kulli shayin mawzoonin
locale.translation: And the earth - We have spread it and cast therein firmly set mountains and caused to grow therein [something] of every well-balanced thing

locale.transliteration: WajaAAalna lakum feeha maAAayisha waman lastum lahu biraziqeena
locale.translation: And We have made for you therein means of living and [for] those for whom you are not providers

locale.transliteration: Wain min shayin illa AAindana khazainuhu wama nunazziluhu illa biqadarin maAAloomin
locale.translation: And there is not a thing but that with Us are its depositories, and We do not send it down except according to a known measure

locale.transliteration: Waarsalna alrriyaha lawaqiha faanzalna mina alssamai maan faasqaynakumoohu wama antum lahu bikhazineena
locale.translation: And We have sent the fertilizing winds and sent down water from the sky and given you drink from it. And you are not its retainers

locale.transliteration: Wainna lanahnu nuhyee wanumeetu wanahnu alwarithoona
locale.translation: And indeed, it is We who give life and cause death, and We are the Inheritor

locale.transliteration: Walaqad AAalimna almustaqdimeena minkum walaqad AAalimna almustakhireena
locale.translation: And We have already known the preceding [generations] among you, and We have already known the later [ones to come]

locale.transliteration: Wainna rabbaka huwa yahshuruhum innahu hakeemun AAaleemun
locale.translation: And indeed, your Lord will gather them; indeed, He is Wise and Knowing

locale.transliteration: Walaqad khalaqna alinsana min salsalin min hamain masnoonin
locale.translation: And We did certainly create man out of clay from an altered black mud

locale.transliteration: Waaljanna khalaqnahu min qablu min nari alssamoomi
locale.translation: And the jinn We created before from scorching fire

locale.transliteration: Waith qala rabbuka lilmalaikati innee khaliqun basharan min salsalin min hamain masnoonin
locale.translation: And [mention, O Muhammad], when your Lord said to the angels, "I will create a human being out of clay from an altered black mud

locale.transliteration: Faitha sawwaytuhu wanafakhtu feehi min roohee faqaAAoo lahu sajideena
locale.translation: And when I have proportioned him and breathed into him of My [created] soul, then fall down to him in prostration

locale.transliteration: Fasajada almalaikatu kulluhum ajmaAAoona
locale.translation: So the angels prostrated - all of them entirely

locale.transliteration: Illa ibleesa aba an yakoona maAAa alssajideena
locale.translation: Except Iblees, he refused to be with those who prostrated

locale.transliteration: Qala ya ibleesu ma laka alla takoona maAAa alssajideena
locale.translation: [Allah] said, O Iblees, what is [the matter] with you that you are not with those who prostrate

locale.transliteration: Qala lam akun liasjuda libasharin khalaqtahu min salsalin min hamain masnoonin
locale.translation: He said, "Never would I prostrate to a human whom You created out of clay from an altered black mud

locale.transliteration: Qala faokhruj minha fainnaka rajeemun
locale.translation: [Allah] said, "Then get out of it, for indeed, you are expelled

locale.transliteration: Wainna AAalayka allaAAnata ila yawmi alddeeni
locale.translation: And indeed, upon you is the curse until the Day of Recompense

locale.transliteration: Qala rabbi faanthirnee ila yawmi yubAAathoona
locale.translation: He said, "My Lord, then reprieve me until the Day they are resurrected

locale.transliteration: Qala fainnaka mina almunthareena
locale.translation: [Allah] said, "So indeed, you are of those reprieved

locale.transliteration: Ila yawmi alwaqti almaAAloomi
locale.translation: Until the Day of the time well-known

locale.transliteration: Qala rabbi bima aghwaytanee laozayyinanna lahum fee alardi walaoghwiyannahum ajmaAAeena
locale.translation: [Iblees] said, "My Lord, because You have put me in error, I will surely make [disobedience] attractive to them on earth, and I will mislead them all

locale.transliteration: Illa AAibadaka minhumu almukhlaseena
locale.translation: Except, among them, Your chosen servants

locale.transliteration: Qala hatha siratun AAalayya mustaqeemun
locale.translation: [Allah] said, "This is a path [of return] to Me [that is] straight

locale.transliteration: Inna AAibadee laysa laka AAalayhim sultanun illa mani ittabaAAaka mina alghaweena
locale.translation: Indeed, My servants - no authority will you have over them, except those who follow you of the deviators

locale.transliteration: Wainna jahannama lamawAAiduhum ajmaAAeena
locale.translation: And indeed, Hell is the promised place for them all

locale.transliteration: Laha sabAAatu abwabin likulli babin minhum juzon maqsoomun
locale.translation: It has seven gates; for every gate is of them a portion designated

locale.transliteration: Inna almuttaqeena fee jannatin waAAuyoonin
locale.translation: Indeed, the righteous will be within gardens and springs

locale.transliteration: Odkhulooha bisalamin amineena
locale.translation: [Having been told], "Enter it in peace, safe [and secure]

locale.transliteration: WanazaAAna ma fee sudoorihim min ghillin ikhwanan AAala sururin mutaqabileena
locale.translation: And We will remove whatever is in their breasts of resentment, [so they will be] brothers, on thrones facing each other

locale.transliteration: La yamassuhum feeha nasabun wama hum minha bimukhrajeena
locale.translation: No fatigue will touch them therein, nor from it will they [ever] be removed

locale.transliteration: Nabbi AAibadee annee ana alghafooru alrraheemu
locale.translation: [O Muhammad], inform My servants that it is I who am the Forgiving, the Merciful

locale.transliteration: Wa anna AAathabee huwa alAAathabu alaleemu
locale.translation: And that it is My punishment which is the painful punishment

locale.transliteration: Wanabbihum AAan dayfi ibraheema
locale.translation: And inform them about the guests of Abraham

locale.transliteration: Ith dakhaloo AAalayhi faqaloo salaman qala inna minkum wajiloona
locale.translation: When they entered upon him and said, "Peace." [Abraham] said, "Indeed, we are fearful of you

locale.transliteration: Qaloo la tawjal inna nubashshiruka bighulamin AAaleemin
locale.translation: [The angels] said, "Fear not. Indeed, we give you good tidings of a learned boy

locale.transliteration: Qala abashshartumoonee AAala an massaniya alkibaru fabima tubashshirooni
locale.translation: He said, "Have you given me good tidings although old age has come upon me? Then of what [wonder] do you inform

locale.transliteration: Qaloo bashsharnaka bialhaqqi fala takun mina alqaniteena
locale.translation: They said, "We have given you good tidings in truth, so do not be of the despairing

locale.transliteration: Qala waman yaqnatu min rahmati rabbihi illa alddalloona
locale.translation: He said, "And who despairs of the mercy of his Lord except for those astray

locale.transliteration: Qala fama khatbukum ayyuha almursaloona
locale.translation: [Abraham] said, "Then what is your business [here], O messengers

locale.transliteration: Qaloo inna orsilna ila qawmin mujrimeena
locale.translation: They said, "Indeed, we have been sent to a people of criminals

locale.transliteration: Illa ala lootin inna lamunajjoohum ajmaAAeena
locale.translation: Except the family of Lot; indeed, we will save them all

locale.transliteration: Illa imraatahu qaddarna innaha lamina alghabireena
locale.translation: Except his wife." Allah decreed that she is of those who remain behind

locale.transliteration: Falamma jaa ala lootin almursaloona
locale.translation: And when the messengers came to the family of Lot

locale.transliteration: Qala innakum qawmun munkaroona
locale.translation: He said, "Indeed, you are people unknown

locale.transliteration: Qaloo bal jinaka bima kanoo feehi yamtaroona
locale.translation: They said, "But we have come to you with that about which they were disputing

locale.transliteration: Waataynaka bialhaqqi wainna lasadiqoona
locale.translation: And we have come to you with truth, and indeed, we are truthful

locale.transliteration: Faasri biahlika biqitAAin mina allayli waittabiAA adbarahum wala yaltafit minkum ahadun waimdoo haythu tumaroona
locale.translation: So set out with your family during a portion of the night and follow behind them and let not anyone among you look back and continue on to where you are commanded

locale.transliteration: Waqadayna ilayhi thalika alamra anna dabira haolai maqtooAAun musbiheena
locale.translation: And We conveyed to him [the decree] of that matter: that those [sinners] would be eliminated by early morning

locale.transliteration: Wajaa ahlu almadeenati yastabshiroona
locale.translation: And the people of the city came rejoicing

locale.transliteration: Qala inna haolai dayfee fala tafdahooni
locale.translation: [Lot] said, "Indeed, these are my guests, so do not shame me

locale.transliteration: Waittaqoo Allaha wala tukhzooni
locale.translation: And fear Allah and do not disgrace me

locale.transliteration: Qaloo awalam nanhaka AAani alAAalameena
locale.translation: They said, "Have we not forbidden you from [protecting] people

locale.transliteration: Qala haolai banatee in kuntum faAAileena
locale.translation: [Lot] said, "These are my daughters - if you would be doers [of lawful marriage]

locale.transliteration: LaAAamruka innahum lafee sakratihim yaAAmahoona
locale.translation: By your life, [O Muhammad], indeed they were, in their intoxication, wandering blindly

locale.transliteration: Faakhathathumu alssayhatu mushriqeena
locale.translation: So the shriek seized them at sunrise

locale.transliteration: FajaAAalna AAaliyaha safilaha waamtarna AAalayhim hijaratan min sijjeelin
locale.translation: And We made the highest part [of the city] its lowest and rained upon them stones of hard clay

locale.transliteration: Inna fee thalika laayatin lilmutawassimeena
locale.translation: Indeed in that are signs for those who discern

locale.transliteration: Wainnaha labisabeelin muqeemin
locale.translation: And indeed, those cities are [situated] on an established road

locale.transliteration: Inna fee thalika laayatan lilmumineena
locale.translation: Indeed in that is a sign for the believers

locale.transliteration: Wain kana ashabu alaykati lathalimeena
locale.translation: And the companions of the thicket were [also] wrongdoers

locale.transliteration: Faintaqamna minhum wainnahuma labiimamin mubeenin
locale.translation: So We took retribution from them, and indeed, both [cities] are on a clear highway

locale.transliteration: Walaqad kaththaba ashabu alhijri almursaleena
locale.translation: And certainly did the companions of Thamud deny the messengers

locale.transliteration: Waataynahum ayatina fakanoo AAanha muAArideena
locale.translation: And We gave them Our signs, but from them they were turning away

locale.transliteration: Wakanoo yanhitoona mina aljibali buyootan amineena
locale.translation: And they used to carve from the mountains, houses, feeling secure

locale.transliteration: Faakhathathumu alssayhatu musbiheena
locale.translation: But the shriek seized them at early morning

locale.transliteration: Fama aghna AAanhum ma kanoo yaksiboona
locale.translation: So nothing availed them [from] what they used to earn

locale.transliteration: Wama khalaqna alssamawati waalarda wama baynahuma illa bialhaqqi wainna alssaAAata laatiyatun faisfahi alssafha aljameela
locale.translation: And We have not created the heavens and earth and that between them except in truth. And indeed, the Hour is coming; so forgive with gracious forgiveness

locale.transliteration: Inna rabbaka huwa alkhallaqu alAAaleemu
locale.translation: Indeed, your Lord - He is the Knowing Creator

locale.transliteration: Walaqad ataynaka sabAAan mina almathanee waalqurana alAAatheema
locale.translation: And We have certainly given you, [O Muhammad], seven of the often repeated [verses] and the great Qur'an

locale.transliteration: La tamuddanna AAaynayka ila ma mattaAAna bihi azwajan minhum wala tahzan AAalayhim waikhfid janahaka lilmumineena
locale.translation: Do not extend your eyes toward that by which We have given enjoyment to [certain] categories of the disbelievers, and do not grieve over them. And lower your wing to the believers

locale.transliteration: Waqul innee ana alnnatheeru almubeenu
locale.translation: And say, "Indeed, I am the clear warner

locale.transliteration: Kama anzalna AAala almuqtasimeena
locale.translation: Just as We had revealed [scriptures] to the separators

locale.transliteration: Allatheena jaAAaloo alqurana AAideena
locale.translation: Who have made the Qur'an into portions

locale.transliteration: Fawarabbika lanasalannahum ajmaAAeena
locale.translation: So by your Lord, We will surely question them all

locale.transliteration: AAamma kanoo yaAAmaloona
locale.translation: About what they used to do

locale.transliteration: FaisdaAA bima tumaru waaAArid AAani almushrikeena
locale.translation: Then declare what you are commanded and turn away from the polytheists

locale.transliteration: Inna kafaynaka almustahzieena
locale.translation: Indeed, We are sufficient for you against the mockers

locale.transliteration: Allatheena yajAAaloona maAAa Allahi ilahan akhara fasawfa yaAAlamoona
locale.translation: Who make [equal] with Allah another deity. But they are going to know

locale.transliteration: Walaqad naAAlamu annaka yadeequ sadruka bima yaqooloona
locale.translation: And We already know that your breast is constrained by what they say

locale.transliteration: Fasabbih bihamdi rabbika wakun mina alssajideena
locale.translation: So exalt [Allah] with praise of your Lord and be of those who prostrate [to Him]

locale.transliteration: WaoAAbud rabbaka hatta yatiyaka alyaqeenu
locale.translation: And worship your Lord until there comes to you the certainty (death)

locale.transliteration: An-Nahl
locale.translation: The Bee

locale.transliteration: Ata amru Allahi fala tastaAAjiloohu subhanahu wataAAala AAamma yushrikoona
locale.translation: The command of Allah is coming, so be not impatient for it. Exalted is He and high above what they associate with Him

locale.transliteration: Yunazzilu almalaikata bialrroohi min amrihi AAala man yashao min AAibadihi an anthiroo annahu la ilaha illa ana faittaqooni
locale.translation: He sends down the angels, with the inspiration of His command, upon whom He wills of His servants, [telling them], "Warn that there is no deity except Me; so fear Me

locale.transliteration: Khalaqa alssamawati waalarda bialhaqqi taAAala AAamma yushrikoona
locale.translation: He created the heavens and earth in truth. High is He above what they associate with Him

locale.transliteration: Khalaqa alinsana min nutfatin faitha huwa khaseemun mubeenun
locale.translation: He created man from a sperm-drop; then at once, he is a clear adversary

locale.transliteration: WaalanAAama khalaqaha lakum feeha difon wamanafiAAu waminha takuloona
locale.translation: And the grazing livestock He has created for you; in them is warmth and [numerous] benefits, and from them you eat

locale.transliteration: Walakum feeha jamalun heena tureehoona waheena tasrahoona
locale.translation: And for you in them is [the enjoyment of] beauty when you bring them in [for the evening] and when you send them out [to pasture]

locale.transliteration: Watahmilu athqalakum ila baladin lam takoonoo baligheehi illa bishiqqi alanfusi inna rabbakum laraoofun raheemun
locale.translation: And they carry your loads to a land you could not have reached except with difficulty to yourselves. Indeed, your Lord is Kind and Merciful

locale.transliteration: Waalkhayla waalbighala waalhameera litarkabooha wazeenatan wayakhluqu ma la taAAlamoona
locale.translation: And [He created] the horses, mules and donkeys for you to ride and [as] adornment. And He creates that which you do not know

locale.transliteration: WaAAala Allahi qasdu alssabeeli waminha jairun walaw shaa lahadakum ajmaAAeena
locale.translation: And upon Allah is the direction of the [right] way, and among the various paths are those deviating. And if He willed, He could have guided you all

locale.transliteration: Huwa allathee anzala mina alssamai maan lakum minhu sharabun waminhu shajarun feehi tuseemoona
locale.translation: It is He who sends down rain from the sky; from it is drink and from it is foliage in which you pasture [animals]

locale.transliteration: Yunbitu lakum bihi alzzarAAa waalzzaytoona waalnnakheela waalaAAnaba wamin kulli alththamarati inna fee thalika laayatan liqawmin yatafakkaroona
locale.translation: He causes to grow for you thereby the crops, olives, palm trees, grapevines, and from all the fruits. Indeed in that is a sign for a people who give thought

locale.transliteration: Wasakhkhara lakumu allayla waalnnahara waalshshamsa waalqamara waalnnujoomu musakhkharatun biamrihi inna fee thalika laayatin liqawmin yaAAqiloona
locale.translation: And He has subjected for you the night and day and the sun and moon, and the stars are subjected by His command. Indeed in that are signs for a people who reason

locale.transliteration: Wama tharaa lakum fee alardi mukhtalifan alwanuhu inna fee thalika laayatan liqawmin yaththakkaroona
locale.translation: And [He has subjected] whatever He multiplied for you on the earth of varying colors. Indeed in that is a sign for a people who remember

locale.transliteration: Wahuwa allathee sakhkhara albahra litakuloo minhu lahman tariyyan watastakhrijoo minhu hilyatan talbasoonaha watara alfulka mawakhira feehi walitabtaghoo min fadlihi walaAAallakum tashkuroona
locale.translation: And it is He who subjected the sea for you to eat from it tender meat and to extract from it ornaments which you wear. And you see the ships plowing through it, and [He subjected it] that you may seek of His bounty; and perhaps you will be grateful

locale.transliteration: Waalqa fee alardi rawasiya an tameeda bikum waanharan wasubulan laAAallakum tahtadoona
locale.translation: And He has cast into the earth firmly set mountains, lest it shift with you, and [made] rivers and roads, that you may be guided

locale.transliteration: WaAAalamatin wabialnnajmi hum yahtadoona
locale.translation: And landmarks. And by the stars they are [also] guided

locale.transliteration: Afaman yakhluqu kaman la yakhluqu afala tathakkaroona
locale.translation: Then is He who creates like one who does not create? So will you not be reminded

locale.transliteration: Wain taAAuddoo niAAmata Allahi la tuhsooha inna Allaha laghafoorun raheemun
locale.translation: And if you should count the favors of Allah, you could not enumerate them. Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful

locale.transliteration: WaAllahu yaAAlamu ma tusirroona wama tuAAlinoona
locale.translation: And Allah knows what you conceal and what you declare

locale.transliteration: Waallatheena yadAAoona min dooni Allahi la yakhluqoona shayan wahum yukhlaqoona
locale.translation: And those they invoke other than Allah create nothing, and they [themselves] are created

locale.transliteration: Amwatun ghayru ahyain wama yashAAuroona ayyana yubAAathoona
locale.translation: They are, [in fact], dead, not alive, and they do not perceive when they will be resurrected

locale.transliteration: Ilahukum ilahun wahidun faallatheena la yuminoona bialakhirati quloobuhum munkiratun wahum mustakbiroona
locale.translation: Your god is one God. But those who do not believe in the Hereafter - their hearts are disapproving, and they are arrogant

locale.transliteration: La jarama anna Allaha yaAAlamu ma yusirroona wama yuAAlinoona innahu la yuhibbu almustakbireena
locale.translation: Assuredly, Allah knows what they conceal and what they declare. Indeed, He does not like the arrogant

locale.transliteration: Waitha qeela lahum matha anzala rabbukum qaloo asateeru alawwaleena
locale.translation: And when it is said to them, "What has your Lord sent down?" They say, "Legends of the former peoples

locale.transliteration: Liyahmiloo awzarahum kamilatan yawma alqiyamati wamin awzari allatheena yudilloonahum bighayri AAilmin ala saa ma yaziroona
locale.translation: That they may bear their own burdens in full on the Day of Resurrection and some of the burdens of those whom they misguide without knowledge. Unquestionably, evil is that which they bear

locale.transliteration: Qad makara allatheena min qablihim faata Allahu bunyanahum mina alqawaAAidi fakharra AAalayhimu alssaqfu min fawqihim waatahumu alAAathabu min haythu la yashAAuroona
locale.translation: Those before them had already plotted, but Allah came at their building from the foundations, so the roof fell upon them from above them, and the punishment came to them from where they did not perceive

locale.transliteration: Thumma yawma alqiyamati yukhzeehim wayaqoolu ayna shurakaiya allatheena kuntum tushaqqoona feehim qala allatheena ootoo alAAilma inna alkhizya alyawma waalssooa AAala alkafireena
locale.translation: Then on the Day of Resurrection He will disgrace them and say, "Where are My 'partners' for whom you used to oppose [the believers]?" Those who were given knowledge will say, "Indeed disgrace, this Day, and evil are upon the disbelievers

locale.transliteration: Allatheena tatawaffahumu almalaikatu thalimee anfusihim faalqawoo alssalama ma kunna naAAmalu min sooin bala inna Allaha AAaleemun bima kuntum taAAmaloona
locale.translation: The ones whom the angels take in death [while] wronging themselves, and [who] then offer submission, [saying], "We were not doing any evil." But, yes! Indeed, Allah is Knowing of what you used to do

locale.transliteration: Faodkhuloo abwaba jahannama khalideena feeha falabisa mathwa almutakabbireena
locale.translation: So enter the gates of Hell to abide eternally therein, and how wretched is the residence of the arrogant

locale.transliteration: Waqeela lillatheena ittaqaw matha anzala rabbukum qaloo khayran lillatheena ahsanoo fee hathihi alddunya hasanatun waladaru alakhirati khayrun walaniAAma daru almuttaqeena
locale.translation: And it will be said to those who feared Allah, "What did your Lord send down?" They will say, "[That which is] good." For those who do good in this world is good; and the home of the Hereafter is better. And how excellent is the home of the righteous

locale.transliteration: Jannatu AAadnin yadkhuloonaha tajree min tahtiha alanharu lahum feeha ma yashaoona kathalika yajzee Allahu almuttaqeena
locale.translation: Gardens of perpetual residence, which they will enter, beneath which rivers flow. They will have therein whatever they wish. Thus does Allah reward the righteous

locale.transliteration: Allatheena tatawaffahumu almalaikatu tayyibeena yaqooloona salamun AAalaykumu odkhuloo aljannata bima kuntum taAAmaloona
locale.translation: The ones whom the angels take in death, [being] good and pure; [the angels] will say, "Peace be upon you. Enter Paradise for what you used to do

locale.transliteration: Hal yanthuroona illa an tatiyahumu almalaikatu aw yatiya amru rabbika kathalika faAAala allatheena min qablihim wama thalamahumu Allahu walakin kanoo anfusahum yathlimoona
locale.translation: Do the disbelievers await [anything] except that the angels should come to them or there comes the command of your Lord? Thus did those do before them. And Allah wronged them not, but they had been wronging themselves

locale.transliteration: Faasabahum sayyiatu ma AAamiloo wahaqa bihim ma kanoo bihi yastahzioona
locale.translation: So they were struck by the evil consequences of what they did and were enveloped by what they used to ridicule

locale.transliteration: Waqala allatheena ashrakoo law shaa Allahu ma AAabadna min doonihi min shayin nahnu wala abaona wala harramna min doonihi min shayin kathalika faAAala allatheena min qablihim fahal AAala alrrusuli illa albalaghu almubeenu
locale.translation: And those who associate others with Allah say, "If Allah had willed, we would not have worshipped anything other than Him, neither we nor our fathers, nor would we have forbidden anything through other than Him." Thus did those do before them. So is there upon the messengers except [the duty of] clear notification

locale.transliteration: Walaqad baAAathna fee kulli ommatin rasoolan ani oAAbudoo Allaha waijtaniboo alttaghoota faminhum man hada Allahu waminhum man haqqat AAalayhi alddalalatu faseeroo fee alardi faonthuroo kayfa kana AAaqibatu almukaththibeena
locale.translation: And We certainly sent into every nation a messenger, [saying], "Worship Allah and avoid Taghut." And among them were those whom Allah guided, and among them were those upon whom error was [deservedly] decreed. So proceed through the earth and observe how was the end of the deniers

locale.transliteration: In tahris AAala hudahum fainna Allaha la yahdee man yudillu wama lahum min nasireena
locale.translation: [Even] if you should strive for their guidance, [O Muhammad], indeed, Allah does not guide those He sends astray, and they will have no helpers

locale.transliteration: Waaqsamoo biAllahi jahda aymanihim la yabAAathu Allahu man yamootu bala waAAdan AAalayhi haqqan walakinna akthara alnnasi la yaAAlamoona
locale.translation: And they swear by Allah their strongest oaths [that] Allah will not resurrect one who dies. But yes - [it is] a true promise [binding] upon Him, but most of the people do not know

locale.transliteration: Liyubayyina lahumu allathee yakhtalifoona feehi waliyaAAlama allatheena kafaroo annahum kanoo kathibeena
locale.translation: [It is] so He will make clear to them [the truth of] that wherein they differ and so those who have disbelieved may know that they were liars

locale.transliteration: Innama qawluna lishayin itha aradnahu an naqoola lahu kun fayakoonu
locale.translation: Indeed, Our word to a thing when We intend it is but that We say to it, "Be," and it is

locale.transliteration: Waallatheena hajaroo fee Allahi min baAAdi ma thulimoo lanubawwiannahum fee alddunya hasanatan walaajru alakhirati akbaru law kanoo yaAAlamoona
locale.translation: And those who emigrated for [the cause of] Allah after they had been wronged - We will surely settle them in this world in a good place; but the reward of the Hereafter is greater, if only they could know

locale.transliteration: Allatheena sabaroo waAAala rabbihim yatawakkaloona
locale.translation: [They are] those who endured patiently and upon their Lord relied

locale.transliteration: Wama arsalna min qablika illa rijalan noohee ilayhim faisaloo ahla alththikri in kuntum la taAAlamoona
locale.translation: And We sent not before you except men to whom We revealed [Our message]. So ask the people of the message if you do not know

locale.transliteration: Bialbayyinati waalzzuburi waanzalna ilayka alththikra litubayyina lilnnasi ma nuzzila ilayhim walaAAallahum yatafakkaroona
locale.translation: [We sent them] with clear proofs and written ordinances. And We revealed to you the message that you may make clear to the people what was sent down to them and that they might give thought

locale.transliteration: Afaamina allatheena makaroo alssayyiati an yakhsifa Allahu bihimu alarda aw yatiyahumu alAAathabu min haythu la yashAAuroona
locale.translation: Then, do those who have planned evil deeds feel secure that Allah will not cause the earth to swallow them or that the punishment will not come upon them from where they do not perceive

locale.transliteration: Aw yakhuthahum fee taqallubihim fama hum bimuAAjizeena
locale.translation: Or that He would not seize them during their [usual] activity, and they could not cause failure

locale.transliteration: Aw yakhuthahum AAala takhawwufin fainna rabbakum laraoofun raheemun
locale.translation: Or that He would not seize them gradually [in a state of dread]? But indeed, your Lord is Kind and Merciful

locale.transliteration: Awa lam yaraw ila ma khalaqa Allahu min shayin yatafayyao thilaluhu AAani alyameeni waalshshamaili sujjadan lillahi wahum dakhiroona
locale.translation: Have they not considered what things Allah has created? Their shadows incline to the right and to the left, prostrating to Allah, while they are humble

locale.transliteration: Walillahi yasjudu ma fee alssamawati wama fee alardi min dabbatin waalmalaikatu wahum la yastakbiroona
locale.translation: And to Allah prostrates whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth of creatures, and the angels [as well], and they are not arrogant

locale.transliteration: Yakhafoona rabbahum min fawqihim wayafAAaloona ma yumaroona
locale.translation: They fear their Lord above them, and they do what they are commanded

locale.transliteration: Waqala Allahu la tattakhithoo ilahayni ithnayni innama huwa ilahun wahidun faiyyaya fairhabooni
locale.translation: And Allah has said, "Do not take for yourselves two deities. He is but one God, so fear only Me

locale.transliteration: Walahu ma fee alssamawati waalardi walahu alddeenu wasiban afaghayra Allahi tattaqoona
locale.translation: And to Him belongs whatever is in the heavens and the earth, and to Him is [due] worship constantly. Then is it other than Allah that you fear

locale.transliteration: Wama bikum min niAAmatin famina Allahi thumma itha massakumu alddurru failayhi tajaroona
locale.translation: And whatever you have of favor - it is from Allah. Then when adversity touches you, to Him you cry for help

locale.transliteration: Thumma itha kashafa alddurra AAankum itha fareequn minkum birabbihim yushrikoona
locale.translation: Then when He removes the adversity from you, at once a party of you associates others with their Lord

locale.transliteration: Liyakfuroo bima ataynahum fatamattaAAoo fasawfa taAAlamoona
locale.translation: So they will deny what We have given them. Then enjoy yourselves, for you are going to know

locale.transliteration: WayajAAaloona lima la yaAAlamoona naseeban mimma razaqnahum taAllahi latusalunna AAamma kuntum taftaroona
locale.translation: And they assign to what they do not know a portion of that which We have provided them. By Allah, you will surely be questioned about what you used to invent

locale.transliteration: WayajAAaloona lillahi albanati subhanahu walahum ma yashtahoona
locale.translation: And they attribute to Allah daughters - exalted is He - and for them is what they desire

locale.transliteration: Waitha bushshira ahaduhum bialontha thalla wajhuhu muswaddan wahuwa katheemun
locale.translation: And when one of them is informed of [the birth of] a female, his face becomes dark, and he suppresses grief

locale.transliteration: Yatawara mina alqawmi min sooi ma bushshira bihi ayumsikuhu AAala hoonin am yadussuhu fee altturabi ala saa ma yahkumoona
locale.translation: He hides himself from the people because of the ill of which he has been informed. Should he keep it in humiliation or bury it in the ground? Unquestionably, evil is what they decide

locale.transliteration: Lillatheena la yuminoona bialakhirati mathalu alssawi walillahi almathalu alaAAla wahuwa alAAazeezu alhakeemu
locale.translation: For those who do not believe in the Hereafter is the description of evil; and for Allah is the highest attribute. And He is Exalted in Might, the Wise

locale.transliteration: Walaw yuakhithu Allahu alnnasa bithulmihim ma taraka AAalayha min dabbatin walakin yuakhkhiruhum ila ajalin musamman faitha jaa ajaluhum la yastakhiroona saAAatan wala yastaqdimoona
locale.translation: And if Allah were to impose blame on the people for their wrongdoing, He would not have left upon the earth any creature, but He defers them for a specified term. And when their term has come, they will not remain behind an hour, nor will they precede [it]

locale.transliteration: WayajAAaloona lillahi ma yakrahoona watasifu alsinatuhumu alkathiba anna lahumu alhusna la jarama anna lahumu alnnara waannahum mufratoona
locale.translation: And they attribute to Allah that which they dislike, and their tongues assert the lie that they will have the best [from Him]. Assuredly, they will have the Fire, and they will be [therein] neglected

locale.transliteration: TaAllahi laqad arsalna ila omamin min qablika fazayyana lahumu alshshaytanu aAAmalahum fahuwa waliyyuhumu alyawma walahum AAathabun aleemun
locale.translation: By Allah, We did certainly send [messengers] to nations before you, but Satan made their deeds attractive to them. And he is the disbelievers' ally today [as well], and they will have a painful punishment

locale.transliteration: Wama anzalna AAalayka alkitaba illa litubayyina lahumu allathee ikhtalafoo feehi wahudan warahmatan liqawmin yuminoona
locale.translation: And We have not revealed to you the Book, [O Muhammad], except for you to make clear to them that wherein they have differed and as guidance and mercy for a people who believe

locale.transliteration: WaAllahu anzala mina alssamai maan faahya bihi alarda baAAda mawtiha inna fee thalika laayatan liqawmin yasmaAAoona
locale.translation: And Allah has sent down rain from the sky and given life thereby to the earth after its lifelessness. Indeed in that is a sign for a people who listen

locale.transliteration: Wainna lakum fee alanAAami laAAibratan nusqeekum mimma fee butoonihi min bayni farthin wadamin labanan khalisan saighan lilshsharibeena
locale.translation: And indeed, for you in grazing livestock is a lesson. We give you drink from what is in their bellies - between excretion and blood - pure milk, palatable to drinkers

locale.transliteration: Wamin thamarati alnnakheeli waalaAAnabi tattakhithoona minhu sakaran warizqan hasanan inna fee thalika laayatan liqawmin yaAAqiloona
locale.translation: And from the fruits of the palm trees and grapevines you take intoxicant and good provision. Indeed in that is a sign for a people who reason

locale.transliteration: Waawha rabbuka ila alnnahli ani ittakhithee mina aljibali buyootan wamina alshshajari wamimma yaAArishoona
locale.translation: And your Lord inspired to the bee, "Take for yourself among the mountains, houses, and among the trees and [in] that which they construct

locale.transliteration: Thumma kulee min kulli alththamarati faoslukee subula rabbiki thululan yakhruju min butooniha sharabun mukhtalifun alwanuhu feehi shifaon lilnnasi inna fee thalika laayatan liqawmin yatafakkaroona
locale.translation: Then eat from all the fruits and follow the ways of your Lord laid down [for you]." There emerges from their bellies a drink, varying in colors, in which there is healing for people. Indeed in that is a sign for a people who give thought

locale.transliteration: WaAllahu khalaqakum thumma yatawaffakum waminkum man yuraddu ila arthali alAAumuri likay la yaAAlama baAAda AAilmin shayan inna Allaha AAaleemun qadeerun
locale.translation: And Allah created you; then He will take you in death. And among you is he who is reversed to the most decrepit [old] age so that he will not know, after [having had] knowledge, a thing. Indeed, Allah is Knowing and Competent

locale.transliteration: WaAllahu faddala baAAdakum AAala baAAdin fee alrrizqi fama allatheena fuddiloo biraddee rizqihim AAala ma malakat aymanuhum fahum feehi sawaon afabiniAAmati Allahi yajhadoona
locale.translation: And Allah has favored some of you over others in provision. But those who were favored would not hand over their provision to those whom their right hands possess so they would be equal to them therein. Then is it the favor of Allah they reject

locale.transliteration: WaAllahu jaAAala lakum min anfusikum azwajan wajaAAala lakum min azwajikum baneena wahafadatan warazaqakum mina alttayyibati afabialbatili yuminoona wabiniAAmati Allahi hum yakfuroona
locale.translation: And Allah has made for you from yourselves mates and has made for you from your mates sons and grandchildren and has provided for you from the good things. Then in falsehood do they believe and in the favor of Allah they disbelieve

locale.transliteration: WayaAAbudoona min dooni Allahi ma la yamliku lahum rizqan mina alssamawati waalardi shayan wala yastateeAAoona
locale.translation: And they worship besides Allah that which does not possess for them [the power of] provision from the heavens and the earth at all, and [in fact], they are unable

locale.transliteration: Fala tadriboo lillahi alamthala inna Allaha yaAAlamu waantum la taAAlamoona
locale.translation: So do not assert similarities to Allah. Indeed, Allah knows and you do not know

locale.transliteration: Daraba Allahu mathalan AAabdan mamlookan la yaqdiru AAala shayin waman razaqnahu minna rizqan hasanan fahuwa yunfiqu minhu sirran wajahran hal yastawoona alhamdu lillahi bal aktharuhum la yaAAlamoona
locale.translation: Allah presents an example: a slave [who is] owned and unable to do a thing and he to whom We have provided from Us good provision, so he spends from it secretly and publicly. Can they be equal? Praise to Allah! But most of them do not know

locale.transliteration: Wadaraba Allahu mathalan rajulayni ahaduhuma abkamu la yaqdiru AAala shayin wahuwa kallun AAala mawlahu aynama yuwajjihhu la yati bikhayrin hal yastawee huwa waman yamuru bialAAadli wahuwa AAala siratin mustaqeemin
locale.translation: And Allah presents an example of two men, one of them dumb and unable to do a thing, while he is a burden to his guardian. Wherever he directs him, he brings no good. Is he equal to one who commands justice, while he is on a straight path

locale.transliteration: Walillahi ghaybu alssamawati waalardi wama amru alssaAAati illa kalamhi albasari aw huwa aqrabu inna Allaha AAala kulli shayin qadeerun
locale.translation: And to Allah belongs the unseen [aspects] of the heavens and the earth. And the command for the Hour is not but as a glance of the eye or even nearer. Indeed, Allah is over all things competent

locale.transliteration: WaAllahu akhrajakum min butooni ommahatikum la taAAlamoona shayan wajaAAala lakumu alssamAAa waalabsara waalafidata laAAallakum tashkuroona
locale.translation: And Allah has extracted you from the wombs of your mothers not knowing a thing, and He made for you hearing and vision and intellect that perhaps you would be grateful

locale.transliteration: Alam yaraw ila alttayri musakhkharatin fee jawwi alssamai ma yumsikuhunna illa Allahu inna fee thalika laayatin liqawmin yuminoona
locale.translation: Do they not see the birds controlled in the atmosphere of the sky? None holds them up except Allah. Indeed in that are signs for a people who believe

locale.transliteration: WaAllahu jaAAala lakum min buyootikum sakanan wajaAAala lakum min juloodi alanAAami buyootan tastakhiffoonaha yawma thaAAnikum wayawma iqamatikum wamin aswafiha waawbariha waashAAariha athathan wamataAAan ila heenin
locale.translation: And Allah has made for you from your homes a place of rest and made for you from the hides of the animals tents which you find light on your day of travel and your day of encampment; and from their wool, fur and hair is furnishing and enjoyment for a time

locale.transliteration: WaAllahu jaAAala lakum mimma khalaqa thilalan wajaAAala lakum mina aljibali aknanan wajaAAala lakum sarabeela taqeekumu alharra wasarabeela taqeekum basakum kathalika yutimmu niAAmatahu AAalaykum laAAallakum tuslimoona
locale.translation: And Allah has made for you, from that which He has created, shadows and has made for you from the mountains, shelters and has made for you garments which protect you from the heat and garments which protect you from your [enemy in] battle. Thus does He complete His favor upon you that you might submit [to Him]

locale.transliteration: Fain tawallaw fainnama AAalayka albalaghu almubeenu
locale.translation: But if they turn away, [O Muhammad] - then only upon you is [responsibility for] clear notification

locale.transliteration: YaAArifoona niAAmata Allahi thumma yunkiroonaha waaktharuhumu alkafiroona
locale.translation: They recognize the favor of Allah; then they deny it. And most of them are disbelievers

locale.transliteration: Wayawma nabAAathu min kulli ommatin shaheedan thumma la yuthanu lillatheena kafaroo wala hum yustaAAtaboona
locale.translation: And [mention] the Day when We will resurrect from every nation a witness. Then it will not be permitted to the disbelievers [to apologize or make excuses], nor will they be asked to appease [Allah]

locale.transliteration: Waitha raa allatheena thalamoo alAAathaba fala yukhaffafu AAanhum wala hum yuntharoona
locale.translation: And when those who wronged see the punishment, it will not be lightened for them, nor will they be reprieved

locale.transliteration: Waitha raa allatheena ashrakoo shurakaahum qaloo rabbana haolai shurakaona allatheena kunna nadAAoo min doonika faalqaw ilayhimu alqawla innakum lakathiboona
locale.translation: And when those who associated others with Allah see their "partners," they will say," Our Lord, these are our partners [to You] whom we used to invoke besides You." But they will throw at them the statement, "Indeed, you are liars

locale.transliteration: Waalqaw ila Allahi yawmaithin alssalama wadalla AAanhum ma kanoo yaftaroona
locale.translation: And they will impart to Allah that Day [their] submission, and lost from them is what they used to invent

locale.transliteration: Allatheena kafaroo wasaddoo AAan sabeeli Allahi zidnahum AAathaban fawqa alAAathabi bima kanoo yufsidoona
locale.translation: Those who disbelieved and averted [others] from the way of Allah - We will increase them in punishment over [their] punishment for what corruption they were causing

locale.transliteration: Wayawma nabAAathu fee kulli ommatin shaheedan AAalayhim min anfusihim wajina bika shaheedan AAala haolai wanazzalna AAalayka alkitaba tibyanan likulli shayin wahudan warahmatan wabushra lilmuslimeena
locale.translation: And [mention] the Day when We will resurrect among every nation a witness over them from themselves. And We will bring you, [O Muhammad], as a witness over your nation. And We have sent down to you the Book as clarification for all things and as guidance and mercy and good tidings for the Muslims

locale.transliteration: Inna Allaha yamuru bialAAadli waalihsani waeetai thee alqurba wayanha AAani alfahshai waalmunkari waalbaghyi yaAAithukum laAAallakum tathakkaroona
locale.translation: Indeed, Allah orders justice and good conduct and giving to relatives and forbids immorality and bad conduct and oppression. He admonishes you that perhaps you will be reminded

locale.transliteration: Waawfoo biAAahdi Allahi itha AAahadtum wala tanqudoo alaymana baAAda tawkeediha waqad jaAAaltumu Allaha AAalaykum kafeelan inna Allaha yaAAlamu ma tafAAaloona
locale.translation: And fulfill the covenant of Allah when you have taken it, [O believers], and do not break oaths after their confirmation while you have made Allah, over you, a witness. Indeed, Allah knows what you do

locale.transliteration: Wala takoonoo kaallatee naqadat ghazlaha min baAAdi quwwatin ankathan tattakhithoona aymanakum dakhalan baynakum an takoona ommatun hiya arba min ommatin innama yablookumu Allahu bihi walayubayyinanna lakum yawma alqiyamati ma kuntum feehi takhtalifoona
locale.translation: And do not be like she who untwisted her spun thread after it was strong [by] taking your oaths as [means of] deceit between you because one community is more plentiful [in number or wealth] than another community. Allah only tries you thereby. And He will surely make clear to you on the Day of Resurrection that over which you used to differ

locale.transliteration: Walaw shaa Allahu lajaAAalakum ommatan wahidatan walakin yudillu man yashao wayahdee man yashao walatusalunna AAamma kuntum taAAmaloona
locale.translation: And if Allah had willed, He could have made you [of] one religion, but He causes to stray whom He wills and guides whom He wills. And you will surely be questioned about what you used to do

locale.transliteration: Wala tattakhithoo aymanakum dakhalan baynakum fatazilla qadamun baAAda thubootiha watathooqoo alssooa bima sadadtum AAan sabeeli Allahi walakum AAathabun AAatheemun
locale.translation: And do not take your oaths as [means of] deceit between you, lest a foot slip after it was [once] firm, and you would taste evil [in this world] for what [people] you diverted from the way of Allah, and you would have [in the Hereafter] a great punishment

locale.transliteration: Wala tashtaroo biAAahdi Allahi thamanan qaleelan innama AAinda Allahi huwa khayrun lakum in kuntum taAAlamoona
locale.translation: And do not exchange the covenant of Allah for a small price. Indeed, what is with Allah is best for you, if only you could know

locale.transliteration: Ma AAindakum yanfadu wama AAinda Allahi baqin walanajziyanna allatheena sabaroo ajrahum biahsani ma kanoo yaAAmaloona
locale.translation: Whatever you have will end, but what Allah has is lasting. And We will surely give those who were patient their reward according to the best of what they used to do

locale.transliteration: Man AAamila salihan min thakarin aw ontha wahuwa muminun falanuhyiyannahu hayatan tayyibatan walanajziyannahum ajrahum biahsani ma kanoo yaAAmaloona
locale.translation: Whoever does righteousness, whether male or female, while he is a believer - We will surely cause him to live a good life, and We will surely give them their reward [in the Hereafter] according to the best of what they used to do

locale.transliteration: Faitha qarata alqurana faistaAAith biAllahi mina alshshaytani alrrajeemi
locale.translation: So when you recite the Qur'an, [first] seek refuge in Allah from Satan, the expelled [from His mercy]

locale.transliteration: Innahu laysa lahu sultanun AAala allatheena amanoo waAAala rabbihim yatawakkaloona
locale.translation: Indeed, there is for him no authority over those who have believed and rely upon their Lord

locale.transliteration: Innama sultanuhu AAala allatheena yatawallawnahu waallatheena hum bihi mushrikoona
locale.translation: His authority is only over those who take him as an ally and those who through him associate others with Allah

locale.transliteration: Waitha baddalna ayatan makana ayatin waAllahu aAAlamu bima yunazzilu qaloo innama anta muftarin bal aktharuhum la yaAAlamoona
locale.translation: And when We substitute a verse in place of a verse - and Allah is most knowing of what He sends down - they say, "You, [O Muhammad], are but an inventor [of lies]." But most of them do not know

locale.transliteration: Qul nazzalahu roohu alqudusi min rabbika bialhaqqi liyuthabbita allatheena amanoo wahudan wabushra lilmuslimeena
locale.translation: Say, [O Muhammad], "The Pure Spirit has brought it down from your Lord in truth to make firm those who believe and as guidance and good tidings to the Muslims

locale.transliteration: Walaqad naAAlamu annahum yaqooloona innama yuAAallimuhu basharun lisanu allathee yulhidoona ilayhi aAAjamiyyun wahatha lisanun AAarabiyyun mubeenun
locale.translation: And We certainly know that they say, "It is only a human being who teaches the Prophet." The tongue of the one they refer to is foreign, and this Qur'an is [in] a clear Arabic language

locale.transliteration: Inna allatheena la yuminoona biayati Allahi la yahdeehimu Allahu walahum AAathabun aleemun
locale.translation: Indeed, those who do not believe in the verses of Allah - Allah will not guide them, and for them is a painful punishment

locale.transliteration: Innama yaftaree alkathiba allatheena la yuminoona biayati Allahi waolaika humu alkathiboona
locale.translation: They only invent falsehood who do not believe in the verses of Allah, and it is those who are the liars

locale.transliteration: Man kafara biAllahi min baAAdi eemanihi illa man okriha waqalbuhu mutmainnun bialeemani walakin man sharaha bialkufri sadran faAAalayhim ghadabun mina Allahi walahum AAathabun AAatheemun
locale.translation: Whoever disbelieves in Allah after his belief... except for one who is forced [to renounce his religion] while his heart is secure in faith. But those who [willingly] open their breasts to disbelief, upon them is wrath from Allah, and for them is a great punishment

locale.transliteration: Thalika biannahumu istahabboo alhayata alddunya AAala alakhirati waanna Allaha la yahdee alqawma alkafireena
locale.translation: That is because they preferred the worldly life over the Hereafter and that Allah does not guide the disbelieving people

locale.transliteration: Olaika allatheena tabaAAa Allahu AAala quloobihim wasamAAihim waabsarihim waolaika humu alghafiloona
locale.translation: Those are the ones over whose hearts and hearing and vision Allah has sealed, and it is those who are the heedless

locale.transliteration: La jarama annahum fee alakhirati humu alkhasiroona
locale.translation: Assuredly, it is they, in the Hereafter, who will be the losers

locale.transliteration: Thumma inna rabbaka lillatheena hajaroo min baAAdi ma futinoo thumma jahadoo wasabaroo inna rabbaka min baAAdiha laghafoorun raheemun
locale.translation: Then, indeed your Lord, to those who emigrated after they had been compelled [to renounce their religion] and thereafter fought [for the cause of Allah] and were patient - indeed, your Lord, after that, is Forgiving and Merciful

locale.transliteration: Yawma tatee kullu nafsin tujadilu AAan nafsiha watuwaffa kullu nafsin ma AAamilat wahum la yuthlamoona
locale.translation: On the Day when every soul will come disputing for itself, and every soul will be fully compensated for what it did, and they will not be wronged

locale.transliteration: Wadaraba Allahu mathalan qaryatan kanat aminatan mutmainnatan yateeha rizquha raghadan min kulli makanin fakafarat bianAAumi Allahi faathaqaha Allahu libasa aljooAAi waalkhawfi bima kanoo yasnaAAoona
locale.translation: And Allah presents an example: a city which was safe and secure, its provision coming to it in abundance from every location, but it denied the favors of Allah. So Allah made it taste the envelopment of hunger and fear for what they had been doing

locale.transliteration: Walaqad jaahum rasoolun minhum fakaththaboohu faakhathahumu alAAathabu wahum thalimoona
locale.translation: And there had certainly come to them a Messenger from among themselves, but they denied him; so punishment overtook them while they were wrongdoers

locale.transliteration: Fakuloo mimma razaqakumu Allahu halalan tayyiban waoshkuroo niAAmata Allahi in kuntum iyyahu taAAbudoona
locale.translation: Then eat of what Allah has provided for you [which is] lawful and good. And be grateful for the favor of Allah, if it is [indeed] Him that you worship

locale.transliteration: Innama harrama AAalaykumu almaytata waalddama walahma alkhinzeeri wama ohilla lighayri Allahi bihi famani idturra ghayra baghin wala AAadin fainna Allaha ghafoorun raheemun
locale.translation: He has only forbidden to you dead animals, blood, the flesh of swine, and that which has been dedicated to other than Allah. But whoever is forced [by necessity], neither desiring [it] nor transgressing [its limit] - then indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful

locale.transliteration: Wala taqooloo lima tasifu alsinatukumu alkathiba hatha halalun wahatha haramun litaftaroo AAala Allahi alkathiba inna allatheena yaftaroona AAala Allahi alkathiba la yuflihoona
locale.translation: And do not say about what your tongues assert of untruth, "This is lawful and this is unlawful," to invent falsehood about Allah. Indeed, those who invent falsehood about Allah will not succeed

locale.transliteration: MataAAun qaleelun walahum AAathabun aleemun
locale.translation: [It is but] a brief enjoyment, and they will have a painful punishment

locale.transliteration: WaAAala allatheena hadoo harramna ma qasasna AAalayka min qablu wama thalamnahum walakin kanoo anfusahum yathlimoona
locale.translation: And to those who are Jews We have prohibited that which We related to you before. And We did not wrong them [thereby], but they were wronging themselves

locale.transliteration: Thumma inna rabbaka lillatheena AAamiloo alssooa bijahalatin thumma taboo min baAAdi thalika waaslahoo inna rabbaka min baAAdiha laghafoorun raheemun
locale.translation: Then, indeed your Lord, to those who have done wrong out of ignorance and then repent after that and correct themselves - indeed, your Lord, thereafter, is Forgiving and Merciful

locale.transliteration: Inna ibraheema kana ommatan qanitan lillahi haneefan walam yaku mina almushrikeena
locale.translation: Indeed, Abraham was a [comprehensive] leader, devoutly obedient to Allah, inclining toward truth, and he was not of those who associate others with Allah

locale.transliteration: Shakiran lianAAumihi ijtabahu wahadahu ila siratin mustaqeemin
locale.translation: [He was] grateful for His favors. Allah chose him and guided him to a straight path

locale.transliteration: Waataynahu fee alddunya hasanatan wainnahu fee alakhirati lamina alssaliheena
locale.translation: And We gave him good in this world, and indeed, in the Hereafter he will be among the righteous

locale.transliteration: Thumma awhayna ilayka ani ittabiAA millata ibraheema haneefan wama kana mina almushrikeena
locale.translation: Then We revealed to you, [O Muhammad], to follow the religion of Abraham, inclining toward truth; and he was not of those who associate with Allah

locale.transliteration: Innama juAAila alssabtu AAala allatheena ikhtalafoo feehi wainna rabbaka layahkumu baynahum yawma alqiyamati feema kanoo feehi yakhtalifoona
locale.translation: The sabbath was only appointed for those who differed over it. And indeed, your Lord will judge between them on the Day of Resurrection concerning that over which they used to differ

locale.transliteration: OdAAu ila sabeeli rabbika bialhikmati waalmawAAithati alhasanati wajadilhum biallatee hiya ahsanu inna rabbaka huwa aAAlamu biman dalla AAan sabeelihi wahuwa aAAlamu bialmuhtadeena
locale.translation: Invite to the way of your Lord with wisdom and good instruction, and argue with them in a way that is best. Indeed, your Lord is most knowing of who has strayed from His way, and He is most knowing of who is [rightly] guided

locale.transliteration: Wain AAaqabtum faAAaqiboo bimithli ma AAooqibtum bihi walain sabartum lahuwa khayrun lilssabireena
locale.translation: And if you punish [an enemy, O believers], punish with an equivalent of that with which you were harmed. But if you are patient - it is better for those who are patient

locale.transliteration: Waisbir wama sabruka illa biAllahi wala tahzan AAalayhim wala taku fee dayqin mimma yamkuroona
locale.translation: And be patient, [O Muhammad], and your patience is not but through Allah. And do not grieve over them and do not be in distress over what they conspire

locale.transliteration: Inna Allaha maAAa allatheena ittaqaw waallatheena hum muhsinoona
locale.translation: Indeed, Allah is with those who fear Him and those who are doers of good

locale.transliteration: Al-Isra
locale.translation: The Night Journey

locale.transliteration: Subhana allathee asra biAAabdihi laylan mina almasjidi alharami ila almasjidi alaqsa allathee barakna hawlahu linuriyahu min ayatina innahu huwa alssameeAAu albaseeru
locale.translation: Exalted is He who took His Servant by night from al-Masjid al-Haram to al-Masjid al-Aqsa, whose surroundings We have blessed, to show him of Our signs. Indeed, He is the Hearing, the Seeing

locale.transliteration: Waatayna moosa alkitaba wajaAAalnahu hudan libanee israeela alla tattakhithoo min doonee wakeelan
locale.translation: And We gave Moses the Scripture and made it a guidance for the Children of Israel that you not take other than Me as Disposer of affairs

locale.transliteration: Thurriyyata man hamalna maAAa noohin innahu kana AAabdan shakooran
locale.translation: O descendants of those We carried [in the ship] with Noah. Indeed, he was a grateful servant

locale.transliteration: Waqadayna ila banee israeela fee alkitabi latufsidunna fee alardi marratayni walataAAlunna AAuluwwan kabeeran
locale.translation: And We conveyed to the Children of Israel in the Scripture that, "You will surely cause corruption on the earth twice, and you will surely reach [a degree of] great haughtiness

locale.transliteration: Faitha jaa waAAdu oolahuma baAAathna AAalaykum AAibadan lana olee basin shadeedin fajasoo khilala alddiyari wakana waAAdan mafAAoolan
locale.translation: So when the [time of] promise came for the first of them, We sent against you servants of Ours - those of great military might, and they probed [even] into the homes, and it was a promise fulfilled

locale.transliteration: Thumma radadna lakumu alkarrata AAalayhim waamdadnakum biamwalin wabaneena wajaAAalnakum akthara nafeeran
locale.translation: Then We gave back to you a return victory over them. And We reinforced you with wealth and sons and made you more numerous in manpower

locale.transliteration: In ahsantum ahsantum lianfusikum wain asatum falaha faitha jaa waAAdu alakhirati liyasoooo wujoohakum waliyadkhuloo almasjida kama dakhaloohu awwala marratin waliyutabbiroo ma AAalaw tatbeeran
locale.translation: [And said], "If you do good, you do good for yourselves; and if you do evil, [you do it] to yourselves." Then when the final promise came, [We sent your enemies] to sadden your faces and to enter the temple in Jerusalem, as they entered it the first time, and to destroy what they had taken over with [total] destruction

locale.transliteration: AAasa rabbukum an yarhamakum wain AAudtum AAudna wajaAAalna jahannama lilkafireena haseeran
locale.translation: [Then Allah said], "It is expected, [if you repent], that your Lord will have mercy upon you. But if you return [to sin], We will return [to punishment]. And We have made Hell, for the disbelievers, a prison-bed

locale.transliteration: Inna hatha alqurana yahdee lillatee hiya aqwamu wayubashshiru almumineena allatheena yaAAmaloona alssalihati anna lahum ajran kabeeran
locale.translation: Indeed, this Qur'an guides to that which is most suitable and gives good tidings to the believers who do righteous deeds that they will have a great reward

locale.transliteration: Waanna allatheena la yuminoona bialakhirati aAAtadna lahum AAathaban aleeman
locale.translation: And that those who do not believe in the Hereafter - We have prepared for them a painful punishment

locale.transliteration: WayadAAu alinsanu bialshsharri duAAaahu bialkhayri wakana alinsanu AAajoolan
locale.translation: And man supplicates for evil as he supplicates for good, and man is ever hasty

locale.transliteration: WajaAAalna allayla waalnnahara ayatayni famahawna ayata allayli wajaAAalna ayata alnnahari mubsiratan litabtaghoo fadlan min rabbikum walitaAAlamoo AAadada alssineena waalhisaba wakulla shayin fassalnahu tafseelan
locale.translation: And We have made the night and day two signs, and We erased the sign of the night and made the sign of the day visible that you may seek bounty from your Lord and may know the number of years and the account [of time]. And everything We have set out in detail

locale.transliteration: Wakulla insanin alzamnahu tairahu fee AAunuqihi wanukhriju lahu yawma alqiyamati kitaban yalqahu manshooran
locale.translation: And [for] every person We have imposed his fate upon his neck, and We will produce for him on the Day of Resurrection a record which he will encounter spread open

locale.transliteration: Iqra kitabaka kafa binafsika alyawma AAalayka haseeban
locale.translation: [It will be said], "Read your record. Sufficient is yourself against you this Day as accountant

locale.transliteration: Mani ihtada fainnama yahtadee linafsihi waman dalla fainnama yadillu AAalayha wala taziru waziratun wizra okhra wama kunna muAAaththibeena hatta nabAAatha rasoolan
locale.translation: Whoever is guided is only guided for [the benefit of] his soul. And whoever errs only errs against it. And no bearer of burdens will bear the burden of another. And never would We punish until We sent a messenger

locale.transliteration: Waitha aradna an nuhlika qaryatan amarna mutrafeeha fafasaqoo feeha fahaqqa AAalayha alqawlu fadammarnaha tadmeeran
locale.translation: And when We intend to destroy a city, We command its affluent but they defiantly disobey therein; so the word comes into effect upon it, and We destroy it with [complete] destruction

locale.transliteration: Wakam ahlakna mina alqurooni min baAAdi noohin wakafa birabbika bithunoobi AAibadihi khabeeran baseeran
locale.translation: And how many have We destroyed from the generations after Noah. And sufficient is your Lord, concerning the sins of His servants, as Acquainted and Seeing

locale.transliteration: Man kana yureedu alAAajilata AAajjalna lahu feeha ma nashao liman nureedu thumma jaAAalna lahu jahannama yaslaha mathmooman madhooran
locale.translation: Whoever should desire the immediate - We hasten for him from it what We will to whom We intend. Then We have made for him Hell, which he will [enter to] burn, censured and banished

locale.transliteration: Waman arada alakhirata wasaAAa laha saAAyaha wahuwa muminun faolaika kana saAAyuhum mashkooran
locale.translation: But whoever desires the Hereafter and exerts the effort due to it while he is a believer - it is those whose effort is ever appreciated [by Allah]

locale.transliteration: Kullan numiddu haolai wahaolai min AAatai rabbika wama kana AAatao rabbika mahthooran
locale.translation: To each [category] We extend - to these and to those - from the gift of your Lord. And never has the gift of your Lord been restricted

locale.transliteration: Onthur kayfa faddalna baAAdahum AAala baAAdin walalakhiratu akbaru darajatin waakbaru tafdeelan
locale.translation: Look how We have favored [in provision] some of them over others. But the Hereafter is greater in degrees [of difference] and greater in distinction

locale.transliteration: La tajAAal maAAa Allahi ilahan akhara fataqAAuda mathmooman makhthoolan
locale.translation: Do not make [as equal] with Allah another deity and [thereby] become censured and forsaken

locale.transliteration: Waqada rabbuka alla taAAbudoo illa iyyahu wabialwalidayni ihsanan imma yablughanna AAindaka alkibara ahaduhuma aw kilahuma fala taqul lahuma offin wala tanharhuma waqul lahuma qawlan kareeman
locale.translation: And your Lord has decreed that you not worship except Him, and to parents, good treatment. Whether one or both of them reach old age [while] with you, say not to them [so much as], "uff," and do not repel them but speak to them a noble word

locale.transliteration: Waikhfid lahuma janaha alththulli mina alrrahmati waqul rabbi irhamhuma kama rabbayanee sagheeran
locale.translation: And lower to them the wing of humility out of mercy and say, "My Lord, have mercy upon them as they brought me up [when I was] small

locale.transliteration: Rabbukum aAAlamu bima fee nufoosikum in takoonoo saliheena fainnahu kana lilawwabeena ghafooran
locale.translation: Your Lord is most knowing of what is within yourselves. If you should be righteous [in intention] - then indeed He is ever, to the often returning [to Him], Forgiving

locale.transliteration: Waati tha alqurba haqqahu waalmiskeena waibna alssabeeli wala tubaththir tabtheeran
locale.translation: And give the relative his right, and [also] the poor and the traveler, and do not spend wastefully

locale.transliteration: Inna almubaththireena kanoo ikhwana alshshayateeni wakana alshshaytanu lirabbihi kafooran
locale.translation: Indeed, the wasteful are brothers of the devils, and ever has Satan been to his Lord ungrateful

locale.transliteration: Waimma tuAAridanna AAanhumu ibtighaa rahmatin min rabbika tarjooha faqul lahum qawlan maysooran
locale.translation: And if you [must] turn away from the needy awaiting mercy from your Lord which you expect, then speak to them a gentle word

locale.transliteration: Wala tajAAal yadaka maghloolatan ila AAunuqika wala tabsutha kulla albasti fataqAAuda malooman mahsooran
locale.translation: And do not make your hand [as] chained to your neck or extend it completely and [thereby] become blamed and insolvent

locale.transliteration: Inna rabbaka yabsutu alrrizqa liman yashao wayaqdiru innahu kana biAAibadihi khabeeran baseeran
locale.translation: Indeed, your Lord extends provision for whom He wills and restricts [it]. Indeed He is ever, concerning His servants, Acquainted and Seeing

locale.transliteration: Wala taqtuloo awladakum khashyata imlaqin nahnu narzuquhum waiyyakum inna qatlahum kana khitan kabeeran
locale.translation: And do not kill your children for fear of poverty. We provide for them and for you. Indeed, their killing is ever a great sin

locale.transliteration: Wala taqraboo alzzina innahu kana fahishatan wasaa sabeelan
locale.translation: And do not approach unlawful sexual intercourse. Indeed, it is ever an immorality and is evil as a way

locale.transliteration: Wala taqtuloo alnnafsa allatee harrama Allahu illa bialhaqqi waman qutila mathlooman faqad jaAAalna liwaliyyihi sultanan fala yusrif fee alqatli innahu kana mansooran
locale.translation: And do not kill the soul which Allah has forbidden, except by right. And whoever is killed unjustly - We have given his heir authority, but let him not exceed limits in [the matter of] taking life. Indeed, he has been supported [by the law]

locale.transliteration: Wala taqraboo mala alyateemi illa biallatee hiya ahsanu hatta yablugha ashuddahu waawfoo bialAAahdi inna alAAahda kana masoolan
locale.translation: And do not approach the property of an orphan, except in the way that is best, until he reaches maturity. And fulfill [every] commitment. Indeed, the commitment is ever [that about which one will be] questioned

locale.transliteration: Waawfoo alkayla itha kiltum wazinoo bialqistasi almustaqeemi thalika khayrun waahsanu taweelan
locale.translation: And give full measure when you measure, and weigh with an even balance. That is the best [way] and best in result

locale.transliteration: Wala taqfu ma laysa laka bihi AAilmun inna alssamAAa waalbasara waalfuada kullu olaika kana AAanhu masoolan
locale.translation: And do not pursue that of which you have no knowledge. Indeed, the hearing, the sight and the heart - about all those [one] will be questioned

locale.transliteration: Wala tamshi fee alardi marahan innaka lan takhriqa alarda walan tablugha aljibala toolan
locale.translation: And do not walk upon the earth exultantly. Indeed, you will never tear the earth [apart], and you will never reach the mountains in height

locale.transliteration: Kullu thalika kana sayyiohu AAinda rabbika makroohan
locale.translation: All that - its evil is ever, in the sight of your Lord, detested

locale.transliteration: Thalika mimma awha ilayka rabbuka mina alhikmati wala tajAAal maAAa Allahi ilahan akhara fatulqa fee jahannama malooman madhooran
locale.translation: That is from what your Lord has revealed to you, [O Muhammad], of wisdom. And, [O mankind], do not make [as equal] with Allah another deity, lest you be thrown into Hell, blamed and banished

locale.transliteration: Afaasfakum rabbukum bialbaneena waittakhatha mina almalaikati inathan innakum lataqooloona qawlan AAatheeman
locale.translation: Then, has your Lord chosen you for [having] sons and taken from among the angels daughters? Indeed, you say a grave saying

locale.transliteration: Walaqad sarrafna fee hatha alqurani liyaththakkaroo wama yazeeduhum illa nufooran
locale.translation: And We have certainly diversified [the contents] in this Qur'an that mankind may be reminded, but it does not increase the disbelievers except in aversion

locale.transliteration: Qul law kana maAAahu alihatun kama yaqooloona ithan laibtaghaw ila thee alAAarshi sabeelan
locale.translation: Say, [O Muhammad], "If there had been with Him [other] gods, as they say, then they [each] would have sought to the Owner of the Throne a way

locale.transliteration: Subhanahu wataAAala AAamma yaqooloona AAuluwwan kabeeran
locale.translation: Exalted is He and high above what they say by great sublimity

locale.transliteration: Tusabbihu lahu alssamawatu alssabAAu waalardu waman feehinna wain min shayin illa yusabbihu bihamdihi walakin la tafqahoona tasbeehahum innahu kana haleeman ghafooran
locale.translation: The seven heavens and the earth and whatever is in them exalt Him. And there is not a thing except that it exalts [Allah] by His praise, but you do not understand their [way of] exalting. Indeed, He is ever Forbearing and Forgiving

locale.transliteration: Waitha qarata alqurana jaAAalna baynaka wabayna allatheena la yuminoona bialakhirati hijaban mastooran
locale.translation: And when you recite the Qur'an, We put between you and those who do not believe in the Hereafter a concealed partition

locale.transliteration: WajaAAalna AAala quloobihim akinnatan an yafqahoohu wafee athanihim waqran waitha thakarta rabbaka fee alqurani wahdahu wallaw AAala adbarihim nufooran
locale.translation: And We have placed over their hearts coverings, lest they understand it, and in their ears deafness. And when you mention your Lord alone in the Qur'an, they turn back in aversion

locale.transliteration: Nahnu aAAlamu bima yastamiAAoona bihi ith yastamiAAoona ilayka waith hum najwa ith yaqoolu alththalimoona in tattabiAAoona illa rajulan mashooran
locale.translation: We are most knowing of how they listen to it when they listen to you and [of] when they are in private conversation, when the wrongdoers say, "You follow not but a man affected by magic

locale.transliteration: Onthur kayfa daraboo laka alamthala fadalloo fala yastateeAAoona sabeelan
locale.translation: Look how they strike for you comparisons; but they have strayed, so they cannot [find] a way

locale.transliteration: Waqaloo aitha kunna AAithaman warufatan ainna lamabAAoothoona khalqan jadeedan
locale.translation: And they say, "When we are bones and crumbled particles, will we [truly] be resurrected as a new creation

locale.transliteration: Qul koonoo hijaratan aw hadeedan
locale.translation: Say, "Be you stones or iron

locale.transliteration: Aw khalqan mimma yakburu fee sudoorikum fasayaqooloona man yuAAeeduna quli allathee fatarakum awwala marratin fasayunghidoona ilayka ruoosahum wayaqooloona mata huwa qul AAasa an yakoona qareeban
locale.translation: Or [any] creation of that which is great within your breasts." And they will say, "Who will restore us?" Say, "He who brought you forth the first time." Then they will nod their heads toward you and say, "When is that?" Say, "Perhaps it will be soon

locale.transliteration: Yawma yadAAookum fatastajeeboona bihamdihi watathunnoona in labithtum illa qaleelan
locale.translation: On the Day He will call you and you will respond with praise of Him and think that you had not remained [in the world] except for a little

locale.transliteration: Waqul liAAibadee yaqooloo allatee hiya ahsanu inna alshshaytana yanzaghu baynahum inna alshshaytana kana lilinsani AAaduwwan mubeenan
locale.translation: And tell My servants to say that which is best. Indeed, Satan induces [dissension] among them. Indeed Satan is ever, to mankind, a clear enemy

locale.transliteration: Rabbukum aAAlamu bikum in yasha yarhamkum aw in yasha yuAAaththibkum wama arsalnaka AAalayhim wakeelan
locale.translation: Your Lord is most knowing of you. If He wills, He will have mercy upon you; or if He wills, He will punish you. And We have not sent you, [O Muhammad], over them as a manager

locale.transliteration: Warabbuka aAAlamu biman fee alssamawati waalardi walaqad faddalna baAAda alnnabiyyeena AAala baAAdin waatayna dawooda zabooran
locale.translation: And your Lord is most knowing of whoever is in the heavens and the earth. And We have made some of the prophets exceed others [in various ways], and to David We gave the book [of Psalms]

locale.transliteration: Quli odAAu allatheena zaAAamtum min doonihi fala yamlikoona kashfa alddurri AAankum wala tahweelan
locale.translation: Say, "Invoke those you have claimed [as gods] besides Him, for they do not possess the [ability for] removal of adversity from you or [for its] transfer [to someone else]

locale.transliteration: Olaika allatheena yadAAoona yabtaghoona ila rabbihimu alwaseelata ayyuhum aqrabu wayarjoona rahmatahu wayakhafoona AAathabahu inna AAathaba rabbika kana mahthooran
locale.translation: Those whom they invoke seek means of access to their Lord, [striving as to] which of them would be nearest, and they hope for His mercy and fear His punishment. Indeed, the punishment of your Lord is ever feared

locale.transliteration: Wain min qaryatin illa nahnu muhlikooha qabla yawmi alqiyamati aw muAAaththibooha AAathaban shadeedan kana thalika fee alkitabi mastooran
locale.translation: And there is no city but that We will destroy it before the Day of Resurrection or punish it with a severe punishment. That has ever been in the Register inscribed

locale.transliteration: Wama manaAAana an nursila bialayati illa an kaththaba biha alawwaloona waatayna thamooda alnnaqata mubsiratan fathalamoo biha wama nursilu bialayati illa takhweefan
locale.translation: And nothing has prevented Us from sending signs except that the former peoples denied them. And We gave Thamud the she-camel as a visible sign, but they wronged her. And We send not the signs except as a warning

locale.transliteration: Waith qulna laka inna rabbaka ahata bialnnasi wama jaAAalna alrruya allatee araynaka illa fitnatan lilnnasi waalshshajarata almalAAoonata fee alqurani wanukhawwifuhum fama yazeeduhum illa tughyanan kabeeran
locale.translation: And [remember, O Muhammad], when We told you, "Indeed, your Lord has encompassed the people." And We did not make the sight which We showed you except as a trial for the people, as was the accursed tree [mentioned] in the Qur'an. And We threaten them, but it increases them not except in great transgression

locale.transliteration: Waith qulna lilmalaikati osjudoo liadama fasajadoo illa ibleesa qala aasjudu liman khalaqta teenan
locale.translation: And [mention] when We said to the angles, "Prostrate to Adam," and they prostrated, except for Iblees. He said, "Should I prostrate to one You created from clay

locale.transliteration: Qala araaytaka hatha allathee karramta AAalayya lain akhkhartani ila yawmi alqiyamati laahtanikanna thurriyyatahu illa qaleelan
locale.translation: [Iblees] said, "Do You see this one whom You have honored above me? If You delay me until the Day of Resurrection, I will surely destroy his descendants, except for a few

locale.transliteration: Qala ithhab faman tabiAAaka minhum fainna jahannama jazaokum jazaan mawfooran
locale.translation: [Allah] said, "Go, for whoever of them follows you, indeed Hell will be the recompense of you - an ample recompense

locale.transliteration: Waistafziz mani istataAAta minhum bisawtika waajlib AAalayhim bikhaylika warajlika washarikhum fee alamwali waalawladi waAAidhum wama yaAAiduhumu alshshaytanu illa ghurooran
locale.translation: And incite [to senselessness] whoever you can among them with your voice and assault them with your horses and foot soldiers and become a partner in their wealth and their children and promise them." But Satan does not promise them except delusion

locale.transliteration: Inna AAibadee laysa laka AAalayhim sultanun wakafa birabbika wakeelan
locale.translation: Indeed, over My [believing] servants there is for you no authority. And sufficient is your Lord as Disposer of affairs

locale.transliteration: Rabbukumu allathee yuzjee lakumu alfulka fee albahri litabtaghoo min fadlihi innahu kana bikum raheeman
locale.translation: It is your Lord who drives the ship for you through the sea that you may seek of His bounty. Indeed, He is ever, to you, Merciful

locale.transliteration: Waitha massakumu alddurru fee albahri dalla man tadAAoona illa iyyahu falamma najjakum ila albarri aAAradtum wakana alinsanu kafooran
locale.translation: And when adversity touches you at sea, lost are [all] those you invoke except for Him. But when He delivers you to the land, you turn away [from Him]. And ever is man ungrateful

locale.transliteration: Afaamintum an yakhsifa bikum janiba albarri aw yursila AAalaykum hasiban thumma la tajidoo lakum wakeelan
locale.translation: Then do you feel secure that [instead] He will not cause a part of the land to swallow you or send against you a storm of stones? Then you would not find for yourselves an advocate

locale.transliteration: Am amintum an yuAAeedakum feehi taratan okhra fayursila AAalaykum qasifan mina alrreehi fayughriqakum bima kafartum thumma la tajidoo lakum AAalayna bihi tabeeAAan
locale.translation: Or do you feel secure that He will not send you back into the sea another time and send upon you a hurricane of wind and drown you for what you denied? Then you would not find for yourselves against Us an avenger

locale.transliteration: Walaqad karramna banee adama wahamalnahum fee albarri waalbahri warazaqnahum mina alttayyibati wafaddalnahum AAala katheerin mimman khalaqna tafdeelan
locale.translation: And We have certainly honored the children of Adam and carried them on the land and sea and provided for them of the good things and preferred them over much of what We have created, with [definite] preference

locale.transliteration: Yawma nadAAoo kulla onasin biimamihim faman ootiya kitabahu biyameenihi faolaika yaqraoona kitabahum wala yuthlamoona fateelan
locale.translation: [Mention, O Muhammad], the Day We will call forth every people with their record [of deeds]. Then whoever is given his record in his right hand - those will read their records, and injustice will not be done to them, [even] as much as a thread [inside the date seed]

locale.transliteration: Waman kana fee hathihi aAAma fahuwa fee alakhirati aAAma waadallu sabeelan
locale.translation: And whoever is blind in this [life] will be blind in the Hereafter and more astray in way

locale.transliteration: Wain kadoo layaftinoonaka AAani allathee awhayna ilayka litaftariya AAalayna ghayrahu waithan laittakhathooka khaleelan
locale.translation: And indeed, they were about to tempt you away from that which We revealed to you in order to [make] you invent about Us something else; and then they would have taken you as a friend

locale.transliteration: Walawla an thabbatnaka laqad kidta tarkanu ilayhim shayan qaleelan
locale.translation: And if We had not strengthened you, you would have almost inclined to them a little

locale.transliteration: Ithan laathaqnaka diAAfa alhayati wadiAAfa almamati thumma la tajidu laka AAalayna naseeran
locale.translation: Then [if you had], We would have made you taste double [punishment in] life and double [after] death. Then you would not find for yourself against Us a helper

locale.transliteration: Wain kadoo layastafizzoonaka mina alardi liyukhrijooka minha waithan la yalbathoona khilafaka illa qaleelan
