locale.translation: And indeed, they were about to drive you from the land to evict you therefrom. And then [when they do], they will not remain [there] after you, except for a little

locale.transliteration: Sunnata man qad arsalna qablaka min rusulina wala tajidu lisunnatina tahweelan
locale.translation: [That is Our] established way for those We had sent before you of Our messengers; and you will not find in Our way any alteration

locale.transliteration: Aqimi alssalata lidulooki alshshamsi ila ghasaqi allayli waqurana alfajri inna qurana alfajri kana mashhoodan
locale.translation: Establish prayer at the decline of the sun [from its meridian] until the darkness of the night and [also] the Qur'an of dawn. Indeed, the recitation of dawn is ever witnessed

locale.transliteration: Wamina allayli fatahajjad bihi nafilatan laka AAasa an yabAAathaka rabbuka maqaman mahmoodan
locale.translation: And from [part of] the night, pray with it as additional [worship] for you; it is expected that your Lord will resurrect you to a praised station

locale.transliteration: Waqul rabbi adkhilnee mudkhala sidqin waakhrijnee mukhraja sidqin waijAAal lee min ladunka sultanan naseeran
locale.translation: And say, "My Lord, cause me to enter a sound entrance and to exit a sound exit and grant me from Yourself a supporting authority

locale.transliteration: Waqul jaa alhaqqu wazahaqa albatilu inna albatila kana zahooqan
locale.translation: And say, "Truth has come, and falsehood has departed. Indeed is falsehood, [by nature], ever bound to depart

locale.transliteration: Wanunazzilu mina alqurani ma huwa shifaon warahmatun lilmumineena wala yazeedu alththalimeena illa khasaran
locale.translation: And We send down of the Qur'an that which is healing and mercy for the believers, but it does not increase the wrongdoers except in loss

locale.transliteration: Waitha anAAamna AAala alinsani aAArada wanaa bijanibihi waitha massahu alshsharru kana yaoosan
locale.translation: And when We bestow favor upon the disbeliever, he turns away and distances himself; and when evil touches him, he is ever despairing

locale.transliteration: Qul kullun yaAAmalu AAala shakilatihi farabbukum aAAlamu biman huwa ahda sabeelan
locale.translation: Say, "Each works according to his manner, but your Lord is most knowing of who is best guided in way

locale.transliteration: Wayasaloonaka AAani alrroohi quli alrroohu min amri rabbee wama ooteetum mina alAAilmi illa qaleelan
locale.translation: And they ask you, [O Muhammad], about the soul. Say, "The soul is of the affair of my Lord. And mankind have not been given of knowledge except a little

locale.transliteration: Walain shina lanathhabanna biallathee awhayna ilayka thumma la tajidu laka bihi AAalayna wakeelan
locale.translation: And if We willed, We could surely do away with that which We revealed to you. Then you would not find for yourself concerning it an advocate against Us

locale.transliteration: Illa rahmatan min rabbika inna fadlahu kana AAalayka kabeeran
locale.translation: Except [We have left it with you] as a mercy from your Lord. Indeed, His favor upon you has ever been great

locale.transliteration: Qul laini ijtamaAAati alinsu waaljinnu AAala an yatoo bimithli hatha alqurani la yatoona bimithlihi walaw kana baAAduhum libaAAdin thaheeran
locale.translation: Say, "If mankind and the jinn gathered in order to produce the like of this Qur'an, they could not produce the like of it, even if they were to each other assistants

locale.transliteration: Walaqad sarrafna lilnnasi fee hatha alqurani min kulli mathalin faaba aktharu alnnasi illa kufooran
locale.translation: And We have certainly diversified for the people in this Qur'an from every [kind] of example, but most of the people refused [anything] except disbelief

locale.transliteration: Waqaloo lan numina laka hatta tafjura lana mina alardi yanbooAAan
locale.translation: And they say, "We will not believe you until you break open for us from the ground a spring

locale.transliteration: Aw takoona laka jannatun min nakheelin waAAinabin fatufajjira alanhara khilalaha tafjeeran
locale.translation: Or [until] you have a garden of palm tress and grapes and make rivers gush forth within them in force [and abundance]

locale.transliteration: Aw tusqita alssamaa kama zaAAamta AAalayna kisafan aw tatiya biAllahi waalmalaikati qabeelan
locale.translation: Or you make the heaven fall upon us in fragments as you have claimed or you bring Allah and the angels before [us]

locale.transliteration: Aw yakoona laka baytun min zukhrufin aw tarqa fee alssamai walan numina liruqiyyika hatta tunazzila AAalayna kitaban naqraohu qul subhana rabbee hal kuntu illa basharan rasoolan
locale.translation: Or you have a house of gold or you ascend into the sky. And [even then], we will not believe in your ascension until you bring down to us a book we may read." Say, "Exalted is my Lord! Was I ever but a human messenger

locale.transliteration: Wama manaAAa alnnasa an yuminoo ith jaahumu alhuda illa an qaloo abaAAatha Allahu basharan rasoolan
locale.translation: And what prevented the people from believing when guidance came to them except that they said, "Has Allah sent a human messenger

locale.transliteration: Qul law kana fee alardi malaikatun yamshoona mutmainneena lanazzalna AAalayhim mina alssamai malakan rasoolan
locale.translation: Say, "If there were upon the earth angels walking securely, We would have sent down to them from the heaven an angel [as a] messenger

locale.transliteration: Qul kafa biAllahi shaheedan baynee wabaynakum innahu kana biAAibadihi khabeeran baseeran
locale.translation: Say, "Sufficient is Allah as Witness between me and you. Indeed he is ever, concerning His servants, Acquainted and Seeing

locale.transliteration: Waman yahdi Allahu fahuwa almuhtadi waman yudlil falan tajida lahum awliyaa min doonihi wanahshuruhum yawma alqiyamati AAala wujoohihim AAumyan wabukman wasumman mawahum jahannamu kullama khabat zidnahum saAAeeran
locale.translation: And whoever Allah guides - he is the [rightly] guided; and whoever He sends astray - you will never find for them protectors besides Him, and We will gather them on the Day of Resurrection [fallen] on their faces - blind, dumb and deaf. Their refuge is Hell; every time it subsides We increase them in blazing fire

locale.transliteration: Thalika jazaohum biannahum kafaroo biayatina waqaloo aitha kunna AAithaman warufatan ainna lamabAAoothoona khalqan jadeedan
locale.translation: That is their recompense because they disbelieved in Our verses and said, "When we are bones and crumbled particles, will we [truly] be resurrected [in] a new creation

locale.transliteration: Awalam yaraw anna Allaha allathee khalaqa alssamawati waalarda qadirun AAala an yakhluqa mithlahum wajaAAala lahum ajalan la rayba feehi faaba alththalimoona illa kufooran
locale.translation: Do they not see that Allah, who created the heavens and earth, is [the one] Able to create the likes of them? And He has appointed for them a term, about which there is no doubt. But the wrongdoers refuse [anything] except disbelief

locale.transliteration: Qul law antum tamlikoona khazaina rahmati rabbee ithan laamsaktum khashyata alinfaqi wakana alinsanu qatooran
locale.translation: Say [to them], "If you possessed the depositories of the mercy of my Lord, then you would withhold out of fear of spending." And ever has man been stingy

locale.transliteration: Walaqad atayna moosa tisAAa ayatin bayyinatin faisal banee israeela ith jaahum faqala lahu firAAawnu innee laathunnuka ya moosa mashooran
locale.translation: And We had certainly given Moses nine evident signs, so ask the Children of Israel [about] when he came to them and Pharaoh said to him, "Indeed I think, O Moses, that you are affected by magic

locale.transliteration: Qala laqad AAalimta ma anzala haolai illa rabbu alssamawati waalardi basaira wainnee laathunnuka ya firAAawnu mathbooran
locale.translation: [Moses] said, "You have already known that none has sent down these [signs] except the Lord of the heavens and the earth as evidence, and indeed I think, O Pharaoh, that you are destroyed

locale.transliteration: Faarada an yastafizzahum mina alardi faaghraqnahu waman maAAahu jameeAAan
locale.translation: So he intended to drive them from the land, but We drowned him and those with him all together

locale.transliteration: Waqulna min baAAdihi libanee israeela oskunoo alarda faitha jaa waAAdu alakhirati jina bikum lafeefan
locale.translation: And We said after Pharaoh to the Children of Israel, "Dwell in the land, and when there comes the promise of the Hereafter, We will bring you forth in [one] gathering

locale.transliteration: Wabialhaqqi anzalnahu wabialhaqqi nazala wama arsalnaka illa mubashshiran wanatheeran
locale.translation: And with the truth We have sent the Qur'an down, and with the truth it has descended. And We have not sent you, [O Muhammad], except as a bringer of good tidings and a warner

locale.transliteration: Waquranan faraqnahu litaqraahu AAala alnnasi AAala mukthin wanazzalnahu tanzeelan
locale.translation: And [it is] a Qur'an which We have separated [by intervals] that you might recite it to the people over a prolonged period. And We have sent it down progressively

locale.transliteration: Qul aminoo bihi aw la tuminoo inna allatheena ootoo alAAilma min qablihi itha yutla AAalayhim yakhirroona lilathqani sujjadan
locale.translation: Say, "Believe in it or do not believe. Indeed, those who were given knowledge before it - when it is recited to them, they fall upon their faces in prostration

locale.transliteration: Wayaqooloona subhana rabbina in kana waAAdu rabbina lamafAAoolan
locale.translation: And they say, "Exalted is our Lord! Indeed, the promise of our Lord has been fulfilled

locale.transliteration: Wayakhirroona lilathqani yabkoona wayazeeduhum khushooAAan
locale.translation: And they fall upon their faces weeping, and the Qur'an increases them in humble submission

locale.transliteration: Quli odAAoo Allaha awi odAAoo alrrahmana ayyan ma tadAAoo falahu alasmao alhusna wala tajhar bisalatika wala tukhafit biha waibtaghi bayna thalika sabeelan
locale.translation: Say, "Call upon Allah or call upon the Most Merciful. Whichever [name] you call - to Him belong the best names." And do not recite [too] loudly in your prayer or [too] quietly but seek between that an [intermediate] way

locale.transliteration: Waquli alhamdu lillahi allathee lam yattakhith waladan walam yakun lahu shareekun fee almulki walam yakun lahu waliyyun mina alththulli wakabbirhu takbeeran
locale.translation: And say, "Praise to Allah, who has not taken a son and has had no partner in [His] dominion and has no [need of a] protector out of weakness; and glorify Him with [great] glorification

locale.transliteration: Al-Kahf
locale.translation: The Cave

locale.transliteration: Alhamdu lillahi allathee anzala AAala AAabdihi alkitaba walam yajAAal lahu AAiwajan
locale.translation: [All] praise is [due] to Allah, who has sent down upon His Servant the Book and has not made therein any deviance

locale.transliteration: Qayyiman liyunthira basan shadeedan min ladunhu wayubashshira almumineena allatheena yaAAmaloona alssalihati anna lahum ajran hasanan
locale.translation: [He has made it] straight, to warn of severe punishment from Him and to give good tidings to the believers who do righteous deeds that they will have a good reward

locale.transliteration: Makitheena feehi abadan
locale.translation: In which they will remain forever

locale.transliteration: Wayunthira allatheena qaloo ittakhatha Allahu waladan
locale.translation: And to warn those who say, "Allah has taken a son

locale.transliteration: Ma lahum bihi min AAilmin wala liabaihim kaburat kalimatan takhruju min afwahihim in yaqooloona illa kathiban
locale.translation: They have no knowledge of it, nor had their fathers. Grave is the word that comes out of their mouths; they speak not except a lie

locale.transliteration: FalaAAallaka bakhiAAun nafsaka AAala atharihim in lam yuminoo bihatha alhadeethi asafan
locale.translation: Then perhaps you would kill yourself through grief over them, [O Muhammad], if they do not believe in this message, [and] out of sorrow

locale.transliteration: Inna jaAAalna ma AAala alardi zeenatan laha linabluwahum ayyuhum ahsanu AAamalan
locale.translation: Indeed, We have made that which is on the earth adornment for it that We may test them [as to] which of them is best in deed

locale.transliteration: Wainna lajaAAiloona ma AAalayha saAAeedan juruzan
locale.translation: And indeed, We will make that which is upon it [into] a barren ground

locale.transliteration: Am hasibta anna ashaba alkahfi waalrraqeemi kanoo min ayatina AAajaban
locale.translation: Or have you thought that the companions of the cave and the inscription were, among Our signs, a wonder

locale.transliteration: Ith awa alfityatu ila alkahfi faqaloo rabbana atina min ladunka rahmatan wahayyi lana min amrina rashadan
locale.translation: [Mention] when the youths retreated to the cave and said, "Our Lord, grant us from Yourself mercy and prepare for us from our affair right guidance

locale.transliteration: Fadarabna AAala athanihim fee alkahfi sineena AAadadan
locale.translation: So We cast [a cover of sleep] over their ears within the cave for a number of years

locale.transliteration: Thumma baAAathnahum linaAAlama ayyu alhizbayni ahsa lima labithoo amadan
locale.translation: Then We awakened them that We might show which of the two factions was most precise in calculating what [extent] they had remained in time

locale.transliteration: Nahnu naqussu AAalayka nabaahum bialhaqqi innahum fityatun amanoo birabbihim wazidnahum hudan
locale.translation: It is We who relate to you, [O Muhammad], their story in truth. Indeed, they were youths who believed in their Lord, and We increased them in guidance

locale.transliteration: Warabatna AAala quloobihim ith qamoo faqaloo rabbuna rabbu alssamawati waalardi lan nadAAuwa min doonihi ilahan laqad qulna ithan shatatan
locale.translation: And We made firm their hearts when they stood up and said, "Our Lord is the Lord of the heavens and the earth. Never will we invoke besides Him any deity. We would have certainly spoken, then, an excessive transgression

locale.transliteration: Haolai qawmuna ittakhathoo min doonihi alihatan lawla yatoona AAalayhim bisultanin bayyinin faman athlamu mimmani iftara AAala Allahi kathiban
locale.translation: These, our people, have taken besides Him deities. Why do they not bring for [worship of] them a clear authority? And who is more unjust than one who invents about Allah a lie

locale.transliteration: Waithi iAAtazaltumoohum wama yaAAbudoona illa Allaha fawoo ila alkahfi yanshur lakum rabbukum min rahmatihi wayuhayyi lakum min amrikum mirfaqan
locale.translation: [The youths said to one another], "And when you have withdrawn from them and that which they worship other than Allah, retreat to the cave. Your Lord will spread out for you of His mercy and will prepare for you from your affair facility

locale.transliteration: Watara alshshamsa itha talaAAat tazawaru AAan kahfihim thata alyameeni waitha gharabat taqriduhum thata alshshimali wahum fee fajwatin minhu thalika min ayati Allahi man yahdi Allahu fahuwa almuhtadi waman yudlil falan tajida lahu waliyyan murshidan
locale.translation: And [had you been present], you would see the sun when it rose, inclining away from their cave on the right, and when it set, passing away from them on the left, while they were [laying] within an open space thereof. That was from the signs of Allah. He whom Allah guides is the [rightly] guided, but he whom He leaves astray - never will you find for him a protecting guide

locale.transliteration: Watahsabuhum ayqathan wahum ruqoodun wanuqallibuhum thata alyameeni wathata alshshimali wakalbuhum basitun thiraAAayhi bialwaseedi lawi ittalaAAta AAalayhim lawallayta minhum firaran walamulita minhum ruAAban
locale.translation: And you would think them awake, while they were asleep. And We turned them to the right and to the left, while their dog stretched his forelegs at the entrance. If you had looked at them, you would have turned from them in flight and been filled by them with terror

locale.transliteration: Wakathalika baAAathnahum liyatasaaloo baynahum qala qailun minhum kam labithtum qaloo labithna yawman aw baAAda yawmin qaloo rabbukum aAAlamu bima labithtum faibAAathoo ahadakum biwariqikum hathihi ila almadeenati falyanthur ayyuha azka taAAaman falyatikum birizqin minhu walyatalattaf wala yushAAiranna bikum ahadan
locale.translation: And similarly, We awakened them that they might question one another. Said a speaker from among them, "How long have you remained [here]?" They said, "We have remained a day or part of a day." They said, "Your Lord is most knowing of how long you remained. So send one of you with this silver coin of yours to the city and let him look to which is the best of food and bring you provision from it and let him be cautious. And let no one be aware of you

locale.transliteration: Innahum in yathharoo AAalaykum yarjumookum aw yuAAeedookum fee millatihim walan tuflihoo ithan abadan
locale.translation: Indeed, if they come to know of you, they will stone you or return you to their religion. And never would you succeed, then - ever

locale.transliteration: Wakathalika aAAtharna AAalayhim liyaAAlamoo anna waAAda Allahi haqqun waanna alsaAAata la rayba feeha ith yatanazaAAoona baynahum amrahum faqaloo ibnoo AAalayhim bunyanan rabbuhum aAAlamu bihim qala allatheena ghalaboo AAala amrihim lanattakhithanna AAalayhim masjidan
locale.translation: And similarly, We caused them to be found that they [who found them] would know that the promise of Allah is truth and that of the Hour there is no doubt. [That was] when they disputed among themselves about their affair and [then] said, "Construct over them a structure. Their Lord is most knowing about them." Said those who prevailed in the matter, "We will surely take [for ourselves] over them a masjid

locale.transliteration: Sayaqooloona thalathatun rabiAAuhum kalbuhum wayaqooloona khamsatun sadisuhum kalbuhum rajman bialghaybi wayaqooloona sabAAatun wathaminuhum kalbuhum qul rabbee aAAlamu biAAiddatihim ma yaAAlamuhum illa qaleelun fala tumari feehim illa miraan thahiran wala tastafti feehim minhum ahadan
locale.translation: They will say there were three, the fourth of them being their dog; and they will say there were five, the sixth of them being their dog - guessing at the unseen; and they will say there were seven, and the eighth of them was their dog. Say, [O Muhammad], "My Lord is most knowing of their number. None knows them except a few. So do not argue about them except with an obvious argument and do not inquire about them among [the speculators] from anyone

locale.transliteration: Wala taqoolanna lishayin innee faAAilun thalika ghadan
locale.translation: And never say of anything, "Indeed, I will do that tomorrow

locale.transliteration: Illa an yashaa Allahu waothkur rabbaka itha naseeta waqul AAasa an yahdiyani rabbee liaqraba min hatha rashadan
locale.translation: Except [when adding], "If Allah wills." And remember your Lord when you forget [it] and say, "Perhaps my Lord will guide me to what is nearer than this to right conduct

locale.transliteration: Walabithoo fee kahfihim thalatha miatin sineena waizdadoo tisAAan
locale.translation: And they remained in their cave for three hundred years and exceeded by nine

locale.transliteration: Quli Allahu aAAlamu bima labithoo lahu ghaybu alssamawati waalardi absir bihi waasmiAA ma lahum min doonihi min waliyyin wala yushriku fee hukmihi ahadan
locale.translation: Say, "Allah is most knowing of how long they remained. He has [knowledge of] the unseen [aspects] of the heavens and the earth. How Seeing is He and how Hearing! They have not besides Him any protector, and He shares not His legislation with anyone

locale.transliteration: Waotlu ma oohiya ilayka min kitabi rabbika la mubaddila likalimatihi walan tajida min doonihi multahadan
locale.translation: And recite, [O Muhammad], what has been revealed to you of the Book of your Lord. There is no changer of His words, and never will you find in other than Him a refuge

locale.transliteration: Waisbir nafsaka maAAa allatheena yadAAoona rabbahum bialghadati waalAAashiyyi yureedoona wajhahu wala taAAdu AAaynaka AAanhum tureedu zeenata alhayati alddunya wala tutiAA man aghfalna qalbahu AAan thikrina waittabaAAa hawahu wakana amruhu furutan
locale.translation: And keep yourself patient [by being] with those who call upon their Lord in the morning and the evening, seeking His countenance. And let not your eyes pass beyond them, desiring adornments of the worldly life, and do not obey one whose heart We have made heedless of Our remembrance and who follows his desire and whose affair is ever [in] neglect

locale.transliteration: Waquli alhaqqu min rabbikum faman shaa falyumin waman shaa falyakfur inna aAAtadna lilththalimeena naran ahata bihim suradiquha wain yastagheethoo yughathoo bimain kaalmuhli yashwee alwujooha bisa alshsharabu wasaat murtafaqan
locale.translation: And say, "The truth is from your Lord, so whoever wills - let him believe; and whoever wills - let him disbelieve." Indeed, We have prepared for the wrongdoers a fire whose walls will surround them. And if they call for relief, they will be relieved with water like murky oil, which scalds [their] faces. Wretched is the drink, and evil is the resting place

locale.transliteration: Inna allatheena amanoo waAAamiloo alssalihati inna la nudeeAAu ajra man ahsana AAamalan
locale.translation: Indeed, those who have believed and done righteous deeds - indeed, We will not allow to be lost the reward of any who did well in deeds

locale.transliteration: Olaika lahum jannatu AAadnin tajree min tahtihimu alanharu yuhallawna feeha min asawira min thahabin wayalbasoona thiyaban khudran min sundusin waistabraqin muttakieena feeha AAala alaraiki niAAma alththawabu wahasunat murtafaqan
locale.translation: Those will have gardens of perpetual residence; beneath them rivers will flow. They will be adorned therein with bracelets of gold and will wear green garments of fine silk and brocade, reclining therein on adorned couches. Excellent is the reward, and good is the resting place

locale.transliteration: Waidrib lahum mathalan rajulayni jaAAalna liahadihima jannatayni min aAAnabin wahafafnahuma binakhlin wajaAAalna baynahuma zarAAan
locale.translation: And present to them an example of two men: We granted to one of them two gardens of grapevines, and We bordered them with palm trees and placed between them [fields of] crops

locale.transliteration: Kilta aljannatayni atat okulaha walam tathlim minhu shayan wafajjarna khilalahuma naharan
locale.translation: Each of the two gardens produced its fruit and did not fall short thereof in anything. And We caused to gush forth within them a river

locale.transliteration: Wakana lahu thamarun faqala lisahibihi wahuwa yuhawiruhu ana aktharu minka malan waaAAazzu nafaran
locale.translation: And he had fruit, so he said to his companion while he was conversing with him, "I am greater than you in wealth and mightier in [numbers of] men

locale.transliteration: Wadakhala jannatahu wahuwa thalimun linafsihi qala ma athunnu an tabeeda hathihi abadan
locale.translation: And he entered his garden while he was unjust to himself. He said, "I do not think that this will perish - ever

locale.transliteration: Wama athunnu alssaAAata qaimatan walain rudidtu ila rabbee laajidanna khayran minha munqalaban
locale.translation: And I do not think the Hour will occur. And even if I should be brought back to my Lord, I will surely find better than this as a return

locale.transliteration: Qala lahu sahibuhu wahuwa yuhawiruhu akafarta biallathee khalaqaka min turabin thumma min nutfatin thumma sawwaka rajulan
locale.translation: His companion said to him while he was conversing with him, "Have you disbelieved in He who created you from dust and then from a sperm-drop and then proportioned you [as] a man

locale.transliteration: Lakinna huwa Allahu rabbee wala oshriku birabbee ahadan
locale.translation: But as for me, He is Allah, my Lord, and I do not associate with my Lord anyone

locale.transliteration: Walawla ith dakhalta jannataka qulta ma shaa Allahu la quwwata illa biAllahi in tarani ana aqalla minka malan wawaladan
locale.translation: And why did you, when you entered your garden, not say, 'What Allah willed [has occurred]; there is no power except in Allah '? Although you see me less than you in wealth and children

locale.transliteration: FaAAasa rabbee an yutiyani khayran min jannatika wayursila AAalayha husbanan mina alssamai fatusbiha saAAeedan zalaqan
locale.translation: It may be that my Lord will give me [something] better than your garden and will send upon it a calamity from the sky, and it will become a smooth, dusty ground

locale.transliteration: Aw yusbiha maoha ghawran falan tastateeAAa lahu talaban
locale.translation: Or its water will become sunken [into the earth], so you would never be able to seek it

locale.transliteration: Waoheeta bithamarihi faasbaha yuqallibu kaffayhi AAala ma anfaqa feeha wahiya khawiyatun AAala AAurooshiha wayaqoolu ya laytanee lam oshrik birabbee ahadan
locale.translation: And his fruits were encompassed [by ruin], so he began to turn his hands about [in dismay] over what he had spent on it, while it had collapsed upon its trellises, and said, "Oh, I wish I had not associated with my Lord anyone

locale.transliteration: Walam takun lahu fiatun yansuroonahu min dooni Allahi wama kana muntasiran
locale.translation: And there was for him no company to aid him other than Allah, nor could he defend himself

locale.transliteration: Hunalika alwalayatu lillahi alhaqqi huwa khayrun thawaban wakhayrun AAuqban
locale.translation: There the authority is [completely] for Allah, the Truth. He is best in reward and best in outcome

locale.transliteration: Waidrib lahum mathala alhayati alddunya kamain anzalnahu mina alssamai faikhtalata bihi nabatu alardi faasbaha hasheeman tathroohu alrriyahu wakana Allahu AAala kulli shayin muqtadiran
locale.translation: And present to them the example of the life of this world, [its being] like rain which We send down from the sky, and the vegetation of the earth mingles with it and [then] it becomes dry remnants, scattered by the winds. And Allah is ever, over all things, Perfect in Ability

locale.transliteration: Almalu waalbanoona zeenatu alhayati alddunya waalbaqiyatu alssalihatu khayrun AAinda rabbika thawaban wakhayrun amalan
locale.translation: Wealth and children are [but] adornment of the worldly life. But the enduring good deeds are better to your Lord for reward and better for [one's] hope

locale.transliteration: Wayawma nusayyiru aljibala watara alarda barizatan wahasharnahum falam nughadir minhum ahadan
locale.translation: And [warn of] the Day when We will remove the mountains and you will see the earth prominent, and We will gather them and not leave behind from them anyone

locale.transliteration: WaAAuridoo AAala rabbika saffan laqad jitumoona kama khalaqnakum awwala marratin bal zaAAamtum allan najAAala lakum mawAAidan
locale.translation: And they will be presented before your Lord in rows, [and He will say], "You have certainly come to Us just as We created you the first time. But you claimed that We would never make for you an appointment

locale.transliteration: WawudiAAa alkitabu fatara almujrimeena mushfiqeena mimma feehi wayaqooloona ya waylatana ma lihatha alkitabi la yughadiru sagheeratan wala kabeeratan illa ahsaha wawajadoo ma AAamiloo hadiran wala yathlimu rabbuka ahadan
locale.translation: And the record [of deeds] will be placed [open], and you will see the criminals fearful of that within it, and they will say, "Oh, woe to us! What is this book that leaves nothing small or great except that it has enumerated it?" And they will find what they did present [before them]. And your Lord does injustice to no one

locale.transliteration: Waith qulna lilmalaikati osjudoo liadama fasajadoo illa ibleesa kana mina aljinni fafasaqa AAan amri rabbihi afatattakhithoonahu wathurriyyatahu awliyaa min doonee wahum lakum AAaduwwun bisa lilththalimeena badalan
locale.translation: And [mention] when We said to the angels, "Prostrate to Adam," and they prostrated, except for Iblees. He was of the jinn and departed from the command of his Lord. Then will you take him and his descendants as allies other than Me while they are enemies to you? Wretched it is for the wrongdoers as an exchange

locale.transliteration: Ma ashhadtuhum khalqa alssamawati waalardi wala khalqa anfusihim wama kuntu muttakhitha almudilleena AAadudan
locale.translation: I did not make them witness to the creation of the heavens and the earth or to the creation of themselves, and I would not have taken the misguiders as assistants

locale.transliteration: Wayawma yaqoolu nadoo shurakaiya allatheena zaAAamtum fadaAAawhum falam yastajeeboo lahum wajaAAalna baynahum mawbiqan
locale.translation: And [warn of] the Day when He will say, "Call 'My partners' whom you claimed," and they will invoke them, but they will not respond to them. And We will put between them [a valley of] destruction

locale.transliteration: Waraa almujrimoona alnnara fathannoo annahum muwaqiAAooha walam yajidoo AAanha masrifan
locale.translation: And the criminals will see the Fire and will be certain that they are to fall therein. And they will not find from it a way elsewhere

locale.transliteration: Walaqad sarrafna fee hatha alqurani lilnnasi min kulli mathalin wakana alinsanu akthara shayin jadalan
locale.translation: And We have certainly diversified in this Qur'an for the people from every [kind of] example; but man has ever been, most of anything, [prone to] dispute

locale.transliteration: Wama manaAAa alnnasa an yuminoo ith jaahumu alhuda wayastaghfiroo rabbahum illa an tatiyahum sunnatu alawwaleena aw yatiyahumu alAAathabu qubulan
locale.translation: And nothing has prevented the people from believing when guidance came to them and from asking forgiveness of their Lord except that there [must] befall them the [accustomed] precedent of the former peoples or that the punishment should come [directly] before them

locale.transliteration: Wama nursilu almursaleena illa mubashshireena wamunthireena wayujadilu allatheena kafaroo bialbatili liyudhidoo bihi alhaqqa waittakhathoo ayatee wama onthiroo huzuwan
locale.translation: And We send not the messengers except as bringers of good tidings and warners. And those who disbelieve dispute by [using] falsehood to [attempt to] invalidate thereby the truth and have taken My verses, and that of which they are warned, in ridicule

locale.transliteration: Waman athlamu mimman thukkira biayati rabbihi faaAArada AAanha wanasiya ma qaddamat yadahu inna jaAAalna AAala quloobihim akinnatan an yafqahoohu wafee athanihim waqran wain tadAAuhum ila alhuda falan yahtadoo ithan abadan
locale.translation: And who is more unjust than one who is reminded of the verses of his Lord but turns away from them and forgets what his hands have put forth? Indeed, We have placed over their hearts coverings, lest they understand it, and in their ears deafness. And if you invite them to guidance - they will never be guided, then - ever

locale.transliteration: Warabbuka alghafooru thoo alrrahmati law yuakhithuhum bima kasaboo laAAajjala lahumu alAAathaba bal lahum mawAAidun lan yajidoo min doonihi mawilan
locale.translation: And your Lord is the Forgiving, full of mercy. If He were to impose blame upon them for what they earned, He would have hastened for them the punishment. Rather, for them is an appointment from which they will never find an escape

locale.transliteration: Watilka alqura ahlaknahum lamma thalamoo wajaAAalna limahlikihim mawAAidan
locale.translation: And those cities - We destroyed them when they wronged, and We made for their destruction an appointed time

locale.transliteration: Waith qala moosa lifatahu la abrahu hatta ablugha majmaAAa albahrayni aw amdiya huquban
locale.translation: And [mention] when Moses said to his servant, "I will not cease [traveling] until I reach the junction of the two seas or continue for a long period

locale.transliteration: Falamma balagha majmaAAa baynihima nasiya hootahuma faittakhatha sabeelahu fee albahri saraban
locale.translation: But when they reached the junction between them, they forgot their fish, and it took its course into the sea, slipping away

locale.transliteration: Falamma jawaza qala lifatahu atina ghadaana laqad laqeena min safarina hatha nasaban
locale.translation: So when they had passed beyond it, [Moses] said to his boy, "Bring us our morning meal. We have certainly suffered in this, our journey, [much] fatigue

locale.transliteration: Qala araayta ith awayna ila alssakhrati fainnee naseetu alhoota wama ansaneehu illa alshshaytanu an athkurahu waittakhatha sabeelahu fee albahri AAajaban
locale.translation: He said, "Did you see when we retired to the rock? Indeed, I forgot [there] the fish. And none made me forget it except Satan - that I should mention it. And it took its course into the sea amazingly

locale.transliteration: Qala thalika ma kunna nabghi fairtadda AAala atharihima qasasan
locale.translation: [Moses] said, "That is what we were seeking." So they returned, following their footprints

locale.transliteration: Fawajada AAabdan min AAibadina ataynahu rahmatan min AAindina waAAallamnahu min ladunna AAilman
locale.translation: And they found a servant from among Our servants to whom we had given mercy from us and had taught him from Us a [certain] knowledge

locale.transliteration: Qala lahu moosa hal attabiAAuka AAala an tuAAallimani mimma AAullimta rushdan
locale.translation: Moses said to him, "May I follow you on [the condition] that you teach me from what you have been taught of sound judgement

locale.transliteration: Qala innaka lan tastateeAAa maAAiya sabran
locale.translation: He said, "Indeed, with me you will never be able to have patience

locale.transliteration: Wakayfa tasbiru AAala ma lam tuhit bihi khubran
locale.translation: And how can you have patience for what you do not encompass in knowledge

locale.transliteration: Qala satajidunee in shaa Allahu sabiran wala aAAsee laka amran
locale.translation: [Moses] said, "You will find me, if Allah wills, patient, and I will not disobey you in [any] order

locale.transliteration: Qala faini ittabaAAtanee fala tasalnee AAan shayin hatta ohditha laka minhu thikran
locale.translation: He said, "Then if you follow me, do not ask me about anything until I make to you about it mention

locale.transliteration: Faintalaqa hatta itha rakiba fee alssafeenati kharaqaha qala akharaqtaha litughriqa ahlaha laqad jita shayan imran
locale.translation: So they set out, until when they had embarked on the ship, al-Khidh r tore it open. [Moses] said, "Have you torn it open to drown its people? You have certainly done a grave thing

locale.transliteration: Qala alam aqul innaka lan tastateeAAa maAAiya sabran
locale.translation: [Al-Khidh r] said, "Did I not say that with me you would never be able to have patience

locale.transliteration: Qala la tuakhithnee bima naseetu wala turhiqnee min amree AAusran
locale.translation: [Moses] said, "Do not blame me for what I forgot and do not cover me in my matter with difficulty

locale.transliteration: Faintalaqa hatta itha laqiya ghulaman faqatalahu qala aqatalta nafsan zakiyyatan bighayri nafsin laqad jita shayan nukran
locale.translation: So they set out, until when they met a boy, al-Khidh r killed him. [Moses] said, "Have you killed a pure soul for other than [having killed] a soul? You have certainly done a deplorable thing

locale.transliteration: Qala alam aqul laka innaka lan tastateeAAa maAAiya sabran
locale.translation: [Al-Khidh r] said, "Did I not tell you that with me you would never be able to have patience

locale.transliteration: Qala in saaltuka AAan shayin baAAdaha fala tusahibnee qad balaghta min ladunnee AAuthran
locale.translation: [Moses] said, "If I should ask you about anything after this, then do not keep me as a companion. You have obtained from me an excuse

locale.transliteration: Faintalaqa hatta itha ataya ahla qaryatin istatAAama ahlaha faabaw an yudayyifoohuma fawajada feeha jidaran yureedu an yanqadda faaqamahu qala law shita laittakhathta AAalayhi ajran
locale.translation: So they set out, until when they came to the people of a town, they asked its people for food, but they refused to offer them hospitality. And they found therein a wall about to collapse, so al-Khidh r restored it. [Moses] said, "If you wished, you could have taken for it a payment

locale.transliteration: Qala hatha firaqu baynee wabaynika saonabbioka bitaweeli ma lam tastatiAA AAalayhi sabran
locale.translation: [Al-Khidh r] said, "This is parting between me and you. I will inform you of the interpretation of that about which you could not have patience

locale.transliteration: Amma alssafeenatu fakanat limasakeena yaAAmaloona fee albahri faaradtu an aAAeebaha wakana waraahum malikun yakhuthu kulla safeenatin ghasban
locale.translation: As for the ship, it belonged to poor people working at sea. So I intended to cause defect in it as there was after them a king who seized every [good] ship by force

locale.transliteration: Waamma alghulamu fakana abawahu muminayni fakhasheena an yurhiqahuma tughyanan wakufran
locale.translation: And as for the boy, his parents were believers, and we feared that he would overburden them by transgression and disbelief

locale.transliteration: Faaradna an yubdilahuma rabbuhuma khayran minhu zakatan waaqraba ruhman
locale.translation: So we intended that their Lord should substitute for them one better than him in purity and nearer to mercy

locale.transliteration: Waamma aljidaru fakana lighulamayni yateemayni fee almadeenati wakana tahtahu kanzun lahuma wakana aboohuma salihan faarada rabbuka an yablugha ashuddahuma wayastakhrija kanzahuma rahmatan min rabbika wama faAAaltuhu AAan amree thalika taweelu ma lam tastiAA AAalayhi sabran
locale.translation: And as for the wall, it belonged to two orphan boys in the city, and there was beneath it a treasure for them, and their father had been righteous. So your Lord intended that they reach maturity and extract their treasure, as a mercy from your Lord. And I did it not of my own accord. That is the interpretation of that about which you could not have patience

locale.transliteration: Wayasaloonaka AAan thee alqarnayni qul saatloo AAalaykum minhu thikran
locale.translation: And they ask you, [O Muhammad], about Dhul-Qarnayn. Say, "I will recite to you about him a report

locale.transliteration: Inna makkanna lahu fee alardi waataynahu min kulli shayin sababan
locale.translation: Indeed We established him upon the earth, and We gave him to everything a way

locale.transliteration: FaatbaAAa sababan
locale.translation: So he followed a way

locale.transliteration: Hatta itha balagha maghriba alshshamsi wajadaha taghrubu fee AAaynin hamiatin wawajada AAindaha qawman qulna ya tha alqarnayni imma an tuAAaththiba waimma an tattakhitha feehim husnan
locale.translation: Until, when he reached the setting of the sun, he found it [as if] setting in a spring of dark mud, and he found near it a people. Allah said, "O Dhul-Qarnayn, either you punish [them] or else adopt among them [a way of] goodness

locale.transliteration: Qala amma man thalama fasawfa nuAAaththibuhu thumma yuraddu ila rabbihi fayuAAaththibuhu AAathaban nukran
locale.translation: He said, "As for one who wrongs, we will punish him. Then he will be returned to his Lord, and He will punish him with a terrible punishment

locale.transliteration: Waamma man amana waAAamila salihan falahu jazaan alhusna wasanaqoolu lahu min amrina yusran
locale.translation: But as for one who believes and does righteousness, he will have a reward of Paradise, and we will speak to him from our command with ease

locale.transliteration: Thumma atbaAAa sababan
locale.translation: Then he followed a way

locale.transliteration: Hatta itha balagha matliAAa alshshamsi wajadaha tatluAAu AAala qawmin lam najAAal lahum min dooniha sitran
locale.translation: Until, when he came to the rising of the sun, he found it rising on a people for whom We had not made against it any shield

locale.transliteration: Kathalika waqad ahatna bima ladayhi khubran
locale.translation: Thus. And We had encompassed [all] that he had in knowledge

locale.transliteration: Thumma atbaAAa sababan
locale.translation: Then he followed a way

locale.transliteration: Hatta itha balagha bayna alssaddayni wajada min doonihima qawman la yakadoona yafqahoona qawlan
locale.translation: Until, when he reached [a pass] between two mountains, he found beside them a people who could hardly understand [his] speech

locale.transliteration: Qaloo ya tha alqarnayni inna yajooja wamajooja mufsidoona fee alardi fahal najAAalu laka kharjan AAala an tajAAala baynana wabaynahum saddan
locale.translation: They said, "O Dhul-Qarnayn, indeed Gog and Magog are [great] corrupters in the land. So may we assign for you an expenditure that you might make between us and them a barrier

locale.transliteration: Qala ma makkannee feehi rabbee khayrun faaAAeenoonee biquwwatin ajAAal baynakum wabaynahum radman
locale.translation: He said, "That in which my Lord has established me is better [than what you offer], but assist me with strength; I will make between you and them a dam

locale.transliteration: Atoonee zubara alhadeedi hatta itha sawa bayna alsadafayni qala onfukhoo hatta itha jaAAalahu naran qala atoonee ofrigh AAalayhi qitran
locale.translation: Bring me sheets of iron" - until, when he had leveled [them] between the two mountain walls, he said, "Blow [with bellows]," until when he had made it [like] fire, he said, "Bring me, that I may pour over it molten copper

locale.transliteration: Fama istaAAoo an yathharoohu wama istataAAoo lahu naqban
locale.translation: So Gog and Magog were unable to pass over it, nor were they able [to effect] in it any penetration

locale.transliteration: Qala hatha rahmatun min rabbee faitha jaa waAAdu rabbee jaAAalahu dakkaa wakana waAAdu rabbee haqqan
locale.translation: [Dhul-Qarnayn] said, "This is a mercy from my Lord; but when the promise of my Lord comes, He will make it level, and ever is the promise of my Lord true

locale.transliteration: Watarakna baAAdahum yawmaithin yamooju fee baAAdin wanufikha fee alssoori fajamaAAnahum jamAAan
locale.translation: And We will leave them that day surging over each other, and [then] the Horn will be blown, and We will assemble them in [one] assembly

locale.transliteration: WaAAaradna jahannama yawmaithin lilkafireena AAardan
locale.translation: And We will present Hell that Day to the Disbelievers, on display

locale.transliteration: Allatheena kanat aAAyunuhum fee ghitain AAan thikree wakanoo la yastateeAAoona samAAan
locale.translation: Those whose eyes had been within a cover [removed] from My remembrance, and they were not able to hear

locale.transliteration: Afahasiba allatheena kafaroo an yattakhithoo AAibadee min doonee awliyaa inna aAAtadna jahannama lilkafireena nuzulan
locale.translation: Then do those who disbelieve think that they can take My servants instead of Me as allies? Indeed, We have prepared Hell for the disbelievers as a lodging

locale.transliteration: Qul hal nunabbiokum bialakhsareena aAAmalan
locale.translation: Say, [O Muhammad], "Shall we [believers] inform you of the greatest losers as to [their] deeds

locale.transliteration: Allatheena dalla saAAyuhum fee alhayati alddunya wahum yahsaboona annahum yuhsinoona sunAAan
locale.translation: [They are] those whose effort is lost in worldly life, while they think that they are doing well in work

locale.transliteration: Olaika allatheena kafaroo biayati rabbihim waliqaihi fahabitat aAAmaluhum fala nuqeemu lahum yawma alqiyamati waznan
locale.translation: Those are the ones who disbelieve in the verses of their Lord and in [their] meeting Him, so their deeds have become worthless; and We will not assign to them on the Day of Resurrection any importance

locale.transliteration: Thalika jazaohum jahannamu bima kafaroo waittakhathoo ayatee warusulee huzuwan
locale.translation: That is their recompense - Hell - for what they denied and [because] they took My signs and My messengers in ridicule

locale.transliteration: Inna allatheena amanoo waAAamiloo alssalihati kanat lahum jannatu alfirdawsi nuzulan
locale.translation: Indeed, those who have believed and done righteous deeds - they will have the Gardens of Paradise as a lodging

locale.transliteration: Khalideena feeha la yabghoona AAanha hiwalan
locale.translation: Wherein they abide eternally. They will not desire from it any transfer

locale.transliteration: Qul law kana albahru midadan likalimati rabbee lanafida albahru qabla an tanfada kalimatu rabbee walaw jina bimithlihi madadan
locale.translation: Say, "If the sea were ink for [writing] the words of my Lord, the sea would be exhausted before the words of my Lord were exhausted, even if We brought the like of it as a supplement

locale.transliteration: Qul innama ana basharun mithlukum yooha ilayya annama ilahukum ilahun wahidun faman kana yarjoo liqaa rabbihi falyaAAmal AAamalan salihan wala yushrik biAAibadati rabbihi ahadan
locale.translation: Say, "I am only a man like you, to whom has been revealed that your god is one God. So whoever would hope for the meeting with his Lord - let him do righteous work and not associate in the worship of his Lord anyone

locale.transliteration: Maryam
locale.translation: Mary

locale.transliteration: KafhayaAAaynsad
locale.translation: Kaf, Ha, Ya, 'Ayn, Sad

locale.transliteration: Thikru rahmati rabbika AAabdahu zakariyya
locale.translation: [This is] a mention of the mercy of your Lord to His servant Zechariah

locale.transliteration: Ith nada rabbahu nidaan khafiyyan
locale.translation: When he called to his Lord a private supplication

locale.transliteration: Qala rabbi innee wahana alAAathmu minnee waishtaAAala alrrasu shayban walam akun biduAAaika rabbi shaqiyyan
locale.translation: He said, "My Lord, indeed my bones have weakened, and my head has filled with white, and never have I been in my supplication to You, my Lord, unhappy

locale.transliteration: Wainnee khiftu almawaliya min waraee wakanati imraatee AAaqiran fahab lee min ladunka waliyyan
locale.translation: And indeed, I fear the successors after me, and my wife has been barren, so give me from Yourself an heir

locale.transliteration: Yarithunee wayarithu min ali yaAAqooba waijAAalhu rabbi radiyyan
locale.translation: Who will inherit me and inherit from the family of Jacob. And make him, my Lord, pleasing [to You]

locale.transliteration: Ya zakariyya inna nubashshiruka bighulamin ismuhu yahya lam najAAal lahu min qablu samiyyan
locale.translation: [He was told], "O Zechariah, indeed We give you good tidings of a boy whose name will be John. We have not assigned to any before [this] name

locale.transliteration: Qala rabbi anna yakoonu lee ghulamun wakanati imraatee AAaqiran waqad balaghtu mina alkibari AAitiyyan
locale.translation: He said, "My Lord, how will I have a boy when my wife has been barren and I have reached extreme old age

locale.transliteration: Qala kathalika qala rabbuka huwa AAalayya hayyinun waqad khalaqtuka min qablu walam taku shayan
locale.translation: [An angel] said, "Thus [it will be]; your Lord says, 'It is easy for Me, for I created you before, while you were nothing

locale.transliteration: Qala rabbi ijAAal lee ayatan qala ayatuka alla tukallima alnnasa thalatha layalin sawiyyan
locale.translation: [Zechariah] said, "My Lord, make for me a sign." He said, "Your sign is that you will not speak to the people for three nights, [being] sound

locale.transliteration: Fakharaja AAala qawmihi mina almihrabi faawha ilayhim an sabbihoo bukratan waAAashiyyan
locale.translation: So he came out to his people from the prayer chamber and signaled to them to exalt [Allah] in the morning and afternoon

locale.transliteration: Ya yahya khuthi alkitaba biquwwatin waataynahu alhukma sabiyyan
locale.translation: [Allah] said, "O John, take the Scripture with determination." And We gave him judgement [while yet] a boy

locale.transliteration: Wahananan min ladunna wazakatan wakana taqiyyan
locale.translation: And affection from Us and purity, and he was fearing of Allah

locale.transliteration: Wabarran biwalidayhi walam yakun jabbaran AAasiyyan
locale.translation: And dutiful to his parents, and he was not a disobedient tyrant

locale.transliteration: Wasalamun AAalayhi yawma wulida wayawma yamootu wayawma yubAAathu hayyan
locale.translation: And peace be upon him the day he was born and the day he dies and the day he is raised alive

locale.transliteration: Waothkur fee alkitabi maryama ithi intabathat min ahliha makanan sharqiyyan
locale.translation: And mention, [O Muhammad], in the Book [the story of] Mary, when she withdrew from her family to a place toward the east

locale.transliteration: Faittakhathat min doonihim hijaban faarsalna ilayha roohana fatamaththala laha basharan sawiyyan
locale.translation: And she took, in seclusion from them, a screen. Then We sent to her Our Angel, and he represented himself to her as a well-proportioned man

locale.transliteration: Qalat innee aAAoothu bialrrahmani minka in kunta taqiyyan
locale.translation: She said, "Indeed, I seek refuge in the Most Merciful from you, [so leave me], if you should be fearing of Allah

locale.transliteration: Qala innama ana rasoolu rabbiki liahaba laki ghulaman zakiyyan
locale.translation: He said, "I am only the messenger of your Lord to give you [news of] a pure boy

locale.transliteration: Qalat anna yakoonu lee ghulamun walam yamsasnee basharun walam aku baghiyyan
locale.translation: She said, "How can I have a boy while no man has touched me and I have not been unchaste

locale.transliteration: Qala kathaliki qala rabbuki huwa AAalayya hayyinun walinajAAalahu ayatan lilnnasi warahmatan minna wakana amran maqdiyyan
locale.translation: He said, "Thus [it will be]; your Lord says, 'It is easy for Me, and We will make him a sign to the people and a mercy from Us. And it is a matter [already] decreed

locale.transliteration: Fahamalathu faintabathat bihi makanan qasiyyan
locale.translation: So she conceived him, and she withdrew with him to a remote place

locale.transliteration: Faajaaha almakhadu ila jithAAi alnnakhlati qalat ya laytanee mittu qabla hatha wakuntu nasyan mansiyyan
locale.translation: And the pains of childbirth drove her to the trunk of a palm tree. She said, "Oh, I wish I had died before this and was in oblivion, forgotten

locale.transliteration: Fanadaha min tahtiha alla tahzanee qad jaAAala rabbuki tahtaki sariyyan
locale.translation: But he called her from below her, "Do not grieve; your Lord has provided beneath you a stream

locale.transliteration: Wahuzzee ilayki bijithAAi alnnakhlati tusaqit AAalayki rutaban janiyyan
locale.translation: And shake toward you the trunk of the palm tree; it will drop upon you ripe, fresh dates

locale.transliteration: Fakulee waishrabee waqarree AAaynan faimma tarayinna mina albashari ahadan faqoolee innee nathartu lilrrahmani sawman falan okallima alyawma insiyyan
locale.translation: So eat and drink and be contented. And if you see from among humanity anyone, say, 'Indeed, I have vowed to the Most Merciful abstention, so I will not speak today to [any] man

locale.transliteration: Faatat bihi qawmaha tahmiluhu qaloo ya maryamu laqad jiti shayan fariyyan
locale.translation: Then she brought him to her people, carrying him. They said, "O Mary, you have certainly done a thing unprecedented

locale.transliteration: Ya okhta haroona ma kana abooki imraa sawin wama kanat ommuki baghiyyan
locale.translation: O sister of Aaron, your father was not a man of evil, nor was your mother unchaste

locale.transliteration: Faasharat ilayhi qaloo kayfa nukallimu man kana fee almahdi sabiyyan
locale.translation: So she pointed to him. They said, "How can we speak to one who is in the cradle a child

locale.transliteration: Qala innee AAabdu Allahi ataniya alkitaba wajaAAalanee nabiyyan
locale.translation: [Jesus] said, "Indeed, I am the servant of Allah. He has given me the Scripture and made me a prophet

locale.transliteration: WajaAAalanee mubarakan ayna ma kuntu waawsanee bialssalati waalzzakati ma dumtu hayyan
locale.translation: And He has made me blessed wherever I am and has enjoined upon me prayer and zakah as long as I remain alive

locale.transliteration: Wabarran biwalidatee walam yajAAalnee jabbaran shaqiyyan
locale.translation: And [made me] dutiful to my mother, and He has not made me a wretched tyrant

locale.transliteration: Waalssalamu AAalayya yawma wulidtu wayawma amootu wayawma obAAathu hayyan
locale.translation: And peace is on me the day I was born and the day I will die and the day I am raised alive

locale.transliteration: Thalika AAeesa ibnu maryama qawla alhaqqi allathee feehi yamtaroona
locale.translation: That is Jesus, the son of Mary - the word of truth about which they are in dispute

locale.transliteration: Ma kana lillahi an yattakhitha min waladin subhanahu itha qada amran fainnama yaqoolu lahu kun fayakoonu
locale.translation: It is not [befitting] for Allah to take a son; exalted is He! When He decrees an affair, He only says to it, "Be," and it is

locale.transliteration: Wainna Allaha rabbee warabbukum faoAAbudoohu hatha siratun mustaqeemun
locale.translation: [Jesus said], "And indeed, Allah is my Lord and your Lord, so worship Him. That is a straight path

locale.transliteration: Faikhtalafa alahzabu min baynihim fawaylun lillatheena kafaroo min mashhadi yawmin AAatheemin
locale.translation: Then the factions differed [concerning Jesus] from among them, so woe to those who disbelieved - from the scene of a tremendous Day

locale.transliteration: AsmiAA bihim waabsir yawma yatoonana lakini alththalimoona alyawma fee dalalin mubeenin
locale.translation: How [clearly] they will hear and see the Day they come to Us, but the wrongdoers today are in clear error

locale.transliteration: Waanthirhum yawma alhasrati ith qudiya alamru wahum fee ghaflatin wahum la yuminoona
locale.translation: And warn them, [O Muhammad], of the Day of Regret, when the matter will be concluded; and [yet], they are in [a state of] heedlessness, and they do not believe

locale.transliteration: Inna nahnu narithu alarda waman AAalayha wailayna yurjaAAoona
locale.translation: Indeed, it is We who will inherit the earth and whoever is on it, and to Us they will be returned

locale.transliteration: Waothkur fee alkitabi ibraheema innahu kana siddeeqan nabiyyan
locale.translation: And mention in the Book [the story of] Abraham. Indeed, he was a man of truth and a prophet

locale.transliteration: Ith qala liabeehi ya abati lima taAAbudu ma la yasmaAAu wala yubsiru wala yughnee AAanka shayan
locale.translation: [Mention] when he said to his father, "O my father, why do you worship that which does not hear and does not see and will not benefit you at all

locale.transliteration: Ya abati innee qad jaanee mina alAAilmi ma lam yatika faittabiAAnee ahdika siratan sawiyyan
locale.translation: O my father, indeed there has come to me of knowledge that which has not come to you, so follow me; I will guide you to an even path

locale.transliteration: Ya abati la taAAbudi alshshaytana inna alshshaytana kana lilrrahmani AAasiyyan
locale.translation: O my father, do not worship Satan. Indeed Satan has ever been, to the Most Merciful, disobedient

locale.transliteration: Ya abati innee akhafu an yamassaka AAathabun mina alrrahmani fatakoona lilshshyatani waliyyan
locale.translation: O my father, indeed I fear that there will touch you a punishment from the Most Merciful so you would be to Satan a companion [in Hellfire]

locale.transliteration: Qala araghibun anta AAan alihatee ya ibraheemu lain lam tantahi laarjumannaka waohjurnee maliyyan
locale.translation: [His father] said, "Have you no desire for my gods, O Abraham? If you do not desist, I will surely stone you, so avoid me a prolonged time

locale.transliteration: Qala salamun AAalayka saastaghfiru laka rabbee innahu kana bee hafiyyan
locale.translation: [Abraham] said, "Peace will be upon you. I will ask forgiveness for you of my Lord. Indeed, He is ever gracious to me

locale.transliteration: WaaAAtazilukum wama tadAAoona min dooni Allahi waadAAoo rabbee AAasa alla akoona biduAAai rabbee shaqiyyan
locale.translation: And I will leave you and those you invoke other than Allah and will invoke my Lord. I expect that I will not be in invocation to my Lord unhappy

locale.transliteration: Falamma iAAtazalahum wama yaAAbudoona min dooni Allahi wahabna lahu ishaqa wayaAAqooba wakullan jaAAalna nabiyyan
locale.translation: So when he had left them and those they worshipped other than Allah, We gave him Isaac and Jacob, and each [of them] We made a prophet

locale.transliteration: Wawahabna lahum min rahmatina wajaAAalna lahum lisana sidqin AAaliyyan
locale.translation: And We gave them of Our mercy, and we made for them a reputation of high honor

locale.transliteration: Waothkur fee alkitabi moosa innahu kana mukhlasan wakana rasoolan nabiyyan
locale.translation: And mention in the Book, Moses. Indeed, he was chosen, and he was a messenger and a prophet

locale.transliteration: Wanadaynahu min janibi alttoori alaymani waqarrabnahu najiyyan
locale.translation: And We called him from the side of the mount at [his] right and brought him near, confiding [to him]

locale.transliteration: Wawahabna lahu min rahmatina akhahu haroona nabiyyan
locale.translation: And We gave him out of Our mercy his brother Aaron as a prophet

locale.transliteration: Waothkur fee alkitabi ismaAAeela innahu kana sadiqa alwaAAdi wakana rasoolan nabiyyan
locale.translation: And mention in the Book, Ishmael. Indeed, he was true to his promise, and he was a messenger and a prophet

locale.transliteration: Wakana yamuru ahlahu bialssalati waalzzakati wakana AAinda rabbihi mardiyyan
locale.translation: And he used to enjoin on his people prayer and zakah and was to his Lord pleasing

locale.transliteration: Waothkur fee alkitabi idreesa innahu kana siddeeqan nabiyyan
locale.translation: And mention in the Book, Idrees. Indeed, he was a man of truth and a prophet

locale.transliteration: WarafaAAnahu makanan AAaliyyan
locale.translation: And We raised him to a high station

locale.transliteration: Olaika allatheena anAAama Allahu AAalayhim mina alnnabiyyeena min thurriyyati adama wamimman hamalna maAAa noohin wamin thurriyyati ibraheema waisraeela wamimman hadayna waijtabayna itha tutla AAalayhim ayatu alrrahmani kharroo sujjadan wabukiyyan
locale.translation: Those were the ones upon whom Allah bestowed favor from among the prophets of the descendants of Adam and of those We carried [in the ship] with Noah, and of the descendants of Abraham and Israel, and of those whom We guided and chose. When the verses of the Most Merciful were recited to them, they fell in prostration and weeping

locale.transliteration: Fakhalafa min baAAdihim khalfun adaAAoo alssalata waittabaAAoo alshshahawati fasawfa yalqawna ghayyan
locale.translation: But there came after them successors who neglected prayer and pursued desires; so they are going to meet evil

locale.transliteration: Illa man taba waamana waAAamila salihan faolaika yadkhuloona aljannata wala yuthlamoona shayan
locale.translation: Except those who repent, believe and do righteousness; for those will enter Paradise and will not be wronged at all

locale.transliteration: Jannati AAadnin allatee waAAada alrrahmanu AAibadahu bialghaybi innahu kana waAAduhu matiyyan
locale.translation: [Therein are] gardens of perpetual residence which the Most Merciful has promised His servants in the unseen. Indeed, His promise has ever been coming

locale.transliteration: La yasmaAAoona feeha laghwan illa salaman walahum rizquhum feeha bukratan waAAashiyyan
locale.translation: They will not hear therein any ill speech - only [greetings of] peace - and they will have their provision therein, morning and afternoon

locale.transliteration: Tilka aljannatu allatee noorithu min AAibadina man kana taqiyyan
locale.translation: That is Paradise, which We give as inheritance to those of Our servants who were fearing of Allah

locale.transliteration: Wama natanazzalu illa biamri rabbika lahu ma bayna aydeena wama khalfana wama bayna thalika wama kana rabbuka nasiyyan
locale.translation: [Gabriel said], "And we [angels] descend not except by the order of your Lord. To Him belongs that before us and that behind us and what is in between. And never is your Lord forgetful

locale.transliteration: Rabbu alssamawati waalardi wama baynahuma faoAAbudhu waistabir liAAibadatihi hal taAAlamu lahu samiyyan
locale.translation: Lord of the heavens and the earth and whatever is between them - so worship Him and have patience for His worship. Do you know of any similarity to Him

locale.transliteration: Wayaqoolu alinsanu aitha ma mittu lasawfa okhraju hayyan
locale.translation: And the disbeliever says, "When I have died, am I going to be brought forth alive

locale.transliteration: Awala yathkuru alinsanu anna khalaqnahu min qablu walam yaku shayan
locale.translation: Does man not remember that We created him before, while he was nothing

locale.transliteration: Fawarabbika lanahshurannahum waalshshayateena thumma lanuhdirannahum hawla jahannama jithiyyan
locale.translation: So by your Lord, We will surely gather them and the devils; then We will bring them to be present around Hell upon their knees

locale.transliteration: Thumma lananziAAanna min kulli sheeAAatin ayyuhum ashaddu AAala alrrahmani AAitiyyan
locale.translation: Then We will surely extract from every sect those of them who were worst against the Most Merciful in insolence

locale.transliteration: Thumma lanahnu aAAlamu biallatheena hum awla biha siliyyan
locale.translation: Then, surely it is We who are most knowing of those most worthy of burning therein

locale.transliteration: Wain minkum illa wariduha kana AAala rabbika hatman maqdiyyan
locale.translation: And there is none of you except he will come to it. This is upon your Lord an inevitability decreed

locale.transliteration: Thumma nunajjee allatheena ittaqaw wanatharu alththalimeena feeha jithiyyan
locale.translation: Then We will save those who feared Allah and leave the wrongdoers within it, on their knees

locale.transliteration: Waitha tutla AAalayhim ayatuna bayyinatin qala allatheena kafaroo lillatheena amanoo ayyu alfareeqayni khayrun maqaman waahsanu nadiyyan
locale.translation: And when Our verses are recited to them as clear evidences, those who disbelieve say to those who believe, "Which of [our] two parties is best in position and best in association

locale.transliteration: Wakam ahlakna qablahum min qarnin hum ahsanu athathan wariyan
locale.translation: And how many a generation have We destroyed before them who were better in possessions and [outward] appearance

locale.transliteration: Qul man kana fee alddalalati falyamdud lahu alrrahmanu maddan hatta itha raaw ma yooAAadoona imma alAAathaba waimma alssaAAata fasayaAAlamoona man huwa sharrun makanan waadAAafu jundan
locale.translation: Say, "Whoever is in error - let the Most Merciful extend for him an extension [in wealth and time] until, when they see that which they were promised - either punishment [in this world] or the Hour [of resurrection] - they will come to know who is worst in position and weaker in soldiers

locale.transliteration: Wayazeedu Allahu allatheena ihtadaw hudan waalbaqiyatu alssalihatu khayrun AAinda rabbika thawaban wakhayrun maraddan
locale.translation: And Allah increases those who were guided, in guidance, and the enduring good deeds are better to your Lord for reward and better for recourse

locale.transliteration: Afaraayta allathee kafara biayatina waqala laootayanna malan wawaladan
locale.translation: Then, have you seen he who disbelieved in Our verses and said, "I will surely be given wealth and children [in the next life]

locale.transliteration: AttalaAAa alghayba ami ittakhatha AAinda alrrahmani AAahdan
locale.translation: Has he looked into the unseen, or has he taken from the Most Merciful a promise

locale.transliteration: Kalla sanaktubu ma yaqoolu wanamuddu lahu mina alAAathabi maddan
locale.translation: No! We will record what he says and extend for him from the punishment extensively

locale.transliteration: Wanarithuhu ma yaqoolu wayateena fardan
locale.translation: And We will inherit him [in] what he mentions, and he will come to Us alone

locale.transliteration: Waittakhathoo min dooni Allahi alihatan liyakoonoo lahum AAizzan
locale.translation: And they have taken besides Allah [false] deities that they would be for them [a source of] honor

locale.transliteration: Kalla sayakfuroona biAAibadatihim wayakoonoona AAalayhim diddan
locale.translation: No! Those "gods" will deny their worship of them and will be against them opponents [on the Day of Judgement]

locale.transliteration: Alam tara anna arsalna alshshayateena AAala alkafireena taozzuhum azzan
locale.translation: Do you not see that We have sent the devils upon the disbelievers, inciting them to [evil] with [constant] incitement

locale.transliteration: Fala taAAjal AAalayhim innama naAAuddu lahum AAaddan
locale.translation: So be not impatient over them. We only count out to them a [limited] number

locale.transliteration: Yawma nahshuru almuttaqeena ila alrrahmani wafdan
locale.translation: On the Day We will gather the righteous to the Most Merciful as a delegation

locale.transliteration: Wanasooqu almujrimeena ila jahannama wirdan
locale.translation: And will drive the criminals to Hell in thirst

locale.transliteration: La yamlikoona alshshafaAAata illa mani ittakhatha AAinda alrrahmani AAahdan
locale.translation: None will have [power of] intercession except he who had taken from the Most Merciful a covenant

locale.transliteration: Waqaloo ittakhatha alrrahmanu waladan
locale.translation: And they say, "The Most Merciful has taken [for Himself] a son

locale.transliteration: Laqad jitum shayan iddan
locale.translation: You have done an atrocious thing

locale.transliteration: Takadu alssamawatu yatafattarna minhu watanshaqqu alardu watakhirru aljibalu haddan
locale.translation: The heavens almost rupture therefrom and the earth splits open and the mountains collapse in devastation

locale.transliteration: An daAAaw lilrrahmani waladan
locale.translation: That they attribute to the Most Merciful a son

locale.transliteration: Wama yanbaghee lilrrahmani an yattakhitha waladan
locale.translation: And it is not appropriate for the Most Merciful that He should take a son

locale.transliteration: In kullu man fee alssamawati waalardi illa atee alrrahmani AAabdan
locale.translation: There is no one in the heavens and earth but that he comes to the Most Merciful as a servant

locale.transliteration: Laqad ahsahum waAAaddahum AAaddan
locale.translation: He has enumerated them and counted them a [full] counting

locale.transliteration: Wakulluhum ateehi yawma alqiyamati fardan
locale.translation: And all of them are coming to Him on the Day of Resurrection alone

locale.transliteration: Inna allatheena amanoo waAAamiloo alssalihati sayajAAalu lahumu alrrahmanu wuddan
locale.translation: Indeed, those who have believed and done righteous deeds - the Most Merciful will appoint for them affection

locale.transliteration: Fainnama yassarnahu bilisanika litubashshira bihi almuttaqeena watunthira bihi qawman luddan
locale.translation: So, [O Muhammad], We have only made Qur'an easy in the Arabic language that you may give good tidings thereby to the righteous and warn thereby a hostile people

locale.transliteration: Wakam ahlakna qablahum min qarnin hal tuhissu minhum min ahadin aw tasmaAAu lahum rikzan
locale.translation: And how many have We destroyed before them of generations? Do you perceive of them anyone or hear from them a sound

locale.transliteration: Taha
locale.translation: Ta-Ha

locale.transliteration: Taha
locale.translation: Ta, Ha

locale.transliteration: Ma anzalna AAalayka alqurana litashqa
locale.translation: We have not sent down to you the Qur'an that you be distressed

locale.transliteration: Illa tathkiratan liman yakhsha
locale.translation: But only as a reminder for those who fear [Allah]

locale.transliteration: Tanzeelan mimman khalaqa alarda waalssamawati alAAula
locale.translation: A revelation from He who created the earth and highest heavens

locale.transliteration: Alrrahmanu AAala alAAarshi istawa
locale.translation: The Most Merciful [who is] above the Throne established

locale.transliteration: Lahu ma fee alssamawati wama fee alardi wama baynahuma wama tahta alththara
locale.translation: To Him belongs what is in the heavens and what is on the earth and what is between them and what is under the soil

locale.transliteration: Wain tajhar bialqawli fainnahu yaAAlamu alssirra waakhfa
locale.translation: And if you speak aloud - then indeed, He knows the secret and what is [even] more hidden

locale.transliteration: Allahu la ilaha illa huwa lahu alasmao alhusna
locale.translation: Allah - there is no deity except Him. To Him belong the best names

locale.transliteration: Wahal ataka hadeethu moosa
locale.translation: And has the story of Moses reached you

locale.transliteration: Ith raa naran faqala liahlihi omkuthoo innee anastu naran laAAallee ateekum minha biqabasin aw ajidu AAala alnnari hudan
locale.translation: When he saw a fire and said to his family, "Stay here; indeed, I have perceived a fire; perhaps I can bring you a torch or find at the fire some guidance

locale.transliteration: Falamma ataha noodiya ya moosa
locale.translation: And when he came to it, he was called, "O Moses

locale.transliteration: Innee ana rabbuka faikhlaAA naAAlayka innaka bialwadi almuqaddasi tuwan
locale.translation: Indeed, I am your Lord, so remove your sandals. Indeed, you are in the sacred valley of Tuwa

locale.transliteration: Waana ikhtartuka faistamiAA lima yooha
locale.translation: And I have chosen you, so listen to what is revealed [to you]

locale.transliteration: Innanee ana Allahu la ilaha illa ana faoAAbudnee waaqimi alssalata lithikree
locale.translation: Indeed, I am Allah. There is no deity except Me, so worship Me and establish prayer for My remembrance

locale.transliteration: Inna alssaAAata atiyatun akadu okhfeeha litujza kullu nafsin bima tasAAa
locale.translation: Indeed, the Hour is coming - I almost conceal it - so that every soul may be recompensed according to that for which it strives

locale.transliteration: Fala yasuddannaka AAanha man la yuminu biha waittabaAAa hawahu fatarda
locale.translation: So do not let one avert you from it who does not believe in it and follows his desire, for you [then] would perish

locale.transliteration: Wama tilka biyameenika ya moosa
locale.translation: And what is that in your right hand, O Moses

locale.transliteration: Qala hiya AAasaya atawakkao AAalayha waahushshu biha AAala ghanamee waliya feeha maaribu okhra
locale.translation: He said, "It is my staff; I lean upon it, and I bring down leaves for my sheep and I have therein other uses

locale.transliteration: Qala alqiha ya moosa
locale.translation: [Allah] said, "Throw it down, O Moses

locale.transliteration: Faalqaha faitha hiya hayyatun tasAAa
locale.translation: So he threw it down, and thereupon it was a snake, moving swiftly

locale.transliteration: Qala khuthha wala takhaf sanuAAeeduha seerataha aloola
locale.translation: [Allah] said, "Seize it and fear not; We will return it to its former condition

locale.transliteration: Waodmum yadaka ila janahika takhruj baydaa min ghayri sooin ayatan okhra
locale.translation: And draw in your hand to your side; it will come out white without disease - another sign

locale.transliteration: Linuriyaka min ayatina alkubra
locale.translation: That We may show you [some] of Our greater signs

locale.transliteration: Ithhab ila firAAawna innahu tagha
locale.translation: Go to Pharaoh. Indeed, he has transgressed

locale.transliteration: Qala rabbi ishrah lee sadree
locale.translation: [Moses] said, "My Lord, expand for me my breast [with assurance]

locale.transliteration: Wayassir lee amree
locale.translation: And ease for me my task

locale.transliteration: Waohlul AAuqdatan min lisanee
locale.translation: And untie the knot from my tongue

locale.transliteration: Yafqahoo qawlee
locale.translation: That they may understand my speech

locale.transliteration: WaijAAal lee wazeeran min ahlee
locale.translation: And appoint for me a minister from my family

locale.transliteration: Haroona akhee
locale.translation: Aaron, my brother

locale.transliteration: Oshdud bihi azree
locale.translation: Increase through him my strength

locale.transliteration: Waashrikhu fee amree
locale.translation: And let him share my task

locale.transliteration: Kay nusabbihaka katheeran
locale.translation: That we may exalt You much

locale.transliteration: Wanathkuraka katheeran
locale.translation: And remember You much

locale.transliteration: Innaka kunta bina baseeran
locale.translation: Indeed, You are of us ever Seeing

locale.transliteration: Qala qad ooteeta sulaka ya moosa
locale.translation: [Allah] said, "You have been granted your request, O Moses

locale.transliteration: Walaqad mananna AAalayka marratan okhra
locale.translation: And We had already conferred favor upon you another time

locale.transliteration: Ith awhayna ila ommika ma yooha
locale.translation: When We inspired to your mother what We inspired

locale.transliteration: Ani iqthifeehi fee alttabooti faiqthifeehi fee alyammi falyulqihi alyammu bialssahili yakhuthhu AAaduwwun lee waAAaduwwun lahu waalqaytu AAalayka mahabbatan minnee walitusnaAAa AAala AAaynee
locale.translation: [Saying], 'Cast him into the chest and cast it into the river, and the river will throw it onto the bank; there will take him an enemy to Me and an enemy to him.' And I bestowed upon you love from Me that you would be brought up under My eye

locale.transliteration: Ith tamshee okhtuka fataqoolu hal adullukum AAala man yakfuluhu farajaAAnaka ila ommika kay taqarra AAaynuha wala tahzana waqatalta nafsan fanajjaynaka mina alghammi wafatannaka futoonan falabithta sineena fee ahli madyana thumma jita AAala qadarin ya moosa
locale.translation: [And We favored you] when your sister went and said, 'Shall I direct you to someone who will be responsible for him?' So We restored you to your mother that she might be content and not grieve. And you killed someone, but We saved you from retaliation and tried you with a [severe] trial. And you remained [some] years among the people of Madyan. Then you came [here] at the decreed time, O Moses

locale.transliteration: WaistanaAAtuka linafsee
locale.translation: And I produced you for Myself

locale.transliteration: Ithhab anta waakhooka biayatee wala taniya fee thikree
locale.translation: Go, you and your brother, with My signs and do not slacken in My remembrance

locale.transliteration: Ithhaba ila firAAawna innahu tagha
locale.translation: Go, both of you, to Pharaoh. Indeed, he has transgressed

locale.transliteration: Faqoola lahu qawlan layyinan laAAallahu yatathakkaru aw yakhsha
locale.translation: And speak to him with gentle speech that perhaps he may be reminded or fear [Allah]

locale.transliteration: Qala rabbana innana nakhafu an yafruta AAalayna aw an yatgha
locale.translation: They said, "Our Lord, indeed we are afraid that he will hasten [punishment] against us or that he will transgress

locale.transliteration: Qala la takhafa innanee maAAakuma asmaAAu waara
locale.translation: [Allah] said, "Fear not. Indeed, I am with you both; I hear and I see

locale.transliteration: Fatiyahu faqoola inna rasoola rabbika faarsil maAAana banee israeela wala tuAAaththibhum qad jinaka biayatin min rabbika waalssalamu AAala mani ittabaAAa alhuda
locale.translation: So go to him and say, 'Indeed, we are messengers of your Lord, so send with us the Children of Israel and do not torment them. We have come to you with a sign from your Lord. And peace will be upon he who follows the guidance

locale.transliteration: Inna qad oohiya ilayna anna alAAathaba AAala man kaththaba watawalla
locale.translation: Indeed, it has been revealed to us that the punishment will be upon whoever denies and turns away

locale.transliteration: Qala faman rabbukuma ya moosa
locale.translation: [Pharaoh] said, "So who is the Lord of you two, O Moses

locale.transliteration: Qala rabbuna allathee aAAta kulla shayin khalqahu thumma hada
locale.translation: He said, "Our Lord is He who gave each thing its form and then guided [it]

locale.transliteration: Qala fama balu alqurooni aloola
locale.translation: [Pharaoh] said, "Then what is the case of the former generations

locale.transliteration: Qala AAilmuha AAinda rabbee fee kitabin la yadillu rabbee wala yansa
locale.translation: [Moses] said, "The knowledge thereof is with my Lord in a record. My Lord neither errs nor forgets

locale.transliteration: Allathee jaAAala lakumu alarda mahdan wasalaka lakum feeha subulan waanzala mina alssamai maan faakhrajna bihi azwajan min nabatin shatta
locale.translation: [It is He] who has made for you the earth as a bed [spread out] and inserted therein for you roadways and sent down from the sky, rain and produced thereby categories of various plants

locale.transliteration: Kuloo wairAAaw anAAamakum inna fee thalika laayatin liolee alnnuha
locale.translation: Eat [therefrom] and pasture your livestock. Indeed, in that are signs for those of intelligence

locale.transliteration: Minha khalaqnakum wafeeha nuAAeedukum waminha nukhrijukum taratan okhra
locale.translation: From the earth We created you, and into it We will return you, and from it We will extract you another time

locale.transliteration: Walaqad araynahu ayatina kullaha fakaththaba waaba
locale.translation: And We certainly showed Pharaoh Our signs - all of them - but he denied and refused

locale.transliteration: Qala ajitana litukhrijana min ardina bisihrika ya moosa
locale.translation: He said, "Have you come to us to drive us out of our land with your magic, O Moses

locale.transliteration: Falanatiyannaka bisihrin mithlihi faijAAal baynana wabaynaka mawAAidan la nukhlifuhu nahnu wala anta makanan suwan
locale.translation: Then we will surely bring you magic like it, so make between us and you an appointment, which we will not fail to keep and neither will you, in a place assigned

locale.transliteration: Qala mawAAidukum yawmu alzzeenati waan yuhshara alnnasu duhan
locale.translation: [Moses] said, "Your appointment is on the day of the festival when the people assemble at mid-morning

locale.transliteration: Fatawalla firAAawnu fajamaAAa kaydahu thumma ata
locale.translation: So Pharaoh went away, put together his plan, and then came [to Moses]

locale.transliteration: Qala lahum moosa waylakum la taftaroo AAala Allahi kathiban fayushitakum biAAathabin waqad khaba mani iftara
locale.translation: Moses said to the magicians summoned by Pharaoh, "Woe to you! Do not invent a lie against Allah or He will exterminate you with a punishment; and he has failed who invents [such falsehood]
