locale.transliteration: FatanazaAAoo amrahum baynahum waasarroo alnnajwa
locale.translation: So they disputed over their affair among themselves and concealed their private conversation

locale.transliteration: Qaloo in hathani lasahirani yureedani an yukhrijakum min ardikum bisihrihima wayathhaba bitareeqatikumu almuthla
locale.translation: They said, "Indeed, these are two magicians who want to drive you out of your land with their magic and do away with your most exemplary way

locale.transliteration: FaajmiAAoo kaydakum thumma itoo saffan waqad aflaha alyawma mani istaAAla
locale.translation: So resolve upon your plan and then come [forward] in line. And he has succeeded today who overcomes

locale.transliteration: Qaloo ya moosa imma an tulqiya waimma an nakoona awwala man alqa
locale.translation: They said, "O Moses, either you throw or we will be the first to throw

locale.transliteration: Qala bal alqoo faitha hibaluhum waAAisiyyuhum yukhayyalu ilayhi min sihrihim annaha tasAAa
locale.translation: He said, "Rather, you throw." And suddenly their ropes and staffs seemed to him from their magic that they were moving [like snakes]

locale.transliteration: Faawjasa fee nafsihi kheefatan moosa
locale.translation: And he sensed within himself apprehension, did Moses

locale.transliteration: Qulna la takhaf innaka anta alaAAla
locale.translation: Allah said, "Fear not. Indeed, it is you who are superior

locale.transliteration: Waalqi ma fee yameenika talqaf ma sanaAAoo innama sanaAAoo kaydu sahirin wala yuflihu alssahiru haythu ata
locale.translation: And throw what is in your right hand; it will swallow up what they have crafted. What they have crafted is but the trick of a magician, and the magician will not succeed wherever he is

locale.transliteration: Faolqiya alssaharatu sujjadan qaloo amanna birabbi haroona wamoosa
locale.translation: So the magicians fell down in prostration. They said, "We have believed in the Lord of Aaron and Moses

locale.transliteration: Qala amantum lahu qabla an athana lakum innahu lakabeerukumu allathee AAallamakumu alssihra falaoqattiAAanna aydiyakum waarjulakum min khilafin walaosallibannakum fee juthooAAi alnnakhli walataAAlamunna ayyuna ashaddu AAathaban waabqa
locale.translation: [Pharaoh] said, "You believed him before I gave you permission. Indeed, he is your leader who has taught you magic. So I will surely cut off your hands and your feet on opposite sides, and I will crucify you on the trunks of palm trees, and you will surely know which of us is more severe in [giving] punishment and more enduring

locale.transliteration: Qaloo lan nuthiraka AAala ma jaana mina albayyinati waallathee fatarana faiqdi ma anta qadin innama taqdee hathihi alhayata alddunya
locale.translation: They said, "Never will we prefer you over what has come to us of clear proofs and [over] He who created us. So decree whatever you are to decree. You can only decree for this worldly life

locale.transliteration: Inna amanna birabbina liyaghfira lana khatayana wama akrahtana AAalayhi mina alssihri waAllahu khayrun waabqa
locale.translation: Indeed, we have believed in our Lord that He may forgive us our sins and what you compelled us [to do] of magic. And Allah is better and more enduring

locale.transliteration: Innahu man yati rabbahu mujriman fainna lahu jahannama la yamootu feeha wala yahya
locale.translation: Indeed, whoever comes to his Lord as a criminal - indeed, for him is Hell; he will neither die therein nor live

locale.transliteration: Waman yatihi muminan qad AAamila alssalihati faolaika lahumu alddarajatu alAAula
locale.translation: But whoever comes to Him as a believer having done righteous deeds - for those will be the highest degrees [in position]

locale.transliteration: Jannatu AAadnin tajree min tahtiha alanharu khalideena feeha wathalika jazao man tazakka
locale.translation: Gardens of perpetual residence beneath which rivers flow, wherein they abide eternally. And that is the reward of one who purifies himself

locale.transliteration: Walaqad awhayna ila moosa an asri biAAibadee faidrib lahum tareeqan fee albahri yabasan la takhafu darakan wala takhsha
locale.translation: And We had inspired to Moses, "Travel by night with My servants and strike for them a dry path through the sea; you will not fear being overtaken [by Pharaoh] nor be afraid [of drowning]

locale.transliteration: FaatbaAAahum firAAawnu bijunoodihi faghashiyahum mina alyammi ma ghashiyahum
locale.translation: So Pharaoh pursued them with his soldiers, and there covered them from the sea that which covered them

locale.transliteration: Waadalla firAAawnu qawmahu wama hada
locale.translation: And Pharaoh led his people astray and did not guide [them]

locale.transliteration: Ya banee israeela qad anjaynakum min AAaduwwikum wawaAAadnakum janiba alttoori alaymana wanazzalna AAalaykumu almanna waalssalwa
locale.translation: O Children of Israel, We delivered you from your enemy, and We made an appointment with you at the right side of the mount, and We sent down to you manna and quails

locale.transliteration: Kuloo min tayyibati ma razaqnakum wala tatghaw feehi fayahilla AAalaykum ghadabee waman yahlil AAalayhi ghadabee faqad hawa
locale.translation: [Saying], "Eat from the good things with which We have provided you and do not transgress [or oppress others] therein, lest My anger should descend upon you. And he upon whom My anger descends has certainly fallen

locale.transliteration: Wainnee laghaffarun liman taba waamana waAAamila salihan thumma ihtada
locale.translation: But indeed, I am the Perpetual Forgiver of whoever repents and believes and does righteousness and then continues in guidance

locale.transliteration: Wama aAAjalaka AAan qawmika ya moosa
locale.translation: [Allah] said, "And what made you hasten from your people, O Moses

locale.transliteration: Qala hum olai AAala atharee waAAajiltu ilayka rabbi litarda
locale.translation: He said, "They are close upon my tracks, and I hastened to You, my Lord, that You be pleased

locale.transliteration: Qala fainna qad fatanna qawmaka min baAAdika waadallahumu alssamiriyyu
locale.translation: [Allah] said, "But indeed, We have tried your people after you [departed], and the Samiri has led them astray

locale.transliteration: FarajaAAa moosa ila qawmihi ghadbana asifan qala ya qawmi alam yaAAidkum rabbukum waAAdan hasanan afatala AAalaykumu alAAahdu am aradtum an yahilla AAalaykum ghadabun min rabbikum faakhlaftum mawAAidee
locale.translation: So Moses returned to his people, angry and grieved. He said, "O my people, did your Lord not make you a good promise? Then, was the time [of its fulfillment] too long for you, or did you wish that wrath from your Lord descend upon you, so you broke your promise [of obedience] to me

locale.transliteration: Qaloo ma akhlafna mawAAidaka bimalkina walakinna hummilna awzaran min zeenati alqawmi faqathafnaha fakathalika alqa alssamiriyyu
locale.translation: They said, "We did not break our promise to you by our will, but we were made to carry burdens from the ornaments of the people [of Pharaoh], so we threw them [into the fire], and thus did the Samiri throw

locale.transliteration: Faakhraja lahum AAijlan jasadan lahu khuwarun faqaloo hatha ilahukum wailahu moosa fanasiya
locale.translation: And he extracted for them [the statue of] a calf which had a lowing sound, and they said, "This is your god and the god of Moses, but he forgot

locale.transliteration: Afala yarawna alla yarjiAAu ilayhim qawlan wala yamliku lahum darran wala nafAAan
locale.translation: Did they not see that it could not return to them any speech and that it did not possess for them any harm or benefit

locale.transliteration: Walaqad qala lahum haroonu min qablu ya qawmi innama futintum bihi wainna rabbakumu alrrahmanu faittabiAAoonee waateeAAoo amree
locale.translation: And Aaron had already told them before [the return of Moses], "O my people, you are only being tested by it, and indeed, your Lord is the Most Merciful, so follow me and obey my order

locale.transliteration: Qaloo lan nabraha AAalayhi AAakifeena hatta yarjiAAa ilayna moosa
locale.translation: They said, "We will never cease being devoted to the calf until Moses returns to us

locale.transliteration: Qala ya haroonu ma manaAAaka ith raaytahum dalloo
locale.translation: [Moses] said, "O Aaron, what prevented you, when you saw them going astray

locale.transliteration: Alla tattabiAAani afaAAasayta amree
locale.translation: From following me? Then have you disobeyed my order

locale.transliteration: Qala ya bna omma la takhuth bilihyatee wala birasee innee khasheetu an taqoola farraqta bayna banee israeela walam tarqub qawlee
locale.translation: [Aaron] said, "O son of my mother, do not seize [me] by my beard or by my head. Indeed, I feared that you would say, 'You caused division among the Children of Israel, and you did not observe [or await] my word

locale.transliteration: Qala fama khatbuka ya samiriyyu
locale.translation: [Moses] said, "And what is your case, O Samiri

locale.transliteration: Qala basurtu bima lam yabsuroo bihi faqabadtu qabdatan min athari alrrasooli fanabathtuha wakathalika sawwalat lee nafsee
locale.translation: He said, "I saw what they did not see, so I took a handful [of dust] from the track of the messenger and threw it, and thus did my soul entice me

locale.transliteration: Qala faithhab fainna laka fee alhayati an taqoola la misasa wainna laka mawAAidan lan tukhlafahu waonthur ila ilahika allathee thalta AAalayhi AAakifan lanuharriqannahu thumma lanansifannahu fee alyammi nasfan
locale.translation: [Moses] said, "Then go. And indeed, it is [decreed] for you in [this] life to say, 'No contact.' And indeed, you have an appointment [in the Hereafter] you will not fail to keep. And look at your 'god' to which you remained devoted. We will surely burn it and blow it into the sea with a blast

locale.transliteration: Innama ilahukumu Allahu allathee la ilaha illa huwa wasiAAa kulla shayin AAilman
locale.translation: Your god is only Allah, except for whom there is no deity. He has encompassed all things in knowledge

locale.transliteration: Kathalika naqussu AAalayka min anbai ma qad sabaqa waqad ataynaka min ladunna thikran
locale.translation: Thus, [O Muhammad], We relate to you from the news of what has preceded. And We have certainly given you from Us the Qur'an

locale.transliteration: Man aAArada AAanhu fainnahu yahmilu yawma alqiyamati wizran
locale.translation: Whoever turns away from it - then indeed, he will bear on the Day of Resurrection a burden

locale.transliteration: Khalideena feehi wasaa lahum yawma alqiyamati himlan
locale.translation: [Abiding] eternally therein, and evil it is for them on the Day of Resurrection as a load

locale.transliteration: Yawma yunfakhu fee alssoori wanahshuru almujrimeena yawmaithin zurqan
locale.translation: The Day the Horn will be blown. And We will gather the criminals, that Day, blue-eyed

locale.transliteration: Yatakhafatoona baynahum in labithtum illa AAashran
locale.translation: They will murmur among themselves, "You remained not but ten [days in the world]

locale.transliteration: Nahnu aAAlamu bima yaqooloona ith yaqoolu amthaluhum tareeqatan in labithtum illa yawman
locale.translation: We are most knowing of what they say when the best of them in manner will say, "You remained not but one day

locale.transliteration: Wayasaloonaka AAani aljibali faqul yansifuha rabbee nasfan
locale.translation: And they ask you about the mountains, so say, "My Lord will blow them away with a blast

locale.transliteration: Fayatharuha qaAAan safsafan
locale.translation: And He will leave the earth a level plain

locale.transliteration: La tara feeha AAiwajan wala amtan
locale.translation: You will not see therein a depression or an elevation

locale.transliteration: Yawmaithin yattabiAAoona alddaAAiya la AAiwaja lahu wakhashaAAati alaswatu lilrrahmani fala tasmaAAu illa hamsan
locale.translation: That Day, everyone will follow [the call of] the Caller [with] no deviation therefrom, and [all] voices will be stilled before the Most Merciful, so you will not hear except a whisper [of footsteps]

locale.transliteration: Yawmaithin la tanfaAAu alshshafaAAatu illa man athina lahu alrrahmanu waradiya lahu qawlan
locale.translation: That Day, no intercession will benefit except [that of] one to whom the Most Merciful has given permission and has accepted his word

locale.transliteration: YaAAlamu ma bayna aydeehim wama khalfahum wala yuheetoona bihi AAilman
locale.translation: Allah knows what is [presently] before them and what will be after them, but they do not encompass it in knowledge

locale.transliteration: WaAAanati alwujoohu lilhayyi alqayyoomi waqad khaba man hamala thulman
locale.translation: And [all] faces will be humbled before the Ever-Living, the Sustainer of existence. And he will have failed who carries injustice

locale.transliteration: Waman yaAAmal mina alssalihati wahuwa muminun fala yakhafu thulman wala hadman
locale.translation: But he who does of righteous deeds while he is a believer - he will neither fear injustice nor deprivation

locale.transliteration: Wakathalika anzalnahu quranan AAarabiyyan wasarrafna feehi mina alwaAAeedi laAAallahum yattaqoona aw yuhdithu lahum thikran
locale.translation: And thus We have sent it down as an Arabic Qur'an and have diversified therein the warnings that perhaps they will avoid [sin] or it would cause them remembrance

locale.transliteration: FataAAala Allahu almaliku alhaqqu wala taAAjal bialqurani min qabli an yuqda ilayka wahyuhu waqul rabbi zidnee AAilman
locale.translation: So high [above all] is Allah, the Sovereign, the Truth. And, [O Muhammad], do not hasten with [recitation of] the Qur'an before its revelation is completed to you, and say, "My Lord, increase me in knowledge

locale.transliteration: Walaqad AAahidna ila adama min qablu fanasiya walam najid lahu AAazman
locale.translation: And We had already taken a promise from Adam before, but he forgot; and We found not in him determination

locale.transliteration: Waith qulna lilmalaikati osjudoo liadama fasajadoo illa ibleesa aba
locale.translation: And [mention] when We said to the angels, "Prostrate to Adam," and they prostrated, except Iblees; he refused

locale.transliteration: Faqulna ya adamu inna hatha AAaduwwun laka walizawjika fala yukhrijannakuma mina aljannati fatashqa
locale.translation: So We said, "O Adam, indeed this is an enemy to you and to your wife. Then let him not remove you from Paradise so you would suffer

locale.transliteration: Inna laka alla tajooAAa feeha wala taAAra
locale.translation: Indeed, it is [promised] for you not to be hungry therein or be unclothed

locale.transliteration: Waannaka la tathmao feeha wala tadha
locale.translation: And indeed, you will not be thirsty therein or be hot from the sun

locale.transliteration: Fawaswasa ilayhi alshshaytanu qala ya adamu hal adulluka AAala shajarati alkhuldi wamulkin la yabla
locale.translation: Then Satan whispered to him; he said, "O Adam, shall I direct you to the tree of eternity and possession that will not deteriorate

locale.transliteration: Faakala minha fabadat lahuma sawatuhuma watafiqa yakhsifani AAalayhima min waraqi aljannati waAAasa adamu rabbahu faghawa
locale.translation: And Adam and his wife ate of it, and their private parts became apparent to them, and they began to fasten over themselves from the leaves of Paradise. And Adam disobeyed his Lord and erred

locale.transliteration: Thumma ijtabahu rabbuhu fataba AAalayhi wahada
locale.translation: Then his Lord chose him and turned to him in forgiveness and guided [him]

locale.transliteration: Qala ihbita minha jameeAAan baAAdukum libaAAdin AAaduwwun faimma yatiyannakum minnee hudan famani ittabaAAa hudaya fala yadillu wala yashqa
locale.translation: [Allah] said, "Descend from Paradise - all, [your descendants] being enemies to one another. And if there should come to you guidance from Me - then whoever follows My guidance will neither go astray [in the world] nor suffer [in the Hereafter]

locale.transliteration: Waman aAArada AAan thikree fainna lahu maAAeeshatan dankan wanahshuruhu yawma alqiyamati aAAman
locale.translation: And whoever turns away from My remembrance - indeed, he will have a depressed life, and We will gather him on the Day of Resurrection blind

locale.transliteration: Qala rabbi lima hashartanee aAAma waqad kuntu baseeran
locale.translation: He will say, "My Lord, why have you raised me blind while I was [once] seeing

locale.transliteration: Qala kathalika atatka ayatuna fanaseetaha wakathalika alyawma tunsa
locale.translation: [Allah] will say, "Thus did Our signs come to you, and you forgot them; and thus will you this Day be forgotten

locale.transliteration: Wakathalika najzee man asrafa walam yumin biayati rabbihi walaAAathabu alakhirati ashaddu waabqa
locale.translation: And thus do We recompense he who transgressed and did not believe in the signs of his Lord. And the punishment of the Hereafter is more severe and more enduring

locale.transliteration: Afalam yahdi lahum kam ahlakna qablahum mina alqurooni yamshoona fee masakinihim inna fee thalika laayatin liolee alnnuha
locale.translation: Then, has it not become clear to them how many generations We destroyed before them as they walk among their dwellings? Indeed in that are signs for those of intelligence

locale.transliteration: Walawla kalimatun sabaqat min rabbika lakana lizaman waajalun musamman
locale.translation: And if not for a word that preceded from your Lord, punishment would have been an obligation [due immediately], and [if not for] a specified term [decreed]

locale.transliteration: Faisbir AAala ma yaqooloona wasabbih bihamdi rabbika qabla tulooAAi alshshamsi waqabla ghuroobiha wamin anai allayli fasabbih waatrafa alnnahari laAAallaka tarda
locale.translation: So be patient over what they say and exalt [Allah] with praise of your Lord before the rising of the sun and before its setting; and during periods of the night [exalt Him] and at the ends of the day, that you may be satisfied

locale.transliteration: Wala tamuddanna AAaynayka ila ma mattaAAna bihi azwajan minhum zahrata alhayati alddunya linaftinahum feehi warizqu rabbika khayrun waabqa
locale.translation: And do not extend your eyes toward that by which We have given enjoyment to [some] categories of them, [its being but] the splendor of worldly life by which We test them. And the provision of your Lord is better and more enduring

locale.transliteration: Wamur ahlaka bialssalati waistabir AAalayha la nasaluka rizqan nahnu narzuquka waalAAaqibatu lilttaqwa
locale.translation: And enjoin prayer upon your family [and people] and be steadfast therein. We ask you not for provision; We provide for you, and the [best] outcome is for [those of] righteousness

locale.transliteration: Waqaloo lawla yateena biayatin min rabbihi awalam tatihim bayyinatu ma fee alssuhufi aloola
locale.translation: And they say, "Why does he not bring us a sign from his Lord?" Has there not come to them evidence of what was in the former scriptures

locale.transliteration: Walaw anna ahlaknahum biAAathabin min qablihi laqaloo rabbana lawla arsalta ilayna rasoolan fanattabiAAa ayatika min qabli an nathilla wanakhza
locale.translation: And if We had destroyed them with a punishment before him, they would have said, "Our Lord, why did You not send to us a messenger so we could have followed Your verses before we were humiliated and disgraced

locale.transliteration: Qul kullun mutarabbisun fatarabbasoo fasataAAlamoona man ashabu alssirati alssawiyyi wamani ihtada
locale.translation: Say, "Each [of us] is waiting; so wait. For you will know who are the companions of the sound path and who is guided

locale.transliteration: Al-Anbya
locale.translation: The Prophets

locale.transliteration: Iqtaraba lilnnasi hisabuhum wahum fee ghaflatin muAAridoona
locale.translation: [The time of] their account has approached for the people, while they are in heedlessness turning away

locale.transliteration: Ma yateehim min thikrin min rabbihim muhdathin illa istamaAAoohu wahum yalAAaboona
locale.translation: No mention comes to them anew from their Lord except that they listen to it while they are at play

locale.transliteration: Lahiyatan quloobuhum waasarroo alnnajwa allatheena thalamoo hal hatha illa basharun mithlukum afatatoona alssihra waantum tubsiroona
locale.translation: With their hearts distracted. And those who do wrong conceal their private conversation, [saying], "Is this [Prophet] except a human being like you? So would you approach magic while you are aware [of it]

locale.transliteration: Qala rabbee yaAAlamu alqawla fee alssamai waalardi wahuwa alssameeAAu alAAaleemu
locale.translation: The Prophet said, "My Lord knows whatever is said throughout the heaven and earth, and He is the Hearing, the Knowing

locale.transliteration: Bal qaloo adghathu ahlamin bali iftarahu bal huwa shaAAirun falyatina biayatin kama orsila alawwaloona
locale.translation: But they say, "[The revelation is but] a mixture of false dreams; rather, he has invented it; rather, he is a poet. So let him bring us a sign just as the previous [messengers] were sent [with miracles]

locale.transliteration: Ma amanat qablahum min qaryatin ahlaknaha afahum yuminoona
locale.translation: Not a [single] city which We destroyed believed before them, so will they believe

locale.transliteration: Wama arsalna qablaka illa rijalan noohee ilayhim faisaloo ahla alththikri in kuntum la taAAlamoona
locale.translation: And We sent not before you, [O Muhammad], except men to whom We revealed [the message], so ask the people of the message if you do not know

locale.transliteration: Wama jaAAalnahum jasadan la yakuloona alttaAAama wama kanoo khalideena
locale.translation: And We did not make the prophets forms not eating food, nor were they immortal [on earth]

locale.transliteration: Thumma sadaqnahumu alwaAAda faanjaynahum waman nashao waahlakna almusrifeena
locale.translation: Then We fulfilled for them the promise, and We saved them and whom We willed and destroyed the transgressors

locale.transliteration: Laqad anzalna ilaykum kitaban feehi thikrukum afala taAAqiloona
locale.translation: We have certainly sent down to you a Book in which is your mention. Then will you not reason

locale.transliteration: Wakam qasamna min qaryatin kanat thalimatan waanshana baAAdaha qawman akhareena
locale.translation: And how many a city which was unjust have We shattered and produced after it another people

locale.transliteration: Falamma ahassoo basana itha hum minha yarkudoona
locale.translation: And when its inhabitants perceived Our punishment, at once they fled from it

locale.transliteration: La tarkudoo wairjiAAoo ila ma otriftum feehi wamasakinikum laAAallakum tusaloona
locale.translation: [Some angels said], "Do not flee but return to where you were given luxury and to your homes - perhaps you will be questioned

locale.transliteration: Qaloo ya waylana inna kunna thalimeena
locale.translation: They said, "O woe to us! Indeed, we were wrongdoers

locale.transliteration: Fama zalat tilka daAAwahum hatta jaAAalnahum haseedan khamideena
locale.translation: And that declaration of theirs did not cease until We made them [as] a harvest [mowed down], extinguished [like a fire]

locale.transliteration: Wama khalaqna alssamaa waalarda wama baynahuma laAAibeena
locale.translation: And We did not create the heaven and earth and that between them in play

locale.transliteration: Law aradna an nattakhitha lahwan laittakhathnahu min ladunna in kunna faAAileena
locale.translation: Had We intended to take a diversion, We could have taken it from [what is] with Us - if [indeed] We were to do so

locale.transliteration: Bal naqthifu bialhaqqi AAala albatili fayadmaghuhu faitha huwa zahiqun walakumu alwaylu mimma tasifoona
locale.translation: Rather, We dash the truth upon falsehood, and it destroys it, and thereupon it departs. And for you is destruction from that which you describe

locale.transliteration: Walahu man fee alssamawati waalardi waman AAindahu la yastakbiroona AAan AAibadatihi wala yastahsiroona
locale.translation: To Him belongs whoever is in the heavens and the earth. And those near Him are not prevented by arrogance from His worship, nor do they tire

locale.transliteration: Yusabbihoona allayla waalnnahara la yafturoona
locale.translation: They exalt [Him] night and day [and] do not slacken

locale.transliteration: Ami ittakhathoo alihatan mina alardi hum yunshiroona
locale.translation: Or have men taken for themselves gods from the earth who resurrect [the dead]

locale.transliteration: Law kana feehima alihatun illa Allahu lafasadata fasubhana Allahi rabbi alAAarshi AAamma yasifoona
locale.translation: Had there been within the heavens and earth gods besides Allah, they both would have been ruined. So exalted is Allah, Lord of the Throne, above what they describe

locale.transliteration: La yusalu AAamma yafAAalu wahum yusaloona
locale.translation: He is not questioned about what He does, but they will be questioned

locale.transliteration: Ami ittakhathoo min doonihi alihatan qul hatoo burhanakum hatha thikru man maAAiya wathikru man qablee bal aktharuhum la yaAAlamoona alhaqqa fahum muAAridoona
locale.translation: Or have they taken gods besides Him? Say, [O Muhammad], "Produce your proof. This [Qur'an] is the message for those with me and the message of those before me." But most of them do not know the truth, so they are turning away

locale.transliteration: Wama arsalna min qablika min rasoolin illa noohee ilayhi annahu la ilaha illa ana faoAAbudooni
locale.translation: And We sent not before you any messenger except that We revealed to him that, "There is no deity except Me, so worship Me

locale.transliteration: Waqaloo ittakhatha alrrahmanu waladan subhanahu bal AAibadun mukramoona
locale.translation: And they say, "The Most Merciful has taken a son." Exalted is He! Rather, they are [but] honored servants

locale.transliteration: La yasbiqoonahu bialqawli wahum biamrihi yaAAmaloona
locale.translation: They cannot precede Him in word, and they act by His command

locale.transliteration: YaAAlamu ma bayna aydeehim wama khalfahum wala yashfaAAoona illa limani irtada wahum min khashyatihi mushfiqoona
locale.translation: He knows what is [presently] before them and what will be after them, and they cannot intercede except on behalf of one whom He approves. And they, from fear of Him, are apprehensive

locale.transliteration: Waman yaqul minhum innee ilahun min doonihi fathalika najzeehi jahannama kathalika najzee alththalimeena
locale.translation: And whoever of them should say, "Indeed, I am a god besides Him"- that one We would recompense with Hell. Thus do We recompense the wrongdoers

locale.transliteration: Awalam yara allatheena kafaroo anna alssamawati waalarda kanata ratqan fafataqnahuma wajaAAalna mina almai kulla shayin hayyin afala yuminoona
locale.translation: Have those who disbelieved not considered that the heavens and the earth were a joined entity, and We separated them and made from water every living thing? Then will they not believe

locale.transliteration: WajaAAalna fee alardi rawasiya an tameeda bihim wajaAAalna feeha fijajan subulan laAAallahum yahtadoona
locale.translation: And We placed within the earth firmly set mountains, lest it should shift with them, and We made therein [mountain] passes [as] roads that they might be guided

locale.transliteration: WajaAAalna alssamaa saqfan mahfoothan wahum AAan ayatiha muAAridoona
locale.translation: And We made the sky a protected ceiling, but they, from its signs, are turning away

locale.transliteration: Wahuwa allathee khalaqa allayla waalnnahara waalshshamsa waalqamara kullun fee falakin yasbahoona
locale.translation: And it is He who created the night and the day and the sun and the moon; all [heavenly bodies] in an orbit are swimming

locale.transliteration: Wama jaAAalna libasharin min qablika alkhulda afain mitta fahumu alkhalidoona
locale.translation: And We did not grant to any man before you eternity [on earth]; so if you die - would they be eternal

locale.transliteration: Kullu nafsin thaiqatu almawti wanablookum bialshsharri waalkhayri fitnatan wailayna turjaAAoona
locale.translation: Every soul will taste death. And We test you with evil and with good as trial; and to Us you will be returned

locale.transliteration: Waitha raaka allatheena kafaroo in yattakhithoonaka illa huzuwan ahatha allathee yathkuru alihatakum wahum bithikri alrrahmani hum kafiroona
locale.translation: And when those who disbelieve see you, [O Muhammad], they take you not except in ridicule, [saying], "Is this the one who insults your gods?" And they are, at the mention of the Most Merciful, disbelievers

locale.transliteration: Khuliqa alinsanu min AAajalin saoreekum ayatee fala tastaAAjiloona
locale.translation: Man was created of haste. I will show you My signs, so do not impatiently urge Me

locale.transliteration: Wayaqooloona mata hatha alwaAAdu in kuntum sadiqeena
locale.translation: And they say, "When is this promise, if you should be truthful

locale.transliteration: Law yaAAlamu allatheena kafaroo heena la yakuffoona AAan wujoohihimu alnnara wala AAan thuhoorihim wala hum yunsaroona
locale.translation: If those who disbelieved but knew the time when they will not avert the Fire from their faces or from their backs and they will not be aided

locale.transliteration: Bal tateehim baghtatan fatabhatuhum fala yastateeAAoona raddaha wala hum yuntharoona
locale.translation: Rather, it will come to them unexpectedly and bewilder them, and they will not be able to repel it, nor will they be reprieved

locale.transliteration: Walaqadi istuhzia birusulin min qablika fahaqa biallatheena sakhiroo minhum ma kanoo bihi yastahzioona
locale.translation: And already were messengers ridiculed before you, but those who mocked them were enveloped by what they used to ridicule

locale.transliteration: Qul man yaklaokum biallayli waalnnahari mina alrrahmani bal hum AAan thikri rabbihim muAAridoona
locale.translation: Say, "Who can protect you at night or by day from the Most Merciful?" But they are, from the remembrance of their Lord, turning away

locale.transliteration: Am lahum alihatun tamnaAAuhum min doonina la yastateeAAoona nasra anfusihim wala hum minna yushaboona
locale.translation: Or do they have gods to defend them other than Us? They are unable [even] to help themselves, nor can they be protected from Us

locale.transliteration: Bal mattaAAna haolai waabaahum hatta tala AAalayhimu alAAumuru afala yarawna anna natee alarda nanqusuha min atrafiha afahumu alghaliboona
locale.translation: But, [on the contrary], We have provided good things for these [disbelievers] and their fathers until life was prolonged for them. Then do they not see that We set upon the land, reducing it from its borders? So it is they who will overcome

locale.transliteration: Qul innama onthirukum bialwahyi wala yasmaAAu alssummu aldduAAaa itha ma yuntharoona
locale.translation: Say, "I only warn you by revelation." But the deaf do not hear the call when they are warned

locale.transliteration: Walain massathum nafhatun min AAathabi rabbika layaqoolunna ya waylana inna kunna thalimeena
locale.translation: And if [as much as] a whiff of the punishment of your Lord should touch them, they would surely say, "O woe to us! Indeed, we have been wrongdoers

locale.transliteration: WanadaAAu almawazeena alqista liyawmi alqiyamati fala tuthlamu nafsun shayan wain kana mithqala habbatin min khardalin atayna biha wakafa bina hasibeena
locale.translation: And We place the scales of justice for the Day of Resurrection, so no soul will be treated unjustly at all. And if there is [even] the weight of a mustard seed, We will bring it forth. And sufficient are We as accountant

locale.transliteration: Walaqad atayna moosa waharoona alfurqana wadiyaan wathikran lilmuttaqeena
locale.translation: And We had already given Moses and Aaron the criterion and a light and a reminder for the righteous

locale.transliteration: Allatheena yakhshawna rabbahum bialghaybi wahum mina alssaAAati mushfiqoona
locale.translation: Who fear their Lord unseen, while they are of the Hour apprehensive

locale.transliteration: Wahatha thikrun mubarakun anzalnahu afaantum lahu munkiroona
locale.translation: And this [Qur'an] is a blessed message which We have sent down. Then are you with it unacquainted

locale.transliteration: Walaqad atayna ibraheema rushdahu min qablu wakunna bihi AAalimeena
locale.translation: And We had certainly given Abraham his sound judgement before, and We were of him well-Knowing

locale.transliteration: Ith qala liabeehi waqawmihi ma hathihi alttamatheelu allatee antum laha AAakifoona
locale.translation: When he said to his father and his people, "What are these statues to which you are devoted

locale.transliteration: Qaloo wajadna abaana laha AAabideena
locale.translation: They said, "We found our fathers worshippers of them

locale.transliteration: Qala laqad kuntum antum waabaokum fee dalalin mubeenin
locale.translation: He said, "You were certainly, you and your fathers, in manifest error

locale.transliteration: Qaloo ajitana bialhaqqi am anta mina allaAAibeena
locale.translation: They said, "Have you come to us with truth, or are you of those who jest

locale.transliteration: Qala bal rabbukum rabbu alssamawati waalardi allathee fatarahunna waana AAala thalikum mina alshshahideena
locale.translation: He said, "[No], rather, your Lord is the Lord of the heavens and the earth who created them, and I, to that, am of those who testify

locale.transliteration: WataAllahi laakeedanna asnamakum baAAda an tuwalloo mudbireena
locale.translation: And [I swear] by Allah, I will surely plan against your idols after you have turned and gone away

locale.transliteration: FajaAAalahum juthathan illa kabeeran lahum laAAallahum ilayhi yarjiAAoona
locale.translation: So he made them into fragments, except a large one among them, that they might return to it [and question]

locale.transliteration: Qaloo man faAAala hatha bialihatina innahu lamina alththalimeena
locale.translation: They said, "Who has done this to our gods? Indeed, he is of the wrongdoers

locale.transliteration: Qaloo samiAAna fatan yathkuruhum yuqalu lahu ibraheemu
locale.translation: They said, "We heard a young man mention them who is called Abraham

locale.transliteration: Qaloo fatoo bihi AAala aAAyuni alnnasi laAAallahum yashhadoona
locale.translation: They said, "Then bring him before the eyes of the people that they may testify

locale.transliteration: Qaloo aanta faAAalta hatha bialihatina ya ibraheemu
locale.translation: They said, "Have you done this to our gods, O Abraham

locale.transliteration: Qala bal faAAalahu kabeeruhum hatha faisaloohum in kanoo yantiqoona
locale.translation: He said, "Rather, this - the largest of them - did it, so ask them, if they should [be able to] speak

locale.transliteration: FarajaAAoo ila anfusihim faqaloo innakum antumu alththalimoona
locale.translation: So they returned to [blaming] themselves and said [to each other], "Indeed, you are the wrongdoers

locale.transliteration: Thumma nukisoo AAala ruoosihim laqad AAalimta ma haolai yantiqoona
locale.translation: Then they reversed themselves, [saying], "You have already known that these do not speak

locale.transliteration: Qala afataAAbudoona min dooni Allahi ma la yanfaAAukum shayan wala yadurrukum
locale.translation: He said, "Then do you worship instead of Allah that which does not benefit you at all or harm you

locale.transliteration: Offin lakum walima taAAbudoona min dooni Allahi afala taAAqiloona
locale.translation: Uff to you and to what you worship instead of Allah. Then will you not use reason

locale.transliteration: Qaloo harriqoohu waonsuroo alihatakum in kuntum faAAileena
locale.translation: They said, "Burn him and support your gods - if you are to act

locale.transliteration: Qulna ya naru koonee bardan wasalaman AAala ibraheema
locale.translation: Allah said, "O fire, be coolness and safety upon Abraham

locale.transliteration: Waaradoo bihi kaydan fajaAAalnahumu alakhsareena
locale.translation: And they intended for him harm, but We made them the greatest losers

locale.transliteration: Wanajjaynahu walootan ila alardi allatee barakna feeha lilAAalameena
locale.translation: And We delivered him and Lot to the land which We had blessed for the worlds

locale.transliteration: Wawahabna lahu ishaqa wayaAAqooba nafilatan wakullan jaAAalna saliheena
locale.translation: And We gave him Isaac and Jacob in addition, and all [of them] We made righteous

locale.transliteration: WajaAAalnahum aimmatan yahdoona biamrina waawhayna ilayhim fiAAla alkhayrati waiqama alssalati waeetaa alzzakati wakanoo lana AAabideena
locale.translation: And We made them leaders guiding by Our command. And We inspired to them the doing of good deeds, establishment of prayer, and giving of zakah; and they were worshippers of Us

locale.transliteration: Walootan ataynahu hukman waAAilman wanajjaynahu mina alqaryati allatee kanat taAAmalu alkhabaitha innahum kanoo qawma sawin fasiqeena
locale.translation: And to Lot We gave judgement and knowledge, and We saved him from the city that was committing wicked deeds. Indeed, they were a people of evil, defiantly disobedient

locale.transliteration: Waadkhalnahu fee rahmatina innahu mina alssaliheena
locale.translation: And We admitted him into Our mercy. Indeed, he was of the righteous

locale.transliteration: Wanoohan ith nada min qablu faistajabna lahu fanajjaynahu waahlahu mina alkarbi alAAatheemi
locale.translation: And [mention] Noah, when he called [to Allah] before [that time], so We responded to him and saved him and his family from the great flood

locale.transliteration: Wanasarnahu mina alqawmi allatheena kaththaboo biayatina innahum kanoo qawma sawin faaghraqnahum ajmaAAeena
locale.translation: And We saved him from the people who denied Our signs. Indeed, they were a people of evil, so We drowned them, all together

locale.transliteration: Wadawooda wasulaymana ith yahkumani fee alharthi ith nafashat feehi ghanamu alqawmi wakunna lihukmihim shahideena
locale.translation: And [mention] David and Solomon, when they judged concerning the field - when the sheep of a people overran it [at night], and We were witness to their judgement

locale.transliteration: Fafahhamnaha sulaymana wakullan atayna hukman waAAilman wasakhkharna maAAa dawooda aljibala yusabbihna waalttayra wakunna faAAileena
locale.translation: And We gave understanding of the case to Solomon, and to each [of them] We gave judgement and knowledge. And We subjected the mountains to exalt [Us], along with David and [also] the birds. And We were doing [that]

locale.transliteration: WaAAallamnahu sanAAata laboosin lakum lituhsinakum min basikum fahal antum shakiroona
locale.translation: And We taught him the fashioning of coats of armor to protect you from your [enemy in] battle. So will you then be grateful

locale.transliteration: Walisulaymana alrreeha AAasifatan tajree biamrihi ila alardi allatee barakna feeha wakunna bikulli shayin AAalimeena
locale.translation: And to Solomon [We subjected] the wind, blowing forcefully, proceeding by his command toward the land which We had blessed. And We are ever, of all things, Knowing

locale.transliteration: Wamina alshshayateeni man yaghoosoona lahu wayaAAmaloona AAamalan doona thalika wakunna lahum hafitheena
locale.translation: And of the devils were those who dived for him and did work other than that. And We were of them a guardian

locale.transliteration: Waayyooba ith nada rabbahu annee massaniya alddurru waanta arhamu alrrahimeena
locale.translation: And [mention] Job, when he called to his Lord, "Indeed, adversity has touched me, and you are the Most Merciful of the merciful

locale.transliteration: Faistajabna lahu fakashafna ma bihi min durrin waataynahu ahlahu wamithlahum maAAahum rahmatan min AAindina wathikra lilAAabideena
locale.translation: So We responded to him and removed what afflicted him of adversity. And We gave him [back] his family and the like thereof with them as mercy from Us and a reminder for the worshippers [of Allah]

locale.transliteration: WaismaAAeela waidreesa watha alkifli kullun mina alssabireena
locale.translation: And [mention] Ishmael and Idrees and Dhul-Kifl; all were of the patient

locale.transliteration: Waadkhalnahum fee rahmatina innahum mina alssaliheena
locale.translation: And We admitted them into Our mercy. Indeed, they were of the righteous

locale.transliteration: Watha alnnooni ith thahaba mughadiban fathanna an lan naqdira AAalayhi fanada fee alththulumati an la ilaha illa anta subhanaka innee kuntu mina alththalimeena
locale.translation: And [mention] the man of the fish, when he went off in anger and thought that We would not decree [anything] upon him. And he called out within the darknesses, "There is no deity except You; exalted are You. Indeed, I have been of the wrongdoers

locale.transliteration: Faistajabna lahu wanajjaynahu mina alghammi wakathalika nunjee almumineena
locale.translation: So We responded to him and saved him from the distress. And thus do We save the believers

locale.transliteration: Wazakariyya ith nada rabbahu rabbi la tatharnee fardan waanta khayru alwaritheena
locale.translation: And [mention] Zechariah, when he called to his Lord, "My Lord, do not leave me alone [with no heir], while you are the best of inheritors

locale.transliteration: Faistajabna lahu wawahabna lahu yahya waaslahna lahu zawjahu innahum kanoo yusariAAoona fee alkhayrati wayadAAoonana raghaban warahaban wakanoo lana khashiAAeena
locale.translation: So We responded to him, and We gave to him John, and amended for him his wife. Indeed, they used to hasten to good deeds and supplicate Us in hope and fear, and they were to Us humbly submissive

locale.transliteration: Waallatee ahsanat farjaha fanafakhna feeha min roohina wajaAAalnaha waibnaha ayatan lilAAalameena
locale.translation: And [mention] the one who guarded her chastity, so We blew into her [garment] through Our angel [Gabriel], and We made her and her son a sign for the worlds

locale.transliteration: Inna hathihi ommatukum ommatan wahidatan waana rabbukum faoAAbudooni
locale.translation: Indeed this, your religion, is one religion, and I am your Lord, so worship Me

locale.transliteration: WataqattaAAoo amrahum baynahum kullun ilayna rajiAAoona
locale.translation: And [yet] they divided their affair among themselves, [but] all to Us will return

locale.transliteration: Faman yaAAmal mina alssalihati wahuwa muminun fala kufrana lisaAAyihi wainna lahu katiboona
locale.translation: So whoever does righteous deeds while he is a believer - no denial will there be for his effort, and indeed We, of it, are recorders

locale.transliteration: Waharamun AAala qaryatin ahlaknaha annahum la yarjiAAoona
locale.translation: And there is prohibition upon [the people of] a city which We have destroyed that they will [ever] return

locale.transliteration: Hatta itha futihat yajooju wamajooju wahum min kulli hadabin yansiloona
locale.translation: Until when [the dam of] Gog and Magog has been opened and they, from every elevation, descend

locale.transliteration: Waiqtaraba alwaAAdu alhaqqu faitha hiya shakhisatun absaru allatheena kafaroo ya waylana qad kunna fee ghaflatin min hatha bal kunna thalimeena
locale.translation: And [when] the true promise has approached; then suddenly the eyes of those who disbelieved will be staring [in horror, while they say], "O woe to us; we had been unmindful of this; rather, we were wrongdoers

locale.transliteration: Innakum wama taAAbudoona min dooni Allahi hasabu jahannama antum laha waridoona
locale.translation: Indeed, you [disbelievers] and what you worship other than Allah are the firewood of Hell. You will be coming to [enter] it

locale.transliteration: Law kana haolai alihatan ma waradooha wakullun feeha khalidoona
locale.translation: Had these [false deities] been [actual] gods, they would not have come to it, but all are eternal therein

locale.transliteration: Lahum feeha zafeerun wahum feeha la yasmaAAoona
locale.translation: For them therein is heavy sighing, and they therein will not hear

locale.transliteration: Inna allatheena sabaqat lahum minna alhusna olaika AAanha mubAAadoona
locale.translation: Indeed, those for whom the best [reward] has preceded from Us - they are from it far removed

locale.transliteration: La yasmaAAoona haseesaha wahum fee ma ishtahat anfusuhum khalidoona
locale.translation: They will not hear its sound, while they are, in that which their souls desire, abiding eternally

locale.transliteration: La yahzunuhumu alfazaAAu alakbaru watatalaqqahumu almalaikatu hatha yawmukumu allathee kuntum tooAAadoona
locale.translation: They will not be grieved by the greatest terror, and the angels will meet them, [saying], "This is your Day which you have been promised

locale.transliteration: Yawma natwee alssamaa katayyi alssijlli lilkutubi kama badana awwala khalqin nuAAeeduhu waAAdan AAalayna inna kunna faAAileena
locale.translation: The Day when We will fold the heaven like the folding of a [written] sheet for the records. As We began the first creation, We will repeat it. [That is] a promise binding upon Us. Indeed, We will do it

locale.transliteration: Walaqad katabna fee alzzaboori min baAAdi alththikri anna alarda yarithuha AAibadiya alssalihoona
locale.translation: And We have already written in the book [of Psalms] after the [previous] mention that the land [of Paradise] is inherited by My righteous servants

locale.transliteration: Inna fee hatha labalaghan liqawmin AAabideena
locale.translation: Indeed, in this [Qur'an] is notification for a worshipping people

locale.transliteration: Wama arsalnaka illa rahmatan lilAAalameena
locale.translation: And We have not sent you, [O Muhammad], except as a mercy to the worlds

locale.transliteration: Qul innama yooha ilayya annama ilahukum ilahun wahidun fahal antum muslimoona
locale.translation: Say, "It is only revealed to me that your god is but one God; so will you be Muslims [in submission to Him]

locale.transliteration: Fain tawallaw faqul athantukum AAala sawain wain adree aqareebun am baAAeedun ma tooAAadoona
locale.translation: But if they turn away, then say, "I have announced to [all of] you equally. And I know not whether near or far is that which you are promised

locale.transliteration: Innahu yaAAlamu aljahra mina alqawli wayaAAlamu ma taktumoona
locale.translation: Indeed, He knows what is declared of speech, and He knows what you conceal

locale.transliteration: Wain adree laAAallahu fitnatun lakum wamataAAun ila heenin
locale.translation: And I know not; perhaps it is a trial for you and enjoyment for a time

locale.transliteration: Qala rabbi ohkum bialhaqqi warabbuna alrrahmanu almustaAAanu AAala ma tasifoona
locale.translation: [The Prophet] has said, "My Lord, judge [between us] in truth. And our Lord is the Most Merciful, the one whose help is sought against that which you describe

locale.transliteration: Al-Hajj
locale.translation: The Pilgrimage

locale.transliteration: Ya ayyuha alnnasu ittaqoo rabbakum inna zalzalata alssaAAati shayon AAatheemun
locale.translation: O mankind, fear your Lord. Indeed, the convulsion of the [final] Hour is a terrible thing

locale.transliteration: Yawma tarawnaha tathhalu kullu murdiAAatin AAamma ardaAAat watadaAAu kullu thati hamlin hamlaha watara alnnasa sukara wama hum bisukara walakinna AAathaba Allahi shadeedun
locale.translation: On the Day you see it every nursing mother will be distracted from that [child] she was nursing, and every pregnant woman will abort her pregnancy, and you will see the people [appearing] intoxicated while they are not intoxicated; but the punishment of Allah is severe

locale.transliteration: Wamina alnnasi man yujadilu fee Allahi bighayri AAilmin wayattabiAAu kulla shaytanin mareedin
locale.translation: And of the people is he who disputes about Allah without knowledge and follows every rebellious devil

locale.transliteration: Kutiba AAalayhi annahu man tawallahu faannahu yudilluhu wayahdeehi ila AAathabi alssaAAeeri
locale.translation: It has been decreed for every devil that whoever turns to him - he will misguide him and will lead him to the punishment of the Blaze

locale.transliteration: Ya ayyuha alnnasu in kuntum fee raybin mina albaAAthi fainna khalaqnakum min turabin thumma min nutfatin thumma min AAalaqatin thumma min mudghatin mukhallaqatin waghayri mukhallaqatin linubayyina lakum wanuqirru fee alarhami ma nashao ila ajalin musamman thumma nukhrijukum tiflan thumma litablughoo ashuddakum waminkum man yutawaffa waminkum man yuraddu ila arthali alAAumuri likayla yaAAlama min baAAdi AAilmin shayan watara alarda hamidatan faitha anzalna AAalayha almaa ihtazzat warabat waanbatat min kulli zawjin baheejin
locale.translation: O People, if you should be in doubt about the Resurrection, then [consider that] indeed, We created you from dust, then from a sperm-drop, then from a clinging clot, and then from a lump of flesh, formed and unformed - that We may show you. And We settle in the wombs whom We will for a specified term, then We bring you out as a child, and then [We develop you] that you may reach your [time of] maturity. And among you is he who is taken in [early] death, and among you is he who is returned to the most decrepit [old] age so that he knows, after [once having] knowledge, nothing. And you see the earth barren, but when We send down upon it rain, it quivers and swells and grows [something] of every beautiful kind

locale.transliteration: Thalika bianna Allaha huwa alhaqqu waannahu yuhyee almawta waannahu AAala kulli shayin qadeerun
locale.translation: That is because Allah is the Truth and because He gives life to the dead and because He is over all things competent

locale.transliteration: Waanna alssaAAata atiyatun la rayba feeha waanna Allaha yabAAathu man fee alquboori
locale.translation: And [that they may know] that the Hour is coming - no doubt about it - and that Allah will resurrect those in the graves

locale.transliteration: Wamina alnnasi man yujadilu fee Allahi bighayri AAilmin wala hudan wala kitabin muneerin
locale.translation: And of the people is he who disputes about Allah without knowledge or guidance or an enlightening book [from Him]

locale.transliteration: Thaniya AAitfihi liyudilla AAan sabeeli Allahi lahu fee alddunya khizyun wanutheequhu yawma alqiyamati AAathaba alhareeqi
locale.translation: Twisting his neck [in arrogance] to mislead [people] from the way of Allah. For him in the world is disgrace, and We will make him taste on the Day of Resurrection the punishment of the Burning Fire [while it is said]

locale.transliteration: Thalika bima qaddamat yadaka waanna Allaha laysa bithallamin lilAAabeedi
locale.translation: That is for what your hands have put forth and because Allah is not ever unjust to [His] servants

locale.transliteration: Wamina alnnasi man yaAAbudu Allaha AAala harfin fain asabahu khayrun itmaanna bihi wain asabathu fitnatun inqalaba AAala wajhihi khasira alddunya waalakhirata thalika huwa alkhusranu almubeenu
locale.translation: And of the people is he who worships Allah on an edge. If he is touched by good, he is reassured by it; but if he is struck by trial, he turns on his face [to the other direction]. He has lost [this] world and the Hereafter. That is what is the manifest loss

locale.transliteration: YadAAoo min dooni Allahi ma la yadurruhu wama la yanfaAAuhu thalika huwa alddalalu albaAAeedu
locale.translation: He invokes instead of Allah that which neither harms him nor benefits him. That is what is the extreme error

locale.transliteration: YadAAoo laman darruhu aqrabu min nafAAihi labisa almawla walabisa alAAasheeru
locale.translation: He invokes one whose harm is closer than his benefit - how wretched the protector and how wretched the associate

locale.transliteration: Inna Allaha yudkhilu allatheena amanoo waAAamiloo alssalihati jannatin tajree min tahtiha alanharu inna Allaha yafAAalu ma yureedu
locale.translation: Indeed, Allah will admit those who believe and do righteous deeds to gardens beneath which rivers flow. Indeed, Allah does what He intends

locale.transliteration: Man kana yathunnu an lan yansurahu Allahu fee alddunya waalakhirati falyamdud bisababin ila alssamai thumma liyaqtaAA falyanthur hal yuthhibanna kayduhu ma yagheethu
locale.translation: Whoever should think that Allah will not support [Prophet Muhammad] in this world and the Hereafter - let him extend a rope to the ceiling, then cut off [his breath], and let him see: will his effort remove that which enrages [him]

locale.transliteration: Wakathalika anzalnahu ayatin bayyinatin waanna Allaha yahdee man yureedu
locale.translation: And thus have We sent the Qur'an down as verses of clear evidence and because Allah guides whom He intends

locale.transliteration: Inna allatheena amanoo waallatheena hadoo waalssabieena waalnnasara waalmajoosa waallatheena ashrakoo inna Allaha yafsilu baynahum yawma alqiyamati inna Allaha AAala kulli shayin shaheedun
locale.translation: Indeed, those who have believed and those who were Jews and the Sabeans and the Christians and the Magians and those who associated with Allah - Allah will judge between them on the Day of Resurrection. Indeed Allah is, over all things, Witness

locale.transliteration: Alam tara anna Allaha yasjudu lahu man fee alssamawati waman fee alardi waalshshamsu waalqamaru waalnnujoomu waaljibalu waalshshajaru waalddawabbu wakatheerun mina alnnasi wakatheerun haqqa AAalayhi alAAathabu waman yuhini Allahu fama lahu min mukrimin inna Allaha yafAAalu ma yashao
locale.translation: Do you not see that to Allah prostrates whoever is in the heavens and whoever is on the earth and the sun, the moon, the stars, the mountains, the trees, the moving creatures and many of the people? But upon many the punishment has been justified. And he whom Allah humiliates - for him there is no bestower of honor. Indeed, Allah does what He wills

locale.transliteration: Hathani khasmani ikhtasamoo fee rabbihim faallatheena kafaroo quttiAAat lahum thiyabun min narin yusabbu min fawqi ruoosihimu alhameemu
locale.translation: These are two adversaries who have disputed over their Lord. But those who disbelieved will have cut out for them garments of fire. Poured upon their heads will be scalding water

locale.transliteration: Yusharu bihi ma fee butoonihim waaljuloodu
locale.translation: By which is melted that within their bellies and [their] skins

locale.transliteration: Walahum maqamiAAu min hadeedin
locale.translation: And for [striking] them are maces of iron

locale.transliteration: Kullama aradoo an yakhrujoo minha min ghammin oAAeedoo feeha wathooqoo AAathaba alhareeqi
locale.translation: Every time they want to get out of Hellfire from anguish, they will be returned to it, and [it will be said], "Taste the punishment of the Burning Fire

locale.transliteration: Inna Allaha yudkhilu allatheena amanoo waAAamiloo alssalihati jannatin tajree min tahtiha alanharu yuhallawna feeha min asawira min thahabin waluluan walibasuhum feeha hareerun
locale.translation: Indeed, Allah will admit those who believe and do righteous deeds to gardens beneath which rivers flow. They will be adorned therein with bracelets of gold and pearl, and their garments therein will be silk

locale.transliteration: Wahudoo ila alttayyibi mina alqawli wahudoo ila sirati alhameedi
locale.translation: And they had been guided [in worldly life] to good speech, and they were guided to the path of the Praiseworthy

locale.transliteration: Inna allatheena kafaroo wayasuddoona AAan sabeeli Allahi waalmasjidi alharami allathee jaAAalnahu lilnnasi sawaan alAAakifu feehi waalbadi waman yurid feehi biilhadin bithulmin nuthiqhu min AAathabin aleemin
locale.translation: Indeed, those who have disbelieved and avert [people] from the way of Allah and [from] al-Masjid al-Haram, which We made for the people - equal are the resident therein and one from outside; and [also] whoever intends [a deed] therein of deviation [in religion] or wrongdoing - We will make him taste of a painful punishment

locale.transliteration: Waith bawwana liibraheema makana albayti an la tushrik bee shayan watahhir baytiya lilttaifeena waalqaimeena waalrrukkaAAi alssujoodi
locale.translation: And [mention, O Muhammad], when We designated for Abraham the site of the House, [saying], "Do not associate anything with Me and purify My House for those who perform Tawaf and those who stand [in prayer] and those who bow and prostrate

locale.transliteration: Waaththin fee alnnasi bialhajji yatooka rijalan waAAala kulli damirin yateena min kulli fajjin AAameeqin
locale.translation: And proclaim to the people the Hajj [pilgrimage]; they will come to you on foot and on every lean camel; they will come from every distant pass

locale.transliteration: Liyashhadoo manafiAAa lahum wayathkuroo isma Allahi fee ayyamin maAAloomatin AAala ma razaqahum min baheemati alanAAami fakuloo minha waatAAimoo albaisa alfaqeera
locale.translation: That they may witness benefits for themselves and mention the name of Allah on known days over what He has provided for them of [sacrificial] animals. So eat of them and feed the miserable and poor

locale.transliteration: Thumma lyaqdoo tafathahum walyoofoo nuthoorahum walyattawwafoo bialbayti alAAateeqi
locale.translation: Then let them end their untidiness and fulfill their vows and perform Tawaf around the ancient House

locale.transliteration: Thalika waman yuAAaththim hurumati Allahi fahuwa khayrun lahu AAinda rabbihi waohillat lakumu alanAAamu illa ma yutla AAalaykum faijtaniboo alrrijsa mina alawthani waijtaniboo qawla alzzoori
locale.translation: That [has been commanded], and whoever honors the sacred ordinances of Allah - it is best for him in the sight of his Lord. And permitted to you are the grazing livestock, except what is recited to you. So avoid the uncleanliness of idols and avoid false statement

locale.transliteration: Hunafaa lillahi ghayra mushrikeena bihi waman yushrik biAllahi fakaannama kharra mina alssamai fatakhtafuhu alttayru aw tahwee bihi alrreehu fee makanin saheeqin
locale.translation: Inclining [only] to Allah, not associating [anything] with Him. And he who associates with Allah - it is as though he had fallen from the sky and was snatched by the birds or the wind carried him down into a remote place

locale.transliteration: Thalika waman yuAAaththim shaAAaira Allahi fainnaha min taqwa alquloobi
locale.translation: That [is so]. And whoever honors the symbols of Allah - indeed, it is from the piety of hearts

locale.transliteration: Lakum feeha manafiAAu ila ajalin musamman thumma mahilluha ila albayti alAAateeqi
locale.translation: For you the animals marked for sacrifice are benefits for a specified term; then their place of sacrifice is at the ancient House

locale.transliteration: Walikulli ommatin jaAAalna mansakan liyathkuroo isma Allahi AAala ma razaqahum min baheemati alanAAami failahukum ilahun wahidun falahu aslimoo wabashshiri almukhbiteena
locale.translation: And for all religion We have appointed a rite [of sacrifice] that they may mention the name of Allah over what He has provided for them of [sacrificial] animals. For your god is one God, so to Him submit. And, [O Muhammad], give good tidings to the humble [before their Lord]

locale.transliteration: Allatheena itha thukira Allahu wajilat quloobuhum waalssabireena AAala ma asabahum waalmuqeemee alssalati wamimma razaqnahum yunfiqoona
locale.translation: Who, when Allah is mentioned, their hearts are fearful, and [to] the patient over what has afflicted them, and the establishers of prayer and those who spend from what We have provided them

locale.transliteration: Waalbudna jaAAalnaha lakum min shaAAairi Allahi lakum feeha khayrun faothkuroo isma Allahi AAalayha sawaffa faitha wajabat junoobuha fakuloo minha waatAAimoo alqaniAAa waalmuAAtarra kathalika sakhkharnaha lakum laAAallakum tashkuroona
locale.translation: And the camels and cattle We have appointed for you as among the symbols of Allah; for you therein is good. So mention the name of Allah upon them when lined up [for sacrifice]; and when they are [lifeless] on their sides, then eat from them and feed the needy and the beggar. Thus have We subjected them to you that you may be grateful

locale.transliteration: Lan yanala Allaha luhoomuha wala dimaoha walakin yanaluhu alttaqwa minkum kathalika sakhkharaha lakum litukabbiroo Allaha AAala ma hadakum wabashshiri almuhsineena
locale.translation: Their meat will not reach Allah, nor will their blood, but what reaches Him is piety from you. Thus have We subjected them to you that you may glorify Allah for that [to] which He has guided you; and give good tidings to the doers of good

locale.transliteration: Inna Allaha yudafiAAu AAani allatheena amanoo inna Allaha la yuhibbu kulla khawwanin kafoorin
locale.translation: Indeed, Allah defends those who have believed. Indeed, Allah does not like everyone treacherous and ungrateful

locale.transliteration: Othina lillatheena yuqataloona biannahum thulimoo wainna Allaha AAala nasrihim laqadeerun
locale.translation: Permission [to fight] has been given to those who are being fought, because they were wronged. And indeed, Allah is competent to give them victory

locale.transliteration: Allatheena okhrijoo min diyarihim bighayri haqqin illa an yaqooloo rabbuna Allahu walawla dafAAu Allahi alnnasa baAAdahum bibaAAdin lahuddimat sawamiAAu wabiyaAAun wasalawatun wamasajidu yuthkaru feeha ismu Allahi katheeran walayansuranna Allahu man yansuruhu inna Allaha laqawiyyun AAazeezun
locale.translation: [They are] those who have been evicted from their homes without right - only because they say, "Our Lord is Allah." And were it not that Allah checks the people, some by means of others, there would have been demolished monasteries, churches, synagogues, and mosques in which the name of Allah is much mentioned. And Allah will surely support those who support Him. Indeed, Allah is Powerful and Exalted in Might

locale.transliteration: Allatheena in makkannahum fee alardi aqamoo alssalata waatawoo alzzakata waamaroo bialmaAAroofi wanahaw AAani almunkari walillahi AAaqibatu alomoori
locale.translation: [And they are] those who, if We give them authority in the land, establish prayer and give zakah and enjoin what is right and forbid what is wrong. And to Allah belongs the outcome of [all] matters

locale.transliteration: Wain yukaththibooka faqad kaththabat qablahum qawmu noohin waAAadun wathamoodu
locale.translation: And if they deny you, [O Muhammad] - so, before them, did the people of Noah and 'Aad and Thamud deny [their prophets]

locale.transliteration: Waqawmu ibraheema waqawmu lootin
locale.translation: And the people of Abraham and the people of Lot

locale.transliteration: Waashabu madyana wakuththiba moosa faamlaytu lilkafireena thumma akhathtuhum fakayfa kana nakeeri
locale.translation: And the inhabitants of Madyan. And Moses was denied, so I prolonged enjoyment for the disbelievers; then I seized them, and how [terrible] was My reproach

locale.transliteration: Fakaayyin min qaryatin ahlaknaha wahiya thalimatun fahiya khawiyatun AAala AAurooshiha wabirin muAAattalatin waqasrin masheedin
locale.translation: And how many a city did We destroy while it was committing wrong - so it is [now] fallen into ruin - and [how many] an abandoned well and [how many] a lofty palace

locale.transliteration: Afalam yaseeroo fee alardi fatakoona lahum quloobun yaAAqiloona biha aw athanun yasmaAAoona biha fainnaha la taAAma alabsaru walakin taAAma alquloobu allatee fee alssudoori
locale.translation: So have they not traveled through the earth and have hearts by which to reason and ears by which to hear? For indeed, it is not eyes that are blinded, but blinded are the hearts which are within the breasts

locale.transliteration: WayastaAAjiloonaka bialAAathabi walan yukhlifa Allahu waAAdahu wainna yawman AAinda rabbika kaalfi sanatin mimma taAAuddoona
locale.translation: And they urge you to hasten the punishment. But Allah will never fail in His promise. And indeed, a day with your Lord is like a thousand years of those which you count

locale.transliteration: Wakaayyin min qaryatin amlaytu laha wahiya thalimatun thumma akhathtuha wailayya almaseeru
locale.translation: And for how many a city did I prolong enjoyment while it was committing wrong. Then I seized it, and to Me is the [final] destination

locale.transliteration: Qul ya ayyuha alnnasu innama ana lakum natheerun mubeenun
locale.translation: Say, "O people, I am only to you a clear warner

locale.transliteration: Faallatheena amanoo waAAamiloo alssalihati lahum maghfiratun warizqun kareemun
locale.translation: And those who have believed and done righteous deeds - for them is forgiveness and noble provision

locale.transliteration: Waallatheena saAAaw fee ayatina muAAajizeena olaika ashabu aljaheemi
locale.translation: But the ones who strove against Our verses, [seeking] to cause failure - those are the companions of Hellfire

locale.transliteration: Wama arsalna min qablika min rasoolin wala nabiyyin illa itha tamanna alqa alshshaytanu fee omniyyatihi fayansakhu Allahu ma yulqee alshshaytanu thumma yuhkimu Allahu ayatihi waAllahu AAaleemun hakeemun
locale.translation: And We did not send before you any messenger or prophet except that when he spoke [or recited], Satan threw into it [some misunderstanding]. But Allah abolishes that which Satan throws in; then Allah makes precise His verses. And Allah is Knowing and Wise

locale.transliteration: LiyajAAala ma yulqee alshshaytanu fitnatan lillatheena fee quloobihim maradun waalqasiyati quloobuhum wainna alththalimeena lafee shiqaqin baAAeedin
locale.translation: [That is] so He may make what Satan throws in a trial for those within whose hearts is disease and those hard of heart. And indeed, the wrongdoers are in extreme dissension

locale.transliteration: WaliyaAAlama allatheena ootoo alAAilma annahu alhaqqu min rabbika fayuminoo bihi fatukhbita lahu quloobuhum wainna Allaha lahadi allatheena amanoo ila siratin mustaqeemin
locale.translation: And so those who were given knowledge may know that it is the truth from your Lord and [therefore] believe in it, and their hearts humbly submit to it. And indeed is Allah the Guide of those who have believed to a straight path

locale.transliteration: Wala yazalu allatheena kafaroo fee miryatin minhu hatta tatiyahumu alssaAAatu baghtatan aw yatiyahum AAathabu yawmin AAaqeemin
locale.translation: But those who disbelieve will not cease to be in doubt of it until the Hour comes upon them unexpectedly or there comes to them the punishment of a barren Day

locale.transliteration: Almulku yawmaithin lillahi yahkumu baynahum faallatheena amanoo waAAamiloo alssalihati fee jannati alnnaAAeemi
locale.translation: [All] sovereignty that Day is for Allah; He will judge between them. So they who believed and did righteous deeds will be in the Gardens of Pleasure

locale.transliteration: Waallatheena kafaroo wakaththaboo biayatina faolaika lahum AAathabun muheenun
locale.translation: And they who disbelieved and denied Our signs - for those there will be a humiliating punishment

locale.transliteration: Waallatheena hajaroo fee sabeeli Allahi thumma qutiloo aw matoo layarzuqannahumu Allahu rizqan hasanan wainna Allaha lahuwa khayru alrraziqeena
locale.translation: And those who emigrated for the cause of Allah and then were killed or died - Allah will surely provide for them a good provision. And indeed, it is Allah who is the best of providers

locale.transliteration: Layudkhilannahum mudkhalan yardawnahu wainna Allaha laAAaleemun haleemun
locale.translation: He will surely cause them to enter an entrance with which they will be pleased, and indeed, Allah is Knowing and Forbearing

locale.transliteration: Thalika waman AAaqaba bimithli ma AAooqiba bihi thumma bughiya AAalayhi layansurannahu Allahu inna Allaha laAAafuwwun ghafoorun
locale.translation: That [is so]. And whoever responds [to injustice] with the equivalent of that with which he was harmed and then is tyrannized - Allah will surely aid him. Indeed, Allah is Pardoning and Forgiving

locale.transliteration: Thalika bianna Allaha yooliju allayla fee alnnahari wayooliju alnnahara fee allayli waanna Allaha sameeAAun baseerun
locale.translation: That is because Allah causes the night to enter the day and causes the day to enter the night and because Allah is Hearing and Seeing

locale.transliteration: Thalika bianna Allaha huwa alhaqqu waanna ma yadAAoona min doonihi huwa albatilu waanna Allaha huwa alAAaliyyu alkabeeru
locale.translation: That is because Allah is the Truth, and that which they call upon other than Him is falsehood, and because Allah is the Most High, the Grand

locale.transliteration: Alam tara anna Allaha anzala mina alssamai maan fatusbihu alardu mukhdarratan inna Allaha lateefun khabeerun
locale.translation: Do you not see that Allah has sent down rain from the sky and the earth becomes green? Indeed, Allah is Subtle and Acquainted

locale.transliteration: Lahu ma fee alssamawati wama fee alardi wainna Allaha lahuwa alghaniyyu alhameedu
locale.translation: To Him belongs what is in the heavens and what is on the earth. And indeed, Allah is the Free of need, the Praiseworthy

locale.transliteration: Alam tara anna Allaha sakhkhara lakum ma fee alardi waalfulka tajree fee albahri biamrihi wayumsiku alssamaa an taqaAAa AAala alardi illa biithnihi inna Allaha bialnnasi laraoofun raheemun
locale.translation: Do you not see that Allah has subjected to you whatever is on the earth and the ships which run through the sea by His command? And He restrains the sky from falling upon the earth, unless by His permission. Indeed Allah, to the people, is Kind and Merciful

locale.transliteration: Wahuwa allathee ahyakum thumma yumeetukum thumma yuhyeekum inna alinsana lakafoorun
locale.translation: And He is the one who gave you life; then He causes you to die and then will [again] give you life. Indeed, mankind is ungrateful

locale.transliteration: Likulli ommatin jaAAalna mansakan hum nasikoohu fala yunaziAAunnaka fee alamri waodAAu ila rabbika innaka laAAala hudan mustaqeemin
locale.translation: For every religion We have appointed rites which they perform. So, [O Muhammad], let the disbelievers not contend with you over the matter but invite them to your Lord. Indeed, you are upon straight guidance

locale.transliteration: Wain jadalooka faquli Allahu aAAlamu bima taAAmaloona
locale.translation: And if they dispute with you, then say, "Allah is most knowing of what you do

locale.transliteration: Allahu yahkumu baynakum yawma alqiyamati feema kuntum feehi takhtalifoona
locale.translation: Allah will judge between you on the Day of Resurrection concerning that over which you used to differ

locale.transliteration: Alam taAAlam anna Allaha yaAAlamu ma fee alssamai waalardi inna thalika fee kitabin inna thalika AAala Allahi yaseerun
locale.translation: Do you not know that Allah knows what is in the heaven and earth? Indeed, that is in a Record. Indeed that, for Allah, is easy

locale.transliteration: WayaAAbudoona min dooni Allahi ma lam yunazzil bihi sultanan wama laysa lahum bihi AAilmun wama lilththalimeena min naseerin
locale.translation: And they worship besides Allah that for which He has not sent down authority and that of which they have no knowledge. And there will not be for the wrongdoers any helper

locale.transliteration: Waitha tutla AAalayhim ayatuna bayyinatin taAArifu fee wujoohi allatheena kafaroo almunkara yakadoona yastoona biallatheena yatloona AAalayhim ayatina qul afaonabbiokum bisharrin min thalikum alnnaru waAAadaha Allahu allatheena kafaroo wabisa almaseeru
locale.translation: And when Our verses are recited to them as clear evidences, you recognize in the faces of those who disbelieve disapproval. They are almost on the verge of assaulting those who recite to them Our verses. Say, "Then shall I inform you of [what is] worse than that? [It is] the Fire which Allah has promised those who disbelieve, and wretched is the destination

locale.transliteration: Ya ayyuha alnnasu duriba mathalun faistamiAAoo lahu inna allatheena tadAAoona min dooni Allahi lan yakhluqoo thubaban walawi ijtamaAAoo lahu wain yaslubuhumu alththubabu shayan la yastanqithoohu minhu daAAufa alttalibu waalmatloobu
locale.translation: O people, an example is presented, so listen to it. Indeed, those you invoke besides Allah will never create [as much as] a fly, even if they gathered together for that purpose. And if the fly should steal away from them a [tiny] thing, they could not recover it from him. Weak are the pursuer and pursued

locale.transliteration: Ma qadaroo Allaha haqqa qadrihi inna Allaha laqawiyyun AAazeezun
locale.translation: They have not appraised Allah with true appraisal. Indeed, Allah is Powerful and Exalted in Might

locale.transliteration: Allahu yastafee mina almalaikati rusulan wamina alnnasi inna Allaha sameeAAun baseerun
locale.translation: Allah chooses from the angels messengers and from the people. Indeed, Allah is Hearing and Seeing

locale.transliteration: YaAAlamu ma bayna aydeehim wama khalfahum waila Allahi turjaAAu alomooru
locale.translation: He knows what is [presently] before them and what will be after them. And to Allah will be returned [all] matters

locale.transliteration: Ya ayyuha allatheena amanoo irkaAAoo waosjudoo waoAAbudoo rabbakum waifAAaloo alkhayra laAAallakum tuflihoona
locale.translation: O you who have believed, bow and prostrate and worship your Lord and do good - that you may succeed

locale.transliteration: Wajahidoo fee Allahi haqqa jihadihi huwa ijtabakum wama jaAAala AAalaykum fee alddeeni min harajin millata abeekum ibraheema huwa sammakumu almuslimeena min qablu wafee hatha liyakoona alrrasoolu shaheedan AAalaykum watakoonoo shuhadaa AAala alnnasi faaqeemoo alssalata waatoo alzzakata waiAAtasimoo biAllahi huwa mawlakum faniAAma almawla waniAAma alnnaseeru
locale.translation: And strive for Allah with the striving due to Him. He has chosen you and has not placed upon you in the religion any difficulty. [It is] the religion of your father, Abraham. Allah named you "Muslims" before [in former scriptures] and in this [revelation] that the Messenger may be a witness over you and you may be witnesses over the people. So establish prayer and give zakah and hold fast to Allah. He is your protector; and excellent is the protector, and excellent is the helper

locale.transliteration: Al-Mu'minun
locale.translation: The Believers

locale.transliteration: Qad aflaha almuminoona
locale.translation: Certainly will the believers have succeeded

locale.transliteration: Allatheena hum fee salatihim khashiAAoona
locale.translation: They who are during their prayer humbly submissive

locale.transliteration: Waallatheena hum AAani allaghwi muAAridoona
locale.translation: And they who turn away from ill speech

locale.transliteration: Waallatheena hum lilzzakati faAAiloona
locale.translation: And they who are observant of zakah

locale.transliteration: Waallatheena hum lifuroojihim hafithoona
locale.translation: And they who guard their private parts

locale.transliteration: Illa AAala azwajihim aw ma malakat aymanuhum fainnahum ghayru maloomeena
locale.translation: Except from their wives or those their right hands possess, for indeed, they will not be blamed

locale.transliteration: Famani ibtagha waraa thalika faolaika humu alAAadoona
locale.translation: But whoever seeks beyond that, then those are the transgressors

locale.transliteration: Waallatheena hum liamanatihim waAAahdihim raAAoona
locale.translation: And they who are to their trusts and their promises attentive

locale.transliteration: Waallatheena hum AAala salawatihim yuhafithoona
locale.translation: And they who carefully maintain their prayers

locale.transliteration: Olaika humu alwarithoona
locale.translation: Those are the inheritors

locale.transliteration: Allatheena yarithoona alfirdawsa hum feeha khalidoona
locale.translation: Who will inherit al-Firdaus. They will abide therein eternally

locale.transliteration: Walaqad khalaqna alinsana min sulalatin min teenin
locale.translation: And certainly did We create man from an extract of clay

locale.transliteration: Thumma jaAAalnahu nutfatan fee qararin makeenin
locale.translation: Then We placed him as a sperm-drop in a firm lodging

locale.transliteration: Thumma khalaqna alnnutfata AAalaqatan fakhalaqna alAAalaqata mudghatan fakhalaqna almudghata AAithaman fakasawna alAAithama lahman thumma anshanahu khalqan akhara fatabaraka Allahu ahsanu alkhaliqeena
locale.translation: Then We made the sperm-drop into a clinging clot, and We made the clot into a lump [of flesh], and We made [from] the lump, bones, and We covered the bones with flesh; then We developed him into another creation. So blessed is Allah, the best of creators

locale.transliteration: Thumma innakum baAAda thalika lamayyitoona
locale.translation: Then indeed, after that you are to die

locale.transliteration: Thumma innakum yawma alqiyamati tubAAathoona
locale.translation: Then indeed you, on the Day of Resurrection, will be resurrected

locale.transliteration: Walaqad khalaqna fawqakum sabAAa taraiqa wama kunna AAani alkhalqi ghafileena
locale.translation: And We have created above you seven layered heavens, and never have We been of [Our] creation unaware

locale.transliteration: Waanzalna mina alssamai maan biqadarin faaskannahu fee alardi wainna AAala thahabin bihi laqadiroona
locale.translation: And We have sent down rain from the sky in a measured amount and settled it in the earth. And indeed, We are Able to take it away

locale.transliteration: Faanshana lakum bihi jannatin min nakheelin waaAAnabin lakum feeha fawakihu katheeratun waminha takuloona
locale.translation: And We brought forth for you thereby gardens of palm trees and grapevines in which for you are abundant fruits and from which you eat

locale.transliteration: Washajaratan takhruju min toori saynaa tanbutu bialdduhni wasibghin lilakileena
locale.translation: And [We brought forth] a tree issuing from Mount Sinai which produces oil and food for those who eat

locale.transliteration: Wainna lakum fee alanAAami laAAibratan nusqeekum mimma fee butooniha walakum feeha manafiAAu katheeratun waminha takuloona
locale.translation: And indeed, for you in livestock is a lesson. We give you drink from that which is in their bellies, and for you in them are numerous benefits, and from them you eat

locale.transliteration: WaAAalayha waAAala alfulki tuhmaloona
locale.translation: And upon them and on ships you are carried

locale.transliteration: Walaqad arsalna noohan ila qawmihi faqala ya qawmi oAAbudoo Allaha ma lakum min ilahin ghayruhu afala tattaqoona
locale.translation: And We had certainly sent Noah to his people, and he said, "O my people, worship Allah; you have no deity other than Him; then will you not fear Him

locale.transliteration: Faqala almalao allatheena kafaroo min qawmihi ma hatha illa basharun mithlukum yureedu an yatafaddala AAalaykum walaw shaa Allahu laanzala malaikatan ma samiAAna bihatha fee abaina alawwaleena
