locale.translation: But the eminent among those who disbelieved from his people said, "This is not but a man like yourselves who wishes to take precedence over you; and if Allah had willed [to send a messenger], He would have sent down angels. We have not heard of this among our forefathers

locale.transliteration: In huwa illa rajulun bihi jinnatun fatarabbasoo bihi hatta heenin
locale.translation: He is not but a man possessed with madness, so wait concerning him for a time

locale.transliteration: Qala rabbi onsurnee bima kaththabooni
locale.translation: [Noah] said, "My Lord, support me because they have denied me

locale.transliteration: Faawhayna ilayhi ani isnaAAi alfulka biaAAyunina wawahyina faitha jaa amruna wafara alttannooru faosluk feeha min kullin zawjayni ithnayni waahlaka illa man sabaqa AAalayhi alqawlu minhum wala tukhatibnee fee allatheena thalamoo innahum mughraqoona
locale.translation: So We inspired to him, "Construct the ship under Our observation, and Our inspiration, and when Our command comes and the oven overflows, put into the ship from each [creature] two mates and your family, except those for whom the decree [of destruction] has proceeded. And do not address Me concerning those who have wronged; indeed, they are to be drowned

locale.transliteration: Faitha istawayta anta waman maAAaka AAala alfulki faquli alhamdu lillahi allathee najjana mina alqawmi alththalimeena
locale.translation: And when you have boarded the ship, you and those with you, then say, 'Praise to Allah who has saved us from the wrongdoing people

locale.transliteration: Waqul rabbi anzilnee munzalan mubarakan waanta khayru almunzileena
locale.translation: And say, 'My Lord, let me land at a blessed landing place, and You are the best to accommodate [us]

locale.transliteration: Inna fee thalika laayatin wain kunna lamubtaleena
locale.translation: Indeed in that are signs, and indeed, We are ever testing [Our servants]

locale.transliteration: Thumma anshana min baAAdihim qarnan akhareena
locale.translation: Then We produced after them a generation of others

locale.transliteration: Faarsalna feehim rasoolan minhum ani oAAbudoo Allaha ma lakum min ilahin ghayruhu afala tattaqoona
locale.translation: And We sent among them a messenger from themselves, [saying], "Worship Allah; you have no deity other than Him; then will you not fear Him

locale.transliteration: Waqala almalao min qawmihi allatheena kafaroo wakaththaboo biliqai alakhirati waatrafnahum fee alhayati alddunya ma hatha illa basharun mithlukum yakulu mimma takuloona minhu wayashrabu mimma tashraboona
locale.translation: And the eminent among his people who disbelieved and denied the meeting of the Hereafter while We had given them luxury in the worldly life said, "This is not but a man like yourselves. He eats of that from which you eat and drinks of what you drink

locale.transliteration: Walain ataAAtum basharan mithlakum innakum ithan lakhasiroona
locale.translation: And if you should obey a man like yourselves, indeed, you would then be losers

locale.transliteration: AyaAAidukum annakum itha mittum wakuntum turaban waAAithaman annakum mukhrajoona
locale.translation: Does he promise you that when you have died and become dust and bones that you will be brought forth [once more]

locale.transliteration: Hayhata hayhata lima tooAAadoona
locale.translation: How far, how far, is that which you are promised

locale.transliteration: In hiya illa hayatuna alddunya namootu wanahya wama nahnu bimabAAootheena
locale.translation: Life is not but our worldly life - we die and live, but we will not be resurrected

locale.transliteration: In huwa illa rajulun iftara AAala Allahi kathiban wama nahnu lahu bimumineena
locale.translation: He is not but a man who has invented a lie about Allah, and we will not believe him

locale.transliteration: Qala rabbi onsurnee bima kaththabooni
locale.translation: He said, "My Lord, support me because they have denied me

locale.transliteration: Qala AAamma qaleelin layusbihunna nadimeena
locale.translation: [Allah] said, "After a little, they will surely become regretful

locale.transliteration: Faakhathathumu alssayhatu bialhaqqi fajaAAalnahum ghuthaan fabuAAdan lilqawmi alththalimeena
locale.translation: So the shriek seized them in truth, and We made them as [plant] stubble. Then away with the wrongdoing people

locale.transliteration: Thumma anshana min baAAdihim quroonan akhareena
locale.translation: Then We produced after them other generations

locale.transliteration: Ma tasbiqu min ommatin ajalaha wama yastakhiroona
locale.translation: No nation will precede its time [of termination], nor will they remain [thereafter]

locale.transliteration: Thumma arsalna rusulana tatra kulla ma jaa ommatan rasooluha kaththaboohu faatbaAAna baAAdahum baAAdan wajaAAalnahum ahadeetha fabuAAdan liqawmin la yuminoona
locale.translation: Then We sent Our messengers in succession. Every time there came to a nation its messenger, they denied him, so We made them follow one another [to destruction], and We made them narrations. So away with a people who do not believe

locale.transliteration: Thumma arsalna moosa waakhahu haroona biayatina wasultanin mubeenin
locale.translation: Then We sent Moses and his brother Aaron with Our signs and a clear authority

locale.transliteration: Ila firAAawna wamalaihi faistakbaroo wakanoo qawman AAaleena
locale.translation: To Pharaoh and his establishment, but they were arrogant and were a haughty people

locale.transliteration: Faqaloo anuminu libasharayni mithlina waqawmuhuma lana AAabidoona
locale.translation: They said, "Should we believe two men like ourselves while their people are for us in servitude

locale.transliteration: Fakaththaboohuma fakanoo mina almuhlakeena
locale.translation: So they denied them and were of those destroyed

locale.transliteration: Walaqad atayna moosa alkitaba laAAallahum yahtadoona
locale.translation: And We certainly gave Moses the Scripture that perhaps they would be guided

locale.transliteration: WajaAAalna ibna maryama waommahu ayatan waawaynahuma ila rabwatin thati qararin wamaAAeenin
locale.translation: And We made the son of Mary and his mother a sign and sheltered them within a high ground having level [areas] and flowing water

locale.transliteration: Ya ayyuha alrrusulu kuloo mina alttayyibati waiAAmaloo salihan innee bima taAAmaloona AAaleemun
locale.translation: [Allah said], "O messengers, eat from the good foods and work righteousness. Indeed, I, of what you do, am Knowing

locale.transliteration: Wainna hathihi ommatukum ommatan wahidatan waana rabbukum faittaqooni
locale.translation: And indeed this, your religion, is one religion, and I am your Lord, so fear Me

locale.transliteration: FataqattaAAoo amrahum baynahum zuburan kullu hizbin bima ladayhim farihoona
locale.translation: But the people divided their religion among them into sects - each faction, in what it has, rejoicing

locale.transliteration: Fatharhum fee ghamratihim hatta heenin
locale.translation: So leave them in their confusion for a time

locale.transliteration: Ayahsaboona annama numidduhum bihi min malin wabaneena
locale.translation: Do they think that what We extend to them of wealth and children

locale.transliteration: NusariAAu lahum fee alkhayrati bal la yashAAuroona
locale.translation: Is [because] We hasten for them good things? Rather, they do not perceive

locale.transliteration: Inna allatheena hum min khashyati rabbihim mushfiqoona
locale.translation: Indeed, they who are apprehensive from fear of their Lord

locale.transliteration: Waallatheena hum biayati rabbihim yuminoona
locale.translation: And they who believe in the signs of their Lord

locale.transliteration: Waallatheena hum birabbihim la yushrikoona
locale.translation: And they who do not associate anything with their Lord

locale.transliteration: Waallatheena yutoona ma ataw waquloobuhum wajilatun annahum ila rabbihim rajiAAoona
locale.translation: And they who give what they give while their hearts are fearful because they will be returning to their Lord

locale.transliteration: Olaika yusariAAoona fee alkhayrati wahum laha sabiqoona
locale.translation: It is those who hasten to good deeds, and they outstrip [others] therein

locale.transliteration: Wala nukallifu nafsan illa wusAAaha waladayna kitabun yantiqu bialhaqqi wahum la yuthlamoona
locale.translation: And We charge no soul except [with that within] its capacity, and with Us is a record which speaks with truth; and they will not be wronged

locale.transliteration: Bal quloobuhum fee ghamratin min hatha walahum aAAmalun min dooni thalika hum laha AAamiloona
locale.translation: But their hearts are covered with confusion over this, and they have [evil] deeds besides disbelief which they are doing

locale.transliteration: Hatta itha akhathna mutrafeehim bialAAathabi itha hum yajaroona
locale.translation: Until when We seize their affluent ones with punishment, at once they are crying [to Allah] for help

locale.transliteration: La tajaroo alyawma innakum minna la tunsaroona
locale.translation: Do not cry out today. Indeed, by Us you will not be helped

locale.transliteration: Qad kanat ayatee tutla AAalaykum fakuntum AAala aAAqabikum tankisoona
locale.translation: My verses had already been recited to you, but you were turning back on your heels

locale.transliteration: Mustakbireena bihi samiran tahjuroona
locale.translation: In arrogance regarding it, conversing by night, speaking evil

locale.transliteration: Afalam yaddabbaroo alqawla am jaahum ma lam yati abaahumu alawwaleena
locale.translation: Then have they not reflected over the Qur'an, or has there come to them that which had not come to their forefathers

locale.transliteration: Am lam yaAArifoo rasoolahum fahum lahu munkiroona
locale.translation: Or did they not know their Messenger, so they are toward him disacknowledging

locale.transliteration: Am yaqooloona bihi jinnatun bal jaahum bialhaqqi waaktharuhum lilhaqqi karihoona
locale.translation: Or do they say, "In him is madness?" Rather, he brought them the truth, but most of them, to the truth, are averse

locale.transliteration: Walawi ittabaAAa alhaqqu ahwaahum lafasadati alssamawatu waalardu waman feehinna bal ataynahum bithikrihim fahum AAan thikrihim muAAridoona
locale.translation: But if the Truth had followed their inclinations, the heavens and the earth and whoever is in them would have been ruined. Rather, We have brought them their message, but they, from their message, are turning away

locale.transliteration: Am tasaluhum kharjan fakharaju rabbika khayrun wahuwa khayru alrraziqeena
locale.translation: Or do you, [O Muhammad], ask them for payment? But the reward of your Lord is best, and He is the best of providers

locale.transliteration: Wainnaka latadAAoohum ila siratin mustaqeemin
locale.translation: And indeed, you invite them to a straight path

locale.transliteration: Wainna allatheena la yuminoona bialakhirati AAani alssirati lanakiboona
locale.translation: But indeed, those who do not believe in the Hereafter are deviating from the path

locale.transliteration: Walaw rahimnahum wakashafna ma bihim min durrin lalajjoo fee tughyanihim yaAAmahoona
locale.translation: And even if We gave them mercy and removed what was upon them of affliction, they would persist in their transgression, wandering blindly

locale.transliteration: Walaqad akhathnahum bialAAathabi fama istakanoo lirabbihim wama yatadarraAAoona
locale.translation: And We had gripped them with suffering [as a warning], but they did not yield to their Lord, nor did they humbly supplicate, [and will continue thus]

locale.transliteration: Hatta itha fatahna AAalayhim baban tha AAathabin shadeedin itha hum feehi mublisoona
locale.translation: Until when We have opened before them a door of severe punishment, immediately they will be therein in despair

locale.transliteration: Wahuwa allathee anshaa lakumu alssamAAa waalabsara waalafidata qaleelan ma tashkuroona
locale.translation: And it is He who produced for you hearing and vision and hearts; little are you grateful

locale.transliteration: Wahuwa allathee tharaakum fee alardi wailayhi tuhsharoona
locale.translation: And it is He who has multiplied you throughout the earth, and to Him you will be gathered

locale.transliteration: Wahuwa allathee yuhyee wayumeetu walahu ikhtilafu allayli waalnnahari afala taAAqiloona
locale.translation: And it is He who gives life and causes death, and His is the alternation of the night and the day. Then will you not reason

locale.transliteration: Bal qaloo mithla ma qala alawwaloona
locale.translation: Rather, they say like what the former peoples said

locale.transliteration: Qaloo aitha mitna wakunna turaban waAAithaman ainna lamabAAoothoona
locale.translation: They said, "When we have died and become dust and bones, are we indeed to be resurrected

locale.transliteration: Laqad wuAAidna nahnu waabaona hatha min qablu in hatha illa asateeru alawwaleena
locale.translation: We have been promised this, we and our forefathers, before; this is not but legends of the former peoples

locale.transliteration: Qul limani alardu waman feeha in kuntum taAAlamoona
locale.translation: Say, [O Muhammad], "To whom belongs the earth and whoever is in it, if you should know

locale.transliteration: Sayaqooloona lillahi qul afala tathakkaroona
locale.translation: They will say, "To Allah." Say, "Then will you not remember

locale.transliteration: Qul man rabbu alssamawati alssabAAi warabbu alAAarshi alAAatheemi
locale.translation: Say, "Who is Lord of the seven heavens and Lord of the Great Throne

locale.transliteration: Sayaqooloona lillahi qul afala tattaqoona
locale.translation: They will say, "[They belong] to Allah." Say, "Then will you not fear Him

locale.transliteration: Qul man biyadihi malakootu kulli shayin wahuwa yujeeru wala yujaru AAalayhi in kuntum taAAlamoona
locale.translation: Say, "In whose hand is the realm of all things - and He protects while none can protect against Him - if you should know

locale.transliteration: Sayaqooloona lillahi qul faanna tusharoona
locale.translation: They will say, "[All belongs] to Allah." Say, "Then how are you deluded

locale.transliteration: Bal ataynahum bialhaqqi wainnahum lakathiboona
locale.translation: Rather, We have brought them the truth, and indeed they are liars

locale.transliteration: Ma ittakhatha Allahu min waladin wama kana maAAahu min ilahin ithan lathahaba kullu ilahin bima khalaqa walaAAala baAAduhum AAala baAAdin subhana Allahi AAamma yasifoona
locale.translation: Allah has not taken any son, nor has there ever been with Him any deity. [If there had been], then each deity would have taken what it created, and some of them would have sought to overcome others. Exalted is Allah above what they describe [concerning Him]

locale.transliteration: AAalimi alghaybi waalshshahadati fataAAala AAamma yushrikoona
locale.translation: [He is] Knower of the unseen and the witnessed, so high is He above what they associate [with Him]

locale.transliteration: Qul rabbi imma turiyannee ma yooAAadoona
locale.translation: Say, [O Muhammad], "My Lord, if You should show me that which they are promised

locale.transliteration: Rabbi fala tajAAalnee fee alqawmi alththalimeena
locale.translation: My Lord, then do not place me among the wrongdoing people

locale.transliteration: Wainna AAala an nuriyaka ma naAAiduhum laqadiroona
locale.translation: And indeed, We are able to show you what We have promised them

locale.transliteration: IdfaAA biallatee hiya ahsanu alssayyiata nahnu aAAlamu bima yasifoona
locale.translation: Repel, by [means of] what is best, [their] evil. We are most knowing of what they describe

locale.transliteration: Waqul rabbi aAAoothu bika min hamazati alshshayateeni
locale.translation: And say, "My Lord, I seek refuge in You from the incitements of the devils

locale.transliteration: WaaAAoothu bika rabbi an yahdurooni
locale.translation: And I seek refuge in You, my Lord, lest they be present with me

locale.transliteration: Hatta itha jaa ahadahumu almawtu qala rabbi irjiAAooni
locale.translation: [For such is the state of the disbelievers], until, when death comes to one of them, he says, "My Lord, send me back

locale.transliteration: LaAAallee aAAmalu salihan feema taraktu kalla innaha kalimatun huwa qailuha wamin waraihim barzakhun ila yawmi yubAAathoona
locale.translation: That I might do righteousness in that which I left behind." No! It is only a word he is saying; and behind them is a barrier until the Day they are resurrected

locale.transliteration: Faitha nufikha fee alssoori fala ansaba baynahum yawmaithin wala yatasaaloona
locale.translation: So when the Horn is blown, no relationship will there be among them that Day, nor will they ask about one another

locale.transliteration: Faman thaqulat mawazeenuhu faolaika humu almuflihoona
locale.translation: And those whose scales are heavy [with good deeds] - it is they who are the successful

locale.transliteration: Waman khaffat mawazeenuhu faolaika allatheena khasiroo anfusahum fee jahannama khalidoona
locale.translation: But those whose scales are light - those are the ones who have lost their souls, [being] in Hell, abiding eternally

locale.transliteration: Talfahu wujoohahumu alnnaru wahum feeha kalihoona
locale.translation: The Fire will sear their faces, and they therein will have taut smiles

locale.transliteration: Alam takun ayatee tutla AAalaykum fakuntum biha tukaththiboona
locale.translation: [It will be said]. "Were not My verses recited to you and you used to deny them

locale.transliteration: Qaloo rabbana ghalabat AAalayna shiqwatuna wakunna qawman dalleena
locale.translation: They will say, "Our Lord, our wretchedness overcame us, and we were a people astray

locale.transliteration: Rabbana akhrijna minha fain AAudna fainna thalimoona
locale.translation: Our Lord, remove us from it, and if we were to return [to evil], we would indeed be wrongdoers

locale.transliteration: Qala ikhsaoo feeha wala tukallimooni
locale.translation: He will say, "Remain despised therein and do not speak to Me

locale.transliteration: Innahu kana fareequn min AAibadee yaqooloona rabbana amanna faighfir lana wairhamna waanta khayru alrrahimeena
locale.translation: Indeed, there was a party of My servants who said, 'Our Lord, we have believed, so forgive us and have mercy upon us, and You are the best of the merciful

locale.transliteration: Faittakhathtumoohum sikhriyyan hatta ansawkum thikree wakuntum minhum tadhakoona
locale.translation: But you took them in mockery to the point that they made you forget My remembrance, and you used to laugh at them

locale.transliteration: Innee jazaytuhumu alyawma bima sabaroo annahum humu alfaizoona
locale.translation: Indeed, I have rewarded them this Day for their patient endurance - that they are the attainers [of success]

locale.transliteration: Qala kam labithtum fee alardi AAadada sineena
locale.translation: [Allah] will say, "How long did you remain on earth in number of years

locale.transliteration: Qaloo labithna yawman aw baAAda yawmin faisali alAAaddeena
locale.translation: They will say, "We remained a day or part of a day; ask those who enumerate

locale.transliteration: Qala in labithtum illa qaleelan law annakum kuntum taAAlamoona
locale.translation: He will say, "You stayed not but a little - if only you had known

locale.transliteration: Afahasibtum annama khalaqnakum AAabathan waannakum ilayna la turjaAAoona
locale.translation: Then did you think that We created you uselessly and that to Us you would not be returned

locale.transliteration: FataAAala Allahu almaliku alhaqqu la ilaha illa huwa rabbu alAAarshi alkareemi
locale.translation: So exalted is Allah, the Sovereign, the Truth; there is no deity except Him, Lord of the Noble Throne

locale.transliteration: Waman yadAAu maAAa Allahi ilahan akhara la burhana lahu bihi fainnama hisabuhu AAinda rabbihi innahu la yuflihu alkafiroona
locale.translation: And whoever invokes besides Allah another deity for which he has no proof - then his account is only with his Lord. Indeed, the disbelievers will not succeed

locale.transliteration: Waqul rabbi ighfir wairham waanta khayru alrrahimeena
locale.translation: And, [O Muhammad], say, "My Lord, forgive and have mercy, and You are the best of the merciful

locale.transliteration: An-Nur
locale.translation: The Light

locale.transliteration: Sooratun anzalnaha wafaradnaha waanzalna feeha ayatin bayyinatin laAAallakum tathakkaroona
locale.translation: [This is] a surah which We have sent down and made [that within it] obligatory and revealed therein verses of clear evidence that you might remember

locale.transliteration: Alzzaniyatu waalzzanee faijlidoo kulla wahidin minhuma miata jaldatin wala takhuthkum bihima rafatun fee deeni Allahi in kuntum tuminoona biAllahi waalyawmi alakhiri walyashhad AAathabahuma taifatun mina almumineena
locale.translation: The [unmarried] woman or [unmarried] man found guilty of sexual intercourse - lash each one of them with a hundred lashes, and do not be taken by pity for them in the religion of Allah, if you should believe in Allah and the Last Day. And let a group of the believers witness their punishment

locale.transliteration: Alzzanee la yankihu illa zaniyatan aw mushrikatan waalzzaniyatu la yankihuha illa zanin aw mushrikun wahurrima thalika AAala almumineena
locale.translation: The fornicator does not marry except a [female] fornicator or polytheist, and none marries her except a fornicator or a polytheist, and that has been made unlawful to the believers

locale.transliteration: Waallatheena yarmoona almuhsanati thumma lam yatoo biarbaAAati shuhadaa faijlidoohum thamaneena jaldatan wala taqbaloo lahum shahadatan abadan waolaika humu alfasiqoona
locale.translation: And those who accuse chaste women and then do not produce four witnesses - lash them with eighty lashes and do not accept from them testimony ever after. And those are the defiantly disobedient

locale.transliteration: Illa allatheena taboo min baAAdi thalika waaslahoo fainna Allaha ghafoorun raheemun
locale.translation: Except for those who repent thereafter and reform, for indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful

locale.transliteration: Waallatheena yarmoona azwajahum walam yakun lahum shuhadao illa anfusuhum fashahadatu ahadihim arbaAAu shahadatin biAllahi innahu lamina alssadiqeena
locale.translation: And those who accuse their wives [of adultery] and have no witnesses except themselves - then the witness of one of them [shall be] four testimonies [swearing] by Allah that indeed, he is of the truthful

locale.transliteration: Waalkhamisatu anna laAAnata Allahi AAalayhi in kana mina alkathibeena
locale.translation: And the fifth [oath will be] that the curse of Allah be upon him if he should be among the liars

locale.transliteration: Wayadrao AAanha alAAathaba an tashhada arbaAAa shahadatin biAllahi innahu lamina alkathibeena
locale.translation: But it will prevent punishment from her if she gives four testimonies [swearing] by Allah that indeed, he is of the liars

locale.transliteration: Waalkhamisata anna ghadaba Allahi AAalayha in kana mina alssadiqeena
locale.translation: And the fifth [oath will be] that the wrath of Allah be upon her if he was of the truthful

locale.transliteration: Walawla fadlu Allahi AAalaykum warahmatuhu waanna Allaha tawwabun hakeemun
locale.translation: And if not for the favor of Allah upon you and His mercy... and because Allah is Accepting of repentance and Wise

locale.transliteration: Inna allatheena jaoo bialifki AAusbatun minkum la tahsaboohu sharran lakum bal huwa khayrun lakum likulli imriin minhum ma iktasaba mina alithmi waallathee tawalla kibrahu minhum lahu AAathabun AAatheemun
locale.translation: Indeed, those who came with falsehood are a group among you. Do not think it bad for you; rather it is good for you. For every person among them is what [punishment] he has earned from the sin, and he who took upon himself the greater portion thereof - for him is a great punishment

locale.transliteration: Lawla ith samiAAtumoohu thanna almuminoona waalmuminatu bianfusihim khayran waqaloo hatha ifkun mubeenun
locale.translation: Why, when you heard it, did not the believing men and believing women think good of one another and say, "This is an obvious falsehood

locale.transliteration: Lawla jaoo AAalayhi biarbaAAati shuhadaa faith lam yatoo bialshshuhadai faolaika AAinda Allahi humu alkathiboona
locale.translation: Why did they [who slandered] not produce for it four witnesses? And when they do not produce the witnesses, then it is they, in the sight of Allah, who are the liars

locale.transliteration: Walawla fadlu Allahi AAalaykum warahmatuhu fee alddunya waalakhirati lamassakum fee ma afadtum feehi AAathabun AAatheemun
locale.translation: And if it had not been for the favor of Allah upon you and His mercy in this world and the Hereafter, you would have been touched for that [lie] in which you were involved by a great punishment

locale.transliteration: Ith talaqqawnahu bialsinatikum wataqooloona biafwahikum ma laysa lakum bihi AAilmun watahsaboonahu hayyinan wahuwa AAinda Allahi AAatheemun
locale.translation: When you received it with your tongues and said with your mouths that of which you had no knowledge and thought it was insignificant while it was, in the sight of Allah, tremendous

locale.transliteration: Walawla ith samiAAtumoohu qultum ma yakoonu lana an natakallama bihatha subhanaka hatha buhtanun AAatheemun
locale.translation: And why, when you heard it, did you not say, "It is not for us to speak of this. Exalted are You, [O Allah]; this is a great slander

locale.transliteration: YaAAithukumu Allahu an taAAoodoo limithlihi abadan in kuntum mumineena
locale.translation: Allah warns you against returning to the likes of this [conduct], ever, if you should be believers

locale.transliteration: Wayubayyinu Allahu lakumu alayati waAllahu AAaleemun hakeemun
locale.translation: And Allah makes clear to you the verses, and Allah is Knowing and Wise

locale.transliteration: Inna allatheena yuhibboona an tasheeAAa alfahishatu fee allatheena amanoo lahum AAathabun aleemun fee alddunya waalakhirati waAllahu yaAAlamu waantum la taAAlamoona
locale.translation: Indeed, those who like that immorality should be spread [or publicized] among those who have believed will have a painful punishment in this world and the Hereafter. And Allah knows and you do not know

locale.transliteration: Walawla fadlu Allahi AAalaykum warahmatuhu waanna Allaha raoofun raheemun
locale.translation: And if it had not been for the favor of Allah upon you and His mercy... and because Allah is Kind and Merciful

locale.transliteration: Ya ayyuha allatheena amanoo la tattabiAAoo khutuwati alshshaytani waman yattabiAA khutuwati alshshaytani fainnahu yamuru bialfahshai waalmunkari walawla fadlu Allahi AAalaykum warahmatuhu ma zaka minkum min ahadin abadan walakinna Allaha yuzakkee man yashao waAllahu sameeAAun AAaleemun
locale.translation: O you who have believed, do not follow the footsteps of Satan. And whoever follows the footsteps of Satan - indeed, he enjoins immorality and wrongdoing. And if not for the favor of Allah upon you and His mercy, not one of you would have been pure, ever, but Allah purifies whom He wills, and Allah is Hearing and Knowing

locale.transliteration: Wala yatali oloo alfadli minkum waalssaAAati an yutoo olee alqurba waalmasakeena waalmuhajireena fee sabeeli Allahi walyaAAfoo walyasfahoo ala tuhibboona an yaghfira Allahu lakum waAllahu ghafoorun raheemun
locale.translation: And let not those of virtue among you and wealth swear not to give [aid] to their relatives and the needy and the emigrants for the cause of Allah, and let them pardon and overlook. Would you not like that Allah should forgive you? And Allah is Forgiving and Merciful

locale.transliteration: Inna allatheena yarmoona almuhsanati alghafilati almuminati luAAinoo fee alddunya waalakhirati walahum AAathabun AAatheemun
locale.translation: Indeed, those who [falsely] accuse chaste, unaware and believing women are cursed in this world and the Hereafter; and they will have a great punishment

locale.transliteration: Yawma tashhadu AAalayhim alsinatuhum waaydeehim waarjuluhum bima kanoo yaAAmaloona
locale.translation: On a Day when their tongues, their hands and their feet will bear witness against them as to what they used to do

locale.transliteration: Yawmaithin yuwaffeehimu Allahu deenahumu alhaqqa wayaAAlamoona anna Allaha huwa alhaqqu almubeenu
locale.translation: That Day, Allah will pay them in full their deserved recompense, and they will know that it is Allah who is the perfect in justice

locale.transliteration: Alkhabeethatu lilkhabeetheena waalkhabeethoona lilkhabeethati waalttayyibatu lilttayyibeena waalttayyiboona lilttayyibati olaika mubarraoona mimma yaqooloona lahum maghfiratun warizqun kareemun
locale.translation: Evil words are for evil men, and evil men are [subjected] to evil words. And good words are for good men, and good men are [an object] of good words. Those [good people] are declared innocent of what the slanderers say. For them is forgiveness and noble provision

locale.transliteration: Ya ayyuha allatheena amanoo la tadkhuloo buyootan ghayra buyootikum hatta tastanisoo watusallimoo AAala ahliha thalikum khayrun lakum laAAallakum tathakkaroona
locale.translation: O you who have believed, do not enter houses other than your own houses until you ascertain welcome and greet their inhabitants. That is best for you; perhaps you will be reminded

locale.transliteration: Fain lam tajidoo feeha ahadan fala tadkhulooha hatta yuthana lakum wain qeela lakumu irjiAAoo fairjiAAoo huwa azka lakum waAllahu bima taAAmaloona AAaleemun
locale.translation: And if you do not find anyone therein, do not enter them until permission has been given you. And if it is said to you, "Go back," then go back; it is purer for you. And Allah is Knowing of what you do

locale.transliteration: Laysa AAalaykum junahun an tadkhuloo buyootan ghayra maskoonatin feeha mataAAun lakum waAllahu yaAAlamu ma tubdoona wama taktumoona
locale.translation: There is no blame upon you for entering houses not inhabited in which there is convenience for you. And Allah knows what you reveal and what you conceal

locale.transliteration: Qul lilmumineena yaghuddoo min absarihum wayahfathoo furoojahum thalika azka lahum inna Allaha khabeerun bima yasnaAAoona
locale.translation: Tell the believing men to reduce [some] of their vision and guard their private parts. That is purer for them. Indeed, Allah is Acquainted with what they do

locale.transliteration: Waqul lilmuminati yaghdudna min absarihinna wayahfathna furoojahunna wala yubdeena zeenatahunna illa ma thahara minha walyadribna bikhumurihinna AAala juyoobihinna wala yubdeena zeenatahunna illa libuAAoolatihinna aw abaihinna aw abai buAAoolatihinna aw abnaihinna aw abnai buAAoolatihinna aw ikhwanihinna aw banee ikhwanihinna aw banee akhawatihinna aw nisaihinna aw ma malakat aymanuhunna awi alttabiAAeena ghayri olee alirbati mina alrrijali awi alttifli allatheena lam yathharoo AAala AAawrati alnnisai wala yadribna biarjulihinna liyuAAlama ma yukhfeena min zeenatihinna watooboo ila Allahi jameeAAan ayyuha almuminoona laAAallakum tuflihoona
locale.translation: And tell the believing women to reduce [some] of their vision and guard their private parts and not expose their adornment except that which [necessarily] appears thereof and to wrap [a portion of] their headcovers over their chests and not expose their adornment except to their husbands, their fathers, their husbands' fathers, their sons, their husbands' sons, their brothers, their brothers' sons, their sisters' sons, their women, that which their right hands possess, or those male attendants having no physical desire, or children who are not yet aware of the private aspects of women. And let them not stamp their feet to make known what they conceal of their adornment. And turn to Allah in repentance, all of you, O believers, that you might succeed

locale.transliteration: Waankihoo alayama minkum waalssaliheena min AAibadikum waimaikum in yakoonoo fuqaraa yughnihimu Allahu min fadlihi waAllahu wasiAAun AAaleemun
locale.translation: And marry the unmarried among you and the righteous among your male slaves and female slaves. If they should be poor, Allah will enrich them from His bounty, and Allah is all-Encompassing and Knowing

locale.transliteration: WalyastaAAfifi allatheena la yajidoona nikahan hatta yughniyahumu Allahu min fadlihi waallatheena yabtaghoona alkitaba mimma malakat aymanukum fakatiboohum in AAalimtum feehim khayran waatoohum min mali Allahi allathee atakum wala tukrihoo fatayatikum AAala albighai in aradna tahassunan litabtaghoo AAarada alhayati alddunya waman yukrihhunna fainna Allaha min baAAdi ikrahihinna ghafoorun raheemun
locale.translation: But let them who find not [the means for] marriage abstain [from sexual relations] until Allah enriches them from His bounty. And those who seek a contract [for eventual emancipation] from among whom your right hands possess - then make a contract with them if you know there is within them goodness and give them from the wealth of Allah which He has given you. And do not compel your slave girls to prostitution, if they desire chastity, to seek [thereby] the temporary interests of worldly life. And if someone should compel them, then indeed, Allah is [to them], after their compulsion, Forgiving and Merciful

locale.transliteration: Walaqad anzalna ilaykum ayatin mubayyinatin wamathalan mina allatheena khalaw min qablikum wamawAAithatan lilmuttaqeena
locale.translation: And We have certainly sent down to you distinct verses and examples from those who passed on before you and an admonition for those who fear Allah

locale.transliteration: Allahu nooru alssamawati waalardi mathalu noorihi kamishkatin feeha misbahun almisbahu fee zujajatin alzzujajatu kaannaha kawkabun durriyyun yooqadu min shajaratin mubarakatin zaytoonatin la sharqiyyatin wala gharbiyyatin yakadu zaytuha yudeeo walaw lam tamsashu narun noorun AAala noorin yahdee Allahu linoorihi man yashao wayadribu Allahu alamthala lilnnasi waAllahu bikulli shayin AAaleemun
locale.translation: Allah is the Light of the heavens and the earth. The example of His light is like a niche within which is a lamp, the lamp is within glass, the glass as if it were a pearly [white] star lit from [the oil of] a blessed olive tree, neither of the east nor of the west, whose oil would almost glow even if untouched by fire. Light upon light. Allah guides to His light whom He wills. And Allah presents examples for the people, and Allah is Knowing of all things

locale.transliteration: Fee buyootin athina Allahu an turfaAAa wayuthkara feeha ismuhu yusabbihu lahu feeha bialghuduwwi waalasali
locale.translation: [Such niches are] in mosques which Allah has ordered to be raised and that His name be mentioned therein; exalting Him within them in the morning and the evenings

locale.transliteration: Rijalun la tulheehim tijaratun wala bayAAun AAan thikri Allahi waiqami alssalati waeetai alzzakati yakhafoona yawman tataqallabu feehi alquloobu waalabsaru
locale.translation: [Are] men whom neither commerce nor sale distracts from the remembrance of Allah and performance of prayer and giving of zakah. They fear a Day in which the hearts and eyes will [fearfully] turn about

locale.transliteration: Liyajziyahumu Allahu ahsana ma AAamiloo wayazeedahum min fadlihi waAllahu yarzuqu man yashao bighayri hisabin
locale.translation: That Allah may reward them [according to] the best of what they did and increase them from His bounty. And Allah gives provision to whom He wills without account

locale.transliteration: Waallatheena kafaroo aAAmaluhum kasarabin biqeeAAatin yahsabuhu alththamanu maan hatta itha jaahu lam yajidhu shayan wawajada Allaha AAindahu fawaffahu hisabahu waAllahu sareeAAu alhisabi
locale.translation: But those who disbelieved - their deeds are like a mirage in a lowland which a thirsty one thinks is water until, when he comes to it, he finds it is nothing but finds Allah before Him, and He will pay him in full his due; and Allah is swift in account

locale.transliteration: Aw kathulumatin fee bahrin lujjiyyin yaghshahu mawjun min fawqihi mawjun min fawqihi sahabun thulumatun baAAduha fawqa baAAdin itha akhraja yadahu lam yakad yaraha waman lam yajAAali Allahu lahu nooran fama lahu min noorin
locale.translation: Or [they are] like darknesses within an unfathomable sea which is covered by waves, upon which are waves, over which are clouds - darknesses, some of them upon others. When one puts out his hand [therein], he can hardly see it. And he to whom Allah has not granted light - for him there is no light

locale.transliteration: Alam tara anna Allaha yusabbihu lahu man fee alssamawati waalardi waalttayru saffatin kullun qad AAalima salatahu watasbeehahu waAllahu AAaleemun bima yafAAaloona
locale.translation: Do you not see that Allah is exalted by whomever is within the heavens and the earth and [by] the birds with wings spread [in flight]? Each [of them] has known his [means of] prayer and exalting [Him], and Allah is Knowing of what they do

locale.transliteration: Walillahi mulku alssamawati waalardi waila Allahi almaseeru
locale.translation: And to Allah belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth, and to Allah is the destination

locale.transliteration: Alam tara anna Allaha yuzjee sahaban thumma yuallifu baynahu thumma yajAAaluhu rukaman fatara alwadqa yakhruju min khilalihi wayunazzilu mina alssamai min jibalin feeha min baradin fayuseebu bihi man yashao wayasrifuhu AAan man yashao yakadu sana barqihi yathhabu bialabsari
locale.translation: Do you not see that Allah drives clouds? Then He brings them together, then He makes them into a mass, and you see the rain emerge from within it. And He sends down from the sky, mountains [of clouds] within which is hail, and He strikes with it whom He wills and averts it from whom He wills. The flash of its lightening almost takes away the eyesight

locale.transliteration: Yuqallibu Allahu allayla waalnnahara inna fee thalika laAAibratan liolee alabsari
locale.translation: Allah alternates the night and the day. Indeed in that is a lesson for those who have vision

locale.transliteration: WaAllahu khalaqa kulla dabbatin min main faminhum man yamshee AAala batnihi waminhum man yamshee AAala rijlayni waminhum man yamshee AAala arbaAAin yakhluqu Allahu ma yashao inna Allaha AAala kulli shayin qadeerun
locale.translation: Allah has created every [living] creature from water. And of them are those that move on their bellies, and of them are those that walk on two legs, and of them are those that walk on four. Allah creates what He wills. Indeed, Allah is over all things competent

locale.transliteration: Laqad anzalna ayatin mubayyinatin waAllahu yahdee man yashao ila siratin mustaqeemin
locale.translation: We have certainly sent down distinct verses. And Allah guides whom He wills to a straight path

locale.transliteration: Wayaqooloona amanna biAllahi wabialrrasooli waataAAna thumma yatawalla fareequn minhum min baAAdi thalika wama olaika bialmumineena
locale.translation: But the hypocrites say, "We have believed in Allah and in the Messenger, and we obey"; then a party of them turns away after that. And those are not believers

locale.transliteration: Waitha duAAoo ila Allahi warasoolihi liyahkuma baynahum itha fareequn minhum muAAridoona
locale.translation: And when they are called to [the words of] Allah and His Messenger to judge between them, at once a party of them turns aside [in refusal]

locale.transliteration: Wain yakun lahumu alhaqqu yatoo ilayhi muthAAineena
locale.translation: But if the right is theirs, they come to him in prompt obedience

locale.transliteration: Afee quloobihim maradun ami irtaboo am yakhafoona an yaheefa Allahu AAalayhim warasooluhu bal olaika humu alththalimoona
locale.translation: Is there disease in their hearts? Or have they doubted? Or do they fear that Allah will be unjust to them, or His Messenger? Rather, it is they who are the wrongdoers

locale.transliteration: Innama kana qawla almumineena itha duAAoo ila Allahi warasoolihi liyahkuma baynahum an yaqooloo samiAAna waataAAna waolaika humu almuflihoona
locale.translation: The only statement of the [true] believers when they are called to Allah and His Messenger to judge between them is that they say, "We hear and we obey." And those are the successful

locale.transliteration: Waman yutiAAi Allaha warasoolahu wayakhsha Allaha wayattaqhi faolaika humu alfaizoona
locale.translation: And whoever obeys Allah and His Messenger and fears Allah and is conscious of Him - it is those who are the attainers

locale.transliteration: Waaqsamoo biAllahi jahda aymanihim lain amartahum layakhrujunna qul la tuqsimoo taAAatun maAAroofatun inna Allaha khabeerun bima taAAmaloona
locale.translation: And they swear by Allah their strongest oaths that if you ordered them, they would go forth [in Allah 's cause]. Say, "Do not swear. [Such] obedience is known. Indeed, Allah is Acquainted with that which you do

locale.transliteration: Qul ateeAAoo Allaha waateeAAoo alrrasoola fain tawallaw fainnama AAalayhi ma hummila waAAalaykum ma hummiltum wain tuteeAAoohu tahtadoo wama AAala alrrasooli illa albalaghu almubeena
locale.translation: Say, "Obey Allah and obey the Messenger; but if you turn away - then upon him is only that [duty] with which he has been charged, and upon you is that with which you have been charged. And if you obey him, you will be [rightly] guided. And there is not upon the Messenger except the [responsibility for] clear notification

locale.transliteration: WaAAada Allahu allatheena amanoo minkum waAAamiloo alssalihati layastakhlifannahum fee alardi kama istakhlafa allatheena min qablihim walayumakkinanna lahum deenahumu allathee irtada lahum walayubaddilannahum min baAAdi khawfihim amnan yaAAbudoonanee la yushrikoona bee shayan waman kafara baAAda thalika faolaika humu alfasiqoona
locale.translation: Allah has promised those who have believed among you and done righteous deeds that He will surely grant them succession [to authority] upon the earth just as He granted it to those before them and that He will surely establish for them [therein] their religion which He has preferred for them and that He will surely substitute for them, after their fear, security, [for] they worship Me, not associating anything with Me. But whoever disbelieves after that - then those are the defiantly disobedient

locale.transliteration: Waaqeemoo alssalata waatoo alzzakata waateeAAoo alrrasoola laAAallakum turhamoona
locale.translation: And establish prayer and give zakah and obey the Messenger - that you may receive mercy

locale.transliteration: La tahsabanna allatheena kafaroo muAAjizeena fee alardi wamawahumu alnnaru walabisa almaseeru
locale.translation: Never think that the disbelievers are causing failure [to Allah] upon the earth. Their refuge will be the Fire - and how wretched the destination

locale.transliteration: Ya ayyuha allatheena amanoo liyastathinkumu allatheena malakat aymanukum waallatheena lam yablughoo alhuluma minkum thalatha marratin min qabli salati alfajri waheena tadaAAoona thiyabakum mina alththaheerati wamin baAAdi salati alAAishai thalathu AAawratin lakum laysa AAalaykum wala AAalayhim junahun baAAdahunna tawwafoona AAalaykum baAAdukum AAala baAAdin kathalika yubayyinu Allahu lakumu alayati waAllahu AAaleemun hakeemun
locale.translation: O you who have believed, let those whom your right hands possess and those who have not [yet] reached puberty among you ask permission of you [before entering] at three times: before the dawn prayer and when you put aside your clothing [for rest] at noon and after the night prayer. [These are] three times of privacy for you. There is no blame upon you nor upon them beyond these [periods], for they continually circulate among you - some of you, among others. Thus does Allah make clear to you the verses; and Allah is Knowing and Wise

locale.transliteration: Waitha balagha alatfalu minkumu alhuluma falyastathinoo kama istathana allatheena min qablihim kathalika yubayyinu Allahu lakum ayatihi waAllahu AAaleemun hakeemun
locale.translation: And when the children among you reach puberty, let them ask permission [at all times] as those before them have done. Thus does Allah make clear to you His verses; and Allah is Knowing and Wise

locale.transliteration: WaalqawaAAidu mina alnnisai allatee la yarjoona nikahan falaysa AAalayhinna junahun an yadaAAna thiyabahunna ghayra mutabarrijatin bizeenatin waan yastaAAfifna khayrun lahunna waAllahu sameeAAun AAaleemun
locale.translation: And women of post-menstrual age who have no desire for marriage - there is no blame upon them for putting aside their outer garments [but] not displaying adornment. But to modestly refrain [from that] is better for them. And Allah is Hearing and Knowing

locale.transliteration: Laysa AAala alaAAma harajun wala AAala alaAAraji harajun wala AAala almareedi harajun wala AAala anfusikum an takuloo min buyootikum aw buyooti abaikum aw buyooti ommahatikum aw buyooti ikhwanikum aw buyooti akhawatikum aw buyooti aAAmamikum aw buyooti AAammatikum aw buyooti akhwalikum aw buyooti khalatikum aw ma malaktum mafatihahu aw sadeeqikum laysa AAalaykum junahun an takuloo jameeAAan aw ashtatan faitha dakhaltum buyootan fasallimoo AAala anfusikum tahiyyatan min AAindi Allahi mubarakatan tayyibatan kathalika yubayyinu Allahu lakumu alayati laAAallakum taAAqiloona
locale.translation: There is not upon the blind [any] constraint nor upon the lame constraint nor upon the ill constraint nor upon yourselves when you eat from your [own] houses or the houses of your fathers or the houses of your mothers or the houses of your brothers or the houses of your sisters or the houses of your father's brothers or the houses of your father's sisters or the houses of your mother's brothers or the houses of your mother's sisters or [from houses] whose keys you possess or [from the house] of your friend. There is no blame upon you whether you eat together or separately. But when you enter houses, give greetings of peace upon each other - a greeting from Allah, blessed and good. Thus does Allah make clear to you the verses [of ordinance] that you may understand

locale.transliteration: Innama almuminoona allatheena amanoo biAllahi warasoolihi waitha kanoo maAAahu AAala amrin jamiAAin lam yathhaboo hatta yastathinoohu inna allatheena yastathinoonaka olaika allatheena yuminoona biAllahi warasoolihi faitha istathanooka libaAAdi shanihim fathan liman shita minhum waistaghfir lahumu Allaha inna Allaha ghafoorun raheemun
locale.translation: The believers are only those who believe in Allah and His Messenger and, when they are [meeting] with him for a matter of common interest, do not depart until they have asked his permission. Indeed, those who ask your permission, [O Muhammad] - those are the ones who believe in Allah and His Messenger. So when they ask your permission for something of their affairs, then give permission to whom you will among them and ask forgiveness for them of Allah. Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful

locale.transliteration: La tajAAaloo duAAaa alrrasooli baynakum kaduAAai baAAdikum baAAdan qad yaAAlamu Allahu allatheena yatasallaloona minkum liwathan falyahthari allatheena yukhalifoona AAan amrihi an tuseebahum fitnatun aw yuseebahum AAathabun aleemun
locale.translation: Do not make [your] calling of the Messenger among yourselves as the call of one of you to another. Already Allah knows those of you who slip away, concealed by others. So let those beware who dissent from the Prophet's order, lest fitnah strike them or a painful punishment

locale.transliteration: Ala inna lillahi ma fee alssamawati waalardi qad yaAAlamu ma antum AAalayhi wayawma yurjaAAoona ilayhi fayunabbiohum bima AAamiloo waAllahu bikulli shayin AAaleemun
locale.translation: Unquestionably, to Allah belongs whatever is in the heavens and earth. Already He knows that upon which you [stand] and [knows] the Day when they will be returned to Him and He will inform them of what they have done. And Allah is Knowing of all things

locale.transliteration: Al-Furqan
locale.translation: The Criterion

locale.transliteration: Tabaraka allathee nazzala alfurqana AAala AAabdihi liyakoona lilAAalameena natheeran
locale.translation: Blessed is He who sent down the Criterion upon His Servant that he may be to the worlds a warner

locale.transliteration: Allathee lahu mulku alssamawati waalardi walam yattakhith waladan walam yakun lahu shareekun fee almulki wakhalaqa kulla shayin faqaddarahu taqdeeran
locale.translation: He to whom belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth and who has not taken a son and has not had a partner in dominion and has created each thing and determined it with [precise] determination

locale.transliteration: Waittakhathoo min doonihi alihatan la yakhluqoona shayan wahum yukhlaqoona wala yamlikoona lianfusihim darran wala nafAAan wala yamlikoona mawtan wala hayatan wala nushooran
locale.translation: But they have taken besides Him gods which create nothing, while they are created, and possess not for themselves any harm or benefit and possess not [power to cause] death or life or resurrection

locale.transliteration: Waqala allatheena kafaroo in hatha illa ifkun iftarahu waaAAanahu AAalayhi qawmun akharoona faqad jaoo thulman wazooran
locale.translation: And those who disbelieve say, "This [Qur'an] is not except a falsehood he invented, and another people assisted him in it." But they have committed an injustice and a lie

locale.transliteration: Waqaloo asateeru alawwaleena iktatabaha fahiya tumla AAalayhi bukratan waaseelan
locale.translation: And they say, "Legends of the former peoples which he has written down, and they are dictated to him morning and afternoon

locale.transliteration: Qul anzalahu allathee yaAAlamu alssirra fee alssamawati waalardi innahu kana ghafooran raheeman
locale.translation: Say, [O Muhammad], "It has been revealed by He who knows [every] secret within the heavens and the earth. Indeed, He is ever Forgiving and Merciful

locale.transliteration: Waqaloo mali hatha alrrasooli yakulu alttaAAama wayamshee fee alaswaqi lawla onzila ilayhi malakun fayakoona maAAahu natheeran
locale.translation: And they say, "What is this messenger that eats food and walks in the markets? Why was there not sent down to him an angel so he would be with him a warner

locale.transliteration: Aw yulqa ilayhi kanzun aw takoonu lahu jannatun yakulu minha waqala alththalimoona in tattabiAAoona illa rajulan mashooran
locale.translation: Or [why is not] a treasure presented to him [from heaven], or does he [not] have a garden from which he eats?" And the wrongdoers say, "You follow not but a man affected by magic

locale.transliteration: Onthur kayfa daraboo laka alamthala fadalloo fala yastateeAAoona sabeelan
locale.translation: Look how they strike for you comparisons; but they have strayed, so they cannot [find] a way

locale.transliteration: Tabaraka allathee in shaa jaAAala laka khayran min thalika jannatin tajree min tahtiha alanharu wayajAAal laka qusooran
locale.translation: Blessed is He who, if He willed, could have made for you [something] better than that - gardens beneath which rivers flow - and could make for you palaces

locale.transliteration: Bal kaththaboo bialssaAAati waaAAtadna liman kaththaba bialssaAAati saAAeeran
locale.translation: But they have denied the Hour, and We have prepared for those who deny the Hour a Blaze

locale.transliteration: Itha raathum min makanin baAAeedin samiAAoo laha taghayyuthan wazafeeran
locale.translation: When the Hellfire sees them from a distant place, they will hear its fury and roaring

locale.transliteration: Waitha olqoo minha makanan dayyiqan muqarraneena daAAaw hunalika thubooran
locale.translation: And when they are thrown into a narrow place therein bound in chains, they will cry out thereupon for destruction

locale.transliteration: La tadAAoo alyawma thubooran wahidan waodAAoo thubooran katheeran
locale.translation: [They will be told], "Do not cry this Day for one destruction but cry for much destruction

locale.transliteration: Qul athalika khayrun am jannatu alkhuldi allatee wuAAida almuttaqoona kanat lahum jazaan wamaseeran
locale.translation: Say, "Is that better or the Garden of Eternity which is promised to the righteous? It will be for them a reward and destination

locale.transliteration: Lahum feeha ma yashaoona khalideena kana AAala rabbika waAAdan masoolan
locale.translation: For them therein is whatever they wish, [while] abiding eternally. It is ever upon your Lord a promise [worthy to be] requested

locale.transliteration: Wayawma yahshuruhum wama yaAAbudoona min dooni Allahi fayaqoolu aantum adlaltum AAibadee haolai am hum dalloo alssabeela
locale.translation: And [mention] the Day He will gather them and that which they worship besides Allah and will say, "Did you mislead these, My servants, or did they [themselves] stray from the way

locale.transliteration: Qaloo subhanaka ma kana yanbaghee lana an nattakhitha min doonika min awliyaa walakin mattaAAtahum waabaahum hatta nasoo alththikra wakanoo qawman booran
locale.translation: They will say, "Exalted are You! It was not for us to take besides You any allies. But You provided comforts for them and their fathers until they forgot the message and became a people ruined

locale.transliteration: Faqad kaththabookum bima taqooloona fama tastateeAAoona sarfan wala nasran waman yathlim minkum nuthiqhu AAathaban kabeeran
locale.translation: So they will deny you, [disbelievers], in what you say, and you cannot avert [punishment] or [find] help. And whoever commits injustice among you - We will make him taste a great punishment

locale.transliteration: Wama arsalna qablaka mina almursaleena illa innahum layakuloona alttaAAama wayamshoona fee alaswaqi wajaAAalna baAAdakum libaAAdin fitnatan atasbiroona wakana rabbuka baseeran
locale.translation: And We did not send before you, [O Muhammad], any of the messengers except that they ate food and walked in the markets. And We have made some of you [people] as trial for others - will you have patience? And ever is your Lord, Seeing

locale.transliteration: Waqala allatheena la yarjoona liqaana lawla onzila AAalayna almalaikatu aw nara rabbana laqadi istakbaroo fee anfusihim waAAataw AAutuwwan kabeeran
locale.translation: And those who do not expect the meeting with Us say, "Why were not angels sent down to us, or [why] do we [not] see our Lord?" They have certainly become arrogant within themselves and [become] insolent with great insolence

locale.transliteration: Yawma yarawna almalaikata la bushra yawmaithin lilmujrimeena wayaqooloona hijran mahjooran
locale.translation: The day they see the angels - no good tidings will there be that day for the criminals, and [the angels] will say, "Prevented and inaccessible

locale.transliteration: Waqadimna ila ma AAamiloo min AAamalin fajaAAalnahu habaan manthooran
locale.translation: And We will regard what they have done of deeds and make them as dust dispersed

locale.transliteration: Ashabu aljannati yawmaithin khayrun mustaqarran waahsanu maqeelan
locale.translation: The companions of Paradise, that Day, are [in] a better settlement and better resting place

locale.transliteration: Wayawma tashaqqaqu alssamao bialghamami wanuzzila almalaikatu tanzeelan
locale.translation: And [mention] the Day when the heaven will split open with [emerging] clouds, and the angels will be sent down in successive descent

locale.transliteration: Almulku yawmaithin alhaqqu lilrrahmani wakana yawman AAala alkafireena AAaseeran
locale.translation: True sovereignty, that Day, is for the Most Merciful. And it will be upon the disbelievers a difficult Day

locale.transliteration: Wayawma yaAAaddu alththalimu AAala yadayhi yaqoolu ya laytanee ittakhathtu maAAa alrrasooli sabeelan
locale.translation: And the Day the wrongdoer will bite on his hands [in regret] he will say, "Oh, I wish I had taken with the Messenger a way

locale.transliteration: Ya waylata laytanee lam attakhith fulanan khaleelan
locale.translation: Oh, woe to me! I wish I had not taken that one as a friend

locale.transliteration: Laqad adallanee AAani alththikri baAAda ith jaanee wakana alshshaytanu lilinsani khathoolan
locale.translation: He led me away from the remembrance after it had come to me. And ever is Satan, to man, a deserter

locale.transliteration: Waqala alrrasoolu ya rabbi inna qawmee ittakhathoo hatha alqurana mahjooran
locale.translation: And the Messenger has said, "O my Lord, indeed my people have taken this Qur'an as [a thing] abandoned

locale.transliteration: Wakathalika jaAAalna likulli nabiyyin AAaduwwan mina almujrimeena wakafa birabbika hadiyan wanaseeran
locale.translation: And thus have We made for every prophet an enemy from among the criminals. But sufficient is your Lord as a guide and a helper

locale.transliteration: Waqala allatheena kafaroo lawla nuzzila AAalayhi alquranu jumlatan wahidatan kathalika linuthabbita bihi fuadaka warattalnahu tarteelan
locale.translation: And those who disbelieve say, "Why was the Qur'an not revealed to him all at once?" Thus [it is] that We may strengthen thereby your heart. And We have spaced it distinctly

locale.transliteration: Wala yatoonaka bimathalin illa jinaka bialhaqqi waahsana tafseeran
locale.translation: And they do not come to you with an argument except that We bring you the truth and the best explanation

locale.transliteration: Allatheena yuhsharoona AAala wujoohihim ila jahannama olaika sharrun makanan waadallu sabeelan
locale.translation: The ones who are gathered on their faces to Hell - those are the worst in position and farthest astray in [their] way

locale.transliteration: Walaqad atayna moosa alkitaba wajaAAalna maAAahu akhahu haroona wazeeran
locale.translation: And We had certainly given Moses the Scripture and appointed with him his brother Aaron as an assistant

locale.transliteration: Faqulna ithhaba ila alqawmi allatheena kaththaboo biayatina fadammarnahum tadmeeran
locale.translation: And We said, "Go both of you to the people who have denied Our signs." Then We destroyed them with [complete] destruction

locale.transliteration: Waqawma noohin lamma kaththaboo alrrusula aghraqnahum wajaAAalnahum lilnnasi ayatan waaAAtadna lilththalimeena AAathaban aleeman
locale.translation: And the people of Noah - when they denied the messengers, We drowned them, and We made them for mankind a sign. And We have prepared for the wrongdoers a painful punishment

locale.transliteration: WaAAadan wathamooda waashaba alrrassi waquroonan bayna thalika katheeran
locale.translation: And [We destroyed] 'Aad and Thamud and the companions of the well and many generations between them

locale.transliteration: Wakullan darabna lahu alamthala wakullan tabbarna tatbeeran
locale.translation: And for each We presented examples [as warnings], and each We destroyed with [total] destruction

locale.transliteration: Walaqad ataw AAala alqaryati allatee omtirat matara alssawi afalam yakoonoo yarawnaha bal kanoo la yarjoona nushooran
locale.translation: And they have already come upon the town which was showered with a rain of evil. So have they not seen it? But they are not expecting resurrection

locale.transliteration: Waitha raawka in yattakhithoonaka illa huzuwan ahatha allathee baAAatha Allahu rasoolan
locale.translation: And when they see you, [O Muhammad], they take you not except in ridicule, [saying], "Is this the one whom Allah has sent as a messenger

locale.transliteration: In kada layudilluna AAan alihatina lawla an sabarna AAalayha wasawfa yaAAlamoona heena yarawna alAAathaba man adallu sabeelan
locale.translation: He almost would have misled us from our gods had we not been steadfast in [worship of] them." But they are going to know, when they see the punishment, who is farthest astray in [his] way

locale.transliteration: Araayta mani ittakhatha ilahahu hawahu afaanta takoonu AAalayhi wakeelan
locale.translation: Have you seen the one who takes as his god his own desire? Then would you be responsible for him

locale.transliteration: Am tahsabu anna aktharahum yasmaAAoona aw yaAAqiloona in hum illa kaalanAAami bal hum adallu sabeelan
locale.translation: Or do you think that most of them hear or reason? They are not except like livestock. Rather, they are [even] more astray in [their] way

locale.transliteration: Alam tara ila rabbika kayfa madda alththilla walaw shaa lajaAAalahu sakinan thumma jaAAalna alshshamsa AAalayhi daleelan
locale.translation: Have you not considered your Lord - how He extends the shadow, and if He willed, He could have made it stationary? Then We made the sun for it an indication

locale.transliteration: Thumma qabadnahu ilayna qabdan yaseeran
locale.translation: Then We hold it in hand for a brief grasp

locale.transliteration: Wahuwa allathee jaAAala lakumu allayla libasan waalnnawma subatan wajaAAala alnnahara nushooran
locale.translation: And it is He who has made the night for you as clothing and sleep [a means for] rest and has made the day a resurrection

locale.transliteration: Wahuwa allathee arsala alrriyaha bushran bayna yaday rahmatihi waanzalna mina alssamai maan tahooran
locale.translation: And it is He who sends the winds as good tidings before His mercy, and We send down from the sky pure water

locale.transliteration: Linuhyiya bihi baldatan maytan wanusqiyahu mimma khalaqna anAAaman waanasiyya katheeran
locale.translation: That We may bring to life thereby a dead land and give it as drink to those We created of numerous livestock and men

locale.transliteration: Walaqad sarrafnahu baynahum liyaththakkaroo faaba aktharu alnnasi illa kufooran
locale.translation: And We have certainly distributed it among them that they might be reminded, but most of the people refuse except disbelief

locale.transliteration: Walaw shina labaAAathna fee kulli qaryatin natheeran
locale.translation: And if We had willed, We could have sent into every city a warner

locale.transliteration: Fala tutiAAi alkafireena wajahidhum bihi jihadan kabeeran
locale.translation: So do not obey the disbelievers, and strive against them with the Qur'an a great striving

locale.transliteration: Wahuwa allathee maraja albahrayni hatha AAathbun furatun wahatha milhun ojajun wajaAAala baynahuma barzakhan wahijran mahjooran
locale.translation: And it is He who has released [simultaneously] the two seas, one fresh and sweet and one salty and bitter, and He placed between them a barrier and prohibiting partition

locale.transliteration: Wahuwa allathee khalaqa mina almai basharan fajaAAalahu nasaban wasihran wakana rabbuka qadeeran
locale.translation: And it is He who has created from water a human being and made him [a relative by] lineage and marriage. And ever is your Lord competent [concerning creation]

locale.transliteration: WayaAAbudoona min dooni Allahi ma la yanfaAAuhum wala yadurruhum wakana alkafiru AAala rabbihi thaheeran
locale.translation: But they worship rather than Allah that which does not benefit them or harm them, and the disbeliever is ever, against his Lord, an assistant [to Satan]

locale.transliteration: Wama arsalnaka illa mubashshiran wanatheeran
locale.translation: And We have not sent you, [O Muhammad], except as a bringer of good tidings and a warner

locale.transliteration: Qul ma asalukum AAalayhi min ajrin illa man shaa an yattakhitha ila rabbihi sabeelan
locale.translation: Say, "I do not ask of you for it any payment - only that whoever wills might take to his Lord a way

locale.transliteration: Watawakkal AAala alhayyi allathee la yamootu wasabbih bihamdihi wakafa bihi bithunoobi AAibadihi khabeeran
locale.translation: And rely upon the Ever-Living who does not die, and exalt [Allah] with His praise. And sufficient is He to be, with the sins of His servants, Acquainted

locale.transliteration: Allathee khalaqa alssamawati waalarda wama baynahuma fee sittati ayyamin thumma istawa AAala alAAarshi alrrahmanu faisal bihi khabeeran
locale.translation: He who created the heavens and the earth and what is between them in six days and then established Himself above the Throne - the Most Merciful, so ask about Him one well informed

locale.transliteration: Waitha qeela lahumu osjudoo lilrrahmani qaloo wama alrrahmanu anasjudu lima tamuruna wazadahum nufooran
locale.translation: And when it is said to them, "Prostrate to the Most Merciful," they say, "And what is the Most Merciful? Should we prostrate to that which you order us?" And it increases them in aversion

locale.transliteration: Tabaraka allathee jaAAala fee alssamai buroojan wajaAAala feeha sirajan waqamaran muneeran
locale.translation: Blessed is He who has placed in the sky great stars and placed therein a [burning] lamp and luminous moon

locale.transliteration: Wahuwa allathee jaAAala allayla waalnnahara khilfatan liman arada an yaththakkara aw arada shukooran
locale.translation: And it is He who has made the night and the day in succession for whoever desires to remember or desires gratitude

locale.transliteration: WaAAibadu alrrahmani allatheena yamshoona AAala alardi hawnan waitha khatabahumu aljahiloona qaloo salaman
locale.translation: And the servants of the Most Merciful are those who walk upon the earth easily, and when the ignorant address them [harshly], they say [words of] peace

locale.transliteration: Waallatheena yabeetoona lirabbihim sujjadan waqiyaman
locale.translation: And those who spend [part of] the night to their Lord prostrating and standing [in prayer]

locale.transliteration: Waallatheena yaqooloona rabbana isrif AAanna AAathaba jahannama inna AAathabaha kana gharaman
locale.translation: And those who say, "Our Lord, avert from us the punishment of Hell. Indeed, its punishment is ever adhering

locale.transliteration: Innaha saat mustaqarran wamuqaman
locale.translation: Indeed, it is evil as a settlement and residence

locale.transliteration: Waallatheena itha anfaqoo lam yusrifoo walam yaqturoo wakana bayna thalika qawaman
locale.translation: And [they are] those who, when they spend, do so not excessively or sparingly but are ever, between that, [justly] moderate

locale.transliteration: Waallatheena la yadAAoona maAAa Allahi ilahan akhara wala yaqtuloona alnnafsa allatee harrama Allahu illa bialhaqqi wala yaznoona waman yafAAal thalika yalqa athaman
locale.translation: And those who do not invoke with Allah another deity or kill the soul which Allah has forbidden [to be killed], except by right, and do not commit unlawful sexual intercourse. And whoever should do that will meet a penalty

locale.transliteration: YudaAAaf lahu alAAathabu yawma alqiyamati wayakhlud feehi muhanan
locale.translation: Multiplied for him is the punishment on the Day of Resurrection, and he will abide therein humiliated

locale.transliteration: Illa man taba waamana waAAamila AAamalan salihan faolaika yubaddilu Allahu sayyiatihim hasanatin wakana Allahu ghafooran raheeman
locale.translation: Except for those who repent, believe and do righteous work. For them Allah will replace their evil deeds with good. And ever is Allah Forgiving and Merciful

locale.transliteration: Waman taba waAAamila salihan fainnahu yatoobu ila Allahi mataban
locale.translation: And he who repents and does righteousness does indeed turn to Allah with [accepted] repentance

locale.transliteration: Waallatheena la yashhadoona alzzoora waitha marroo biallaghwi marroo kiraman
locale.translation: And [they are] those who do not testify to falsehood, and when they pass near ill speech, they pass by with dignity

locale.transliteration: Waallatheena itha thukkiroo biayati rabbihim lam yakhirroo AAalayha summan waAAumyanan
locale.translation: And those who, when reminded of the verses of their Lord, do not fall upon them deaf and blind

locale.transliteration: Waallatheena yaqooloona rabbana hab lana min azwajina wathurriyyatina qurrata aAAyunin waijAAalna lilmuttaqeena imaman
locale.translation: And those who say, "Our Lord, grant us from among our wives and offspring comfort to our eyes and make us an example for the righteous

locale.transliteration: Olaika yujzawna alghurfata bima sabaroo wayulaqqawna feeha tahiyyatan wasalaman
locale.translation: Those will be awarded the Chamber for what they patiently endured, and they will be received therein with greetings and [words of] peace

locale.transliteration: Khalideena feeha hasunat mustaqarran wamuqaman
locale.translation: Abiding eternally therein. Good is the settlement and residence

locale.transliteration: Qul ma yaAAbao bikum rabbee lawla duAAaokum faqad kaththabtum fasawfa yakoonu lizaman
locale.translation: Say, "What would my Lord care for you if not for your supplication?" For you [disbelievers] have denied, so your denial is going to be adherent

locale.transliteration: Ash-Shu'ara
locale.translation: The Poets

locale.transliteration: Taseenmeem
locale.translation: Ta, Seen, Meem

locale.transliteration: Tilka ayatu alkitabi almubeeni
locale.translation: These are the verses of the clear Book

locale.transliteration: LaAAallaka bakhiAAun nafsaka alla yakoonoo mumineena
locale.translation: Perhaps, [O Muhammad], you would kill yourself with grief that they will not be believers

locale.transliteration: In nasha nunazzil AAalayhim mina alssamai ayatan fathallat aAAnaquhum laha khadiAAeena
locale.translation: If We willed, We could send down to them from the sky a sign for which their necks would remain humbled

locale.transliteration: Wama yateehim min thikrin mina alrrahmani muhdathin illa kanoo AAanhu muAArideena
locale.translation: And no revelation comes to them anew from the Most Merciful except that they turn away from it

locale.transliteration: Faqad kaththaboo fasayateehim anbao ma kanoo bihi yastahzioona
locale.translation: For they have already denied, but there will come to them the news of that which they used to ridicule

locale.transliteration: Awalam yaraw ila alardi kam anbatna feeha min kulli zawjin kareemin
locale.translation: Did they not look at the earth - how much We have produced therein from every noble kind

locale.transliteration: Inna fee thalika laayatan wama kana aktharuhum mumineena
locale.translation: Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers

locale.transliteration: Wainna rabbaka lahuwa alAAazeezu alrraheemu
locale.translation: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful

locale.transliteration: Waith nada rabbuka moosa ani iti alqawma alththalimeena
locale.translation: And [mention] when your Lord called Moses, [saying], "Go to the wrongdoing people

locale.transliteration: Qawma firAAawna ala yattaqoona
locale.translation: The people of Pharaoh. Will they not fear Allah

locale.transliteration: Qala rabbi innee akhafu an yukaththibooni
locale.translation: He said, "My Lord, indeed I fear that they will deny me

locale.transliteration: Wayadeequ sadree wala yantaliqu lisanee faarsil ila haroona
locale.translation: And that my breast will tighten and my tongue will not be fluent, so send for Aaron

locale.transliteration: Walahum AAalayya thanbun faakhafu an yaqtulooni
locale.translation: And they have upon me a [claim due to] sin, so I fear that they will kill me

locale.transliteration: Qala kalla faithhaba biayatina inna maAAakum mustamiAAoona
locale.translation: [Allah] said, "No. Go both of you with Our signs; indeed, We are with you, listening

locale.transliteration: Fatiya firAAawna faqoola inna rasoolu rabbi alAAalameena
locale.translation: Go to Pharaoh and say, 'We are the messengers of the Lord of the worlds

locale.transliteration: An arsil maAAana banee israeela
locale.translation: [Commanded to say], "Send with us the Children of Israel

locale.transliteration: Qala alam nurabbika feena waleedan walabithta feena min AAumurika sineena
locale.translation: [Pharaoh] said, "Did we not raise you among us as a child, and you remained among us for years of your life

locale.transliteration: WafaAAalta faAAlataka allatee faAAalta waanta mina alkafireena
locale.translation: And [then] you did your deed which you did, and you were of the ungrateful

locale.transliteration: Qala faAAaltuha ithan waana mina alddalleena
locale.translation: [Moses] said, "I did it, then, while I was of those astray

locale.transliteration: Fafarartu minkum lamma khiftukum fawahaba lee rabbee hukman wajaAAalanee mina almursaleena
locale.translation: So I fled from you when I feared you. Then my Lord granted me wisdom and prophethood and appointed me [as one] of the messengers

locale.transliteration: Watilka niAAmatun tamunnuha AAalayya an AAabbadta banee israeela
locale.translation: And is this a favor of which you remind me - that you have enslaved the Children of Israel

locale.transliteration: Qala firAAawnu wama rabbu alAAalameena
locale.translation: Said Pharaoh, "And what is the Lord of the worlds

locale.transliteration: Qala rabbu alssamawati waalardi wama baynahuma in kuntum mooqineena
locale.translation: [Moses] said, "The Lord of the heavens and earth and that between them, if you should be convinced

locale.transliteration: Qala liman hawlahu ala tastamiAAoona
locale.translation: [Pharaoh] said to those around him, "Do you not hear

locale.transliteration: Qala rabbukum warabbu abaikumu alawwaleena
locale.translation: [Moses] said, "Your Lord and the Lord of your first forefathers

locale.transliteration: Qala inna rasoolakumu allathee orsila ilaykum lamajnoonun
locale.translation: [Pharaoh] said, "Indeed, your 'messenger' who has been sent to you is mad

locale.transliteration: Qala rabbu almashriqi waalmaghribi wama baynahuma in kuntum taAAqiloona
locale.translation: [Moses] said, "Lord of the east and the west and that between them, if you were to reason

locale.transliteration: Qala laini ittakhathta ilahan ghayree laajAAalannaka mina almasjooneena
locale.translation: [Pharaoh] said, "If you take a god other than me, I will surely place you among those imprisoned

locale.transliteration: Qala awalaw jituka bishayin mubeenin
locale.translation: [Moses] said, "Even if I brought you proof manifest

locale.transliteration: Qala fati bihi in kunta mina alssadiqeena
locale.translation: [Pharaoh] said, "Then bring it, if you should be of the truthful

locale.transliteration: Faalqa AAasahu faitha hiya thuAAbanun mubeenun
locale.translation: So [Moses] threw his staff, and suddenly it was a serpent manifest

locale.transliteration: WanazaAAa yadahu faitha hiya baydao lilnnathireena
locale.translation: And he drew out his hand; thereupon it was white for the observers

locale.transliteration: Qala lilmalai hawlahu inna hatha lasahirun AAaleemun
locale.translation: [Pharaoh] said to the eminent ones around him, "Indeed, this is a learned magician

locale.transliteration: Yureedu an yukhrijakum min ardikum bisihrihi famatha tamuroona
locale.translation: He wants to drive you out of your land by his magic, so what do you advise

locale.transliteration: Qaloo arjih waakhahu waibAAath fee almadaini hashireena
locale.translation: They said, "Postpone [the matter of] him and his brother and send among the cities gatherers

locale.transliteration: Yatooka bikulli sahharin AAaleemin
locale.translation: Who will bring you every learned, skilled magician

locale.transliteration: FajumiAAa alssaharatu limeeqati yawmin maAAloomin
locale.translation: So the magicians were assembled for the appointment of a well-known day

locale.transliteration: Waqeela lilnnasi hal antum mujtamiAAoona
locale.translation: And it was said to the people, "Will you congregate

locale.transliteration: LaAAallana nattabiAAu alssaharata in kanoo humu alghalibeena
locale.translation: That we might follow the magicians if they are the predominant

locale.transliteration: Falamma jaa alssaharatu qaloo lifirAAawna ainna lana laajran in kunna nahnu alghalibeena
locale.translation: And when the magicians arrived, they said to Pharaoh, "Is there indeed for us a reward if we are the predominant

locale.transliteration: Qala naAAam wainnakum ithan lamina almuqarrabeena
locale.translation: He said, "Yes, and indeed, you will then be of those near [to me]

locale.transliteration: Qala lahum moosa alqoo ma antum mulqoona
locale.translation: Moses said to them, "Throw whatever you will throw

locale.transliteration: Faalqaw hibalahum waAAisiyyahum waqaloo biAAizzati firAAawna inna lanahnu alghaliboona
locale.translation: So they threw their ropes and their staffs and said, "By the might of Pharaoh, indeed it is we who are predominant

locale.transliteration: Faalqa moosa AAasahu faitha hiya talqafu ma yafikoona
locale.translation: Then Moses threw his staff, and at once it devoured what they falsified

locale.transliteration: Faolqiya alssaharatu sajideena
locale.translation: So the magicians fell down in prostration [to Allah]

locale.transliteration: Qaloo amanna birabbi alAAalameena
locale.translation: They said, "We have believed in the Lord of the worlds

locale.transliteration: Rabbi moosa waharoona
locale.translation: The Lord of Moses and Aaron

locale.transliteration: Qala amantum lahu qabla an athana lakum innahu lakabeerukumu allathee AAallamakumu alssihra falasawfa taAAlamoona laoqattiAAanna aydiyakum waarjulakum min khilafin walaosallibannakum ajmaAAeena
locale.translation: [Pharaoh] said, "You believed Moses before I gave you permission. Indeed, he is your leader who has taught you magic, but you are going to know. I will surely cut off your hands and your feet on opposite sides, and I will surely crucify you all

locale.transliteration: Qaloo la dayra inna ila rabbina munqaliboona
locale.translation: They said, "No harm. Indeed, to our Lord we will return

locale.transliteration: Inna natmaAAu an yaghfira lana rabbuna khatayana an kunna awwala almumineena
locale.translation: Indeed, we aspire that our Lord will forgive us our sins because we were the first of the believers

locale.transliteration: Waawhayna ila moosa an asri biAAibadee innakum muttabaAAoona
locale.translation: And We inspired to Moses, "Travel by night with My servants; indeed, you will be pursued

locale.transliteration: Faarsala firAAawnu fee almadaini hashireena
locale.translation: Then Pharaoh sent among the cities gatherers

locale.transliteration: Inna haolai lashirthimatun qaleeloona
locale.translation: [And said], "Indeed, those are but a small band

locale.transliteration: Wainnahum lana laghaithoona
locale.translation: And indeed, they are enraging us

locale.transliteration: Wainna lajameeAAun hathiroona
locale.translation: And indeed, we are a cautious society

locale.transliteration: Faakhrajnahum min jannatin waAAuyoonin
locale.translation: So We removed them from gardens and springs

locale.transliteration: Wakunoozin wamaqamin kareemin
locale.translation: And treasures and honorable station

locale.transliteration: Kathalika waawrathnaha banee israeela
locale.translation: Thus. And We caused to inherit it the Children of Israel

locale.transliteration: FaatbaAAoohum mushriqeena
locale.translation: So they pursued them at sunrise

locale.transliteration: Falamma taraa aljamAAani qala ashabu moosa inna lamudrakoona
locale.translation: And when the two companies saw one another, the companions of Moses said, "Indeed, we are to be overtaken

locale.transliteration: Qala kalla inna maAAiya rabbee sayahdeeni
