locale.translation: [Moses] said, "No! Indeed, with me is my Lord; He will guide me

locale.transliteration: Faawhayna ila moosa ani idrib biAAasaka albahra fainfalaqa fakana kullu firqin kaalttawdi alAAatheemi
locale.translation: Then We inspired to Moses, "Strike with your staff the sea," and it parted, and each portion was like a great towering mountain

locale.transliteration: Waazlafna thamma alakhareena
locale.translation: And We advanced thereto the pursuers

locale.transliteration: Waanjayna moosa waman maAAahu ajmaAAeena
locale.translation: And We saved Moses and those with him, all together

locale.transliteration: Thumma aghraqna alakhareena
locale.translation: Then We drowned the others

locale.transliteration: Inna fee thalika laayatan wama kana aktharuhum mumineena
locale.translation: Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers

locale.transliteration: Wainna rabbaka lahuwa alAAazeezu alrraheemu
locale.translation: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful

locale.transliteration: Waotlu AAalayhim nabaa ibraheema
locale.translation: And recite to them the news of Abraham

locale.transliteration: Ith qala liabeehi waqawmihi ma taAAbudoona
locale.translation: When he said to his father and his people, "What do you worship

locale.transliteration: Qaloo naAAbudu asnaman fanathallu laha AAakifeena
locale.translation: They said, "We worship idols and remain to them devoted

locale.transliteration: Qala hal yasmaAAoonakum ith tadAAoona
locale.translation: He said, "Do they hear you when you supplicate

locale.transliteration: Aw yanfaAAoonakum aw yadurroona
locale.translation: Or do they benefit you, or do they harm

locale.transliteration: Qaloo bal wajadna abaana kathalika yafAAaloona
locale.translation: They said, "But we found our fathers doing thus

locale.transliteration: Qala afaraaytum ma kuntum taAAbudoona
locale.translation: He said, "Then do you see what you have been worshipping

locale.transliteration: Antum waabaokumu alaqdamoona
locale.translation: You and your ancient forefathers

locale.transliteration: Fainnahum AAaduwwun lee illa rabba alAAalameena
locale.translation: Indeed, they are enemies to me, except the Lord of the worlds

locale.transliteration: Allathee khalaqanee fahuwa yahdeeni
locale.translation: Who created me, and He [it is who] guides me

locale.transliteration: Waallathee huwa yutAAimunee wayasqeeni
locale.translation: And it is He who feeds me and gives me drink

locale.transliteration: Waitha maridtu fahuwa yashfeeni
locale.translation: And when I am ill, it is He who cures me

locale.transliteration: Waallathee yumeetunee thumma yuhyeeni
locale.translation: And who will cause me to die and then bring me to life

locale.transliteration: Waallathee atmaAAu an yaghfira lee khateeatee yawma alddeeni
locale.translation: And who I aspire that He will forgive me my sin on the Day of Recompense

locale.transliteration: Rabbi hab lee hukman waalhiqnee bialssaliheena
locale.translation: [And he said], "My Lord, grant me authority and join me with the righteous

locale.transliteration: WaijAAal lee lisana sidqin fee alakhireena
locale.translation: And grant me a reputation of honor among later generations

locale.transliteration: WaijAAalnee min warathati jannati alnnaAAeemi
locale.translation: And place me among the inheritors of the Garden of Pleasure

locale.transliteration: LaoAAaththibannahu AAathaban shadeedan aw laathbahannahu aw layatiyannee bisultanin mubeenin
locale.translation: I will surely punish him with a severe punishment or slaughter him unless he brings me clear authorization

locale.transliteration: Famakatha ghayra baAAeedin faqala ahattu bima lam tuhit bihi wajituka min sabain binabain yaqeenin
locale.translation: But the hoopoe stayed not long and said, "I have encompassed [in knowledge] that which you have not encompassed, and I have come to you from Sheba with certain news

locale.transliteration: Innee wajadtu imraatan tamlikuhum waootiyat min kulli shayin walaha AAarshun AAatheemun
locale.translation: Indeed, I found [there] a woman ruling them, and she has been given of all things, and she has a great throne

locale.transliteration: Wajadtuha waqawmaha yasjudoona lilshshamsi min dooni Allahi wazayyana lahumu alshshaytanu aAAmalahum fasaddahum AAani alssabeeli fahum la yahtadoona
locale.translation: I found her and her people prostrating to the sun instead of Allah, and Satan has made their deeds pleasing to them and averted them from [His] way, so they are not guided

locale.transliteration: Alla yasjudoo lillahi allathee yukhriju alkhabaa fee alssamawati waalardi wayaAAlamu ma tukhfoona wama tuAAlinoona
locale.translation: [And] so they do not prostrate to Allah, who brings forth what is hidden within the heavens and the earth and knows what you conceal and what you declare

locale.transliteration: Allahu la ilaha illa huwa rabbu alAAarshi alAAatheemi
locale.translation: Allah - there is no deity except Him, Lord of the Great Throne

locale.transliteration: Qala sananthuru asadaqta am kunta mina alkathibeena
locale.translation: [Solomon] said, "We will see whether you were truthful or were of the liars

locale.transliteration: Ithhab bikitabee hatha faalqih ilayhim thumma tawalla AAanhum faonthur matha yarjiAAoona
locale.translation: Take this letter of mine and deliver it to them. Then leave them and see what [answer] they will return

locale.transliteration: Qalat ya ayyuha almalao innee olqiya ilayya kitabun kareemun
locale.translation: She said, "O eminent ones, indeed, to me has been delivered a noble letter

locale.transliteration: Innahu min sulaymana wainnahu bismi Allahi alrrahmani alrraheemi
locale.translation: Indeed, it is from Solomon, and indeed, it reads: 'In the name of Allah, the Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful

locale.transliteration: Alla taAAloo AAalayya watoonee muslimeena
locale.translation: Be not haughty with me but come to me in submission [as Muslims]

locale.transliteration: Qalat ya ayyuha almalao aftoonee fee amree ma kuntu qatiAAatan amran hatta tashhadoona
locale.translation: She said, "O eminent ones, advise me in my affair. I would not decide a matter until you witness [for] me

locale.transliteration: Qaloo nahnu oloo quwwatin waoloo basin shadeedin waalamru ilayki faonthuree matha tamureena
locale.translation: They said, "We are men of strength and of great military might, but the command is yours, so see what you will command

locale.transliteration: Qalat inna almulooka itha dakhaloo qaryatan afsadooha wajaAAaloo aAAizzata ahliha athillatan wakathalika yafAAaloona
locale.translation: She said, "Indeed kings - when they enter a city, they ruin it and render the honored of its people humbled. And thus do they do

locale.transliteration: Wainnee mursilatun ilayhim bihadiyyatin fanathiratun bima yarjiAAu almursaloona
locale.translation: But indeed, I will send to them a gift and see with what [reply] the messengers will return

locale.transliteration: Falamma jaa sulaymana qala atumiddoonani bimalin fama ataniya Allahu khayrun mimma atakum bal antum bihadiyyatikum tafrahoona
locale.translation: So when they came to Solomon, he said, "Do you provide me with wealth? But what Allah has given me is better than what He has given you. Rather, it is you who rejoice in your gift

locale.transliteration: IrjiAA ilayhim falanatiyannahum bijunoodin la qibala lahum biha walanukhrijannahum minha athillatan wahum saghiroona
locale.translation: Return to them, for we will surely come to them with soldiers that they will be powerless to encounter, and we will surely expel them therefrom in humiliation, and they will be debased

locale.transliteration: Qala ya ayyuha almalao ayyukum yateenee biAAarshiha qabla an yatoonee muslimeena
locale.translation: [Solomon] said, "O assembly [of jinn], which of you will bring me her throne before they come to me in submission

locale.transliteration: Qala AAifreetun mina aljinni ana ateeka bihi qabla an taqooma min maqamika wainne AAalayhi laqawiyyun ameenun
locale.translation: A powerful one from among the jinn said, "I will bring it to you before you rise from your place, and indeed, I am for this [task] strong and trustworthy

locale.transliteration: Qala allathee AAindahu AAilmun mina alkitabi ana ateeka bihi qabla an yartadda ilayka tarfuka falamma raahu mustaqirran AAindahu qala hatha min fadli rabbee liyabluwanee aashkuru am akfuru waman shakara fainnama yashkuru linafsihi waman kafara fainna rabbee ghaniyyun kareemun
locale.translation: Said one who had knowledge from the Scripture, "I will bring it to you before your glance returns to you." And when [Solomon] saw it placed before him, he said, "This is from the favor of my Lord to test me whether I will be grateful or ungrateful. And whoever is grateful - his gratitude is only for [the benefit of] himself. And whoever is ungrateful - then indeed, my Lord is Free of need and Generous

locale.transliteration: Qala nakkiroo laha AAarshaha nanthur atahtadee am takoonu mina allatheena la yahtadoona
locale.translation: He said, "Disguise for her her throne; we will see whether she will be guided [to truth] or will be of those who is not guided

locale.transliteration: Falamma jaat qeela ahakatha AAarshuki qalat kaannahu huwa waooteena alAAilma min qabliha wakunna muslimeena
locale.translation: So when she arrived, it was said [to her], "Is your throne like this?" She said, "[It is] as though it was it." [Solomon said], "And we were given knowledge before her, and we have been Muslims [in submission to Allah]

locale.transliteration: Wasaddaha ma kanat taAAbudu min dooni Allahi innaha kanat min qawmin kafireena
locale.translation: And that which she was worshipping other than Allah had averted her [from submission to Him]. Indeed, she was from a disbelieving people

locale.transliteration: Qeela laha odkhulee alssarha falamma raathu hasibathu lujjatan wakashafat AAan saqayha qala innahu sarhun mumarradun min qawareera qalat rabbi innee thalamtu nafsee waaslamtu maAAa sulaymana lillahi rabbi alAAalameena
locale.translation: She was told, "Enter the palace." But when she saw it, she thought it was a body of water and uncovered her shins [to wade through]. He said, "Indeed, it is a palace [whose floor is] made smooth with glass." She said, "My Lord, indeed I have wronged myself, and I submit with Solomon to Allah, Lord of the worlds

locale.transliteration: Walaqad arsalna ila thamooda akhahum salihan ani oAAbudoo Allaha faitha hum fareeqani yakhtasimoona
locale.translation: And We had certainly sent to Thamud their brother Salih, [saying], "Worship Allah," and at once they were two parties conflicting

locale.transliteration: Qala ya qawmi lima tastaAAjiloona bialssayyiati qabla alhasanati lawla tastaghfiroona Allaha laAAallakum turhamoona
locale.translation: He said, "O my people, why are you impatient for evil instead of good? Why do you not seek forgiveness of Allah that you may receive mercy

locale.transliteration: Qaloo ittayyarna bika wabiman maAAaka qala tairukum AAinda Allahi bal antum qawmun tuftanoona
locale.translation: They said, "We consider you a bad omen, you and those with you." He said, "Your omen is with Allah. Rather, you are a people being tested

locale.transliteration: Wakana fee almadeenati tisAAatu rahtin yufsidoona fee alardi wala yuslihoona
locale.translation: And there were in the city nine family heads causing corruption in the land and not amending [its affairs]

locale.transliteration: Qaloo taqasamoo biAllahi lanubayyitannahu waahlahu thumma lanaqoolanna liwaliyyihi ma shahidna mahlika ahlihi wainna lasadiqoona
locale.translation: They said, "Take a mutual oath by Allah that we will kill him by night, he and his family. Then we will say to his executor, 'We did not witness the destruction of his family, and indeed, we are truthful

locale.transliteration: Wamakaroo makran wamakarna makran wahum la yashAAuroona
locale.translation: And they planned a plan, and We planned a plan, while they perceived not

locale.transliteration: Faonthur kayfa kana AAaqibatu makrihim anna dammarnahum waqawmahum ajmaAAeena
locale.translation: Then look how was the outcome of their plan - that We destroyed them and their people, all

locale.transliteration: Fatilka buyootuhum khawiyatan bima thalamoo inna fee thalika laayatan liqawmin yaAAlamoona
locale.translation: So those are their houses, desolate because of the wrong they had done. Indeed in that is a sign for people who know

locale.transliteration: Waanjayna allatheena amanoo wakanoo yattaqoona
locale.translation: And We saved those who believed and used to fear Allah

locale.transliteration: Walootan ith qala liqawmihi atatoona alfahishata waantum tubsiroona
locale.translation: And [mention] Lot, when he said to his people, "Do you commit immorality while you are seeing

locale.transliteration: Ainnakum latatoona alrrijala shahwatan min dooni alnnisai bal antum qawmun tajhaloona
locale.translation: Do you indeed approach men with desire instead of women? Rather, you are a people behaving ignorantly

locale.transliteration: Fama kana jawaba qawmihi illa an qaloo akhrijoo ala lootin min qaryatikum innahum onasun yatatahharoona
locale.translation: But the answer of his people was not except that they said, "Expel the family of Lot from your city. Indeed, they are people who keep themselves pure

locale.transliteration: Faanjaynahu waahlahu illa imraatahu qaddarnaha mina alghabireena
locale.translation: So We saved him and his family, except for his wife; We destined her to be of those who remained behind

locale.transliteration: Waamtarna AAalayhim mataran fasaa mataru almunthareena
locale.translation: And We rained upon them a rain [of stones], and evil was the rain of those who were warned

locale.transliteration: Quli alhamdu lillahi wasalamun AAala AAibadihi allatheena istafa allahu khayrun amma yushrikoona
locale.translation: Say, [O Muhammad], "Praise be to Allah, and peace upon His servants whom He has chosen. Is Allah better or what they associate with Him

locale.transliteration: Amman khalaqa alssamawati waalarda waanzala lakum mina alssamai maan faanbatna bihi hadaiqa thata bahjatin ma kana lakum an tunbitoo shajaraha ailahun maAAa Allahi bal hum qawmun yaAAdiloona
locale.translation: [More precisely], is He [not best] who created the heavens and the earth and sent down for you rain from the sky, causing to grow thereby gardens of joyful beauty which you could not [otherwise] have grown the trees thereof? Is there a deity with Allah? [No], but they are a people who ascribe equals [to Him]

locale.transliteration: Amman jaAAala alarda qararan wajaAAala khilalaha anharan wajaAAala laha rawasiya wajaAAala bayna albahrayni hajizan ailahun maAAa Allahi bal aktharuhum la yaAAlamoona
locale.translation: Is He [not best] who made the earth a stable ground and placed within it rivers and made for it firmly set mountains and placed between the two seas a barrier? Is there a deity with Allah? [No], but most of them do not know

locale.transliteration: Amman yujeebu almudtarra itha daAAahu wayakshifu alssooa wayajAAalukum khulafaa alardi ailahun maAAa Allahi qaleelan ma tathakkaroona
locale.translation: Is He [not best] who responds to the desperate one when he calls upon Him and removes evil and makes you inheritors of the earth? Is there a deity with Allah? Little do you remember

locale.transliteration: Amman yahdeekum fee thulumati albarri waalbahri waman yursilu alrriyaha bushran bayna yaday rahmatihi ailahun maAAa Allahi taAAala Allahu AAamma yushrikoona
locale.translation: Is He [not best] who guides you through the darknesses of the land and sea and who sends the winds as good tidings before His mercy? Is there a deity with Allah? High is Allah above whatever they associate with Him

locale.transliteration: Amman yabdao alkhalqa thumma yuAAeeduhu waman yarzuqukum mina alssamai waalardi ailahun maAAa Allahi qul hatoo burhanakum in kuntum sadiqeena
locale.translation: Is He [not best] who begins creation and then repeats it and who provides for you from the heaven and earth? Is there a deity with Allah? Say, "Produce your proof, if you should be truthful

locale.transliteration: Qul la yaAAlamu man fee alssamawati waalardi alghayba illa Allahu wama yashAAuroona ayyana yubAAathoona
locale.translation: Say, "None in the heavens and earth knows the unseen except Allah, and they do not perceive when they will be resurrected

locale.transliteration: Bali iddaraka AAilmuhum fee alakhirati bal hum fee shakkin minha bal hum minha AAamoona
locale.translation: Rather, their knowledge is arrested concerning the Hereafter. Rather, they are in doubt about it. Rather, they are, concerning it, blind

locale.transliteration: Waqala allatheena kafaroo aitha kunna turaban waabaona ainna lamukhrajoona
locale.translation: And those who disbelieve say, "When we have become dust as well as our forefathers, will we indeed be brought out [of the graves]

locale.transliteration: Laqad wuAAidna hatha nahnu waabaona min qablu in hatha illa asateeru alawwaleena
locale.translation: We have been promised this, we and our forefathers, before. This is not but legends of the former peoples

locale.transliteration: Qul seeroo fee alardi faonthuroo kayfa kana AAaqibatu almujrimeena
locale.translation: Say, [O Muhammad], "Travel through the land and observe how was the end of the criminals

locale.transliteration: Wala tahzan AAalayhim wala takun fee dayqin mimma yamkuroona
locale.translation: And grieve not over them or be in distress from what they conspire

locale.transliteration: Wayaqooloona mata hatha alwaAAdu in kuntum sadiqeena
locale.translation: And they say, "When is [the fulfillment of] this promise, if you should be truthful

locale.transliteration: Qul AAasa an yakoona radifa lakum baAAdu allathee tastaAAjiloona
locale.translation: Say, "Perhaps it is close behind you - some of that for which you are impatient

locale.transliteration: Wainna rabbaka lathoo fadlin AAala alnnasi walakinna aktharahum la yashkuroona
locale.translation: And indeed, your Lord is full of bounty for the people, but most of them do not show gratitude

locale.transliteration: Wainna rabbaka layaAAlamu ma tukinnu sudooruhum wama yuAAlinoona
locale.translation: And indeed, your Lord knows what their breasts conceal and what they declare

locale.transliteration: Wama min ghaibatin fee alssamai waalardi illa fee kitabin mubeenin
locale.translation: And there is nothing concealed within the heaven and the earth except that it is in a clear Register

locale.transliteration: Inna hatha alqurana yaqussu AAala banee israeela akthara allathee hum feehi yakhtalifoona
locale.translation: Indeed, this Qur'an relates to the Children of Israel most of that over which they disagree

locale.transliteration: Wainnahu lahudan warahmatun lilmumineena
locale.translation: And indeed, it is guidance and mercy for the believers

locale.transliteration: Inna rabbaka yaqdee baynahum bihukmihi wahuwa alAAazeezu alAAaleemu
locale.translation: Indeed, your Lord will judge between them by His [wise] judgement. And He is the Exalted in Might, the Knowing

locale.transliteration: Fatawakkal AAala Allahi innaka AAala alhaqqi almubeeni
locale.translation: So rely upon Allah; indeed, you are upon the clear truth

locale.transliteration: Innaka la tusmiAAu almawta wala tusmiAAu alssumma aldduAAaa itha wallaw mudbireena
locale.translation: Indeed, you will not make the dead hear, nor will you make the deaf hear the call when they have turned their backs retreating

locale.transliteration: Wama anta bihadee alAAumyi AAan dalalatihim in tusmiAAu illa man yuminu biayatina fahum muslimoona
locale.translation: And you cannot guide the blind away from their error. You will only make hear those who believe in Our verses so they are Muslims [submitting to Allah]

locale.transliteration: Waitha waqaAAa alqawlu AAalayhim akhrajna lahum dabbatan mina alardi tukallimuhum anna alnnasa kanoo biayatina la yooqinoona
locale.translation: And when the word befalls them, We will bring forth for them a creature from the earth speaking to them, [saying] that the people were, of Our verses, not certain [in faith]

locale.transliteration: Wayawma nahshuru min kulli ommatin fawjan mimman yukaththibu biayatina fahum yoozaAAoona
locale.translation: And [warn of] the Day when We will gather from every nation a company of those who deny Our signs, and they will be [driven] in rows

locale.transliteration: Hatta itha jaoo qala akaththabtum biayatee walam tuheetoo biha AAilman ammatha kuntum taAAmaloona
locale.translation: Until, when they arrive [at the place of Judgement], He will say, "Did you deny My signs while you encompassed them not in knowledge, or what [was it that] you were doing

locale.transliteration: WawaqaAAa alqawlu AAalayhim bima thalamoo fahum la yantiqoona
locale.translation: And the decree will befall them for the wrong they did, and they will not [be able to] speak

locale.transliteration: Alam yaraw anna jaAAalna allayla liyaskunoo feehi waalnnahara mubsiran inna fee thalika laayatin liqawmin yuminoona
locale.translation: Do they not see that We made the night that they may rest therein and the day giving sight? Indeed in that are signs for a people who believe

locale.transliteration: Wayawma yunfakhu fee alssoori fafaziAAa man fee alssamawati waman fee alardi illa man shaa Allahu wakullun atawhu dakhireena
locale.translation: And [warn of] the Day the Horn will be blown, and whoever is in the heavens and whoever is on the earth will be terrified except whom Allah wills. And all will come to Him humbled

locale.transliteration: Watara aljibala tahsabuha jamidatan wahiya tamurru marra alssahabi sunAAa Allahi allathee atqana kulla shayin innahu khabeerun bima tafAAaloona
locale.translation: And you see the mountains, thinking them rigid, while they will pass as the passing of clouds. [It is] the work of Allah, who perfected all things. Indeed, He is Acquainted with that which you do

locale.transliteration: Man jaa bialhasanati falahu khayrun minha wahum min fazaAAin yawmaithin aminoona
locale.translation: Whoever comes [at Judgement] with a good deed will have better than it, and they, from the terror of that Day, will be safe

locale.transliteration: Waman jaa bialssayyiati fakubbat wujoohuhum fee alnnari hal tujzawna illa ma kuntum taAAmaloona
locale.translation: And whoever comes with an evil deed - their faces will be overturned into the Fire, [and it will be said], "Are you recompensed except for what you used to do

locale.transliteration: Innama omirtu an aAAbuda rabba hathihi albaldati allathee harramaha walahu kullu shayin waomirtu an akoona mina almuslimeena
locale.translation: [Say, O Muhammad], "I have only been commanded to worship the Lord of this city, who made it sacred and to whom [belongs] all things. And I am commanded to be of the Muslims [those who submit to Allah]

locale.transliteration: Waan atluwa alqurana famani ihtada fainnama yahtadee linafsihi waman dalla faqul innama ana mina almunthireena
locale.translation: And to recite the Qur'an." And whoever is guided is only guided for [the benefit of] himself; and whoever strays - say, "I am only [one] of the warners

locale.transliteration: Waquli alhamdu lillahi sayureekum ayatihi fataAArifoonaha wama rabbuka bighafilin AAamma taAAmaloona
locale.translation: And say, "[All] praise is [due] to Allah. He will show you His signs, and you will recognize them. And your Lord is not unaware of what you do

locale.transliteration: Al-Qasas
locale.translation: The Stories

locale.transliteration: Taseenmeem
locale.translation: Ta, Seen, Meem

locale.transliteration: Tilka ayatu alkitabi almubeeni
locale.translation: These are the verses of the clear Book

locale.transliteration: Natloo AAalayka min nabai moosa wafirAAawna bialhaqqi liqawmin yuminoona
locale.translation: We recite to you from the news of Moses and Pharaoh in truth for a people who believe

locale.transliteration: Inna firAAawna AAala fee alardi wajaAAala ahlaha shiyaAAan yastadAAifu taifatan minhum yuthabbihu abnaahum wayastahyee nisaahum innahu kana mina almufsideena
locale.translation: Indeed, Pharaoh exalted himself in the land and made its people into factions, oppressing a sector among them, slaughtering their [newborn] sons and keeping their females alive. Indeed, he was of the corrupters

locale.transliteration: Wanureedu an namunna AAala allatheena istudAAifoo fee alardi wanajAAalahum aimmatan wanajAAalahumu alwaritheena
locale.translation: And We wanted to confer favor upon those who were oppressed in the land and make them leaders and make them inheritors

locale.transliteration: Wanumakkina lahum fee alardi wanuriya firAAawna wahamana wajunoodahuma minhum ma kanoo yahtharoona
locale.translation: And establish them in the land and show Pharaoh and [his minister] Haman and their soldiers through them that which they had feared

locale.transliteration: Waawhayna ila ommi moosa an ardiAAeehi faitha khifti AAalayhi faalqeehi fee alyammi wala takhafee wala tahzanee inna raddoohu ilayki wajaAAiloohu mina almursaleena
locale.translation: And We inspired to the mother of Moses, "Suckle him; but when you fear for him, cast him into the river and do not fear and do not grieve. Indeed, We will return him to you and will make him [one] of the messengers

locale.transliteration: Failtaqatahu alu firAAawna liyakoona lahum AAaduwwan wahazanan inna firAAawna wahamana wajunoodahuma kanoo khatieena
locale.translation: And the family of Pharaoh picked him up [out of the river] so that he would become to them an enemy and a [cause of] grief. Indeed, Pharaoh and Haman and their soldiers were deliberate sinners

locale.transliteration: Waqalati imraatu firAAawna qurratu AAaynin lee walaka la taqtuloohu AAasa an yanfaAAana aw nattakhithahu waladan wahum la yashAAuroona
locale.translation: And the wife of Pharaoh said, "[He will be] a comfort of the eye for me and for you. Do not kill him; perhaps he may benefit us, or we may adopt him as a son." And they perceived not

locale.transliteration: Waasbaha fuadu ommi moosa farighan in kadat latubdee bihi lawla an rabatna AAala qalbiha litakoona mina almumineena
locale.translation: And the heart of Moses' mother became empty [of all else]. She was about to disclose [the matter concerning] him had We not bound fast her heart that she would be of the believers

locale.transliteration: Waqalat liokhtihi qusseehi fabasurat bihi AAan junubin wahum la yashAAuroona
locale.translation: And she said to his sister, "Follow him"; so she watched him from a distance while they perceived not

locale.transliteration: Waharramna AAalayhi almaradiAAa min qablu faqalat hal adullukum AAala ahli baytin yakfuloonahu lakum wahum lahu nasihoona
locale.translation: And We had prevented from him [all] wet nurses before, so she said, "Shall I direct you to a household that will be responsible for him for you while they are to him [for his upbringing] sincere

locale.transliteration: Faradadnahu ila ommihi kay taqarra AAaynuha wala tahzana walitaAAlama anna waAAda Allahi haqqun walakinna aktharahum la yaAAlamoona
locale.translation: So We restored him to his mother that she might be content and not grieve and that she would know that the promise of Allah is true. But most of the people do not know

locale.transliteration: Walamma balagha ashuddahu waistawa ataynahu hukman waAAilman wakathalika najzee almuhsineena
locale.translation: And when he attained his full strength and was [mentally] mature, We bestowed upon him judgement and knowledge. And thus do We reward the doers of good

locale.transliteration: Wadakhala almadeenata AAala heeni ghaflatin min ahliha fawajada feeha rajulayni yaqtatilani hatha min sheeAAatihi wahatha min AAaduwwihi faistaghathahu allathee min sheeAAatihi AAala allathee min AAaduwwihi fawakazahu moosa faqada AAalayhi qala hatha min AAamali alshshaytani innahu AAaduwwun mudillun mubeenun
locale.translation: And he entered the city at a time of inattention by its people and found therein two men fighting: one from his faction and one from among his enemy. And the one from his faction called for help to him against the one from his enemy, so Moses struck him and [unintentionally] killed him. [Moses] said, "This is from the work of Satan. Indeed, he is a manifest, misleading enemy

locale.transliteration: Qala rabbi innee thalamtu nafsee faighfir lee faghafara lahu innahu huwa alghafooru alrraheemu
locale.translation: He said, "My Lord, indeed I have wronged myself, so forgive me," and He forgave him. Indeed, He is the Forgiving, the Merciful

locale.transliteration: Qala rabbi bima anAAamta AAalayya falan akoona thaheeran lilmujrimeena
locale.translation: He said, "My Lord, for the favor You bestowed upon me, I will never be an assistant to the criminals

locale.transliteration: Faasbaha fee almadeenati khaifan yataraqqabu faitha allathee istansarahu bialamsi yastasrikhuhu qala lahu moosa innaka laghawiyyun mubeenun
locale.translation: And he became inside the city fearful and anticipating [exposure], when suddenly the one who sought his help the previous day cried out to him [once again]. Moses said to him, "Indeed, you are an evident, [persistent] deviator

locale.transliteration: Falamma an arada an yabtisha biallathee huwa AAaduwwun lahuma qala ya moosa atureedu an taqtulanee kama qatalta nafsan bialamsi in tureedu illa an takoona jabbaran fee alardi wama tureedu an takoona mina almusliheena
locale.translation: And when he wanted to strike the one who was an enemy to both of them, he said, "O Moses, do you intend to kill me as you killed someone yesterday? You only want to be a tyrant in the land and do not want to be of the amenders

locale.transliteration: Wajaa rajulun min aqsa almadeenati yasAAa qala ya moosa inna almalaa yatamiroona bika liyaqtulooka faokhruj innee laka mina alnnasiheena
locale.translation: And a man came from the farthest end of the city, running. He said, "O Moses, indeed the eminent ones are conferring over you [intending] to kill you, so leave [the city]; indeed, I am to you of the sincere advisors

locale.transliteration: Fakharaja minha khaifan yataraqqabu qala rabbi najjinee mina alqawmi alththalimeena
locale.translation: So he left it, fearful and anticipating [apprehension]. He said, "My Lord, save me from the wrongdoing people

locale.transliteration: Walamma tawajjaha tilqaa madyana qala AAasa rabbee an yahdiyanee sawaa alssabeeli
locale.translation: And when he directed himself toward Madyan, he said, "Perhaps my Lord will guide me to the sound way

locale.transliteration: Walamma warada maa madyana wajada AAalayhi ommatan mina alnnasi yasqoona wawajada min doonihimu imraatayni tathoodani qala ma khatbukuma qalata la nasqee hatta yusdira alrriAAao waaboona shaykhun kabeerun
locale.translation: And when he came to the well of Madyan, he found there a crowd of people watering [their flocks], and he found aside from them two women driving back [their flocks]. He said, "What is your circumstance?" They said, "We do not water until the shepherds dispatch [their flocks]; and our father is an old man

locale.transliteration: Fasaqa lahuma thumma tawalla ila alththilli faqala rabbi innee lima anzalta ilayya min khayrin faqeerun
locale.translation: So he watered [their flocks] for them; then he went back to the shade and said, "My Lord, indeed I am, for whatever good You would send down to me, in need

locale.transliteration: Fajaathu ihdahuma tamshee AAala istihyain qalat inna abee yadAAooka liyajziyaka ajra ma saqayta lana falamma jaahu waqassa AAalayhi alqasasa qala la takhaf najawta mina alqawmi alththalimeena
locale.translation: Then one of the two women came to him walking with shyness. She said, "Indeed, my father invites you that he may reward you for having watered for us." So when he came to him and related to him the story, he said, "Fear not. You have escaped from the wrongdoing people

locale.transliteration: Qalat ihdahuma ya abati istajirhu inna khayra mani istajarta alqawiyyu alameenu
locale.translation: One of the women said, "O my father, hire him. Indeed, the best one you can hire is the strong and the trustworthy

locale.transliteration: Qala innee oreedu an onkihaka ihda ibnatayya hatayni AAala an tajuranee thamaniya hijajin fain atmamta AAashran famin AAindika wama oreedu an ashuqqa AAalayka satajidunee in shaa Allahu mina alssaliheena
locale.translation: He said, "Indeed, I wish to wed you one of these, my two daughters, on [the condition] that you serve me for eight years; but if you complete ten, it will be [as a favor] from you. And I do not wish to put you in difficulty. You will find me, if Allah wills, from among the righteous

locale.transliteration: Qala thalika baynee wabaynaka ayyama alajalayni qadaytu fala AAudwana AAalayya waAllahu AAala ma naqoolu wakeelun
locale.translation: [Moses] said, "That is [established] between me and you. Whichever of the two terms I complete - there is no injustice to me, and Allah, over what we say, is Witness

locale.transliteration: Falamma qada moosaalajala wasara biahlihi anasa min janibi alttoori naran qala liahlihi omkuthoo innee anastu naran laAAallee ateekum minha bikhabarin aw jathwatin mina alnnari laAAallakum tastaloona
locale.translation: And when Moses had completed the term and was traveling with his family, he perceived from the direction of the mount a fire. He said to his family, "Stay here; indeed, I have perceived a fire. Perhaps I will bring you from there [some] information or burning wood from the fire that you may warm yourselves

locale.transliteration: Falamma ataha noodiya min shatii alwadi alaymani fee albuqAAati almubarakati mina alshshajarati an ya moosa innee ana Allahu rabbu alAAalameena
locale.translation: But when he came to it, he was called from the right side of the valley in a blessed spot - from the tree, "O Moses, indeed I am Allah, Lord of the worlds

locale.transliteration: Waan alqi AAasaka falamma raaha tahtazzu kaannaha jannun walla mudbiran walam yuAAaqqib ya moosa aqbil wala takhaf innaka mina alamineena
locale.translation: And [he was told], "Throw down your staff." But when he saw it writhing as if it was a snake, he turned in flight and did not return. [Allah said], "O Moses, approach and fear not. Indeed, you are of the secure

locale.transliteration: Osluk yadaka fee jaybika takhruj baydaa min ghayri sooin waodmum ilayka janahaka mina alrrahbi fathanika burhanani min rabbika ila firAAawna wamalaihi innahum kanoo qawman fasiqeena
locale.translation: Insert your hand into the opening of your garment; it will come out white, without disease. And draw in your arm close to you [as prevention] from fear, for those are two proofs from your Lord to Pharaoh and his establishment. Indeed, they have been a people defiantly disobedient

locale.transliteration: Qala rabbi innee qataltu minhum nafsan faakhafu an yaqtulooni
locale.translation: He said, "My Lord, indeed, I killed from among them someone, and I fear they will kill me

locale.transliteration: Waakhee haroonu huwa afsahu minnee lisanan faarsilhu maAAiya ridan yusaddiqunee innee akhafu an yukaththibooni
locale.translation: And my brother Aaron is more fluent than me in tongue, so send him with me as support, verifying me. Indeed, I fear that they will deny me

locale.transliteration: Qala sanashuddu AAadudaka biakheeka wanajAAalu lakuma sultanan fala yasiloona ilaykuma biayatina antuma wamani ittabaAAakuma alghaliboona
locale.translation: [Allah] said, "We will strengthen your arm through your brother and grant you both supremacy so they will not reach you. [It will be] through Our signs; you and those who follow you will be the predominant

locale.transliteration: Falamma jaahum moosa biayatina bayyinatin qaloo ma hatha illa sihrun muftaran wama samiAAna bihatha fee abaina alawwaleena
locale.translation: But when Moses came to them with Our signs as clear evidences, they said, "This is not except invented magic, and we have not heard of this [religion] among our forefathers

locale.transliteration: Waqala moosa rabbee aAAlamu biman jaa bialhuda min AAindihi waman takoonu lahu AAaqibatu alddari innahu la yuflihu alththalimoona
locale.translation: And Moses said, "My Lord is more knowing [than we or you] of who has come with guidance from Him and to whom will be succession in the home. Indeed, wrongdoers do not succeed

locale.transliteration: Waqala firAAawnu ya ayyuha almalao ma AAalimtu lakum min ilahin ghayree faawqid lee ya hamanu AAala altteeni faijAAal lee sarhan laAAallee attaliAAu ila ilahi moosa wainnee laathunnuhu mina alkathibeena
locale.translation: And Pharaoh said, "O eminent ones, I have not known you to have a god other than me. Then ignite for me, O Haman, [a fire] upon the clay and make for me a tower that I may look at the God of Moses. And indeed, I do think he is among the liars

locale.transliteration: Waistakbara huwa wajunooduhu fee alardi bighayri alhaqqi wathannoo annahum ilayna la yurjaAAoona
locale.translation: And he was arrogant, he and his soldiers, in the land, without right, and they thought that they would not be returned to Us

locale.transliteration: Faakhathnahu wajunoodahu fanabathnahum fee alyammi faonthur kayfa kana AAaqibatu alththalimeena
locale.translation: So We took him and his soldiers and threw them into the sea. So see how was the end of the wrongdoers

locale.transliteration: WajaAAalnahum aimmatan yadAAoona ila alnnari wayawma alqiyamati la yunsaroona
locale.translation: And We made them leaders inviting to the Fire, and on the Day of Resurrection they will not be helped

locale.transliteration: WaatbaAAnahum fee hathihi alddunya laAAnatan wayawma alqiyamati hum mina almaqbooheena
locale.translation: And We caused to overtake them in this world a curse, and on the Day of Resurrection they will be of the despised

locale.transliteration: Walaqad atayna moosa alkitaba min baAAdi ma ahlakna alquroona aloola basaira lilnnasi wahudan warahmatan laAAallahum yatathakkaroona
locale.translation: And We gave Moses the Scripture, after We had destroyed the former generations, as enlightenment for the people and guidance and mercy that they might be reminded

locale.transliteration: Wama kunta bijanibi algharbiyyi ith qadayna ila moosa alamra wama kunta mina alshshahideena
locale.translation: And you, [O Muhammad], were not on the western side [of the mount] when We revealed to Moses the command, and you were not among the witnesses [to that]

locale.transliteration: Walakinna anshana quroonan fatatawala AAalayhimu alAAumuru wama kunta thawiyan fee ahli madyana tatloo AAalayhim ayatina walakinna kunna mursileena
locale.translation: But We produced [many] generations [after Moses], and prolonged was their duration. And you were not a resident among the people of Madyan, reciting to them Our verses, but We were senders [of this message]

locale.transliteration: Wama kunta bijanibi alttoori ith nadayna walakin rahmatan min rabbika litunthira qawman ma atahum min natheerin min qablika laAAallahum yatathakkaroona
locale.translation: And you were not at the side of the mount when We called [Moses] but [were sent] as a mercy from your Lord to warn a people to whom no warner had come before you that they might be reminded

locale.transliteration: Walawla an tuseebahum museebatun bima qaddamat aydeehim fayaqooloo rabbana lawla arsalta ilayna rasoolan fanattabiAAa ayatika wanakoona mina almumineena
locale.translation: And if not that a disaster should strike them for what their hands put forth [of sins] and they would say, "Our Lord, why did You not send us a messenger so we could have followed Your verses and been among the believers

locale.transliteration: Falamma jaahumu alhaqqu min AAindina qaloo lawla ootiya mithla ma ootiya moosa awalam yakfuroo bima ootiya moosa min qablu qaloo sihrani tathahara waqaloo inna bikullin kafiroona
locale.translation: But when the truth came to them from Us, they said, "Why was he not given like that which was given to Moses?" Did they not disbelieve in that which was given to Moses before? They said, "[They are but] two works of magic supporting each other, and indeed we are, in both, disbelievers

locale.transliteration: Qul fatoo bikitabin min AAindi Allahi huwa ahda minhuma attabiAAhu in kuntum sadiqeena
locale.translation: Say, "Then bring a scripture from Allah which is more guiding than either of them that I may follow it, if you should be truthful

locale.transliteration: Fain lam yastajeeboo laka faiAAlam annama yattabiAAoona ahwaahum waman adallu mimmani ittabaAAa hawahu bighayri hudan mina Allahi inna Allaha la yahdee alqawma alththalimeena
locale.translation: But if they do not respond to you - then know that they only follow their [own] desires. And who is more astray than one who follows his desire without guidance from Allah? Indeed, Allah does not guide the wrongdoing people

locale.transliteration: Walaqad wassalna lahumu alqawla laAAallahum yatathakkaroona
locale.translation: And We have [repeatedly] conveyed to them the Qur'an that they might be reminded

locale.transliteration: Allatheena ataynahumu alkitaba min qablihi hum bihi yuminoona
locale.translation: Those to whom We gave the Scripture before it - they are believers in it

locale.transliteration: Waitha yutla AAalayhim qaloo amanna bihi innahu alhaqqu min rabbina inna kunna min qablihi muslimeena
locale.translation: And when it is recited to them, they say, "We have believed in it; indeed, it is the truth from our Lord. Indeed we were, [even] before it, Muslims [submitting to Allah]

locale.transliteration: Olaika yutawna ajrahum marratayni bima sabaroo wayadraoona bialhasanati alssayyiata wamimma razaqnahum yunfiqoona
locale.translation: Those will be given their reward twice for what they patiently endured and [because] they avert evil through good, and from what We have provided them they spend

locale.transliteration: Waitha samiAAoo allaghwa aAAradoo AAanhu waqaloo lana aAAmaluna walakum aAAmalukum salamun AAalaykum la nabtaghee aljahileena
locale.translation: And when they hear ill speech, they turn away from it and say, "For us are our deeds, and for you are your deeds. Peace will be upon you; we seek not the ignorant

locale.transliteration: Innaka la tahdee man ahbabta walakinna Allaha yahdee man yashao wahuwa aAAlamu bialmuhtadeena
locale.translation: Indeed, [O Muhammad], you do not guide whom you like, but Allah guides whom He wills. And He is most knowing of the [rightly] guided

locale.transliteration: Waqaloo in nattabiAAi alhuda maAAaka nutakhattaf min ardina awalam numakkin lahum haraman aminan yujba ilayhi thamaratu kulli shayin rizqan min ladunna walakinna aktharahum la yaAAlamoona
locale.translation: And they say, "If we were to follow the guidance with you, we would be swept from our land." Have we not established for them a safe sanctuary to which are brought the fruits of all things as provision from Us? But most of them do not know

locale.transliteration: Wakam ahlakna min qaryatin batirat maAAeeshataha fatilka masakinuhum lam tuskan min baAAdihim illa qaleelan wakunna nahnu alwaritheena
locale.translation: And how many a city have We destroyed that was insolent in its [way of] living, and those are their dwellings which have not been inhabited after them except briefly. And it is We who were the inheritors

locale.transliteration: Wama kana rabbuka muhlika alqura hatta yabAAatha fee ommiha rasoolan yatloo AAalayhim ayatina wama kunna muhlikee alqura illa waahluha thalimoona
locale.translation: And never would your Lord have destroyed the cities until He had sent to their mother a messenger reciting to them Our verses. And We would not destroy the cities except while their people were wrongdoers

locale.transliteration: Wama ooteetum min shayin famataAAu alhayati alddunya wazeenatuha wama AAinda Allahi khayrun waabqa afala taAAqiloona
locale.translation: And whatever thing you [people] have been given - it is [only for] the enjoyment of worldly life and its adornment. And what is with Allah is better and more lasting; so will you not use reason

locale.transliteration: Afaman waAAadnahu waAAdan hasanan fahuwa laqeehi kaman mattaAAnahu mataAAa alhayati alddunya thumma huwa yawma alqiyamati mina almuhdareena
locale.translation: Then is he whom We have promised a good promise which he will obtain like he for whom We provided enjoyment of worldly life [but] then he is, on the Day of Resurrection, among those presented [for punishment in Hell]

locale.transliteration: Wayawma yunadeehim fayaqoolu ayna shurakaiya allatheena kuntum tazAAumoona
locale.translation: And [warn of] the Day He will call them and say, "Where are My 'partners' which you used to claim

locale.transliteration: Qala allatheena haqqa AAalayhimu alqawlu rabbana haolai allatheena aghwayna aghwaynahum kama ghawayna tabarrana ilayka ma kanoo iyyana yaAAbudoona
locale.translation: Those upon whom the word will have come into effect will say, "Our Lord, these are the ones we led to error. We led them to error just as we were in error. We declare our disassociation [from them] to You. They did not used to worship us

locale.transliteration: Waqeela odAAoo shurakaakum fadaAAawhum falam yastajeeboo lahum waraawoo alAAathaba law annahum kanoo yahtadoona
locale.translation: And it will be said, "Invoke your 'partners' " and they will invoke them; but they will not respond to them, and they will see the punishment. If only they had followed guidance

locale.transliteration: Wayawma yunadeehim fayaqoolu matha ajabtumu almursaleena
locale.translation: And [mention] the Day He will call them and say, "What did you answer the messengers

locale.transliteration: FaAAamiyat AAalayhimu alanbao yawmaithin fahum la yatasaaloona
locale.translation: But the information will be unapparent to them that Day, so they will not [be able to] ask one another

locale.transliteration: Faamma man taba waamana waAAamila salihan faAAasa an yakoona mina almufliheena
locale.translation: But as for one who had repented, believed, and done righteousness, it is promised by Allah that he will be among the successful

locale.transliteration: Warabbuka yakhluqu ma yashao wayakhtaru ma kana lahumu alkhiyaratu subhana Allahi wataAAala AAamma yushrikoona
locale.translation: And your Lord creates what He wills and chooses; not for them was the choice. Exalted is Allah and high above what they associate with Him

locale.transliteration: Warabbuka yaAAlamu ma tukinnu sudooruhum wama yuAAlinoona
locale.translation: And your Lord knows what their breasts conceal and what they declare

locale.transliteration: Wahuwa Allahu la ilaha illa huwa lahu alhamdu fee aloola waalakhirati walahu alhukmu wailayhi turjaAAoona
locale.translation: And He is Allah; there is no deity except Him. To Him is [due all] praise in the first [life] and the Hereafter. And His is the [final] decision, and to Him you will be returned

locale.transliteration: Qul araaytum in jaAAala Allahu AAalaykumu allayla sarmadan ila yawmi alqiyamati man ilahun ghayru Allahi yateekum bidiyain afala tasmaAAoona
locale.translation: Say, "Have you considered: if Allah should make for you the night continuous until the Day of Resurrection, what deity other than Allah could bring you light? Then will you not hear

locale.transliteration: Qul araaytum in jaAAala Allahu AAalaykumu alnnahara sarmadan ila yawmi alqiyamati man ilahun ghayru Allahi yateekum bilaylin taskunoona feehi afala tubsiroona
locale.translation: Say, "Have you considered: if Allah should make for you the day continuous until the Day of Resurrection, what deity other than Allah could bring you a night in which you may rest? Then will you not see

locale.transliteration: Wamin rahmatihi jaAAala lakumu allayla waalnnahara litaskunoo feehi walitabtaghoo min fadlihi walaAAallakum tashkuroona
locale.translation: And out of His mercy He made for you the night and the day that you may rest therein and [by day] seek from His bounty and [that] perhaps you will be grateful

locale.transliteration: Wayawma yunadeehim fayaqoolu ayna shurakaiya allatheena kuntum tazAAumoona
locale.translation: And [warn of] the Day He will call them and say, "Where are my 'partners' which you used to claim

locale.transliteration: WanazaAAna min kulli ommatin shaheedan faqulna hatoo burhanakum faAAalimoo anna alhaqqa lillahi wadalla AAanhum ma kanoo yaftaroona
locale.translation: And We will extract from every nation a witness and say, "Produce your proof," and they will know that the truth belongs to Allah, and lost from them is that which they used to invent

locale.transliteration: Inna qaroona kana min qawmi moosa fabagha AAalayhim waataynahu mina alkunoozi ma inna mafatihahu latanooo bialAAusbati olee alquwwati ith qala lahu qawmuhu la tafrah inna Allaha la yuhibbu alfariheena
locale.translation: Indeed, Qarun was from the people of Moses, but he tyrannized them. And We gave him of treasures whose keys would burden a band of strong men; thereupon his people said to him, "Do not exult. Indeed, Allah does not like the exultant

locale.transliteration: Waibtaghi feema ataka Allahu alddara alakhirata wala tansa naseebaka mina alddunya waahsin kama ahsana Allahu ilayka wala tabghi alfasada fee alardi inna Allaha la yuhibbu almufsideena
locale.translation: But seek, through that which Allah has given you, the home of the Hereafter; and [yet], do not forget your share of the world. And do good as Allah has done good to you. And desire not corruption in the land. Indeed, Allah does not like corrupters

locale.transliteration: Qala innama ooteetuhu AAala AAilmin AAindee awalam yaAAlam anna Allaha qad ahlaka min qablihi mina alqurooni man huwa ashaddu minhu quwwatan waaktharu jamAAan wala yusalu AAan thunoobihimu almujrimoona
locale.translation: He said, "I was only given it because of knowledge I have." Did he not know that Allah had destroyed before him of generations those who were greater than him in power and greater in accumulation [of wealth]? But the criminals, about their sins, will not be asked

locale.transliteration: Fakharaja AAala qawmihi fee zeenatihi qala allatheena yureedoona alhayata alddunya ya layta lana mithla ma ootiya qaroonu innahu lathoo haththin AAatheemin
locale.translation: So he came out before his people in his adornment. Those who desired the worldly life said, "Oh, would that we had like what was given to Qarun. Indeed, he is one of great fortune

locale.transliteration: Waqala allatheena ootoo alAAilma waylakum thawabu Allahi khayrun liman amana waAAamila salihan wala yulaqqaha illa alssabiroona
locale.translation: But those who had been given knowledge said, "Woe to you! The reward of Allah is better for he who believes and does righteousness. And none are granted it except the patient

locale.transliteration: Fakhasafna bihi wabidarihi alarda fama kana lahu min fiatin yansuroonahu min dooni Allahi wama kana mina almuntasireena
locale.translation: And We caused the earth to swallow him and his home. And there was for him no company to aid him other than Allah, nor was he of those who [could] defend themselves

locale.transliteration: Waasbaha allatheena tamannaw makanahu bialamsi yaqooloona waykaanna Allaha yabsutu alrrizqa liman yashao min AAibadihi wayaqdiru lawla an manna Allahu AAalayna lakhasafa bina waykaannahu la yuflihu alkafiroona
locale.translation: And those who had wished for his position the previous day began to say, "Oh, how Allah extends provision to whom He wills of His servants and restricts it! If not that Allah had conferred favor on us, He would have caused it to swallow us. Oh, how the disbelievers do not succeed

locale.transliteration: Tilka alddaru alakhiratu najAAaluha lillatheena la yureedoona AAuluwwan fee alardi wala fasadan waalAAaqibatu lilmuttaqeena
locale.translation: That home of the Hereafter We assign to those who do not desire exaltedness upon the earth or corruption. And the [best] outcome is for the righteous

locale.transliteration: Man jaa bialhasanati falahu khayrun minha waman jaa bialssayyiati fala yujza allatheena AAamiloo alssayyiati illa ma kanoo yaAAmaloona
locale.translation: Whoever comes [on the Day of Judgement] with a good deed will have better than it; and whoever comes with an evil deed - then those who did evil deeds will not be recompensed except [as much as] what they used to do

locale.transliteration: Inna allathee farada AAalayka alqurana laradduka ila maAAadin qul rabbee aAAlamu man jaa bialhuda waman huwa fee dalalin mubeenin
locale.translation: Indeed, [O Muhammad], He who imposed upon you the Qur'an will take you back to a place of return. Say, "My Lord is most knowing of who brings guidance and who is in clear error

locale.transliteration: Wama kunta tarjoo an yulqa ilayka alkitabu illa rahmatan min rabbika fala takoonanna thaheeran lilkafireena
locale.translation: And you were not expecting that the Book would be conveyed to you, but [it is] a mercy from your Lord. So do not be an assistant to the disbelievers

locale.transliteration: Wala yasuddunnaka AAan ayati Allahi baAAda ith onzilat ilayka waodAAu ila rabbika wala takoonanna mina almushrikeena
locale.translation: And never let them avert you from the verses of Allah after they have been revealed to you. And invite [people] to your Lord. And never be of those who associate others with Allah

locale.transliteration: Wala tadAAu maAAa Allahi ilahan akhara la ilaha illa huwa kullu shayin halikun illa wajhahu lahu alhukmu wailayhi turjaAAoona
locale.translation: And do not invoke with Allah another deity. There is no deity except Him. Everything will be destroyed except His Face. His is the judgement, and to Him you will be returned

locale.transliteration: Al-'Ankabut
locale.translation: The Spider

locale.transliteration: Aliflammeem
locale.translation: Alif, Lam, Meem

locale.transliteration: Ahasiba alnnasu an yutrakoo an yaqooloo amanna wahum la yuftanoona
locale.translation: Do the people think that they will be left to say, "We believe" and they will not be tried

locale.transliteration: Walaqad fatanna allatheena min qablihim falayaAAlamanna Allahu allatheena sadaqoo walayaAAlamanna alkathibeena
locale.translation: But We have certainly tried those before them, and Allah will surely make evident those who are truthful, and He will surely make evident the liars

locale.transliteration: Am hasiba allatheena yaAAmaloona alssayyiati an yasbiqoona saa ma yahkumoona
locale.translation: Or do those who do evil deeds think they can outrun Us? Evil is what they judge

locale.transliteration: Man kana yarjoo liqaa Allahi fainna ajala Allahi laatin wahuwa alssameeAAu alAAaleemu
locale.translation: Whoever should hope for the meeting with Allah - indeed, the term decreed by Allah is coming. And He is the Hearing, the Knowing

locale.transliteration: Waman jahada fainnama yujahidu linafsihi inna Allaha laghaniyyun AAani alAAalameena
locale.translation: And whoever strives only strives for [the benefit of] himself. Indeed, Allah is free from need of the worlds

locale.transliteration: Waallatheena amanoo waAAamiloo alssalihati lanukaffiranna AAanhum sayyiatihim walanajziyannahum ahsana allathee kanoo yaAAmaloona
locale.translation: And those who believe and do righteous deeds - We will surely remove from them their misdeeds and will surely reward them according to the best of what they used to do

locale.transliteration: Wawassayna alinsana biwalidayhi husnan wain jahadaka litushrika bee ma laysa laka bihi AAilmun fala tutiAAhuma ilayya marjiAAukum faonabbiokum bima kuntum taAAmaloona
locale.translation: And We have enjoined upon man goodness to parents. But if they endeavor to make you associate with Me that of which you have no knowledge, do not obey them. To Me is your return, and I will inform you about what you used to do

locale.transliteration: Waallatheena amanoo waAAamiloo alssalihati lanudkhilannahum fee alssaliheena
locale.translation: And those who believe and do righteous deeds - We will surely admit them among the righteous [into Paradise]

locale.transliteration: Wamina alnnasi man yaqoolu amanna biAllahi faitha oothiya fee Allahi jaAAala fitnata alnnasi kaAAathabi Allahi walain jaa nasrun min rabbika layaqoolunna inna kunna maAAakum awalaysa Allahu biaAAlama bima fee sudoori alAAalameena
locale.translation: And of the people are some who say, "We believe in Allah," but when one [of them] is harmed for [the cause of] Allah, they consider the trial of the people as [if it were] the punishment of Allah. But if victory comes from your Lord, they say, "Indeed, We were with you." Is not Allah most knowing of what is within the breasts of all creatures

locale.transliteration: WalayaAAlamanna Allahu allatheena amanoo walayaAAlamanna almunafiqeena
locale.translation: And Allah will surely make evident those who believe, and He will surely make evident the hypocrites

locale.transliteration: Waqala allatheena kafaroo lillatheena amanoo ittabiAAoo sabeelana walnahmil khatayakum wama hum bihamileena min khatayahum min shayin innahum lakathiboona
locale.translation: And those who disbelieve say to those who believe, "Follow our way, and we will carry your sins." But they will not carry anything of their sins. Indeed, they are liars

locale.transliteration: Walayahmilunna athqalahum waathqalan maAAa athqalihim walayusalunna yawma alqiyamati AAamma kanoo yaftaroona
locale.translation: But they will surely carry their [own] burdens and [other] burdens along with their burdens, and they will surely be questioned on the Day of Resurrection about what they used to invent

locale.transliteration: Walaqad arsalna noohan ila qawmihi falabitha feehim alfa sanatin illa khamseena AAaman faakhathahumu alttoofanu wahum thalimoona
locale.translation: And We certainly sent Noah to his people, and he remained among them a thousand years minus fifty years, and the flood seized them while they were wrongdoers

locale.transliteration: Faanjaynahu waashaba alssafeenati wajaAAalnaha ayatan lilAAalameena
locale.translation: But We saved him and the companions of the ship, and We made it a sign for the worlds

locale.transliteration: Waibraheema ith qala liqawmihi oAAbudoo Allaha waittaqoohu thalikum khayrun lakum in kuntum taAAlamoona
locale.translation: And [We sent] Abraham, when he said to his people, "Worship Allah and fear Him. That is best for you, if you should know

locale.transliteration: Innama taAAbudoona min dooni Allahi awthanan watakhluqoona ifkan inna allatheena taAAbudoona min dooni Allahi la yamlikoona lakum rizqan faibtaghoo AAinda Allahi alrrizqa waoAAbudoohu waoshkuroo lahu ilayhi turjaAAoona
locale.translation: You only worship, besides Allah, idols, and you produce a falsehood. Indeed, those you worship besides Allah do not possess for you [the power of] provision. So seek from Allah provision and worship Him and be grateful to Him. To Him you will be returned

locale.transliteration: Wain tukaththiboo faqad kaththaba omamun min qablikum wama AAala alrrasooli illa albalaghu almubeenu
locale.translation: And if you [people] deny [the message] - already nations before you have denied. And there is not upon the Messenger except [the duty of] clear notification

locale.transliteration: Awalam yaraw kayfa yubdio Allahu alkhalqa thumma yuAAeeduhu inna thalika AAala Allahi yaseerun
locale.translation: Have they not considered how Allah begins creation and then repeats it? Indeed that, for Allah, is easy

locale.transliteration: Qul seeroo fee alardi faonthuroo kayfa badaa alkhalqa thumma Allahu yunshio alnnashata alakhirata inna Allaha AAala kulli shayin qadeerun
locale.translation: Say, [O Muhammad], "Travel through the land and observe how He began creation. Then Allah will produce the final creation. Indeed Allah, over all things, is competent

locale.transliteration: YuAAaththibu man yashao wayarhamu man yashao wailayhi tuqlaboona
locale.translation: He punishes whom He wills and has mercy upon whom He wills, and to Him you will be returned

locale.transliteration: Wama antum bimuAAjizeena fee alardi wala fee alssamai wama lakum min dooni Allahi min waliyyin wala naseerin
locale.translation: And you will not cause failure [to Allah] upon the earth or in the heaven. And you have not other than Allah any protector or any helper

locale.transliteration: Waallatheena kafaroo biayati Allahi waliqaihi olaika yaisoo min rahmatee waolaika lahum AAathabun aleemun
locale.translation: And the ones who disbelieve in the signs of Allah and the meeting with Him - those have despaired of My mercy, and they will have a painful punishment

locale.transliteration: Fama kana jawaba qawmihi illa an qaloo oqtuloohu aw harriqoohu faanjahu Allahu mina alnnari inna fee thalika laayatin liqawmin yuminoona
locale.translation: And the answer of Abraham's people was not but that they said, "Kill him or burn him," but Allah saved him from the fire. Indeed in that are signs for a people who believe

locale.transliteration: Waqala innama ittakhathtum min dooni Allahi awthanan mawaddata baynikum fee alhayati alddunya thumma yawma alqiyamati yakfuru baAAdukum bibaAAdin wayalAAanu baAAdukum baAAdan wamawakumu alnnaru wama lakum min nasireena
locale.translation: And [Abraham] said, "You have only taken, other than Allah, idols as [a bond of] affection among you in worldly life. Then on the Day of Resurrection you will deny one another and curse one another, and your refuge will be the Fire, and you will not have any helpers

locale.transliteration: Faamana lahu lootun waqala innee muhajirun ila rabbee innahu huwa alAAazeezu alhakeemu
locale.translation: And Lot believed him. [Abraham] said, "Indeed, I will emigrate to [the service of] my Lord. Indeed, He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise

locale.transliteration: Wawahabna lahu ishaqa wayaAAqooba wajaAAalna fee thurriyyatihi alnnubuwwata waalkitaba waataynahu ajrahu fee alddunya wainnahu fee alakhirati lamina alssaliheena
locale.translation: And We gave to Him Isaac and Jacob and placed in his descendants prophethood and scripture. And We gave him his reward in this world, and indeed, he is in the Hereafter among the righteous

locale.transliteration: Walootan ith qala liqawmihi innakum latatoona alfahishata ma sabaqakum biha min ahadin mina alAAalameena
locale.translation: And [mention] Lot, when he said to his people, "Indeed, you commit such immorality as no one has preceded you with from among the worlds

locale.transliteration: Ainnakum latatoona alrrijala wataqtaAAoona alssabeela watatoona fee nadeekumu almunkara fama kana jawaba qawmihi illa an qaloo itina biAAathabi Allahi in kunta mina alssadiqeena
locale.translation: Indeed, you approach men and obstruct the road and commit in your meetings [every] evil." And the answer of his people was not but they said, "Bring us the punishment of Allah, if you should be of the truthful

locale.transliteration: Qala rabbi onsurnee AAala alqawmi almufsideena
locale.translation: He said, "My Lord, support me against the corrupting people

locale.transliteration: Walamma jaat rusuluna ibraheema bialbushra qaloo inna muhlikoo ahli hathihi alqaryati inna ahlaha kanoo thalimeena
locale.translation: And when Our messengers came to Abraham with the good tidings, they said, "Indeed, we will destroy the people of that Lot's city. Indeed, its people have been wrongdoers

locale.transliteration: Qala inna feeha lootan qaloo nahnu aAAlamu biman feeha lanunajjiyannahu waahlahu illa imraatahu kanat mina alghabireena
locale.translation: [Abraham] said, "Indeed, within it is Lot." They said, "We are more knowing of who is within it. We will surely save him and his family, except his wife. She is to be of those who remain behind

locale.transliteration: Walamma an jaat rusuluna lootan seea bihim wadaqa bihim tharAAan waqaloo la takhaf wala tahzan inna munajjooka waahlaka illa imraataka kanat mina alghabireena
locale.translation: And when Our messengers came to Lot, he was distressed for them and felt for them great discomfort. They said, "Fear not, nor grieve. Indeed, we will save you and your family, except your wife; she is to be of those who remain behind

locale.transliteration: Inna munziloona AAala ahli hathihi alqaryati rijzan mina alssamai bima kanoo yafsuqoona
locale.translation: Indeed, we will bring down on the people of this city punishment from the sky because they have been defiantly disobedient

locale.transliteration: Walaqad tarakna minha ayatan bayyinatan liqawmin yaAAqiloona
locale.translation: And We have certainly left of it a sign as clear evidence for a people who use reason

locale.transliteration: Waila madyana akhahum shuAAayban faqala ya qawmi oAAbudoo Allaha waorjoo alyawma alakhira wala taAAthaw fee alardi mufsideena
locale.translation: And to Madyan [We sent] their brother Shu'ayb, and he said, "O my people, worship Allah and expect the Last Day and do not commit abuse on the earth, spreading corruption

locale.transliteration: Fakaththaboohu faakhathathumu alrrajfatu faasbahoo fee darihim jathimeena
locale.translation: But they denied him, so the earthquake seized them, and they became within their home [corpses] fallen prone

locale.transliteration: WaAAadan wathamooda waqad tabayyana lakum min masakinihim wazayyana lahumu alshshaytanu aAAmalahum fasaddahum AAani alssabeeli wakanoo mustabsireena
locale.translation: And [We destroyed] 'Aad and Thamud, and it has become clear to you from their [ruined] dwellings. And Satan had made pleasing to them their deeds and averted them from the path, and they were endowed with perception

locale.transliteration: Waqaroona wafirAAawna wahamana walaqad jaahum moosa bialbayyinati faistakbaroo fee alardi wama kanoo sabiqeena
locale.translation: And [We destroyed] Qarun and Pharaoh and Haman. And Moses had already come to them with clear evidences, and they were arrogant in the land, but they were not outrunners [of Our punishment]

locale.transliteration: Fakullan akhathna bithanbihi faminhum man arsalna AAalayhi hasiban waminhum man akhathathu alssayhatu waminhum man khasafna bihi alarda waminhum man aghraqna wama kana Allahu liyathlimahum walakin kanoo anfusahum yathlimoona
locale.translation: So each We seized for his sin; and among them were those upon whom We sent a storm of stones, and among them were those who were seized by the blast [from the sky], and among them were those whom We caused the earth to swallow, and among them were those whom We drowned. And Allah would not have wronged them, but it was they who were wronging themselves

locale.transliteration: Mathalu allatheena ittakhathoo min dooni Allahi awliyaa kamathali alAAankabooti ittakhathat baytan wainna awhana albuyooti labaytu alAAankabooti law kanoo yaAAlamoona
locale.translation: The example of those who take allies other than Allah is like that of the spider who takes a home. And indeed, the weakest of homes is the home of the spider, if they only knew

locale.transliteration: Inna Allaha yaAAlamu ma yadAAoona min doonihi min shayin wahuwa alAAazeezu alhakeemu
locale.translation: Indeed, Allah knows whatever thing they call upon other than Him. And He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise

locale.transliteration: Watilka alamthalu nadribuha lilnnasi wama yaAAqiluha illa alAAalimoona
locale.translation: And these examples We present to the people, but none will understand them except those of knowledge

locale.transliteration: Khalaqa Allahu alssamawati waalarda bialhaqqi inna fee thalika laayatan lilmumineena
locale.translation: Allah created the heavens and the earth in truth. Indeed in that is a sign for the believers

locale.transliteration: Otlu ma oohiya ilayka mina alkitabi waaqimi alssalata inna alssalata tanha AAani alfahshai waalmunkari walathikru Allahi akbaru waAllahu yaAAlamu ma tasnaAAoona
locale.translation: Recite, [O Muhammad], what has been revealed to you of the Book and establish prayer. Indeed, prayer prohibits immorality and wrongdoing, and the remembrance of Allah is greater. And Allah knows that which you do

locale.transliteration: Wala tujadiloo ahla alkitabi illa biallatee hiya ahsanu illa allatheena thalamoo minhum waqooloo amanna biallathee onzila ilayna waonzila ilaykum wailahuna wailahukum wahidun wanahnu lahu muslimoona
locale.translation: And do not argue with the People of the Scripture except in a way that is best, except for those who commit injustice among them, and say, "We believe in that which has been revealed to us and revealed to you. And our God and your God is one; and we are Muslims [in submission] to Him

locale.transliteration: Wakathalika anzalna ilayka alkitaba faallatheena ataynahumu alkitaba yuminoona bihi wamin haolai man yuminu bihi wama yajhadu biayatina illa alkafiroona
locale.translation: And thus We have sent down to you the Qur'an. And those to whom We [previously] gave the Scripture believe in it. And among these [people of Makkah] are those who believe in it. And none reject Our verses except the disbelievers

locale.transliteration: Wama kunta tatloo min qablihi min kitabin wala takhuttuhu biyameenika ithan lairtaba almubtiloona
locale.translation: And you did not recite before it any scripture, nor did you inscribe one with your right hand. Otherwise the falsifiers would have had [cause for] doubt

locale.transliteration: Bal huwa ayatun bayyinatun fee sudoori allatheena ootoo alAAilma wama yajhadu biayatina illa alththalimoona
locale.translation: Rather, the Qur'an is distinct verses [preserved] within the breasts of those who have been given knowledge. And none reject Our verses except the wrongdoers

locale.transliteration: Waqaloo lawla onzila AAalayhi ayatun min rabbihi qul innama alayatu AAinda Allahi wainnama ana natheerun mubeenun
locale.translation: But they say, "Why are not signs sent down to him from his Lord?" Say, "The signs are only with Allah, and I am only a clear warner

locale.transliteration: Awalam yakfihim anna anzalna AAalayka alkitaba yutla AAalayhim inna fee thalika larahmatan wathikra liqawmin yuminoona
locale.translation: And is it not sufficient for them that We revealed to you the Book which is recited to them? Indeed in that is a mercy and reminder for a people who believe

locale.transliteration: Qul kafa biAllahi baynee wabaynakum shaheedan yaAAlamu ma fee alssamawati waalardi waallatheena amanoo bialbatili wakafaroo biAllahi olaika humu alkhasiroona
locale.translation: Say, "Sufficient is Allah between me and you as Witness. He knows what is in the heavens and earth. And they who have believed in falsehood and disbelieved in Allah - it is those who are the losers

locale.transliteration: WayastaAAjiloonaka bialAAathabi walawla ajalun musamman lajaahumu alAAathabu walayatiyannahum baghtatan wahum la yashAAuroona
locale.translation: And they urge you to hasten the punishment. And if not for [the decree of] a specified term, punishment would have reached them. But it will surely come to them suddenly while they perceive not

locale.transliteration: YastaAAjiloonaka bialAAathabi wainna jahannama lamuheetatun bialkafireena
locale.translation: They urge you to hasten the punishment. And indeed, Hell will be encompassing of the disbelievers

locale.transliteration: Yawma yaghshahumu alAAathabu min fawqihim wamin tahti arjulihim wayaqoolu thooqoo ma kuntum taAAmaloona
locale.translation: On the Day the punishment will cover them from above them and from below their feet and it is said, "Taste [the result of] what you used to do

locale.transliteration: Ya AAibadiya allatheena amanoo inna ardee wasiAAatun faiyyaya faoAAbudooni
locale.translation: O My servants who have believed, indeed My earth is spacious, so worship only Me

locale.transliteration: Kullu nafsin thaiqatu almawti thumma ilayna turjaAAoona
locale.translation: Every soul will taste death. Then to Us will you be returned

locale.transliteration: Waallatheena amanoo waAAamiloo alssalihati lanubawwiannahum mina aljannati ghurafan tajree min tahtiha alanharu khalideena feeha niAAma ajru alAAamileena
locale.translation: And those who have believed and done righteous deeds - We will surely assign to them of Paradise [elevated] chambers beneath which rivers flow, wherein they abide eternally. Excellent is the reward of the [righteous] workers

locale.transliteration: Allatheena sabaroo waAAala rabbihim yatawakkaloona
locale.translation: Who have been patient and upon their Lord rely

locale.transliteration: Wakaayyin min dabbatin la tahmilu rizqaha Allahu yarzuquha waiyyakum wahuwa alssameeAAu alAAaleemu
locale.translation: And how many a creature carries not its [own] provision. Allah provides for it and for you. And He is the Hearing, the Knowing

locale.transliteration: Walain saaltahum man khalaqa alssamawati waalarda wasakhkhara alshshamsa waalqamara layaqoolunna Allahu faanna yufakoona
locale.translation: If you asked them, "Who created the heavens and earth and subjected the sun and the moon?" they would surely say, "Allah." Then how are they deluded

locale.transliteration: Allahu yabsutu alrrizqa liman yashao min AAibadihi wayaqdiru lahu inna Allaha bikulli shayin AAaleemun
locale.translation: Allah extends provision for whom He wills of His servants and restricts for him. Indeed Allah is, of all things, Knowing

locale.transliteration: Walain saaltahum man nazzala mina alssamai maan faahya bihi alarda min baAAdi mawtiha layaqoolunna Allahu quli alhamdu lillahi bal aktharuhum la yaAAqiloona
locale.translation: And if you asked them, "Who sends down rain from the sky and gives life thereby to the earth after its lifelessness?" they would surely say " Allah." Say, "Praise to Allah "; but most of them do not reason

locale.transliteration: Wama hathihi alhayatu alddunya illa lahwun walaAAibun wainna alddara alakhirata lahiya alhayawanu law kanoo yaAAlamoona
locale.translation: And this worldly life is not but diversion and amusement. And indeed, the home of the Hereafter - that is the [eternal] life, if only they knew

locale.transliteration: Faitha rakiboo fee alfulki daAAawoo Allaha mukhliseena lahu alddeena falamma najjahum ila albarri itha hum yushrikoona
locale.translation: And when they board a ship, they supplicate Allah, sincere to Him in religion. But when He delivers them to the land, at once they associate others with Him

locale.transliteration: Liyakfuroo bima ataynahum waliyatamattaAAoo fasawfa yaAAlamoona
locale.translation: So that they will deny what We have granted them, and they will enjoy themselves. But they are going to know

locale.transliteration: Awalam yaraw anna jaAAalna haraman aminan wayutakhattafu alnnasu min hawlihim afabialbatili yuminoona wabiniAAmati Allahi yakfuroona
locale.translation: Have they not seen that We made [Makkah] a safe sanctuary, while people are being taken away all around them? Then in falsehood do they believe, and in the favor of Allah they disbelieve

locale.transliteration: Waman athlamu mimmani iftara AAala Allahi kathiban aw kaththaba bialhaqqi lamma jaahu alaysa fee jahannama mathwan lilkafireena
locale.translation: And who is more unjust than one who invents a lie about Allah or denies the truth when it has come to him? Is there not in Hell a [sufficient] residence for the disbelievers

locale.transliteration: Waallatheena jahadoo feena lanahdiyannahum subulana wainna Allaha lamaAAa almuhsineena
locale.translation: And those who strive for Us - We will surely guide them to Our ways. And indeed, Allah is with the doers of good

locale.transliteration: Ar-Rum
locale.translation: The Romans

locale.transliteration: Aliflammeem
locale.translation: Alif, Lam, Meem

locale.transliteration: Ghulibati alrroomu
locale.translation: The Byzantines have been defeated

locale.transliteration: Fee adna alardi wahum min baAAdi ghalabihim sayaghliboona
locale.translation: In the nearest land. But they, after their defeat, will overcome

locale.transliteration: Fee bidAAi sineena lillahi alamru min qablu wamin baAAdu wayawmaithin yafrahu almuminoona
locale.translation: Within three to nine years. To Allah belongs the command before and after. And that day the believers will rejoice

locale.transliteration: Binasri Allahi yansuru man yashao wahuwa alAAazeezu alrraheemu
locale.translation: In the victory of Allah. He gives victory to whom He wills, and He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful

locale.transliteration: WaAAda Allahi la yukhlifu Allahu waAAdahu walakinna akthara alnnasi la yaAAlamoona
locale.translation: [It is] the promise of Allah. Allah does not fail in His promise, but most of the people do not know

locale.transliteration: YaAAlamoona thahiran mina alhayati alddunya wahum AAani alakhirati hum ghafiloona
locale.translation: They know what is apparent of the worldly life, but they, of the Hereafter, are unaware

locale.transliteration: Awalam yatafakkaroo fee anfusihim ma khalaqa Allahu alssamawati waalarda wama baynahuma illa bialhaqqi waajalin musamman wainna katheeran mina alnnasi biliqai rabbihim lakafiroona
locale.translation: Do they not contemplate within themselves? Allah has not created the heavens and the earth and what is between them except in truth and for a specified term. And indeed, many of the people, in [the matter of] the meeting with their Lord, are disbelievers

locale.transliteration: Awalam yaseeroo fee alardi fayanthuroo kayfa kana AAaqibatu allatheena min qablihim kanoo ashadda minhum quwwatan waatharoo alarda waAAamarooha akthara mimma AAamarooha wajaathum rusuluhum bialbayyinati fama kana Allahu liyathlimahum walakin kanoo anfusahum yathlimoona
locale.translation: Have they not traveled through the earth and observed how was the end of those before them? They were greater than them in power, and they plowed the earth and built it up more than they have built it up, and their messengers came to them with clear evidences. And Allah would not ever have wronged them, but they were wronging themselves

locale.transliteration: Thumma kana AAaqibata allatheena asaoo alssooa an kaththaboo biayati Allahi wakanoo biha yastahzioona
locale.translation: Then the end of those who did evil was the worst [consequence] because they denied the signs of Allah and used to ridicule them

locale.transliteration: Allahu yabdao alkhalqa thumma yuAAeeduhu thumma ilayhi turjaAAoona
locale.translation: Allah begins creation; then He will repeat it; then to Him you will be returned

locale.transliteration: Wayawma taqoomu alssaAAatu yublisu almujrimoona
locale.translation: And the Day the Hour appears the criminals will be in despair

locale.transliteration: Walam yakun lahum min shurakaihim shufaAAao wakanoo bishurakaihim kafireena
locale.translation: And there will not be for them among their [alleged] partners any intercessors, and they will [then] be disbelievers in their partners

locale.transliteration: Wayawma taqoomu alssaAAatu yawmaithin yatafarraqoona
locale.translation: And the Day the Hour appears - that Day they will become separated

locale.transliteration: Faamma allatheena amanoo waAAamiloo alssalihati fahum fee rawdatin yuhbaroona
locale.translation: And as for those who had believed and done righteous deeds, they will be in a garden [of Paradise], delighted

locale.transliteration: Waamma allatheena kafaroo wakaththaboo biayatina waliqai alakhirati faolaika fee alAAathabi muhdaroona
locale.translation: But as for those who disbelieved and denied Our verses and the meeting of the Hereafter, those will be brought into the punishment [to remain]

locale.transliteration: Fasubhana Allahi heena tumsoona waheena tusbihoona
locale.translation: So exalted is Allah when you reach the evening and when you reach the morning
