locale.translation: And if you could see when they are terrified but there is no escape, and they will be seized from a place nearby

locale.transliteration: Waqaloo amanna bihi waanna lahumu alttanawushu min makanin baAAeedin
locale.translation: And they will [then] say, "We believe in it!" But how for them will be the taking [of faith] from a place far away

locale.transliteration: Waqad kafaroo bihi min qablu wayaqthifoona bialghaybi min makanin baAAeedin
locale.translation: And they had already disbelieved in it before and would assault the unseen from a place far away

locale.transliteration: Waheela baynahum wabayna ma yashtahoona kama fuAAila biashyaAAihim min qablu innahum kanoo fee shakkin mureebin
locale.translation: And prevention will be placed between them and what they desire, as was done with their kind before. Indeed, they were in disquieting denial

locale.transliteration: Fatir
locale.translation: Originator

locale.transliteration: Alhamdu lillahi fatiri alssamawati waalardi jaAAili almalaikati rusulan olee ajnihatin mathna wathulatha warubaAAa yazeedu fee alkhalqi ma yashao inna Allaha AAala kulli shayin qadeerun
locale.translation: [All] praise is [due] to Allah, Creator of the heavens and the earth, [who] made the angels messengers having wings, two or three or four. He increases in creation what He wills. Indeed, Allah is over all things competent

locale.transliteration: Ma yaftahi Allahu lilnnasi min rahmatin fala mumsika laha wama yumsik fala mursila lahu min baAAdihi wahuwa alAAazeezu alhakeemu
locale.translation: Whatever Allah grants to people of mercy - none can withhold it; and whatever He withholds - none can release it thereafter. And He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise

locale.transliteration: Ya ayyuha alnnasu othkuroo niAAmata Allahi AAalaykum hal min khaliqin ghayru Allahi yarzuqukum mina alssamai waalardi la ilaha illa huwa faanna tufakoona
locale.translation: O mankind, remember the favor of Allah upon you. Is there any creator other than Allah who provides for you from the heaven and earth? There is no deity except Him, so how are you deluded

locale.transliteration: Wain yukaththibooka faqad kuththibat rusulun min qablika waila Allahi turjaAAu alomooru
locale.translation: And if they deny you, [O Muhammad] - already were messengers denied before you. And to Allah are returned [all] matters

locale.transliteration: Ya ayyuha alnnasu inna waAAda Allahi haqqun fala taghurrannakumu alhayatu alddunya wala yaghurrannakum biAllahi algharooru
locale.translation: O mankind, indeed the promise of Allah is truth, so let not the worldly life delude you and be not deceived about Allah by the Deceiver

locale.transliteration: Inna alshshaytana lakum AAaduwwun faittakhithoohu AAaduwwan innama yadAAoo hizbahu liyakoonoo min ashabi alssaAAeeri
locale.translation: Indeed, Satan is an enemy to you; so take him as an enemy. He only invites his party to be among the companions of the Blaze

locale.transliteration: Allatheena kafaroo lahum AAathabun shadeedun waallatheena amanoo waAAamiloo alssalihati lahum maghfiratun waajrun kabeerun
locale.translation: Those who disbelieve will have a severe punishment, and those who believe and do righteous deeds will have forgiveness and great reward

locale.transliteration: Afaman zuyyina lahu sooo AAamalihi faraahu hasanan fainna Allaha yudillu man yashao wayahdee man yashao fala tathhab nafsuka AAalayhim hasaratin inna Allaha AAaleemun bima yasnaAAoona
locale.translation: Then is one to whom the evil of his deed has been made attractive so he considers it good [like one rightly guided]? For indeed, Allah sends astray whom He wills and guides whom He wills. So do not let yourself perish over them in regret. Indeed, Allah is Knowing of what they do

locale.transliteration: WaAllahu allathee arsala alrriyaha fatutheeru sahaban fasuqnahu ila baladin mayyitin faahyayna bihi alarda baAAda mawtiha kathalika alnnushooru
locale.translation: And it is Allah who sends the winds, and they stir the clouds, and We drive them to a dead land and give life thereby to the earth after its lifelessness. Thus is the resurrection

locale.transliteration: Man kana yureedu alAAizzata falillahi alAAizzatu jameeAAan ilayhi yasAAadu alkalimu alttayyibu waalAAamalu alssalihu yarfaAAuhu waallatheena yamkuroona alssayyiati lahum AAathabun shadeedun wamakru olaika huwa yabooru
locale.translation: Whoever desires honor [through power] - then to Allah belongs all honor. To Him ascends good speech, and righteous work raises it. But they who plot evil deeds will have a severe punishment, and the plotting of those - it will perish

locale.transliteration: WaAllahu khalaqakum min turabin thumma min nutfatin thumma jaAAalakum azwajan wama tahmilu min ontha wala tadaAAu illa biAAilmihi wama yuAAammaru min muAAammarin wala yunqasu min AAumurihi illa fee kitabin inna thalika AAala Allahi yaseerun
locale.translation: And Allah created you from dust, then from a sperm-drop; then He made you mates. And no female conceives nor does she give birth except with His knowledge. And no aged person is granted [additional] life nor is his lifespan lessened but that it is in a register. Indeed, that for Allah is easy

locale.transliteration: Wama yastawee albahrani hatha AAathbun furatun saighun sharabuhu wahatha milhun ojajun wamin kullin takuloona lahman tariyyan watastakhrijoona hilyatan talbasoonaha watara alfulka feehi mawakhira litabtaghoo min fadlihi walaAAallakum tashkuroona
locale.translation: And not alike are the two bodies of water. One is fresh and sweet, palatable for drinking, and one is salty and bitter. And from each you eat tender meat and extract ornaments which you wear, and you see the ships plowing through [them] that you might seek of His bounty; and perhaps you will be grateful

locale.transliteration: Yooliju allayla fee alnnahari wayooliju alnnahara fee allayli wasakhkhara alshshamsa waalqamara kullun yajree liajalin musamman thalikumu Allahu rabbukum lahu almulku waallatheena tadAAoona min doonihi ma yamlikoona min qitmeerin
locale.translation: He causes the night to enter the day, and He causes the day to enter the night and has subjected the sun and the moon - each running [its course] for a specified term. That is Allah, your Lord; to Him belongs sovereignty. And those whom you invoke other than Him do not possess [as much as] the membrane of a date seed

locale.transliteration: In tadAAoohum la yasmaAAoo duAAaakum walaw samiAAoo ma istajaboo lakum wayawma alqiyamati yakfuroona bishirkikum wala yunabbioka mithlu khabeerin
locale.translation: If you invoke them, they do not hear your supplication; and if they heard, they would not respond to you. And on the Day of Resurrection they will deny your association. And none can inform you like [one] Acquainted [with all matters]

locale.transliteration: Ya ayyuha alnnasu antumu alfuqarao ila Allahi waAllahu huwa alghaniyyu alhameedu
locale.translation: O mankind, you are those in need of Allah, while Allah is the Free of need, the Praiseworthy

locale.transliteration: In yasha yuthhibkum wayati bikhalqin jadeedin
locale.translation: If He wills, He can do away with you and bring forth a new creation

locale.transliteration: Wama thalika AAala Allahi biAAazeezin
locale.translation: And that is for Allah not difficult

locale.transliteration: Wala taziru waziratun wizra okhra wain tadAAu muthqalatun ila himliha la yuhmal minhu shayon walaw kana tha qurba innama tunthiru allatheena yakhshawna rabbahum bialghaybi waaqamoo alssalata waman tazakka fainnama yatazakka linafsihi waila Allahi almaseeru
locale.translation: And no bearer of burdens will bear the burden of another. And if a heavily laden soul calls [another] to [carry some of] its load, nothing of it will be carried, even if he should be a close relative. You can only warn those who fear their Lord unseen and have established prayer. And whoever purifies himself only purifies himself for [the benefit of] his soul. And to Allah is the [final] destination

locale.transliteration: Wama yastawee alaAAma waalbaseeru
locale.translation: Not equal are the blind and the seeing

locale.transliteration: Wala alththulumatu wala alnnooru
locale.translation: Nor are the darknesses and the light

locale.transliteration: Wala alththillu wala alharooru
locale.translation: Nor are the shade and the heat

locale.transliteration: Wama yastawee alahyao wala alamwatu inna Allaha yusmiAAu man yashao wama anta bimusmiAAin man fee alquboori
locale.translation: And not equal are the living and the dead. Indeed, Allah causes to hear whom He wills, but you cannot make hear those in the graves

locale.transliteration: In anta illa natheerun
locale.translation: You, [O Muhammad], are not but a warner

locale.transliteration: Inna arsalnaka bialhaqqi basheeran wanatheeran wain min ommatin illa khala feeha natheerun
locale.translation: Indeed, We have sent you with the truth as a bringer of good tidings and a warner. And there was no nation but that there had passed within it a warner

locale.transliteration: Wain yukaththibooka faqad kaththaba allatheena min qablihim jaathum rusuluhum bialbayyinati wabialzzuburi wabialkitabi almuneeri
locale.translation: And if they deny you - then already have those before them denied. Their messengers came to them with clear proofs and written ordinances and with the enlightening Scripture

locale.transliteration: Thumma akhathtu allatheena kafaroo fakayfa kana nakeeri
locale.translation: Then I seized the ones who disbelieved, and how [terrible] was My reproach

locale.transliteration: Alam tara anna Allaha anzala mina alssamai maan faakhrajna bihi thamaratin mukhtalifan alwanuha wamina aljibali judadun beedun wahumrun mukhtalifun alwanuha wagharabeebu soodun
locale.translation: Do you not see that Allah sends down rain from the sky, and We produce thereby fruits of varying colors? And in the mountains are tracts, white and red of varying shades and [some] extremely black

locale.transliteration: Wamina alnnasi waalddawabbi waalanAAami mukhtalifun alwanuhu kathalika innama yakhsha Allaha min AAibadihi alAAulamao inna Allaha AAazeezun ghafoorun
locale.translation: And among people and moving creatures and grazing livestock are various colors similarly. Only those fear Allah, from among His servants, who have knowledge. Indeed, Allah is Exalted in Might and Forgiving

locale.transliteration: Inna allatheena yatloona kitaba Allahi waaqamoo alssalata waanfaqoo mimma razaqnahum sirran waAAalaniyatan yarjoona tijaratan lan taboora
locale.translation: Indeed, those who recite the Book of Allah and establish prayer and spend [in His cause] out of what We have provided them, secretly and publicly, [can] expect a profit that will never perish

locale.transliteration: Liyuwaffiyahum ojoorahum wayazeedahum min fadlihi innahu ghafoorun shakoorun
locale.translation: That He may give them in full their rewards and increase for them of His bounty. Indeed, He is Forgiving and Appreciative

locale.transliteration: Waallathee awhayna ilayka mina alkitabi huwa alhaqqu musaddiqan lima bayna yadayhi inna Allaha biAAibadihi lakhabeerun baseerun
locale.translation: And that which We have revealed to you, [O Muhammad], of the Book is the truth, confirming what was before it. Indeed, Allah, of His servants, is Acquainted and Seeing

locale.transliteration: Thumma awrathna alkitaba allatheena istafayna min AAibadina faminhum thalimun linafsihi waminhum muqtasidun waminhum sabiqun bialkhayrati biithni Allahi thalika huwa alfadlu alkabeeru
locale.translation: Then we caused to inherit the Book those We have chosen of Our servants; and among them is he who wrongs himself, and among them is he who is moderate, and among them is he who is foremost in good deeds by permission of Allah. That [inheritance] is what is the great bounty

locale.transliteration: Jannatu AAadnin yadkhuloonaha yuhallawna feeha min asawira min thahabin waluluan walibasuhum feeha hareerun
locale.translation: [For them are] gardens of perpetual residence which they will enter. They will be adorned therein with bracelets of gold and pearls, and their garments therein will be silk

locale.transliteration: Waqaloo alhamdu lillahi allathee athhaba AAanna alhazana inna rabbana laghafoorun shakoorun
locale.translation: And they will say, "Praise to Allah, who has removed from us [all] sorrow. Indeed, our Lord is Forgiving and Appreciative

locale.transliteration: Allathee ahallana dara almuqamati min fadlihi la yamassuna feeha nasabun wala yamassuna feeha lughoobun
locale.translation: He who has settled us in the home of duration out of His bounty. There touches us not in it any fatigue, and there touches us not in it weariness [of mind]

locale.transliteration: Waallatheena kafaroo lahum naru jahannama la yuqda AAalayhim fayamootoo wala yukhaffafu AAanhum min AAathabiha kathalika najzee kulla kafoorin
locale.translation: And for those who disbelieve will be the fire of Hell. [Death] is not decreed for them so they may die, nor will its torment be lightened for them. Thus do we recompense every ungrateful one

locale.transliteration: Wahum yastarikhoona feeha rabbana akhrijna naAAmal salihan ghayra allathee kunna naAAmalu awalam nuAAammirkum ma yatathakkaru feehi man tathakkara wajaakumu alnnatheeru fathooqoo fama lilththalimeena min naseerin
locale.translation: And they will cry out therein, "Our Lord, remove us; we will do righteousness - other than what we were doing!" But did We not grant you life enough for whoever would remember therein to remember, and the warner had come to you? So taste [the punishment], for there is not for the wrongdoers any helper

locale.transliteration: Inna Allaha AAalimu ghaybi alssamawati waalardi innahu AAaleemun bithati alssudoori
locale.translation: Indeed, Allah is Knower of the unseen [aspects] of the heavens and earth. Indeed, He is Knowing of that within the breasts

locale.transliteration: Huwa allathee jaAAalakum khalaifa fee alardi faman kafara faAAalayhi kufruhu wala yazeedu alkafireena kufruhum AAinda rabbihim illa maqtan wala yazeedu alkafireena kufruhum illa khasaran
locale.translation: It is He who has made you successors upon the earth. And whoever disbelieves - upon him will be [the consequence of] his disbelief. And the disbelief of the disbelievers does not increase them in the sight of their Lord except in hatred; and the disbelief of the disbelievers does not increase them except in loss

locale.transliteration: Qul araaytum shurakaakumu allatheena tadAAoona min dooni Allahi aroonee matha khalaqoo mina alardi am lahum shirkun fee alssamawati am ataynahum kitaban fahum AAala bayyinatin minhu bal in yaAAidu alththalimoona baAAduhum baAAdan illa ghurooran
locale.translation: Say, "Have you considered your 'partners' whom you invoke besides Allah? Show me what they have created from the earth, or have they partnership [with Him] in the heavens? Or have We given them a book so they are [standing] on evidence therefrom? [No], rather, the wrongdoers do not promise each other except delusion

locale.transliteration: Inna Allaha yumsiku alssamawati waalarda an tazoola walain zalata in amsakahuma min ahadin min baAAdihi innahu kana haleeman ghafooran
locale.translation: Indeed, Allah holds the heavens and the earth, lest they cease. And if they should cease, no one could hold them [in place] after Him. Indeed, He is Forbearing and Forgiving

locale.transliteration: Waaqsamoo biAllahi jahda aymanihim lain jaahum natheerun layakoonunna ahda min ihda alomami falamma jaahum natheerun ma zadahum illa nufooran
locale.translation: And they swore by Allah their strongest oaths that if a warner came to them, they would be more guided than [any] one of the [previous] nations. But when a warner came to them, it did not increase them except in aversion

locale.transliteration: Istikbaran fee alardi wamakra alssayyii wala yaheequ almakru alssayyio illa biahlihi fahal yanthuroona illa sunnata alawwaleena falan tajida lisunnati Allahi tabdeelan walan tajida lisunnati Allahi tahweelan
locale.translation: [Due to] arrogance in the land and plotting of evil; but the evil plot does not encompass except its own people. Then do they await except the way of the former peoples? But you will never find in the way of Allah any change, and you will never find in the way of Allah any alteration

locale.transliteration: Awalam yaseeroo fee alardi fayanthuroo kayfa kana AAaqibatu allatheena min qablihim wakanoo ashadda minhum quwwatan wama kana Allahu liyuAAjizahu min shayin fee alssamawati wala fee alardi innahu kana AAaleeman qadeeran
locale.translation: Have they not traveled through the land and observed how was the end of those before them? And they were greater than them in power. But Allah is not to be caused failure by anything in the heavens or on the earth. Indeed, He is ever Knowing and Competent

locale.transliteration: Walaw yuakhithu Allahu alnnasa bima kasaboo ma taraka AAala thahriha min dabbatin walakin yuakhkhiruhum ila ajalin musamman faitha jaa ajaluhum fainna Allaha kana biAAibadihi baseeran
locale.translation: And if Allah were to impose blame on the people for what they have earned, He would not leave upon the earth any creature. But He defers them for a specified term. And when their time comes, then indeed Allah has ever been, of His servants, Seeing

locale.transliteration: Ya-Sin
locale.translation: Ya Sin

locale.transliteration: Yaseen
locale.translation: Ya, Seen

locale.transliteration: Waalqurani alhakeemi
locale.translation: By the wise Qur'an

locale.transliteration: Innaka lamina almursaleena
locale.translation: Indeed you, [O Muhammad], are from among the messengers

locale.transliteration: AAala siratin mustaqeemin
locale.translation: On a straight path

locale.transliteration: Tanzeela alAAazeezi alrraheemi
locale.translation: [This is] a revelation of the Exalted in Might, the Merciful

locale.transliteration: Litunthira qawman ma onthira abaohum fahum ghafiloona
locale.translation: That you may warn a people whose forefathers were not warned, so they are unaware

locale.transliteration: Laqad haqqa alqawlu AAala aktharihim fahum la yuminoona
locale.translation: Already the word has come into effect upon most of them, so they do not believe

locale.transliteration: Inna jaAAalna fee aAAnaqihim aghlalan fahiya ila alathqani fahum muqmahoona
locale.translation: Indeed, We have put shackles on their necks, and they are to their chins, so they are with heads [kept] aloft

locale.transliteration: WajaAAalna min bayni aydeehim saddan wamin khalfihim saddan faaghshaynahum fahum la yubsiroona
locale.translation: And We have put before them a barrier and behind them a barrier and covered them, so they do not see

locale.transliteration: Wasawaon AAalayhim aanthartahum am lam tunthirhum la yuminoona
locale.translation: And it is all the same for them whether you warn them or do not warn them - they will not believe

locale.transliteration: Innama tunthiru mani ittabaAAa alththikra wakhashiya alrrahmana bialghaybi fabashshirhu bimaghfiratin waajrin kareemin
locale.translation: You can only warn one who follows the message and fears the Most Merciful unseen. So give him good tidings of forgiveness and noble reward

locale.transliteration: Inna nahnu nuhyee almawta wanaktubu ma qaddamoo waatharahum wakulla shayin ahsaynahu fee imamin mubeenin
locale.translation: Indeed, it is We who bring the dead to life and record what they have put forth and what they left behind, and all things We have enumerated in a clear register

locale.transliteration: Waidrib lahum mathalan ashaba alqaryati ith jaaha almursaloona
locale.translation: And present to them an example: the people of the city, when the messengers came to it

locale.transliteration: Ith arsalna ilayhimu ithnayni fakaththaboohuma faAAazzazna bithalithin faqaloo inna ilaykum mursaloona
locale.translation: When We sent to them two but they denied them, so We strengthened them with a third, and they said, "Indeed, we are messengers to you

locale.transliteration: Qaloo ma antum illa basharun mithluna wama anzala alrrahmanu min shayin in antum illa takthiboona
locale.translation: They said, "You are not but human beings like us, and the Most Merciful has not revealed a thing. You are only telling lies

locale.transliteration: Qaloo rabbuna yaAAlamu inna ilaykum lamursaloona
locale.translation: They said, "Our Lord knows that we are messengers to you

locale.transliteration: Wama AAalayna illa albalaghu almubeenu
locale.translation: And we are not responsible except for clear notification

locale.transliteration: Qaloo inna tatayyarna bikum lain lam tantahoo lanarjumannakum walayamassannakum minna AAathabun aleemun
locale.translation: They said, "Indeed, we consider you a bad omen. If you do not desist, we will surely stone you, and there will surely touch you, from us, a painful punishment

locale.transliteration: Qaloo tairukum maAAakum ain thukkirtum bal antum qawmun musrifoona
locale.translation: They said, "Your omen is with yourselves. Is it because you were reminded? Rather, you are a transgressing people

locale.transliteration: Wajaa min aqsa almadeenati rajulun yasAAa qala ya qawmi ittabiAAoo almursaleena
locale.translation: And there came from the farthest end of the city a man, running. He said, "O my people, follow the messengers

locale.transliteration: IttabiAAoo man la yasalukum ajran wahum muhtadoona
locale.translation: Follow those who do not ask of you [any] payment, and they are [rightly] guided

locale.transliteration: Wama liya la aAAbudu allathee fataranee wailayhi turjaAAoona
locale.translation: And why should I not worship He who created me and to whom you will be returned

locale.transliteration: Aattakhithu min doonihi alihatan in yuridni alrrahmanu bidurrin la tughni AAannee shafaAAatuhum shayan wala yunqithooni
locale.translation: Should I take other than Him [false] deities [while], if the Most Merciful intends for me some adversity, their intercession will not avail me at all, nor can they save me

locale.transliteration: Innee ithan lafee dalalin mubeenin
locale.translation: Indeed, I would then be in manifest error

locale.transliteration: Innee amantu birabbikum faismaAAooni
locale.translation: Indeed, I have believed in your Lord, so listen to me

locale.transliteration: Qeela odkhuli aljannata qala ya layta qawmee yaAAlamoona
locale.translation: It was said, "Enter Paradise." He said, "I wish my people could know

locale.transliteration: Bima ghafara lee rabbee wajaAAalanee mina almukrameena
locale.translation: Of how my Lord has forgiven me and placed me among the honored

locale.transliteration: Wama anzalna AAala qawmihi min baAAdihi min jundin mina alssamai wama kunna munzileena
locale.translation: And We did not send down upon his people after him any soldiers from the heaven, nor would We have done so

locale.transliteration: In kanat illa sayhatan wahidatan faitha hum khamidoona
locale.translation: It was not but one shout, and immediately they were extinguished

locale.transliteration: Ya hasratan AAala alAAibadi ma yateehim min rasoolin illa kanoo bihi yastahzioona
locale.translation: How regretful for the servants. There did not come to them any messenger except that they used to ridicule him

locale.transliteration: Alam yaraw kam ahlakna qablahum mina alqurooni annahum ilayhim la yarjiAAoona
locale.translation: Have they not considered how many generations We destroyed before them - that they to them will not return

locale.transliteration: Wain kullun lamma jameeAAun ladayna muhdaroona
locale.translation: And indeed, all of them will yet be brought present before Us

locale.transliteration: Waayatun lahumu alardu almaytatu ahyaynaha waakhrajna minha habban faminhu yakuloona
locale.translation: And a sign for them is the dead earth. We have brought it to life and brought forth from it grain, and from it they eat

locale.transliteration: WajaAAalna feeha jannatin min nakheelin waaAAnabin wafajjarna feeha mina alAAuyooni
locale.translation: And We placed therein gardens of palm trees and grapevines and caused to burst forth therefrom some springs

locale.transliteration: Liyakuloo min thamarihi wama AAamilathu aydeehim afala yashkuroona
locale.translation: That they may eat of His fruit. And their hands have not produced it, so will they not be grateful

locale.transliteration: Subhana allathee khalaqa alazwaja kullaha mimma tunbitu alardu wamin anfusihim wamimma la yaAAlamoona
locale.translation: Exalted is He who created all pairs - from what the earth grows and from themselves and from that which they do not know

locale.transliteration: Waayatun lahumu allaylu naslakhu minhu alnnahara faitha hum muthlimoona
locale.translation: And a sign for them is the night. We remove from it [the light of] day, so they are [left] in darkness

locale.transliteration: Waalshshamsu tajree limustaqarrin laha thalika taqdeeru alAAazeezi alAAaleemi
locale.translation: And the sun runs [on course] toward its stopping point. That is the determination of the Exalted in Might, the Knowing

locale.transliteration: Waalqamara qaddarnahu manazila hatta AAada kaalAAurjooni alqadeemi
locale.translation: And the moon - We have determined for it phases, until it returns [appearing] like the old date stalk

locale.transliteration: La alshshamsu yanbaghee laha an tudrika alqamara wala allaylu sabiqu alnnahari wakullun fee falakin yasbahoona
locale.translation: It is not allowable for the sun to reach the moon, nor does the night overtake the day, but each, in an orbit, is swimming

locale.transliteration: Waayatun lahum anna hamalna thurriyyatahum fee alfulki almashhooni
locale.translation: And a sign for them is that We carried their forefathers in a laden ship

locale.transliteration: Wakhalaqna lahum min mithlihi ma yarkaboona
locale.translation: And We created for them from the likes of it that which they ride

locale.transliteration: Wain nasha nughriqhum fala sareekha lahum wala hum yunqathoona
locale.translation: And if We should will, We could drown them; then no one responding to a cry would there be for them, nor would they be saved

locale.transliteration: Illa rahmatan minna wamataAAan ila heenin
locale.translation: Except as a mercy from Us and provision for a time

locale.transliteration: Waitha qeela lahumu ittaqoo ma bayna aydeekum wama khalfakum laAAallakum turhamoona
locale.translation: But when it is said to them, "Beware of what is before you and what is behind you; perhaps you will receive mercy

locale.transliteration: Wama tateehim min ayatin min ayati rabbihim illa kanoo AAanha muAArideena
locale.translation: And no sign comes to them from the signs of their Lord except that they are from it turning away

locale.transliteration: Waitha qeela lahum anfiqoo mimma razaqakumu Allahu qala allatheena kafaroo lillatheena amanoo anutAAimu man law yashao Allahu atAAamahu in antum illa fee dalalin mubeenin
locale.translation: And when it is said to them, "Spend from that which Allah has provided for you," those who disbelieve say to those who believe, "Should we feed one whom, if Allah had willed, He would have fed? You are not but in clear error

locale.transliteration: Wayaqooloona mata hatha alwaAAdu in kuntum sadiqeena
locale.translation: And they say, "When is this promise, if you should be truthful

locale.transliteration: Ma yanthuroona illa sayhatan wahidatan takhuthuhum wahum yakhissimoona
locale.translation: They do not await except one blast which will seize them while they are disputing

locale.transliteration: Fala yastateeAAoona tawsiyatan wala ila ahlihim yarjiAAoona
locale.translation: And they will not be able [to give] any instruction, nor to their people can they return

locale.transliteration: Wanufikha fee alssoori faitha hum mina alajdathi ila rabbihim yansiloona
locale.translation: And the Horn will be blown; and at once from the graves to their Lord they will hasten

locale.transliteration: Qaloo ya waylana man baAAathana min marqadina hatha ma waAAada alrrahmanu wasadaqa almursaloona
locale.translation: They will say, "O woe to us! Who has raised us up from our sleeping place?" [The reply will be], "This is what the Most Merciful had promised, and the messengers told the truth

locale.transliteration: In kanat illa sayhatan wahidatan faitha hum jameeAAun ladayna muhdaroona
locale.translation: It will not be but one blast, and at once they are all brought present before Us

locale.transliteration: Faalyawma la tuthlamu nafsun shayan wala tujzawna illa ma kuntum taAAmaloona
locale.translation: So today no soul will be wronged at all, and you will not be recompensed except for what you used to do

locale.transliteration: Inna ashaba aljannati alyawma fee shughulin fakihoona
locale.translation: Indeed the companions of Paradise, that Day, will be amused in [joyful] occupation

locale.transliteration: Hum waazwajuhum fee thilalin AAala alaraiki muttakioona
locale.translation: They and their spouses - in shade, reclining on adorned couches

locale.transliteration: Lahum feeha fakihatun walahum ma yaddaAAoona
locale.translation: For them therein is fruit, and for them is whatever they request [or wish]

locale.transliteration: Salamun qawlan min rabbin raheemin
locale.translation: [And] "Peace," a word from a Merciful Lord

locale.transliteration: Waimtazoo alyawma ayyuha almujrimoona
locale.translation: [Then He will say], "But stand apart today, you criminals

locale.transliteration: Alam aAAhad ilaykum ya banee adama an la taAAbudoo alshshaytana innahu lakum AAaduwwun mubeenun
locale.translation: Did I not enjoin upon you, O children of Adam, that you not worship Satan - [for] indeed, he is to you a clear enemy

locale.transliteration: Waani oAAbudoonee hatha siratun mustaqeemun
locale.translation: And that you worship [only] Me? This is a straight path

locale.transliteration: Walaqad adalla minkum jibillan katheeran afalam takoonoo taAAqiloona
locale.translation: And he had already led astray from among you much of creation, so did you not use reason

locale.transliteration: Hathihi jahannamu allatee kuntum tooAAadoona
locale.translation: This is the Hellfire which you were promised

locale.transliteration: Islawha alyawma bima kuntum takfuroona
locale.translation: [Enter to] burn therein today for what you used to deny

locale.transliteration: Alyawma nakhtimu AAala afwahihim watukallimuna aydeehim watashhadu arjuluhum bima kanoo yaksiboona
locale.translation: That Day, We will seal over their mouths, and their hands will speak to Us, and their feet will testify about what they used to earn

locale.transliteration: Walaw nashao latamasna AAala aAAyunihim faistabaqoo alssirata faanna yubsiroona
locale.translation: And if We willed, We could have obliterated their eyes, and they would race to [find] the path, and how could they see

locale.transliteration: Walaw nashao lamasakhnahum AAala makanatihim fama istataAAoo mudiyyan wala yarjiAAoona
locale.translation: And if We willed, We could have deformed them, [paralyzing them] in their places so they would not be able to proceed, nor could they return

locale.transliteration: Waman nuAAammirhu nunakkishu fee alkhalqi afala yaAAqiloona
locale.translation: And he to whom We grant long life We reverse in creation; so will they not understand

locale.transliteration: Wama AAallamnahu alshshiAAra wama yanbaghee lahu in huwa illa thikrun waquranun mubeenun
locale.translation: And We did not give Prophet Muhammad, knowledge of poetry, nor is it befitting for him. It is not but a message and a clear Qur'an

locale.transliteration: Liyunthira man kana hayyan wayahiqqa alqawlu AAala alkafireena
locale.translation: To warn whoever is alive and justify the word against the disbelievers

locale.transliteration: Awalam yaraw anna khalaqna lahum mimma AAamilat aydeena anAAaman fahum laha malikoona
locale.translation: Do they not see that We have created for them from what Our hands have made, grazing livestock, and [then] they are their owners

locale.transliteration: Wathallalnaha lahum faminha rakoobuhum waminha yakuloona
locale.translation: And We have tamed them for them, so some of them they ride, and some of them they eat

locale.transliteration: Walahum feeha manafiAAu wamasharibu afala yashkuroona
locale.translation: And for them therein are [other] benefits and drinks, so will they not be grateful

locale.transliteration: Waittakhathoo min dooni Allahi alihatan laAAallahum yunsaroona
locale.translation: But they have taken besides Allah [false] deities that perhaps they would be helped

locale.transliteration: La yastateeAAoona nasrahum wahum lahum jundun muhdaroona
locale.translation: They are not able to help them, and they [themselves] are for them soldiers in attendance

locale.transliteration: Fala yahzunka qawluhum inna naAAlamu ma yusirroona wama yuAAlinoona
locale.translation: So let not their speech grieve you. Indeed, We know what they conceal and what they declare

locale.transliteration: Awalam yara alinsanu anna khalaqnahu min nutfatin faitha huwa khaseemun mubeenun
locale.translation: Does man not consider that We created him from a [mere] sperm-drop - then at once he is a clear adversary

locale.transliteration: Wadaraba lana mathalan wanasiya khalqahu qala man yuhyee alAAithama wahiya rameemun
locale.translation: And he presents for Us an example and forgets his [own] creation. He says, "Who will give life to bones while they are disintegrated

locale.transliteration: Qul yuhyeeha allathee anshaaha awwala marratin wahuwa bikulli khalqin AAaleemun
locale.translation: Say, "He will give them life who produced them the first time; and He is, of all creation, Knowing

locale.transliteration: Allathee jaAAala lakum mina alshshajari alakhdari naran faitha antum minhu tooqidoona
locale.translation: [It is] He who made for you from the green tree, fire, and then from it you ignite

locale.transliteration: Awalaysa allathee khalaqa alssamawati waalarda biqadirin AAala an yakhluqa mithlahum bala wahuwa alkhallaqu alAAaleemu
locale.translation: Is not He who created the heavens and the earth Able to create the likes of them? Yes, [it is so]; and He is the Knowing Creator

locale.transliteration: Innama amruhu itha arada shayan an yaqoola lahu kun fayakoonu
locale.translation: His command is only when He intends a thing that He says to it, "Be," and it is

locale.transliteration: Fasubhana allathee biyadihi malakootu kulli shayin wailayhi turjaAAoona
locale.translation: So exalted is He in whose hand is the realm of all things, and to Him you will be returned

locale.transliteration: As-Saffat
locale.translation: Those who set the Ranks

locale.transliteration: Waalssaffati saffan
locale.translation: By those [angels] lined up in rows

locale.transliteration: Faalzzajirati zajran
locale.translation: And those who drive [the clouds]

locale.transliteration: Faalttaliyati thikran
locale.translation: And those who recite the message

locale.transliteration: Inna ilahakum lawahidun
locale.translation: Indeed, your God is One

locale.transliteration: Rabbu alssamawati waalardi wama baynahuma warabbu almashariqi
locale.translation: Lord of the heavens and the earth and that between them and Lord of the sunrises

locale.transliteration: Inna zayyanna alssamaa alddunya bizeenatin alkawakibi
locale.translation: Indeed, We have adorned the nearest heaven with an adornment of stars

locale.transliteration: Wahifthan min kulli shaytanin maridin
locale.translation: And as protection against every rebellious devil

locale.transliteration: La yassammaAAoona ila almalai alaAAla wayuqthafoona min kulli janibin
locale.translation: [So] they may not listen to the exalted assembly [of angels] and are pelted from every side

locale.transliteration: Duhooran walahum AAathabun wasibun
locale.translation: Repelled; and for them is a constant punishment

locale.transliteration: Illa man khatifa alkhatfata faatbaAAahu shihabun thaqibun
locale.translation: Except one who snatches [some words] by theft, but they are pursued by a burning flame, piercing [in brightness]

locale.transliteration: Faistaftihim ahum ashaddu khalqan am man khalaqna inna khalaqnahum min teenin lazibin
locale.translation: Then inquire of them, [O Muhammad], "Are they a stronger [or more difficult] creation or those [others] We have created?" Indeed, We created men from sticky clay

locale.transliteration: Bal AAajibta wayaskharoona
locale.translation: But you wonder, while they mock

locale.transliteration: Waitha thukkiroo la yathkuroona
locale.translation: And when they are reminded, they remember not

locale.transliteration: Waitha raaw ayatan yastaskhiroona
locale.translation: And when they see a sign, they ridicule

locale.transliteration: Waqaloo in hatha illa sihrun mubeenun
locale.translation: And say, "This is not but obvious magic

locale.transliteration: Aitha mitna wakunna turaban waAAithaman ainna lamabAAoothoona
locale.translation: When we have died and become dust and bones, are we indeed to be resurrected

locale.transliteration: Awaabaona alawwaloona
locale.translation: And our forefathers [as well]

locale.transliteration: Qul naAAam waantum dakhiroona
locale.translation: Say, "Yes, and you will be [rendered] contemptible

locale.transliteration: Fainnama hiya zajratun wahidatun faitha hum yanthuroona
locale.translation: It will be only one shout, and at once they will be observing

locale.transliteration: Waqaloo ya waylana hatha yawmu alddeeni
locale.translation: They will say, "O woe to us! This is the Day of Recompense

locale.transliteration: Hatha yawmu alfasli allathee kuntum bihi tukaththiboona
locale.translation: [They will be told], "This is the Day of Judgement which you used to deny

locale.transliteration: Ohshuroo allatheena thalamoo waazwajahum wama kanoo yaAAbudoona
locale.translation: [The angels will be ordered], "Gather those who committed wrong, their kinds, and what they used to worship

locale.transliteration: Min dooni Allahi faihdoohum ila sirati aljaheemi
locale.translation: Other than Allah, and guide them to the path of Hellfire

locale.transliteration: Waqifoohum innahum masooloona
locale.translation: And stop them; indeed, they are to be questioned

locale.transliteration: Ma lakum la tanasaroona
locale.translation: [They will be asked], "What is [wrong] with you? Why do you not help each other

locale.transliteration: Bal humu alyawma mustaslimoona
locale.translation: But they, that Day, are in surrender

locale.transliteration: Waaqbala baAAduhum AAala baAAdin yatasaaloona
locale.translation: And they will approach one another blaming each other

locale.transliteration: Qaloo innakum kuntum tatoonana AAani alyameeni
locale.translation: They will say, "Indeed, you used to come at us from the right

locale.transliteration: Qaloo bal lam takoonoo mumineena
locale.translation: The oppressors will say, "Rather, you [yourselves] were not believers

locale.transliteration: Wama kana lana AAalaykum min sultanin bal kuntum qawman tagheena
locale.translation: And we had over you no authority, but you were a transgressing people

locale.transliteration: Fahaqqa AAalayna qawlu rabbina inna lathaiqoona
locale.translation: So the word of our Lord has come into effect upon us; indeed, we will taste [punishment]

locale.transliteration: Faaghwaynakum inna kunna ghaweena
locale.translation: And we led you to deviation; indeed, we were deviators

locale.transliteration: Fainnahum yawmaithin fee alAAathabi mushtarikoona
locale.translation: So indeed they, that Day, will be sharing in the punishment

locale.transliteration: Inna kathalika nafAAalu bialmujrimeena
locale.translation: Indeed, that is how We deal with the criminals

locale.transliteration: Innahum kanoo itha qeela lahum la ilaha illa Allahu yastakbiroona
locale.translation: Indeed they, when it was said to them, "There is no deity but Allah," were arrogant

locale.transliteration: Wayaqooloona ainna latarikoo alihatina lishaAAirin majnoonin
locale.translation: And were saying, "Are we to leave our gods for a mad poet

locale.transliteration: Bal jaa bialhaqqi wasaddaqa almursaleena
locale.translation: Rather, the Prophet has come with the truth and confirmed the [previous] messengers

locale.transliteration: Innakum lathaiqoo alAAathabi alaleemi
locale.translation: Indeed, you [disbelievers] will be tasters of the painful punishment

locale.transliteration: Wama tujzawna illa ma kuntum taAAmaloona
locale.translation: And you will not be recompensed except for what you used to do

locale.transliteration: Illa AAibada Allahi almukhlaseena
locale.translation: But not the chosen servants of Allah

locale.transliteration: Olaika lahum rizqun maAAloomun
locale.translation: Those will have a provision determined

locale.transliteration: Fawakihu wahum mukramoona
locale.translation: Fruits; and they will be honored

locale.transliteration: Fee jannati alnnaAAeemi
locale.translation: In gardens of pleasure

locale.transliteration: AAala sururin mutaqabileena
locale.translation: On thrones facing one another

locale.transliteration: Yutafu AAalayhim bikasin min maAAeenin
locale.translation: There will be circulated among them a cup [of wine] from a flowing spring

locale.transliteration: Baydaa laththatin lilshsharibeena
locale.translation: White and delicious to the drinkers

locale.transliteration: La feeha ghawlun wala hum AAanha yunzafoona
locale.translation: No bad effect is there in it, nor from it will they be intoxicated

locale.transliteration: WaAAindahum qasiratu alttarfi AAeenun
locale.translation: And with them will be women limiting [their] glances, with large, [beautiful] eyes

locale.transliteration: Kaannahunna baydun maknoonun
locale.translation: As if they were [delicate] eggs, well-protected

locale.transliteration: Faaqbala baAAduhum AAala baAAdin yatasaaloona
locale.translation: And they will approach one another, inquiring of each other

locale.transliteration: Qala qailun minhum innee kana lee qareenun
locale.translation: A speaker among them will say, "Indeed, I had a companion [on earth]

locale.transliteration: Yaqoolu ainnaka lamina almusaddiqeena
locale.translation: Who would say, 'Are you indeed of those who believe

locale.transliteration: Aitha mitna wakunna turaban waAAithaman ainna lamadeenoona
locale.translation: That when we have died and become dust and bones, we will indeed be recompensed

locale.transliteration: Qala hal antum muttaliAAoona
locale.translation: He will say, "Would you [care to] look

locale.transliteration: FaittalaAAa faraahu fee sawai aljaheemi
locale.translation: And he will look and see him in the midst of the Hellfire

locale.transliteration: Qala taAllahi in kidta laturdeeni
locale.translation: He will say, "By Allah, you almost ruined me

locale.transliteration: Walawla niAAmatu rabbee lakuntu mina almuhdareena
locale.translation: If not for the favor of my Lord, I would have been of those brought in [to Hell]

locale.transliteration: Afama nahnu bimayyiteena
locale.translation: Then, are we not to die

locale.transliteration: Illa mawtatana aloola wama nahnu bimuAAaththabeena
locale.translation: Except for our first death, and we will not be punished

locale.transliteration: Inna hatha lahuwa alfawzu alAAatheemu
locale.translation: Indeed, this is the great attainment

locale.transliteration: Limithli hatha falyaAAmali alAAamiloona
locale.translation: For the like of this let the workers [on earth] work

locale.transliteration: Athalika khayrun nuzulan am shajaratu alzzaqqoomi
locale.translation: Is Paradise a better accommodation or the tree of zaqqum

locale.transliteration: Inna jaAAalnaha fitnatan lilththalimeena
locale.translation: Indeed, We have made it a torment for the wrongdoers

locale.transliteration: Innaha shajaratun takhruju fee asli aljaheemi
locale.translation: Indeed, it is a tree issuing from the bottom of the Hellfire

locale.transliteration: TalAAuha kaannahu ruoosu alshshayateeni
locale.translation: Its emerging fruit as if it was heads of the devils

locale.transliteration: Fainnahum laakiloona minha famalioona minha albutoona
locale.translation: And indeed, they will eat from it and fill with it their bellies

locale.transliteration: Thumma inna lahum AAalayha lashawban min hameemin
locale.translation: Then indeed, they will have after it a mixture of scalding water

locale.transliteration: Thumma inna marjiAAahum laila aljaheemi
locale.translation: Then indeed, their return will be to the Hellfire

locale.transliteration: Innahum alfaw abaahum dalleena
locale.translation: Indeed they found their fathers astray

locale.transliteration: Fahum AAala atharihim yuhraAAoona
locale.translation: So they hastened [to follow] in their footsteps

locale.transliteration: Walaqad dalla qablahum aktharu alawwaleena
locale.translation: And there had already strayed before them most of the former peoples

locale.transliteration: Walaqad arsalna feehim munthireena
locale.translation: And We had already sent among them warners

locale.transliteration: Faonthur kayfa kana AAaqibatu almunthareena
locale.translation: Then look how was the end of those who were warned

locale.transliteration: Illa AAibada Allahi almukhlaseena
locale.translation: But not the chosen servants of Allah

locale.transliteration: Walaqad nadana noohun falaniAAma almujeeboona
locale.translation: And Noah had certainly called Us, and [We are] the best of responders

locale.transliteration: Wanajjaynahu waahlahu mina alkarbi alAAatheemi
locale.translation: And We saved him and his family from the great affliction

locale.transliteration: WajaAAalna thurriyyatahu humu albaqeena
locale.translation: And We made his descendants those remaining [on the earth]

locale.transliteration: Watarakna AAalayhi fee alakhireena
locale.translation: And left for him [favorable mention] among later generations

locale.transliteration: Salamun AAala noohin fee alAAalameena
locale.translation: Peace upon Noah among the worlds

locale.transliteration: Inna kathalika najzee almuhsineena
locale.translation: Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good

locale.transliteration: Innahu min AAibadina almumineena
locale.translation: Indeed, he was of Our believing servants

locale.transliteration: Thumma aghraqna alakhareena
locale.translation: Then We drowned the disbelievers

locale.transliteration: Wainna min sheeAAatihi laibraheema
locale.translation: And indeed, among his kind was Abraham

locale.transliteration: Ith jaa rabbahu biqalbin saleemin
locale.translation: When he came to his Lord with a sound heart

locale.transliteration: Ith qala liabeehi waqawmihi matha taAAbudoona
locale.translation: [And] when he said to his father and his people, "What do you worship

locale.transliteration: Aifkan alihatan doona Allahi tureedoona
locale.translation: Is it falsehood [as] gods other than Allah you desire

locale.transliteration: Fama thannukum birabbi alAAalameena
locale.translation: Then what is your thought about the Lord of the worlds

locale.transliteration: Fanathara nathratan fee alnnujoomi
locale.translation: And he cast a look at the stars

locale.transliteration: Faqala innee saqeemun
locale.translation: And said, "Indeed, I am [about to be] ill

locale.transliteration: Fatawallaw AAanhu mudbireena
locale.translation: So they turned away from him, departing

locale.transliteration: Faragha ila alihatihim faqala ala takuloona
locale.translation: Then he turned to their gods and said, "Do you not eat

locale.transliteration: Ma lakum la tantiqoona
locale.translation: What is [wrong] with you that you do not speak

locale.transliteration: Faragha AAalayhim darban bialyameeni
locale.translation: And he turned upon them a blow with [his] right hand

locale.transliteration: Faaqbaloo ilayhi yaziffoona
locale.translation: Then the people came toward him, hastening

locale.transliteration: Qala ataAAbudoona ma tanhitoona
locale.translation: He said, "Do you worship that which you [yourselves] carve

locale.transliteration: WaAllahu khalaqakum wama taAAmaloona
locale.translation: While Allah created you and that which you do

locale.transliteration: Qaloo ibnoo lahu bunyanan faalqoohu fee aljaheemi
locale.translation: They said, "Construct for him a furnace and throw him into the burning fire

locale.transliteration: Faaradoo bihi kaydan fajaAAalnahumu alasfaleena
locale.translation: And they intended for him a plan, but We made them the most debased

locale.transliteration: Waqala innee thahibun ila rabbee sayahdeeni
locale.translation: And [then] he said, "Indeed, I will go to [where I am ordered by] my Lord; He will guide me

locale.transliteration: Rabbi hab lee mina alssaliheena
locale.translation: My Lord, grant me [a child] from among the righteous

locale.transliteration: Fabashsharnahu bighulamin haleemin
locale.translation: So We gave him good tidings of a forbearing boy

locale.transliteration: Falamma balagha maAAahu alssaAAya qala ya bunayya innee ara fee almanami annee athbahuka faonthur matha tara qala ya abati ifAAal ma tumaru satajidunee in shaa Allahu mina alssabireena
locale.translation: And when he reached with him [the age of] exertion, he said, "O my son, indeed I have seen in a dream that I [must] sacrifice you, so see what you think." He said, "O my father, do as you are commanded. You will find me, if Allah wills, of the steadfast

locale.transliteration: Falamma aslama watallahu liljabeeni
locale.translation: And when they had both submitted and he put him down upon his forehead

locale.transliteration: Wanadaynahu an ya ibraheemu
locale.translation: We called to him, "O Abraham

locale.transliteration: Qad saddaqta alrruya inna kathalika najzee almuhsineena
locale.translation: You have fulfilled the vision." Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good

locale.transliteration: Inna hatha lahuwa albalao almubeenu
locale.translation: Indeed, this was the clear trial

locale.transliteration: Wafadaynahu bithibhin AAatheemin
locale.translation: And We ransomed him with a great sacrifice

locale.transliteration: Watarakna AAalayhi fee alakhireena
locale.translation: And We left for him [favorable mention] among later generations

locale.transliteration: Salamun AAala ibraheema
locale.translation: Peace upon Abraham

locale.transliteration: Kathalika najzee almuhsineena
locale.translation: Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good

locale.transliteration: Innahu min AAibadina almumineena
locale.translation: Indeed, he was of Our believing servants

locale.transliteration: Wabashsharnahu biishaqa nabiyyan mina alssaliheena
locale.translation: And We gave him good tidings of Isaac, a prophet from among the righteous

locale.transliteration: Wabarakna AAalayhi waAAala ishaqa wamin thurriyyatihima muhsinun wathalimun linafsihi mubeenun
locale.translation: And We blessed him and Isaac. But among their descendants is the doer of good and the clearly unjust to himself

locale.transliteration: Walaqad mananna AAala moosa waharoona
locale.translation: And We did certainly confer favor upon Moses and Aaron

locale.transliteration: Wanajjaynahuma waqawmahuma mina alkarbi alAAatheemi
locale.translation: And We saved them and their people from the great affliction

locale.transliteration: Wanasarnahum fakanoo humu alghalibeena
locale.translation: And We supported them so it was they who overcame

locale.transliteration: Waataynahuma alkitaba almustabeena
locale.translation: And We gave them the explicit Scripture

locale.transliteration: Wahadaynahuma alssirata almustaqeema
locale.translation: And We guided them on the straight path

locale.transliteration: Watarakna AAalayhima fee alakhireena
locale.translation: And We left for them [favorable mention] among later generations

locale.transliteration: Salamun AAala moosa waharoona
locale.translation: Peace upon Moses and Aaron

locale.transliteration: Inna kathalika najzee almuhsineena
locale.translation: Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good

locale.transliteration: Innahuma min AAibadina almumineena
locale.translation: Indeed, they were of Our believing servants

locale.transliteration: Wainna ilyasa lamina almursaleena
locale.translation: And indeed, Elias was from among the messengers

locale.transliteration: Ith qala liqawmihi ala tattaqoona
locale.translation: When he said to his people, "Will you not fear Allah

locale.transliteration: AtadAAoona baAAlan watatharoona ahsana alkhaliqeena
locale.translation: Do you call upon Ba'l and leave the best of creators

locale.transliteration: Allaha rabbakum warabba abaikumu alawwaleena
locale.translation: Allah, your Lord and the Lord of your first forefathers

locale.transliteration: Fakaththaboohu fainnahum lamuhdaroona
locale.translation: And they denied him, so indeed, they will be brought [for punishment]

locale.transliteration: Illa AAibada Allahi almukhlaseena
locale.translation: Except the chosen servants of Allah

locale.transliteration: Watarakna AAalayhi fee alakhireena
locale.translation: And We left for him [favorable mention] among later generations

locale.transliteration: Salamun AAala il yaseena
locale.translation: Peace upon Elias

locale.transliteration: Inna kathalika najzee almuhsineena
locale.translation: Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good

locale.transliteration: Innahu min AAibadina almumineena
locale.translation: Indeed, he was of Our believing servants

locale.transliteration: Wainna lootan lamina almursaleena
locale.translation: And indeed, Lot was among the messengers

locale.transliteration: Ith najjaynahu waahlahu ajmaAAeena
locale.translation: [So mention] when We saved him and his family, all

locale.transliteration: Illa AAajoozan fee alghabireena
locale.translation: Except his wife among those who remained [with the evildoers]

locale.transliteration: Thumma dammarna alakhareena
locale.translation: Then We destroyed the others

locale.transliteration: Wainnakum latamurroona AAalayhim musbiheena
locale.translation: And indeed, you pass by them in the morning

locale.transliteration: Wabiallayli afala taAAqiloona
locale.translation: And at night. Then will you not use reason

locale.transliteration: Wainna yoonusa lamina almursaleena
locale.translation: And indeed, Jonah was among the messengers

locale.transliteration: Ith abaqa ila alfulki almashhooni
locale.translation: [Mention] when he ran away to the laden ship

locale.transliteration: Fasahama fakana mina almudhadeena
locale.translation: And he drew lots and was among the losers

locale.transliteration: Failtaqamahu alhootu wahuwa muleemun
locale.translation: Then the fish swallowed him, while he was blameworthy

locale.transliteration: Falawla annahu kana mina almusabbiheena
locale.translation: And had he not been of those who exalt Allah

locale.transliteration: Lalabitha fee batnihi ila yawmi yubAAathoona
locale.translation: He would have remained inside its belly until the Day they are resurrected

locale.transliteration: Fanabathnahu bialAAarai wahuwa saqeemun
locale.translation: But We threw him onto the open shore while he was ill

locale.transliteration: Waanbatna AAalayhi shajaratan min yaqteenin
locale.translation: And We caused to grow over him a gourd vine

locale.transliteration: Waarsalnahu ila miati alfin aw yazeedoona
locale.translation: And We sent him to [his people of] a hundred thousand or more

locale.transliteration: Faamanoo famattaAAnahum ila heenin
locale.translation: And they believed, so We gave them enjoyment [of life] for a time

locale.transliteration: Faistaftihim alirabbika albanatu walahumu albanoona
locale.translation: So inquire of them, [O Muhammad], "Does your Lord have daughters while they have sons

locale.transliteration: Am khalaqna almalaikata inathan wahum shahidoona
locale.translation: Or did We create the angels as females while they were witnesses

locale.transliteration: Ala innahum min ifkihim layaqooloona
locale.translation: Unquestionably, it is out of their [invented] falsehood that they say

locale.transliteration: Walada Allahu wainnahum lakathiboona
locale.translation: Allah has begotten," and indeed, they are liars

locale.transliteration: Astafa albanati AAala albaneena
locale.translation: Has He chosen daughters over sons

locale.transliteration: Ma lakum kayfa tahkumoona
locale.translation: What is [wrong] with you? How do you make judgement

locale.transliteration: Afala tathakkaroona
locale.translation: Then will you not be reminded

locale.transliteration: Am lakum sultanun mubeenun
locale.translation: Or do you have a clear authority

locale.transliteration: Fatoo bikitabikum in kuntum sadiqeena
locale.translation: Then produce your scripture, if you should be truthful

locale.transliteration: WajaAAaloo baynahu wabayna aljinnati nasaban walaqad AAalimati aljinnatu innahum lamuhdaroona
locale.translation: And they have claimed between Him and the jinn a lineage, but the jinn have already known that they [who made such claims] will be brought to [punishment]

locale.transliteration: Subhana Allahi AAamma yasifoona
locale.translation: Exalted is Allah above what they describe

locale.transliteration: Illa AAibada Allahi almukhlaseena
locale.translation: Except the chosen servants of Allah [who do not share in that sin]

locale.transliteration: Fainnakum wama taAAbudoona
locale.translation: So indeed, you [disbelievers] and whatever you worship

locale.transliteration: Ma antum AAalayhi bifatineena
locale.translation: You cannot tempt [anyone] away from Him

locale.transliteration: Illa man huwa sali aljaheemi
locale.translation: Except he who is to [enter and] burn in the Hellfire

locale.transliteration: Wama minna illa lahu maqamun maAAloomun
locale.translation: [The angels say], "There is not among us any except that he has a known position

locale.transliteration: Wainna lanahnu alssaffoona
locale.translation: And indeed, we are those who line up [for prayer]

locale.transliteration: Wainna lanahnu almusabbihoona
locale.translation: And indeed, we are those who exalt Allah

locale.transliteration: Wain kanoo layaqooloona
locale.translation: And indeed, the disbelievers used to say

locale.transliteration: Law anna AAindana thikran mina alawwaleena
locale.translation: If we had a message from [those of] the former peoples

locale.transliteration: Lakunna AAibada Allahi almukhlaseena
locale.translation: We would have been the chosen servants of Allah

locale.transliteration: Fakafaroo bihi fasawfa yaAAlamoona
locale.translation: But they disbelieved in it, so they are going to know

locale.transliteration: Walaqad sabaqat kalimatuna liAAibadina almursaleena
locale.translation: And Our word has already preceded for Our servants, the messengers

locale.transliteration: Innahum lahumu almansooroona
locale.translation: [That] indeed, they would be those given victory

locale.transliteration: Wainna jundana lahumu alghaliboona
locale.translation: And [that] indeed, Our soldiers will be those who overcome

locale.transliteration: Fatawalla AAanhum hatta heenin
locale.translation: So, [O Muhammad], leave them for a time

locale.transliteration: Waabsirhum fasawfa yubsiroona
locale.translation: And see [what will befall] them, for they are going to see

locale.transliteration: AfabiAAathabina yastaAAjiloona
locale.translation: Then for Our punishment are they impatient

locale.transliteration: Faitha nazala bisahatihim fasaa sabahu almunthareena
locale.translation: But when it descends in their territory, then evil is the morning of those who were warned

locale.transliteration: Watawalla AAanhum hatta heenin
locale.translation: And leave them for a time

locale.transliteration: Waabsir fasawfa yubsiroona
locale.translation: And see, for they are going to see

locale.transliteration: Subhana rabbika rabbi alAAizzati AAamma yasifoona
locale.translation: Exalted is your Lord, the Lord of might, above what they describe

locale.transliteration: Wasalamun AAala almursaleena
locale.translation: And peace upon the messengers

locale.transliteration: Waalhamdu lillahi rabbi alAAalameena
locale.translation: And praise to Allah, Lord of the worlds

locale.transliteration: Sad
locale.translation: The Letter "Saad"

locale.transliteration: Sad waalqurani thee alththikri
locale.translation: Sad. By the Qur'an containing reminder

locale.transliteration: Bali allatheena kafaroo fee AAizzatin washiqaqin
locale.translation: But those who disbelieve are in pride and dissension

locale.transliteration: Kam ahlakna min qablihim min qarnin fanadaw walata heena manasin
locale.translation: How many a generation have We destroyed before them, and they [then] called out; but it was not a time for escape

locale.transliteration: WaAAajiboo an jaahum munthirun minhum waqala alkafiroona hatha sahirun kaththabun
locale.translation: And they wonder that there has come to them a warner from among themselves. And the disbelievers say, "This is a magician and a liar

locale.transliteration: AjaAAala alalihata ilahan wahidan inna hatha lashayon AAujabun
locale.translation: Has he made the gods [only] one God? Indeed, this is a curious thing

locale.transliteration: Waintalaqa almalao minhum ani imshoo waisbiroo AAala alihatikum inna hatha lashayon yuradu
locale.translation: And the eminent among them went forth, [saying], "Continue, and be patient over [the defense of] your gods. Indeed, this is a thing intended

locale.transliteration: Ma samiAAna bihatha fee almillati alakhirati in hatha illa ikhtilaqun
locale.translation: We have not heard of this in the latest religion. This is not but a fabrication

locale.transliteration: Aonzila AAalayhi alththikru min baynina bal hum fee shakkin min thikree bal lamma yathooqoo AAathabi
locale.translation: Has the message been revealed to him out of [all of] us?" Rather, they are in doubt about My message. Rather, they have not yet tasted My punishment

locale.transliteration: Am AAindahum khazainu rahmati rabbika alAAazeezi alwahhabi
locale.translation: Or do they have the depositories of the mercy of your Lord, the Exalted in Might, the Bestower

locale.transliteration: Am lahum mulku alssamawati waalardi wama baynahuma falyartaqoo fee alasbabi
locale.translation: Or is theirs the dominion of the heavens and the earth and what is between them? Then let them ascend through [any] ways of access

locale.transliteration: Jundun ma hunalika mahzoomun mina alahzabi
locale.translation: [They are but] soldiers [who will be] defeated there among the companies [of disbelievers]

locale.transliteration: Kaththabat qablahum qawmu noohin waAAadun wafirAAawnu thoo alawtadi
locale.translation: The people of Noah denied before them, and [the tribe of] 'Aad and Pharaoh, the owner of stakes

locale.transliteration: Wathamoodu waqawmu lootin waashabu alaykati olaika alahzabu
locale.translation: And [the tribe of] Thamud and the people of Lot and the companions of the thicket. Those are the companies

locale.transliteration: In kullun illa kaththaba alrrusula fahaqqa AAiqabi
locale.translation: Each of them denied the messengers, so My penalty was justified

locale.transliteration: Wama yanthuru haolai illa sayhatan wahidatan ma laha min fawaqin
locale.translation: And these [disbelievers] await not but one blast [of the Horn]; for it there will be no delay

locale.transliteration: Waqaloo rabbana AAajjil lana qittana qabla yawmi alhisabi
locale.translation: And they say, "Our Lord, hasten for us our share [of the punishment] before the Day of Account

locale.transliteration: Isbir AAala ma yaqooloona waothkur AAabdana dawooda tha alaydi innahu awwabun
locale.translation: Be patient over what they say and remember Our servant, David, the possessor of strength; indeed, he was one who repeatedly turned back [to Allah]

locale.transliteration: Inna sakhkharna aljibala maAAahu yusabbihna bialAAashiyyi waalishraqi
locale.translation: Indeed, We subjected the mountains [to praise] with him, exalting [Allah] in the [late] afternoon and [after] sunrise

locale.transliteration: Waalttayra mahshooratan kullun lahu awwabun
locale.translation: And the birds were assembled, all with him repeating [praises]

locale.transliteration: Washadadna mulkahu waataynahu alhikmata wafasla alkhitabi
locale.translation: And We strengthened his kingdom and gave him wisdom and discernment in speech

locale.transliteration: Wahal ataka nabao alkhasmi ith tasawwaroo almihraba
locale.translation: And has there come to you the news of the adversaries, when they climbed over the wall of [his] prayer chamber

locale.transliteration: Ith dakhaloo AAala dawooda fafaziAAa minhum qaloo la takhaf khasmani bagha baAAduna AAala baAAdin faohkum baynana bialhaqqi wala tushtit waihdina ila sawai alssirati
locale.translation: When they entered upon David and he was alarmed by them? They said, "Fear not. [We are] two adversaries, one of whom has wronged the other, so judge between us with truth and do not exceed [it] and guide us to the sound path

locale.transliteration: Inna hatha akhee lahu tisAAun watisAAoona naAAjatan waliya naAAjatun wahidatun faqala akfilneeha waAAazzanee fee alkhitabi
locale.translation: Indeed this, my brother, has ninety-nine ewes, and I have one ewe; so he said, 'Entrust her to me,' and he overpowered me in speech

locale.transliteration: Qala laqad thalamaka bisuali naAAjatika ila niAAajihi wainna katheeran mina alkhulatai layabghee baAAduhum AAala baAAdin illa allatheena amanoo waAAamiloo alssalihati waqaleelun ma hum wathanna dawoodu annama fatannahu faistaghfara rabbahu wakharra rakiAAan waanaba
locale.translation: [David] said, "He has certainly wronged you in demanding your ewe [in addition] to his ewes. And indeed, many associates oppress one another, except for those who believe and do righteous deeds - and few are they." And David became certain that We had tried him, and he asked forgiveness of his Lord and fell down bowing [in prostration] and turned in repentance [to Allah]

locale.transliteration: Faghafarna lahu thalika wainna lahu AAindana lazulfa wahusna maabin
locale.translation: So We forgave him that; and indeed, for him is nearness to Us and a good place of return

locale.transliteration: Ya dawoodu inna jaAAalnaka khaleefatan fee alardi faohkum bayna alnnasi bialhaqqi wala tattabiAAi alhawa fayudillaka AAan sabeeli Allahi inna allatheena yadilloona AAan sabeeli Allahi lahum AAathabun shadeedun bima nasoo yawma alhisabi
locale.translation: [We said], "O David, indeed We have made you a successor upon the earth, so judge between the people in truth and do not follow [your own] desire, as it will lead you astray from the way of Allah." Indeed, those who go astray from the way of Allah will have a severe punishment for having forgotten the Day of Account

locale.transliteration: Wama khalaqna alssamaa waalarda wama baynahuma batilan thalika thannu allatheena kafaroo fawaylun lillatheena kafaroo mina alnnari
locale.translation: And We did not create the heaven and the earth and that between them aimlessly. That is the assumption of those who disbelieve, so woe to those who disbelieve from the Fire

locale.transliteration: Am najAAalu allatheena amanoo waAAamiloo alssalihati kaalmufsideena fee alardi am najAAalu almuttaqeena kaalfujjari
locale.translation: Or should we treat those who believe and do righteous deeds like corrupters in the land? Or should We treat those who fear Allah like the wicked

locale.transliteration: Kitabun anzalnahu ilayka mubarakun liyaddabbaroo ayatihi waliyatathakkara oloo alalbabi
locale.translation: [This is] a blessed Book which We have revealed to you, [O Muhammad], that they might reflect upon its verses and that those of understanding would be reminded

locale.transliteration: Wawahabna lidawooda sulaymana niAAma alAAabdu innahu awwabun
locale.translation: And to David We gave Solomon. An excellent servant, indeed he was one repeatedly turning back [to Allah]

locale.transliteration: Ith AAurida AAalayhi bialAAashiyyi alssafinatu aljiyadu
locale.translation: [Mention] when there were exhibited before him in the afternoon the poised [standing] racehorses

locale.transliteration: Faqala innee ahbabtu hubba alkhayri AAan thikri rabbee hatta tawarat bialhijabi
locale.translation: And he said, "Indeed, I gave preference to the love of good [things] over the remembrance of my Lord until the sun disappeared into the curtain [of darkness]

locale.transliteration: Ruddooha AAalayya fatafiqa mashan bialssooqi waalaAAnaqi
locale.translation: [He said], "Return them to me," and set about striking [their] legs and necks

locale.transliteration: Walaqad fatanna sulaymana waalqayna AAala kursiyyihi jasadan thumma anaba
locale.translation: And We certainly tried Solomon and placed on his throne a body; then he returned

locale.transliteration: Qala rabbi ighfir lee wahab lee mulkan la yanbaghee liahadin min baAAdee innaka anta alwahhabu
locale.translation: He said, "My Lord, forgive me and grant me a kingdom such as will not belong to anyone after me. Indeed, You are the Bestower

locale.transliteration: Fasakhkharna lahu alrreeha tajree biamrihi rukhaan haythu asaba
locale.translation: So We subjected to him the wind blowing by his command, gently, wherever he directed

locale.transliteration: Waalshshayateena kulla bannain waghawwasin
locale.translation: And [also] the devils [of jinn] - every builder and diver

locale.transliteration: Waakhareena muqarraneena fee alasfadi
locale.translation: And others bound together in shackles

locale.transliteration: Hatha AAataona faomnun aw amsik bighayri hisabin
locale.translation: [We said], "This is Our gift, so grant or withhold without account

locale.transliteration: Wainna lahu AAindana lazulfa wahusna maabin
locale.translation: And indeed, for him is nearness to Us and a good place of return

locale.transliteration: Waothkur AAabdana ayyooba ith nada rabbahu annee massaniya alshshaytanu binusbin waAAathabin
locale.translation: And remember Our servant Job, when he called to his Lord, "Indeed, Satan has touched me with hardship and torment

locale.transliteration: Orkud birijlika hatha mughtasalun baridun washarabun
locale.translation: [So he was told], "Strike [the ground] with your foot; this is a [spring for] a cool bath and drink

locale.transliteration: Wawahabna lahu ahlahu wamithlahum maAAahum rahmatan minna wathikra liolee alalbabi
locale.translation: And We granted him his family and a like [number] with them as mercy from Us and a reminder for those of understanding

locale.transliteration: Wakhuth biyadika dighthan faidrib bihi wala tahnath inna wajadnahu sabiran niAAma alAAabdu innahu awwabun
locale.translation: [We said], "And take in your hand a bunch [of grass] and strike with it and do not break your oath." Indeed, We found him patient, an excellent servant. Indeed, he was one repeatedly turning back [to Allah]

locale.transliteration: Waothkur AAibadana ibraheema waishaqa wayaAAqooba olee alaydee waalabsari
locale.translation: And remember Our servants, Abraham, Isaac and Jacob - those of strength and [religious] vision

locale.transliteration: Inna akhlasnahum bikhalisatin thikra alddari
locale.translation: Indeed, We chose them for an exclusive quality: remembrance of the home [of the Hereafter]

locale.transliteration: Wainnahum AAindana lamina almustafayna alakhyari
locale.translation: And indeed they are, to Us, among the chosen and outstanding

locale.transliteration: Waothkur ismaAAeela wailyasaAAa watha alkifli wakullun mina alakhyari
locale.translation: And remember Ishmael, Elisha and Dhul-Kifl, and all are among the outstanding

locale.transliteration: Hatha thikrun wainna lilmuttaqeena lahusna maabin
locale.translation: This is a reminder. And indeed, for the righteous is a good place of return

locale.transliteration: Jannati AAadnin mufattahatan lahumu alabwabu
locale.translation: Gardens of perpetual residence, whose doors will be opened to them

locale.transliteration: Muttakieena feeha yadAAoona feeha bifakihatin katheeratin washarabin
locale.translation: Reclining within them, they will call therein for abundant fruit and drink

locale.transliteration: WaAAindahum qasiratu alttarfi atrabun
locale.translation: And with them will be women limiting [their] glances and of equal age

locale.transliteration: Hatha ma tooAAadoona liyawmi alhisabi
locale.translation: This is what you, [the righteous], are promised for the Day of Account

locale.transliteration: Inna hatha larizquna ma lahu min nafadin
locale.translation: Indeed, this is Our provision; for it there is no depletion

locale.transliteration: Hatha wainna lilttagheena lasharra maabin
locale.translation: This [is so]. But indeed, for the transgressors is an evil place of return

locale.transliteration: Jahannama yaslawnaha fabisa almihadu
locale.translation: Hell, which they will [enter to] burn, and wretched is the resting place

locale.transliteration: Hatha falyathooqoohu hameemun waghassaqun
locale.translation: This - so let them taste it - is scalding water and [foul] purulence

locale.transliteration: Waakharu min shaklihi azwajun
locale.translation: And other [punishments] of its type [in various] kinds

locale.transliteration: Hatha fawjun muqtahimun maAAakum la marhaban bihim innahum saloo alnnari
locale.translation: [Its inhabitants will say], "This is a company bursting in with you. No welcome for them. Indeed, they will burn in the Fire

locale.transliteration: Qaloo bal antum la marhaban bikum antum qaddamtumoohu lana fabisa alqararu
locale.translation: They will say, "Nor you! No welcome for you. You, [our leaders], brought this upon us, and wretched is the settlement

locale.transliteration: Qaloo rabbana man qaddama lana hatha fazidhu AAathaban diAAfan fee alnnari
locale.translation: They will say, "Our Lord, whoever brought this upon us - increase for him double punishment in the Fire

locale.transliteration: Waqaloo ma lana la nara rijalan kunna naAAudduhum mina alashrari
locale.translation: And they will say, "Why do we not see men whom we used to count among the worst

locale.transliteration: Attakhathnahum sikhriyyan am zaghat AAanhumu alabsaru
locale.translation: Is it [because] we took them in ridicule, or has [our] vision turned away from them

locale.transliteration: Inna thalika lahaqqun takhasumu ahli alnnari
locale.translation: Indeed, that is truth - the quarreling of the people of the Fire

locale.transliteration: Qul innama ana munthirun wama min ilahin illa Allahu alwahidu alqahharu
locale.translation: Say, [O Muhammad], "I am only a warner, and there is not any deity except Allah, the One, the Prevailing

locale.transliteration: Rabbu alssamawati waalardi wama baynahuma alAAazeezu alghaffaru
locale.translation: Lord of the heavens and the earth and whatever is between them, the Exalted in Might, the Perpetual Forgiver

locale.transliteration: Qul huwa nabaon AAatheemun
locale.translation: Say, "It is great news

locale.transliteration: Antum AAanhu muAAridoona
locale.translation: From which you turn away

locale.transliteration: Ma kana liya min AAilmin bialmalai alaAAla ith yakhtasimoona
locale.translation: I had no knowledge of the exalted assembly [of angels] when they were disputing [the creation of Adam]

locale.transliteration: In yooha ilayya illa annama ana natheerun mubeenun
locale.translation: It has not been revealed to me except that I am a clear warner

locale.transliteration: Ith qala rabbuka lilmalaikati innee khaliqun basharan min teenin
locale.translation: [So mention] when your Lord said to the angels, "Indeed, I am going to create a human being from clay

locale.transliteration: Faitha sawwaytuhu wanafakhtu feehi min roohee faqaAAoo lahu sajideena
locale.translation: So when I have proportioned him and breathed into him of My [created] soul, then fall down to him in prostration

locale.transliteration: Fasajada almalaikatu kulluhum ajmaAAoona
locale.translation: So the angels prostrated - all of them entirely

locale.transliteration: Illa ibleesa istakbara wakana mina alkafireena
locale.translation: Except Iblees; he was arrogant and became among the disbelievers

locale.transliteration: Qala ya ibleesu ma manaAAaka an tasjuda lima khalaqtu biyadayya astakbarta am kunta mina alAAaleena
locale.translation: [Allah] said, "O Iblees, what prevented you from prostrating to that which I created with My hands? Were you arrogant [then], or were you [already] among the haughty

locale.transliteration: Qala ana khayrun minhu khalaqtanee min narin wakhalaqtahu min teenin
locale.translation: He said, "I am better than him. You created me from fire and created him from clay

locale.transliteration: Qala faokhruj minha fainnaka rajeemun
locale.translation: [Allah] said, "Then get out of Paradise, for indeed, you are expelled

locale.transliteration: Wainna AAalayka laAAnatee ila yawmi alddeeni
locale.translation: And indeed, upon you is My curse until the Day of Recompense

locale.transliteration: Qala rabbi faanthirnee ila yawmi yubAAathoona
locale.translation: He said, "My Lord, then reprieve me until the Day they are resurrected

locale.transliteration: Qala fainnaka mina almunthareena
locale.translation: [Allah] said, "So indeed, you are of those reprieved

locale.transliteration: Ila yawmi alwaqti almaAAloomi
locale.translation: Until the Day of the time well-known

locale.transliteration: Qala fabiAAizzatika laoghwiyannahum ajmaAAeena
locale.translation: [Iblees] said, "By your might, I will surely mislead them all

locale.transliteration: Illa AAibadaka minhumu almukhlaseena
locale.translation: Except, among them, Your chosen servants

locale.transliteration: Qala faalhaqqu waalhaqqa aqoolu
locale.translation: [Allah] said, "The truth [is My oath], and the truth I say

locale.transliteration: Laamlaanna jahannama minka wamimman tabiAAaka minhum ajmaAAeena
locale.translation: [That] I will surely fill Hell with you and those of them that follow you all together

locale.transliteration: Qul ma asalukum AAalayhi min ajrin wama ana mina almutakallifeena
locale.translation: Say, [O Muhammad], "I do not ask you for the Qur'an any payment, and I am not of the pretentious

locale.transliteration: In huwa illa thikrun lilAAalameena
locale.translation: It is but a reminder to the worlds

locale.transliteration: WalataAAlamunna nabaahu baAAda heenin
locale.translation: And you will surely know [the truth of] its information after a time

locale.transliteration: Az-Zumar
locale.translation: The Troops

locale.transliteration: Tanzeelu alkitabi mina Allahi alAAazeezi alhakeemi
locale.translation: The revelation of the Qur'an is from Allah, the Exalted in Might, the Wise

locale.transliteration: Inna anzalna ilayka alkitaba bialhaqqi faoAAbudi Allaha mukhlisan lahu alddeena
locale.translation: Indeed, We have sent down to you the Book, [O Muhammad], in truth. So worship Allah, [being] sincere to Him in religion

locale.transliteration: Ala lillahi alddeenu alkhalisu waallatheena ittakhathoo min doonihi awliyaa ma naAAbuduhum illa liyuqarriboona ila Allahi zulfa inna Allaha yahkumu baynahum fee ma hum feehi yakhtalifoona inna Allaha la yahdee man huwa kathibun kaffarun
locale.translation: Unquestionably, for Allah is the pure religion. And those who take protectors besides Him [say], "We only worship them that they may bring us nearer to Allah in position." Indeed, Allah will judge between them concerning that over which they differ. Indeed, Allah does not guide he who is a liar and [confirmed] disbeliever

locale.transliteration: Law arada Allahu an yattakhitha waladan laistafa mimma yakhluqu ma yashao subhanahu huwa Allahu alwahidu alqahharu
locale.translation: If Allah had intended to take a son, He could have chosen from what He creates whatever He willed. Exalted is He; He is Allah, the One, the Prevailing
