locale.transliteration: In yasha yuskini alrreeha fayathlalna rawakida AAala thahrihi inna fee thalika laayatin likulli sabbarin shakoorin
locale.translation: If He willed, He could still the wind, and they would remain motionless on its surface. Indeed in that are signs for everyone patient and grateful

locale.transliteration: Aw yoobiqhunna bima kasaboo wayaAAfu AAan katheerin
locale.translation: Or He could destroy them for what they earned; but He pardons much

locale.transliteration: WayaAAlama allatheena yujadiloona fee ayatina ma lahum min maheesin
locale.translation: And [that is so] those who dispute concerning Our signs may know that for them there is no place of escape

locale.transliteration: Fama ooteetum min shayin famataAAu alhayati alddunya wama AAinda Allahi khayrun waabqa lillatheena amanoo waAAala rabbihim yatawakkaloona
locale.translation: So whatever thing you have been given - it is but [for] enjoyment of the worldly life. But what is with Allah is better and more lasting for those who have believed and upon their Lord rely

locale.transliteration: Waallatheena yajtaniboona kabaira alithmi waalfawahisha waitha ma ghadiboo hum yaghfiroona
locale.translation: And those who avoid the major sins and immoralities, and when they are angry, they forgive

locale.transliteration: Waallatheena istajaboo lirabbihim waaqamoo alssalata waamruhum shoora baynahum wamimma razaqnahum yunfiqoona
locale.translation: And those who have responded to their lord and established prayer and whose affair is [determined by] consultation among themselves, and from what We have provided them, they spend

locale.transliteration: Waallatheena itha asabahumu albaghyu hum yantasiroona
locale.translation: And those who, when tyranny strikes them, they defend themselves

locale.transliteration: Wajazao sayyiatin sayyiatun mithluha faman AAafa waaslaha faajruhu AAala Allahi innahu la yuhibbu alththalimeena
locale.translation: And the retribution for an evil act is an evil one like it, but whoever pardons and makes reconciliation - his reward is [due] from Allah. Indeed, He does not like wrongdoers

locale.transliteration: Walamani intasara baAAda thulmihi faolaika ma AAalayhim min sabeelin
locale.translation: And whoever avenges himself after having been wronged - those have not upon them any cause [for blame]

locale.transliteration: Innama alssabeelu AAala allatheena yathlimoona alnnasa wayabghoona fee alardi bighayri alhaqqi olaika lahum AAathabun aleemun
locale.translation: The cause is only against the ones who wrong the people and tyrannize upon the earth without right. Those will have a painful punishment

locale.transliteration: Walaman sabara waghafara inna thalika lamin AAazmi alomoori
locale.translation: And whoever is patient and forgives - indeed, that is of the matters [requiring] determination

locale.transliteration: Waman yudlili Allahu fama lahu min waliyyin min baAAdihi watara alththalimeena lamma raawoo alAAathaba yaqooloona hal ila maraddin min sabeelin
locale.translation: And he whom Allah sends astray - for him there is no protector beyond Him. And you will see the wrongdoers, when they see the punishment, saying, "Is there for return [to the former world] any way

locale.transliteration: Watarahum yuAAradoona AAalayha khashiAAeena mina alththulli yanthuroona min tarfin khafiyyin waqala allatheena amanoo inna alkhasireena allatheena khasiroo anfusahum waahleehim yawma alqiyamati ala inna alththalimeena fee AAathabin muqeemin
locale.translation: And you will see them being exposed to the Fire, humbled from humiliation, looking from [behind] a covert glance. And those who had believed will say, "Indeed, the [true] losers are the ones who lost themselves and their families on the Day of Resurrection. Unquestionably, the wrongdoers are in an enduring punishment

locale.transliteration: Wama kana lahum min awliyaa yansuroonahum min dooni Allahi waman yudlili Allahu fama lahu min sabeelin
locale.translation: And there will not be for them any allies to aid them other than Allah. And whoever Allah sends astray - for him there is no way

locale.transliteration: Istajeeboo lirabbikum min qabli an yatiya yawmun la maradda lahu mina Allahi ma lakum min maljain yawmaithin wama lakum min nakeerin
locale.translation: Respond to your Lord before a Day comes from Allah of which there is no repelling. No refuge will you have that day, nor for you will there be any denial

locale.transliteration: Fain aAAradoo fama arsalnaka AAalayhim hafeethan in AAalayka illa albalaghu wainna itha athaqna alinsana minna rahmatan fariha biha wain tusibhum sayyiatun bima qaddamat aydeehim fainna alinsana kafoorun
locale.translation: But if they turn away - then We have not sent you, [O Muhammad], over them as a guardian; upon you is only [the duty of] notification. And indeed, when We let man taste mercy from us, he rejoices in it; but if evil afflicts him for what his hands have put forth, then indeed, man is ungrateful

locale.transliteration: Lillahi mulku alssamawati waalardi yakhluqu ma yashao yahabu liman yashao inathan wayahabu liman yashao alththukoora
locale.translation: To Allah belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth; He creates what he wills. He gives to whom He wills female [children], and He gives to whom He wills males

locale.transliteration: Aw yuzawwijuhum thukranan wainathan wayajAAalu man yashao AAaqeeman innahu AAaleemun qadeerun
locale.translation: Or He makes them [both] males and females, and He renders whom He wills barren. Indeed, He is Knowing and Competent

locale.transliteration: Wama kana libasharin an yukallimahu Allahu illa wahyan aw min warai hijabin aw yursila rasoolan fayoohiya biithnihi ma yashao innahu AAaliyyun hakeemun
locale.translation: And it is not for any human being that Allah should speak to him except by revelation or from behind a partition or that He sends a messenger to reveal, by His permission, what He wills. Indeed, He is Most High and Wise

locale.transliteration: Wakathalika awhayna ilayka roohan min amrina ma kunta tadree ma alkitabu wala aleemanu walakin jaAAalnahu nooran nahdee bihi man nashao min AAibadina wainnaka latahdee ila siratin mustaqeemin
locale.translation: And thus We have revealed to you an inspiration of Our command. You did not know what is the Book or [what is] faith, but We have made it a light by which We guide whom We will of Our servants. And indeed, [O Muhammad], you guide to a straight path

locale.transliteration: Sirati Allahi allathee lahu ma fee alssamawati wama fee alardi ala ila Allahi taseeru alomooru
locale.translation: The path of Allah, to whom belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth. Unquestionably, to Allah do [all] matters evolve

locale.transliteration: Az-Zukhruf
locale.translation: The Ornaments of Gold

locale.transliteration: Hameem
locale.translation: Ha, Meem

locale.transliteration: Waalkitabi almubeeni
locale.translation: By the clear Book

locale.transliteration: Inna jaAAalnahu quranan AAarabiyyan laAAallakum taAAqiloona
locale.translation: Indeed, We have made it an Arabic Qur'an that you might understand

locale.transliteration: Wainnahu fee ommi alkitabi ladayna laAAaliyyun hakeemun
locale.translation: And indeed it is, in the Mother of the Book with Us, exalted and full of wisdom

locale.transliteration: Afanadribu AAankumu alththikra safhan an kuntum qawman musrifeena
locale.translation: Then should We turn the message away, disregarding you, because you are a transgressing people

locale.transliteration: Wakam arsalna min nabiyyin fee alawwaleena
locale.translation: And how many a prophet We sent among the former peoples

locale.transliteration: Wama yateehim min nabiyyin illa kanoo bihi yastahzioona
locale.translation: But there would not come to them a prophet except that they used to ridicule him

locale.transliteration: Faahlakna ashadda minhum batshan wamada mathalu alawwaleena
locale.translation: And We destroyed greater than them in [striking] power, and the example of the former peoples has preceded

locale.transliteration: Walain saaltahum man khalaqa alssamawati waalarda layaqoolunna khalaqahunna alAAazeezu alAAaleemu
locale.translation: And if you should ask them, "Who has created the heavens and the earth?" they would surely say, "They were created by the Exalted in Might, the Knowing

locale.transliteration: Allathee jaAAala lakumu alarda mahdan wajaAAala lakum feeha subulan laAAallakum tahtadoona
locale.translation: [The one] who has made for you the earth a bed and made for you upon it roads that you might be guided

locale.transliteration: Waallathee nazzala mina alssamai maan biqadarin faansharna bihi baldatan maytan kathalika tukhrajoona
locale.translation: And who sends down rain from the sky in measured amounts, and We revive thereby a dead land - thus will you be brought forth

locale.transliteration: Waallathee khalaqa alazwaja kullaha wajaAAala lakum mina alfulki waalanAAami ma tarkaboona
locale.translation: And who created the species, all of them, and has made for you of ships and animals those which you mount

locale.transliteration: Litastawoo AAala thuhoorihi thumma tathkuroo niAAmata rabbikum itha istawaytum AAalayhi wataqooloo subhana allathee sakhkhara lana hatha wama kunna lahu muqrineena
locale.translation: That you may settle yourselves upon their backs and then remember the favor of your Lord when you have settled upon them and say. "Exalted is He who has subjected this to us, and we could not have [otherwise] subdued it

locale.transliteration: Wainna ila rabbina lamunqaliboona
locale.translation: And indeed we, to our Lord, will [surely] return

locale.transliteration: WajaAAaloo lahu min AAibadihi juzan inna alinsana lakafoorun mubeenun
locale.translation: But they have attributed to Him from His servants a portion. Indeed, man is clearly ungrateful

locale.transliteration: Ami ittakhatha mimma yakhluqu banatin waasfakum bialbaneena
locale.translation: Or has He taken, out of what He has created, daughters and chosen you for [having] sons

locale.transliteration: Waitha bushshira ahaduhum bima daraba lilrrahmani mathalan thalla wajhuhu muswaddan wahuwa katheemun
locale.translation: And when one of them is given good tidings of that which he attributes to the Most Merciful in comparison, his face becomes dark, and he suppresses grief

locale.transliteration: Awaman yunashshao fee alhilyati wahuwa fee alkhisami ghayru mubeenin
locale.translation: So is one brought up in ornaments while being during conflict unevident [attributed to Allah]

locale.transliteration: WajaAAaloo almalaikata allatheena hum AAibadu alrrahmani inathan ashahidoo khalqahum satuktabu shahadatuhum wayusaloona
locale.translation: And they have made the angels, who are servants of the Most Merciful, females. Did they witness their creation? Their testimony will be recorded, and they will be questioned

locale.transliteration: Waqaloo law shaa alrrahmanu ma AAabadnahum ma lahum bithalika min AAilmin in hum illa yakhrusoona
locale.translation: And they said, "If the Most Merciful had willed, we would not have worshipped them." They have of that no knowledge. They are not but falsifying

locale.transliteration: Am ataynahum kitaban min qablihi fahum bihi mustamsikoona
locale.translation: Or have We given them a book before the Qur'an to which they are adhering

locale.transliteration: Bal qaloo inna wajadna abaana AAala ommatin wainna AAala atharihim muhtadoona
locale.translation: Rather, they say, "Indeed, we found our fathers upon a religion, and we are in their footsteps [rightly] guided

locale.transliteration: Wakathalika ma arsalna min qablika fee qaryatin min natheerin illa qala mutrafooha inna wajadna abaana AAala ommatin wainna AAala atharihim muqtadoona
locale.translation: And similarly, We did not send before you any warner into a city except that its affluent said, "Indeed, we found our fathers upon a religion, and we are, in their footsteps, following

locale.transliteration: Qala awalaw jitukum biahda mimma wajadtum AAalayhi abaakum qaloo inna bima orsiltum bihi kafiroona
locale.translation: [Each warner] said, "Even if I brought you better guidance than that [religion] upon which you found your fathers?" They said, "Indeed we, in that with which you were sent, are disbelievers

locale.transliteration: Faintaqamna minhum faonthur kayfa kana AAaqibatu almukaththibeena
locale.translation: So we took retribution from them; then see how was the end of the deniers

locale.transliteration: Waith qala ibraheemu liabeehi waqawmihi innanee baraon mimma taAAbudoona
locale.translation: And [mention, O Muhammad], when Abraham said to his father and his people, "Indeed, I am disassociated from that which you worship

locale.transliteration: Illa allathee fataranee fainnahu sayahdeeni
locale.translation: Except for He who created me; and indeed, He will guide me

locale.transliteration: WajaAAalaha kalimatan baqiyatan fee AAaqibihi laAAallahum yarjiAAoona
locale.translation: And he made it a word remaining among his descendants that they might return [to it]

locale.transliteration: Bal mattaAAtu haolai waabaahum hatta jaahumu alhaqqu warasoolun mubeenun
locale.translation: However, I gave enjoyment to these [people of Makkah] and their fathers until there came to them the truth and a clear Messenger

locale.transliteration: Walamma jaahumu alhaqqu qaloo hatha sihrun wainna bihi kafiroona
locale.translation: But when the truth came to them, they said, "This is magic, and indeed we are, concerning it, disbelievers

locale.transliteration: Waqaloo lawla nuzzila hatha alquranu AAala rajulin mina alqaryatayni AAatheemun
locale.translation: And they said, "Why was this Qur'an not sent down upon a great man from [one of] the two cities

locale.transliteration: Ahum yaqsimoona rahmata rabbika nahnu qasamna baynahum maAAeeshatahum fee alhayati alddunya warafaAAna baAAdahum fawqa baAAdin darajatin liyattakhitha baAAduhum baAAdan sukhriyyan warahmatu rabbika khayrun mimma yajmaAAoona
locale.translation: Do they distribute the mercy of your Lord? It is We who have apportioned among them their livelihood in the life of this world and have raised some of them above others in degrees [of rank] that they may make use of one another for service. But the mercy of your Lord is better than whatever they accumulate

locale.transliteration: Walawla an yakoona alnnasu ommatan wahidatan lajaAAalna liman yakfuru bialrrahmani libuyootihim suqufan min fiddatin wamaAAarija AAalayha yathharoona
locale.translation: And if it were not that the people would become one community [of disbelievers], We would have made for those who disbelieve in the Most Merciful - for their houses - ceilings and stairways of silver upon which to mount

locale.transliteration: Walibuyootihim abwaban wasururan AAalayha yattakioona
locale.translation: And for their houses - doors and couches [of silver] upon which to recline

locale.transliteration: Wazukhrufan wain kullu thalika lamma mataAAu alhayati alddunya waalakhiratu AAinda rabbika lilmuttaqeena
locale.translation: And gold ornament. But all that is not but the enjoyment of worldly life. And the Hereafter with your Lord is for the righteous

locale.transliteration: Waman yaAAshu AAan thikri alrrahmani nuqayyid lahu shaytanan fahuwa lahu qareenun
locale.translation: And whoever is blinded from remembrance of the Most Merciful - We appoint for him a devil, and he is to him a companion

locale.transliteration: Wainnahum layasuddoonahum AAani alssabeeli wayahsaboona annahum muhtadoona
locale.translation: And indeed, the devils avert them from the way [of guidance] while they think that they are [rightly] guided

locale.transliteration: Hatta itha jaana qala ya layta baynee wabaynaka buAAda almashriqayni fabisa alqareenu
locale.translation: Until, when he comes to Us [at Judgement], he says [to his companion], "Oh, I wish there was between me and you the distance between the east and west - how wretched a companion

locale.transliteration: Walan yanfaAAakumu alyawma ith thalamtum annakum fee alAAathabi mushtarikoona
locale.translation: And never will it benefit you that Day, when you have wronged, that you are [all] sharing in the punishment

locale.transliteration: Afaanta tusmiAAu alssumma aw tahdee alAAumya waman kana fee dalalin mubeenin
locale.translation: Then will you make the deaf hear, [O Muhammad], or guide the blind or he who is in clear error

locale.transliteration: Faimma nathhabanna bika fainna minhum muntaqimoona
locale.translation: And whether [or not] We take you away [in death], indeed, We will take retribution upon them

locale.transliteration: Aw nuriyannaka allathee waAAadnahum fainna AAalayhim muqtadiroona
locale.translation: Or whether [or not] We show you that which We have promised them, indeed, We are Perfect in Ability

locale.transliteration: Faistamsik biallathee oohiya ilayka innaka AAala siratin mustaqeemin
locale.translation: So adhere to that which is revealed to you. Indeed, you are on a straight path

locale.transliteration: Wainnahu lathikrun laka waliqawmika wasawfa tusaloona
locale.translation: And indeed, it is a remembrance for you and your people, and you [all] are going to be questioned

locale.transliteration: Waisal man arsalna min qablika min rusulina ajaAAalna min dooni alrrahmani alihatan yuAAbadoona
locale.translation: And ask those We sent before you of Our messengers; have We made besides the Most Merciful deities to be worshipped

locale.transliteration: Walaqad arsalna moosa biayatina ila firAAawna wamalaihi faqala innee rasoolu rabbi alAAalameena
locale.translation: And certainly did We send Moses with Our signs to Pharaoh and his establishment, and he said, "Indeed, I am the messenger of the Lord of the worlds

locale.transliteration: Falamma jaahum biayatina itha hum minha yadhakoona
locale.translation: But when he brought them Our signs, at once they laughed at them

locale.transliteration: Wama nureehim min ayatin illa hiya akbaru min okhtiha waakhathnahum bialAAathabi laAAallahum yarjiAAoona
locale.translation: And We showed them not a sign except that it was greater than its sister, and We seized them with affliction that perhaps they might return [to faith]

locale.transliteration: Waqaloo ya ayyuha alsahiru odAAu lana rabbaka bima AAahida AAindaka innana lamuhtadoona
locale.translation: And they said [to Moses], "O magician, invoke for us your Lord by what He has promised you. Indeed, we will be guided

locale.transliteration: Falamma kashafna AAanhumu alAAathaba itha hum yankuthoona
locale.translation: But when We removed from them the affliction, at once they broke their word

locale.transliteration: Wanada firAAawnu fee qawmihi qala ya qawmi alaysa lee mulku misra wahathihi alanharu tajree min tahtee afala tubsiroona
locale.translation: And Pharaoh called out among his people; he said, "O my people, does not the kingdom of Egypt belong to me, and these rivers flowing beneath me; then do you not see

locale.transliteration: Am ana khayrun min hatha allathee huwa maheenun wala yakadu yubeenu
locale.translation: Or am I [not] better than this one who is insignificant and hardly makes himself clear

locale.transliteration: Falawla olqiya AAalayhi aswiratun min thahabin aw jaa maAAahu almalaikatu muqtarineena
locale.translation: Then why have there not been placed upon him bracelets of gold or come with him the angels in conjunction

locale.transliteration: Faistakhaffa qawmahu faataAAoohu innahum kanoo qawman fasiqeena
locale.translation: So he bluffed his people, and they obeyed him. Indeed, they were [themselves] a people defiantly disobedient [of Allah]

locale.transliteration: Falamma asafoona intaqamna minhum faaghraqnahum ajmaAAeena
locale.translation: And when they angered Us, We took retribution from them and drowned them all

locale.transliteration: FajaAAalnahum salafan wamathalan lilakhireena
locale.translation: And We made them a precedent and an example for the later peoples

locale.transliteration: Walamma duriba ibnu maryama mathalan itha qawmuka minhu yasiddoona
locale.translation: And when the son of Mary was presented as an example, immediately your people laughed aloud

locale.transliteration: Waqaloo aalihatuna khayrun am huwa ma daraboohu laka illa jadalan bal hum qawmun khasimoona
locale.translation: And they said, "Are your gods better, or is he?" They did not present the comparison except for [mere] argument. But, [in fact], they are a people prone to dispute

locale.transliteration: In huwa illa AAabdun anAAamna AAalayhi wajaAAalnahu mathalan libanee israeela
locale.translation: Jesus was not but a servant upon whom We bestowed favor, and We made him an example for the Children of Israel

locale.transliteration: Walaw nashao lajaAAalna minkum malaikatan fee alardi yakhlufoona
locale.translation: And if We willed, We could have made [instead] of you angels succeeding [one another] on the earth

locale.transliteration: Wainnahu laAAilmun lilssaAAati fala tamtarunna biha waittabiAAooni hatha siratun mustaqeemun
locale.translation: And indeed, Jesus will be [a sign for] knowledge of the Hour, so be not in doubt of it, and follow Me. This is a straight path

locale.transliteration: Wala yasuddannakumu alshshaytanu innahu lakum AAaduwwun mubeenun
locale.translation: And never let Satan avert you. Indeed, he is to you a clear enemy

locale.transliteration: Walamma jaa AAeesa bialbayyinati qala qad jitukum bialhikmati waliobayyina lakum baAAda allathee takhtalifoona feehi faittaqoo Allaha waateeAAooni
locale.translation: And when Jesus brought clear proofs, he said, "I have come to you with wisdom and to make clear to you some of that over which you differ, so fear Allah and obey me

locale.transliteration: Inna Allaha huwa rabbee warabbukum faoAAbudoohu hatha siratun mustaqeemun
locale.translation: Indeed, Allah is my Lord and your Lord, so worship Him. This is a straight path

locale.transliteration: Faikhtalafa alahzabu min baynihim fawaylun lillatheena thalamoo min AAathabi yawmin aleemin
locale.translation: But the denominations from among them differed [and separated], so woe to those who have wronged from the punishment of a painful Day

locale.transliteration: Hal yanthuroona illa alssaAAata an tatiyahum baghtatan wahum la yashAAuroona
locale.translation: Are they waiting except for the Hour to come upon them suddenly while they perceive not

locale.transliteration: Alakhillao yawmaithin baAAduhum libaAAdin AAaduwwun illa almuttaqeena
locale.translation: Close friends, that Day, will be enemies to each other, except for the righteous

locale.transliteration: Ya AAibadi la khawfun AAalaykumu alyawma wala antum tahzanoona
locale.translation: [To whom Allah will say], "O My servants, no fear will there be concerning you this Day, nor will you grieve

locale.transliteration: Allatheena amanoo biayatina wakanoo muslimeena
locale.translation: [You] who believed in Our verses and were Muslims

locale.transliteration: Odkhuloo aljannata antum waazwajukum tuhbaroona
locale.translation: Enter Paradise, you and your kinds, delighted

locale.transliteration: Yutafu AAalayhim bisihafin min thahabin waakwabin wafeeha ma tashtaheehi alanfusu watalaththu alaAAyunu waantum feeha khalidoona
locale.translation: Circulated among them will be plates and vessels of gold. And therein is whatever the souls desire and [what] delights the eyes, and you will abide therein eternally

locale.transliteration: Watilka aljannatu allatee oorithtumooha bima kuntum taAAmaloona
locale.translation: And that is Paradise which you are made to inherit for what you used to do

locale.transliteration: Lakum feeha fakihatun katheeratun minha takuloona
locale.translation: For you therein is much fruit from which you will eat

locale.transliteration: Inna almujrimeena fee AAathabi jahannama khalidoona
locale.translation: Indeed, the criminals will be in the punishment of Hell, abiding eternally

locale.transliteration: La yufattaru AAanhum wahum feehi mublisoona
locale.translation: It will not be allowed to subside for them, and they, therein, are in despair

locale.transliteration: Wama thalamnahum walakin kanoo humu alththalimeena
locale.translation: And We did not wrong them, but it was they who were the wrongdoers

locale.transliteration: Wanadaw ya maliku liyaqdi AAalayna rabbuka qala innakum makithoona
locale.translation: And they will call, "O Malik, let your Lord put an end to us!" He will say, "Indeed, you will remain

locale.transliteration: Laqad jinakum bialhaqqi walakinna aktharakum lilhaqqi karihoona
locale.translation: We had certainly brought you the truth, but most of you, to the truth, were averse

locale.transliteration: Am abramoo amran fainna mubrimoona
locale.translation: Or have they devised [some] affair? But indeed, We are devising [a plan]

locale.transliteration: Am yahsaboona anna la nasmaAAu sirrahum wanajwahum bala warusuluna ladayhim yaktuboona
locale.translation: Or do they think that We hear not their secrets and their private conversations? Yes, [We do], and Our messengers are with them recording

locale.transliteration: Qul in kana lilrrahmani waladun faana awwalu alAAabideena
locale.translation: Say, [O Muhammad], "If the Most Merciful had a son, then I would be the first of [his] worshippers

locale.transliteration: Subhana rabbi alssamawati waalardi rabbi alAAarshi AAamma yasifoona
locale.translation: Exalted is the Lord of the heavens and the earth, Lord of the Throne, above what they describe

locale.transliteration: Fatharhum yakhoodoo wayalAAaboo hatta yulaqoo yawmahumu allathee yooAAadoona
locale.translation: So leave them to converse vainly and amuse themselves until they meet their Day which they are promised

locale.transliteration: Wahuwa allathee fee alssamai ilahun wafee alardi ilahun wahuwa alhakeemu alAAaleemu
locale.translation: And it is Allah who is [the only] deity in the heaven, and on the earth [the only] deity. And He is the Wise, the Knowing

locale.transliteration: Watabaraka allathee lahu mulku alssamawati waalardi wama baynahuma waAAindahu AAilmu alssaAAati wailayhi turjaAAoona
locale.translation: And blessed is He to whom belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth and whatever is between them and with whom is knowledge of the Hour and to whom you will be returned

locale.transliteration: Wala yamliku allatheena yadAAoona min doonihi alshshafaAAata illa man shahida bialhaqqi wahum yaAAlamoona
locale.translation: And those they invoke besides Him do not possess [power of] intercession; but only those who testify to the truth [can benefit], and they know

locale.transliteration: Walain saaltahum man khalaqahum layaqoolunna Allahu faanna yufakoona
locale.translation: And if you asked them who created them, they would surely say, "Allah." So how are they deluded

locale.transliteration: Waqeelihi yarabbi inna haolai qawmun la yuminoona
locale.translation: And [Allah acknowledges] his saying, "O my Lord, indeed these are a people who do not believe

locale.transliteration: Faisfah AAanhum waqul salamun fasawfa yaAAlamoona
locale.translation: So turn aside from them and say, "Peace." But they are going to know

locale.transliteration: Ad-Dukhan
locale.translation: The Smoke

locale.transliteration: Hameem
locale.translation: Ha, Meem

locale.transliteration: Waalkitabi almubeeni
locale.translation: By the clear Book

locale.transliteration: Inna anzalnahu fee laylatin mubarakatin inna kunna munthireena
locale.translation: Indeed, We sent it down during a blessed night. Indeed, We were to warn [mankind]

locale.transliteration: Feeha yufraqu kullu amrin hakeemin
locale.translation: On that night is made distinct every precise matter

locale.transliteration: Amran min AAindina inna kunna mursileena
locale.translation: [Every] matter [proceeding] from Us. Indeed, We were to send [a messenger]

locale.transliteration: Rahmatan min rabbika innahu huwa alssameeAAu alAAaleemu
locale.translation: As mercy from your Lord. Indeed, He is the Hearing, the Knowing

locale.transliteration: Rabbi alssamawati waalardi wama baynahuma in kuntum mooqineena
locale.translation: Lord of the heavens and the earth and that between them, if you would be certain

locale.transliteration: La ilaha illa huwa yuhyee wayumeetu rabbukum warabbu abaikumu alawwaleena
locale.translation: There is no deity except Him; He gives life and causes death. [He is] your Lord and the Lord of your first forefathers

locale.transliteration: Bal hum fee shakkin yalAAaboona
locale.translation: But they are in doubt, amusing themselves

locale.transliteration: Fairtaqib yawma tatee alssamao bidukhanin mubeenin
locale.translation: Then watch for the Day when the sky will bring a visible smoke

locale.transliteration: Yaghsha alnnasa hatha AAathabun aleemun
locale.translation: Covering the people; this is a painful torment

locale.transliteration: Rabbana ikshif AAanna alAAathaba inna muminoona
locale.translation: [They will say], "Our Lord, remove from us the torment; indeed, we are believers

locale.transliteration: Anna lahumu alththikra waqad jaahum rasoolun mubeenun
locale.translation: How will there be for them a reminder [at that time]? And there had come to them a clear Messenger

locale.transliteration: Thumma tawallaw AAanhu waqaloo muAAallamun majnoonun
locale.translation: Then they turned away from him and said, "[He was] taught [and is] a madman

locale.transliteration: Inna kashifoo alAAathabi qaleelan innakum AAaidoona
locale.translation: Indeed, We will remove the torment for a little. Indeed, you [disbelievers] will return [to disbelief]

locale.transliteration: Yawma nabtishu albatshata alkubra inna muntaqimoona
locale.translation: The Day We will strike with the greatest assault, indeed, We will take retribution

locale.transliteration: Walaqad fatanna qablahum qawma firAAawna wajaahum rasoolun kareemun
locale.translation: And We had already tried before them the people of Pharaoh, and there came to them a noble messenger

locale.transliteration: An addoo ilayya AAibada Allahi innee lakum rasoolun ameenun
locale.translation: [Saying], "Render to me the servants of Allah. Indeed, I am to you a trustworthy messenger

locale.transliteration: Waan la taAAloo AAala Allahi innee ateekum bisultanin mubeenin
locale.translation: And [saying], "Be not haughty with Allah. Indeed, I have come to you with clear authority

locale.transliteration: Wainnee AAuthtu birabbee warabbikum an tarjumooni
locale.translation: And indeed, I have sought refuge in my Lord and your Lord, lest you stone me

locale.transliteration: Wain lam tuminoo lee faiAAtazilooni
locale.translation: But if you do not believe me, then leave me alone

locale.transliteration: FadaAAa rabbahu anna haolai qawmun mujrimoona
locale.translation: And [finally] he called to his Lord that these were a criminal people

locale.transliteration: Faasri biAAibadee laylan innakum muttabaAAoona
locale.translation: [Allah said], "Then set out with My servants by night. Indeed, you are to be pursued

locale.transliteration: Waotruki albahra rahwan innahum jundun mughraqoona
locale.translation: And leave the sea in stillness. Indeed, they are an army to be drowned

locale.transliteration: Kam tarakoo min jannatin waAAuyoonin
locale.translation: How much they left behind of gardens and springs

locale.transliteration: WazurooAAin wamaqamin kareemin
locale.translation: And crops and noble sites

locale.transliteration: WanaAAmatin kanoo feeha fakiheena
locale.translation: And comfort wherein they were amused

locale.transliteration: Kathalika waawrathnaha qawman akhareena
locale.translation: Thus. And We caused to inherit it another people

locale.transliteration: Fama bakat AAalayhimu alssamao waalardu wama kanoo munthareena
locale.translation: And the heaven and earth wept not for them, nor were they reprieved

locale.transliteration: Walaqad najjayna banee israeela mina alAAathabi almuheeni
locale.translation: And We certainly saved the Children of Israel from the humiliating torment

locale.transliteration: Min firAAawna innahu kana AAaliyan mina almusrifeena
locale.translation: From Pharaoh. Indeed, he was a haughty one among the transgressors

locale.transliteration: Walaqadi ikhtarnahum AAala AAilmin AAala alAAalameena
locale.translation: And We certainly chose them by knowledge over [all] the worlds

locale.transliteration: Waataynahum mina alayati ma feehi balaon mubeenun
locale.translation: And We gave them of signs that in which there was a clear trial

locale.transliteration: Inna haolai layaqooloona
locale.translation: Indeed, these [disbelievers] are saying

locale.transliteration: In hiya illa mawtatuna aloola wama nahnu bimunshareena
locale.translation: There is not but our first death, and we will not be resurrected

locale.transliteration: Fatoo biabaina in kuntum sadiqeena
locale.translation: Then bring [back] our forefathers, if you should be truthful

locale.transliteration: Ahum khayrun am qawmu tubbaAAin waallatheena min qablihim ahlaknahum innahum kanoo mujrimeena
locale.translation: Are they better or the people of Tubba' and those before them? We destroyed them, [for] indeed, they were criminals

locale.transliteration: Wama khalaqna alssamawati waalarda wama baynahuma laAAibeena
locale.translation: And We did not create the heavens and earth and that between them in play

locale.transliteration: Ma khalaqnahuma illa bialhaqqi walakinna aktharahum la yaAAlamoona
locale.translation: We did not create them except in truth, but most of them do not know

locale.transliteration: Inna yawma alfasli meeqatuhum ajmaAAeena
locale.translation: Indeed, the Day of Judgement is the appointed time for them all

locale.transliteration: Yawma la yughnee mawlan AAan mawlan shayan wala hum yunsaroona
locale.translation: The Day when no relation will avail a relation at all, nor will they be helped

locale.transliteration: Illa man rahima Allahu innahu huwa alAAazeezu alrraheemu
locale.translation: Except those [believers] on whom Allah has mercy. Indeed, He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful

locale.transliteration: Inna shajarata alzzaqqoomi
locale.translation: Indeed, the tree of zaqqum

locale.transliteration: TaAAamu alatheemi
locale.translation: Is food for the sinful

locale.transliteration: Kaalmuhli yaghlee fee albutooni
locale.translation: Like murky oil, it boils within bellies

locale.transliteration: Kaghalyi alhameemi
locale.translation: Like the boiling of scalding water

locale.transliteration: Khuthoohu faiAAtiloohu ila sawai aljaheemi
locale.translation: [It will be commanded], "Seize him and drag him into the midst of the Hellfire

locale.transliteration: Thumma subboo fawqa rasihi min AAathabi alhameemi
locale.translation: Then pour over his head from the torment of scalding water

locale.transliteration: Thuq innaka anta alAAazeezu alkareemu
locale.translation: [It will be said], "Taste! Indeed, you are the honored, the noble

locale.transliteration: Inna hatha ma kuntum bihi tamtaroona
locale.translation: Indeed, this is what you used to dispute

locale.transliteration: Inna almuttaqeena fee maqamin ameenin
locale.translation: Indeed, the righteous will be in a secure place

locale.transliteration: Fee jannatin waAAuyoonin
locale.translation: Within gardens and springs

locale.transliteration: Yalbasoona min sundusin waistabraqin mutaqabileena
locale.translation: Wearing [garments of] fine silk and brocade, facing each other

locale.transliteration: Kathalika wazawwajnahum bihoorin AAeenin
locale.translation: Thus. And We will marry them to fair women with large, [beautiful] eyes

locale.transliteration: YadAAoona feeha bikulli fakihatin amineena
locale.translation: They will call therein for every [kind of] fruit - safe and secure

locale.transliteration: La yathooqoona feeha almawta illa almawtata aloola wawaqahum AAathaba aljaheemi
locale.translation: They will not taste death therein except the first death, and He will have protected them from the punishment of Hellfire

locale.transliteration: Fadlan min rabbika thalika huwa alfawzu alAAatheemu
locale.translation: As bounty from your Lord. That is what is the great attainment

locale.transliteration: Fainnama yassarnahu bilisanika laAAallahum yatathakkaroona
locale.translation: And indeed, We have eased the Qur'an in your tongue that they might be reminded

locale.transliteration: Fairtaqib innahum murtaqiboona
locale.translation: So watch, [O Muhammad]; indeed, they are watching [for your end]

locale.transliteration: Al-Jathiyah
locale.translation: The Crouching

locale.transliteration: Hameem
locale.translation: Ha, Meem

locale.transliteration: Tanzeelu alkitabi mina Allahi alAAazeezi alhakeemi
locale.translation: The revelation of the Book is from Allah, the Exalted in Might, the Wise

locale.transliteration: Inna fee alssamawati waalardi laayatin lilmumineena
locale.translation: Indeed, within the heavens and earth are signs for the believers

locale.transliteration: Wafee khalqikum wama yabuththu min dabbatin ayatun liqawmin yooqinoona
locale.translation: And in the creation of yourselves and what He disperses of moving creatures are signs for people who are certain [in faith]

locale.transliteration: Waikhtilafi allayli waalnnahari wama anzala Allahu mina alssamai min rizqin faahya bihi alarda baAAda mawtiha watasreefi alrriyahi ayatun liqawmin yaAAqiloona
locale.translation: And [in] the alternation of night and day and [in] what Allah sends down from the sky of provision and gives life thereby to the earth after its lifelessness and [in His] directing of the winds are signs for a people who reason

locale.transliteration: Tilka ayatu Allahi natlooha AAalayka bialhaqqi fabiayyi hadeethin baAAda Allahi waayatihi yuminoona
locale.translation: These are the verses of Allah which We recite to you in truth. Then in what statement after Allah and His verses will they believe

locale.transliteration: Waylun likulli affakin atheemin
locale.translation: Woe to every sinful liar

locale.transliteration: YasmaAAu ayati Allahi tutla AAalayhi thumma yusirru mustakbiran kaan lam yasmaAAha fabashshirhu biAAathabin aleemin
locale.translation: Who hears the verses of Allah recited to him, then persists arrogantly as if he had not heard them. So give him tidings of a painful punishment

locale.transliteration: Waitha AAalima min ayatina shayan ittakhathaha huzuwan olaika lahum AAathabun muheenun
locale.translation: And when he knows anything of Our verses, he takes them in ridicule. Those will have a humiliating punishment

locale.transliteration: Min waraihim jahannamu wala yughnee AAanhum ma kasaboo shayan wala ma ittakhathoo min dooni Allahi awliyaa walahum AAathabun AAatheemun
locale.translation: Before them is Hell, and what they had earned will not avail them at all nor what they had taken besides Allah as allies. And they will have a great punishment

locale.transliteration: Hatha hudan waallatheena kafaroo biayati rabbihim lahum AAathabun min rijzin aleemin
locale.translation: This [Qur'an] is guidance. And those who have disbelieved in the verses of their Lord will have a painful punishment of foul nature

locale.transliteration: Allahu allathee sakhkhara lakumu albahra litajriya alfulku feehi biamrihi walitabtaghoo min fadlihi walaAAallakum tashkuroona
locale.translation: It is Allah who subjected to you the sea so that ships may sail upon it by His command and that you may seek of His bounty; and perhaps you will be grateful

locale.transliteration: Wasakhkhara lakum ma fee alssamawati wama fee alardi jameeAAan minhu inna fee thalika laayatin liqawmin yatafakkaroona
locale.translation: And He has subjected to you whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth - all from Him. Indeed in that are signs for a people who give thought

locale.transliteration: Qul lillatheena amanoo yaghfiroo lillatheena la yarjoona ayyama Allahi liyajziya qawman bima kanoo yaksiboona
locale.translation: Say, [O Muhammad], to those who have believed that they [should] forgive those who expect not the days of Allah so that He may recompense a people for what they used to earn

locale.transliteration: Man AAamila salihan falinafsihi waman asaa faAAalayha thumma ila rabbikum turjaAAoona
locale.translation: Whoever does a good deed - it is for himself; and whoever does evil - it is against the self. Then to your Lord you will be returned

locale.transliteration: Walaqad atayna banee israeela alkitaba waalhukma waalnnubuwwata warazaqnahum mina alttayyibati wafaddalnahum AAala alAAalameena
locale.translation: And We did certainly give the Children of Israel the Scripture and judgement and prophethood, and We provided them with good things and preferred them over the worlds

locale.transliteration: Waataynahum bayyinatin mina alamri fama ikhtalafoo illa min baAAdi ma jaahumu alAAilmu baghyan baynahum inna rabbaka yaqdee baynahum yawma alqiyamati feema kanoo feehi yakhtalifoona
locale.translation: And We gave them clear proofs of the matter [of religion]. And they did not differ except after knowledge had come to them - out of jealous animosity between themselves. Indeed, your Lord will judge between them on the Day of Resurrection concerning that over which they used to differ

locale.transliteration: Thumma jaAAalnaka AAala shareeAAatin mina alamri faittabiAAha wala tattabiAA ahwaa allatheena la yaAAlamoona
locale.translation: Then We put you, [O Muhammad], on an ordained way concerning the matter [of religion]; so follow it and do not follow the inclinations of those who do not know

locale.transliteration: Innahum lan yughnoo AAanka mina Allahi shayan wainna alththalimeena baAAduhum awliyao baAAdin waAllahu waliyyu almuttaqeena
locale.translation: Indeed, they will never avail you against Allah at all. And indeed, the wrongdoers are allies of one another; but Allah is the protector of the righteous

locale.transliteration: Hatha basairu lilnnasi wahudan warahmatun liqawmin yooqinoona
locale.translation: This [Qur'an] is enlightenment for mankind and guidance and mercy for a people who are certain [in faith]

locale.transliteration: Am hasiba allatheena ijtarahoo alssayyiati an najAAalahum kaallatheena amanoo waAAamiloo alssalihati sawaan mahyahum wamamatuhum saa ma yahkumoona
locale.translation: Or do those who commit evils think We will make them like those who have believed and done righteous deeds - [make them] equal in their life and their death? Evil is that which they judge

locale.transliteration: Wakhalaqa Allahu alssamawati waalarda bialhaqqi walitujza kullu nafsin bima kasabat wahum la yuthlamoona
locale.translation: And Allah created the heavens and earth in truth and so that every soul may be recompensed for what it has earned, and they will not be wronged

locale.transliteration: Afaraayta mani ittakhatha ilahahu hawahu waadallahu Allahu AAala AAilmin wakhatama AAala samAAihi waqalbihi wajaAAala AAala basarihi ghishawatan faman yahdeehi min baAAdi Allahi afala tathakkaroona
locale.translation: Have you seen he who has taken as his god his [own] desire, and Allah has sent him astray due to knowledge and has set a seal upon his hearing and his heart and put over his vision a veil? So who will guide him after Allah? Then will you not be reminded

locale.transliteration: Waqaloo ma hiya illa hayatuna alddunya namootu wanahya wama yuhlikuna illa alddahru wama lahum bithalika min AAilmin in hum illa yathunnoona
locale.translation: And they say, "There is not but our worldly life; we die and live, and nothing destroys us except time." And they have of that no knowledge; they are only assuming

locale.transliteration: Waitha tutla AAalayhim ayatuna bayyinatin ma kana hujjatahum illa an qaloo itoo biabaina in kuntum sadiqeena
locale.translation: And when Our verses are recited to them as clear evidences, their argument is only that they say, "Bring [back] our forefathers, if you should be truthful

locale.transliteration: Quli Allahu yuhyeekum thumma yumeetukum thumma yajmaAAukum ila yawmi alqiyamati la rayba feehi walakinna akthara alnnasi la yaAAlamoona
locale.translation: Say, "Allah causes you to live, then causes you to die; then He will assemble you for the Day of Resurrection, about which there is no doubt, but most of the people do not know

locale.transliteration: Walillahi mulku alssamawati waalardi wayawma taqoomu alssaAAatu yawmaithin yakhsaru almubtiloona
locale.translation: And to Allah belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth. And the Day the Hour appears - that Day the falsifiers will lose

locale.transliteration: Watara kulla ommatin jathiyatan kullu ommatin tudAAa ila kitabiha alyawma tujzawna ma kuntum taAAmaloona
locale.translation: And you will see every nation kneeling [from fear]. Every nation will be called to its record [and told], "Today you will be recompensed for what you used to do

locale.transliteration: Hatha kitabuna yantiqu AAalaykum bialhaqqi inna kunna nastansikhu ma kuntum taAAmaloona
locale.translation: This, Our record, speaks about you in truth. Indeed, We were having transcribed whatever you used to do

locale.transliteration: Faamma allatheena amanoo waAAamiloo alssalihati fayudkhiluhum rabbuhum fee rahmatihi thalika huwa alfawzu almubeenu
locale.translation: So as for those who believed and did righteous deeds, their Lord will admit them into His mercy. That is what is the clear attainment

locale.transliteration: Waamma allatheena kafaroo afalam takun ayatee tutla AAalaykum faistakbartum wakuntum qawman mujrimeena
locale.translation: But as for those who disbelieved, [it will be said], "Were not Our verses recited to you, but you were arrogant and became a people of criminals

locale.transliteration: Waitha qeela inna waAAda Allahi haqqun waalssaAAatu la rayba feeha qultum ma nadree ma alssaAAatu in nathunnu illa thannan wama nahnu bimustayqineena
locale.translation: And when it was said, 'Indeed, the promise of Allah is truth and the Hour [is coming] - no doubt about it,' you said, 'We know not what is the Hour. We assume only assumption, and we are not convinced

locale.transliteration: Wabada lahum sayyiatu ma AAamiloo wahaqa bihim ma kanoo bihi yastahzioona
locale.translation: And the evil consequences of what they did will appear to them, and they will be enveloped by what they used to ridicule

locale.transliteration: Waqeela alyawma nansakum kama naseetum liqaa yawmikum hatha wamawakumu alnnaru wama lakum min nasireena
locale.translation: And it will be said, "Today We will forget you as you forgot the meeting of this Day of yours, and your refuge is the Fire, and for you there are no helpers

locale.transliteration: Thalikum biannakumu ittakhathtum ayati Allahi huzuwan wagharratkumu alhayatu alddunya faalyawma la yukhrajoona minha wala hum yustaAAtaboona
locale.translation: That is because you took the verses of Allah in ridicule, and worldly life deluded you." So that Day they will not be removed from it, nor will they be asked to appease [Allah]

locale.transliteration: Falillahi alhamdu rabbi alssamawati warabbi alardi rabbi alAAalameena
locale.translation: Then, to Allah belongs [all] praise - Lord of the heavens and Lord of the earth, Lord of the worlds

locale.transliteration: Walahu alkibriyao fee alssamawati waalardi wahuwa alAAazeezu alhakeemu
locale.translation: And to Him belongs [all] grandeur within the heavens and the earth, and He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise

locale.transliteration: Al-Ahqaf
locale.translation: The Wind-Curved Sandhills

locale.transliteration: Hameem
locale.translation: Ha, Meem

locale.transliteration: Tanzeelu alkitabi mina Allahi alAAazeezi alhakeemi
locale.translation: The revelation of the Book is from Allah, the Exalted in Might, the Wise

locale.transliteration: Ma khalaqna alssamawati waalarda wama baynahuma illa bialhaqqi waajalin musamman waallatheena kafaroo AAamma onthiroo muAAridoona
locale.translation: We did not create the heavens and earth and what is between them except in truth and [for] a specified term. But those who disbelieve, from that of which they are warned, are turning away

locale.transliteration: Qul araaytum ma tadAAoona min dooni Allahi aroonee matha khalaqoo mina alardi am lahum shirkun fee alssamawati eetoonee bikitabin min qabli hatha aw atharatin min AAilmin in kuntum sadiqeena
locale.translation: Say, [O Muhammad], "Have you considered that which you invoke besides Allah? Show me what they have created of the earth; or did they have partnership in [creation of] the heavens? Bring me a scripture [revealed] before this or a [remaining] trace of knowledge, if you should be truthful

locale.transliteration: Waman adallu mimman yadAAoo min dooni Allahi man la yastajeebu lahu ila yawmi alqiyamati wahum AAan duAAaihim ghafiloona
locale.translation: And who is more astray than he who invokes besides Allah those who will not respond to him until the Day of Resurrection, and they, of their invocation, are unaware

locale.transliteration: Waitha hushira alnnasu kanoo lahum aAAdaan wakanoo biAAibadatihim kafireena
locale.translation: And when the people are gathered [that Day], they [who were invoked] will be enemies to them, and they will be deniers of their worship

locale.transliteration: Waitha tutla AAalayhim ayatuna bayyinatin qala allatheena kafaroo lilhaqqi lamma jaahum hatha sihrun mubeenun
locale.translation: And when Our verses are recited to them as clear evidences, those who disbelieve say of the truth when it has come to them, "This is obvious magic

locale.transliteration: Am yaqooloona iftarahu qul ini iftaraytuhu fala tamlikoona lee mina Allahi shayan huwa aAAlamu bima tufeedoona feehi kafa bihi shaheedan baynee wabaynakum wahuwa alghafooru alrraheemu
locale.translation: Or do they say, "He has invented it?" Say, "If I have invented it, you will not possess for me [the power of protection] from Allah at all. He is most knowing of that in which you are involved. Sufficient is He as Witness between me and you, and He is the Forgiving the Merciful

locale.transliteration: Qul ma kuntu bidAAan mina alrrusuli wama adree ma yufAAalu bee wala bikum in attabiAAu illa ma yooha ilayya wama ana illa natheerun mubeenun
locale.translation: Say, "I am not something original among the messengers, nor do I know what will be done with me or with you. I only follow that which is revealed to me, and I am not but a clear warner

locale.transliteration: Qul araaytum in kana min AAindi Allahi wakafartum bihi washahida shahidun min banee israeela AAala mithlihi faamana waistakbartum inna Allaha la yahdee alqawma alththalimeena
locale.translation: Say, "Have you considered: if the Qur'an was from Allah, and you disbelieved in it while a witness from the Children of Israel has testified to something similar and believed while you were arrogant...?" Indeed, Allah does not guide the wrongdoing people

locale.transliteration: Waqala allatheena kafaroo lillatheena amanoo law kana khayran ma sabaqoona ilayhi waith lam yahtadoo bihi fasayaqooloona hatha ifkun qadeemun
locale.translation: And those who disbelieve say of those who believe, "If it had [truly] been good, they would not have preceded us to it." And when they are not guided by it, they will say, "This is an ancient falsehood

locale.transliteration: Wamin qablihi kitabu moosa imaman warahmatan wahatha kitabun musaddiqun lisanan AAarabiyyan liyunthira allatheena thalamoo wabushra lilmuhsineena
locale.translation: And before it was the scripture of Moses to lead and as a mercy. And this is a confirming Book in an Arabic tongue to warn those who have wronged and as good tidings to the doers of good

locale.transliteration: Inna allatheena qaloo rabbuna Allahu thumma istaqamoo fala khawfun AAalayhim wala hum yahzanoona
locale.translation: Indeed, those who have said, "Our Lord is Allah," and then remained on a right course - there will be no fear concerning them, nor will they grieve

locale.transliteration: Olaika ashabu aljannati khalideena feeha jazaan bima kanoo yaAAmaloona
locale.translation: Those are the companions of Paradise, abiding eternally therein as reward for what they used to do

locale.transliteration: Wawassayna alinsana biwalidayhi ihsanan hamalathu ommuhu kurhan wawadaAAathu kurhan wahamluhu wafisaluhu thalathoona shahran hatta itha balagha ashuddahu wabalagha arbaAAeena sanatan qala rabbi awziAAnee an ashkura niAAmataka allatee anAAamta AAalayya waAAala walidayya waan aAAmala salihan tardahu waaslih lee fee thurriyyatee innee tubtu ilayka wainnee mina almuslimeena
locale.translation: And We have enjoined upon man, to his parents, good treatment. His mother carried him with hardship and gave birth to him with hardship, and his gestation and weaning [period] is thirty months. [He grows] until, when he reaches maturity and reaches [the age of] forty years, he says, "My Lord, enable me to be grateful for Your favor which You have bestowed upon me and upon my parents and to work righteousness of which You will approve and make righteous for me my offspring. Indeed, I have repented to You, and indeed, I am of the Muslims

locale.transliteration: Olaika allatheena nataqabbalu AAanhum ahsana ma AAamiloo wanatajawazu AAan sayyiatihim fee ashabi aljannati waAAda alssidqi allathee kanoo yooAAadoona
locale.translation: Those are the ones from whom We will accept the best of what they did and overlook their misdeeds, [their being] among the companions of Paradise. [That is] the promise of truth which they had been promised

locale.transliteration: Waallathee qala liwalidayhi offin lakuma ataAAidaninee an okhraja waqad khalati alquroonu min qablee wahuma yastagheethani Allaha waylaka amin inna waAAda Allahi haqqun fayaqoolu ma hatha illa asateeru alawwaleena
locale.translation: But one who says to his parents, "Uff to you; do you promise me that I will be brought forth [from the earth] when generations before me have already passed on [into oblivion]?" while they call to Allah for help [and to their son], "Woe to you! Believe! Indeed, the promise of Allah is truth." But he says, "This is not but legends of the former people

locale.transliteration: Olaika allatheena haqqa AAalayhimu alqawlu fee umamin qad khalat min qablihim mina aljinni waalinsi innahum kanoo khasireena
locale.translation: Those are the ones upon whom the word has come into effect, [who will be] among nations which had passed on before them of jinn and men. Indeed, they [all] were losers

locale.transliteration: Walikullin darajatun mimma AAamiloo waliyuwaffiyahum aAAmalahum wahum la yuthlamoona
locale.translation: And for all there are degrees [of reward and punishment] for what they have done, and [it is] so that He may fully compensate them for their deeds, and they will not be wronged

locale.transliteration: Wayawma yuAAradu allatheena kafaroo AAala alnnari athhabtum tayyibatikum fee hayatikumu alddunya waistamtaAAtum biha faalyawma tujzawna AAathaba alhooni bima kuntum tastakbiroona fee alardi bighayri alhaqqi wabima kuntum tafsuqoona
locale.translation: And the Day those who disbelieved are exposed to the Fire [it will be said], "You exhausted your pleasures during your worldly life and enjoyed them, so this Day you will be awarded the punishment of [extreme] humiliation because you were arrogant upon the earth without right and because you were defiantly disobedient

locale.transliteration: Waothkur akha AAadin ith anthara qawmahu bialahqafi waqad khalati alnnuthuru min bayni yadayhi wamin khalfihi alla taAAbudoo illa Allaha innee akhafu AAalaykum AAathaba yawmin AAatheemin
locale.translation: And mention, [O Muhammad], the brother of 'Aad, when he warned his people in the [region of] al-Ahqaf - and warners had already passed on before him and after him - [saying], "Do not worship except Allah. Indeed, I fear for you the punishment of a terrible day

locale.transliteration: Qaloo ajitana litafikana AAan alihatina fatina bima taAAiduna in kunta mina alssadiqeena
locale.translation: They said, "Have you come to delude us away from our gods? Then bring us what you promise us, if you should be of the truthful

locale.transliteration: Qala innama alAAilmu AAinda Allahi waoballighukum ma orsiltu bihi walakinnee arakum qawman tajhaloona
locale.translation: He said, "Knowledge [of its time] is only with Allah, and I convey to you that with which I was sent; but I see you [to be] a people behaving ignorantly

locale.transliteration: Falamma raawhu AAaridan mustaqbila awdiyatihim qaloo hatha AAaridun mumtiruna bal huwa ma istaAAjaltum bihi reehun feeha AAathabun aleemun
locale.translation: And when they saw it as a cloud approaching their valleys, they said, "This is a cloud bringing us rain!" Rather, it is that for which you were impatient: a wind, within it a painful punishment

locale.transliteration: Tudammiru kulla shayin biamri rabbiha faasbahoo la yura illa masakinuhum kathalika najzee alqawma almujrimeena
locale.translation: Destroying everything by command of its Lord. And they became so that nothing was seen [of them] except their dwellings. Thus do We recompense the criminal people

locale.transliteration: Walaqad makkannahum feema in makkannakum feehi wajaAAalna lahum samAAan waabsaran waafidatan fama aghna AAanhum samAAuhum wala absaruhum wala afidatuhum min shayin ith kanoo yajhadoona biayati Allahi wahaqa bihim ma kanoo bihi yastahzioona
locale.translation: And We had certainly established them in such as We have not established you, and We made for them hearing and vision and hearts. But their hearing and vision and hearts availed them not from anything [of the punishment] when they were [continually] rejecting the signs of Allah; and they were enveloped by what they used to ridicule

locale.transliteration: Walaqad ahlakna ma hawlakum mina alqura wasarrafna alayati laAAallahum yarjiAAoona
locale.translation: And We have already destroyed what surrounds you of [those] cities, and We have diversified the signs [or verses] that perhaps they might return [from disbelief]

locale.transliteration: Falawla nasarahumu allatheena ittakhathoo min dooni Allahi qurbanan alihatan bal dalloo AAanhum wathalika ifkuhum wama kanoo yaftaroona
locale.translation: Then why did those they took besides Allah as deities by which to approach [Him] not aid them? But they had strayed from them. And that was their falsehood and what they were inventing

locale.transliteration: Waith sarafna ilayka nafaran mina aljinni yastamiAAoona alqurana falamma hadaroohu qaloo ansitoo falamma qudiya wallaw ila qawmihim munthireena
locale.translation: And [mention, O Muhammad], when We directed to you a few of the jinn, listening to the Qur'an. And when they attended it, they said, "Listen quietly." And when it was concluded, they went back to their people as warners

locale.transliteration: Qaloo ya qawmana inna samiAAna kitaban onzila min baAAdi moosa musaddiqan lima bayna yadayhi yahdee ila alhaqqi waila tareeqin mustaqeemin
locale.translation: They said, "O our people, indeed we have heard a [recited] Book revealed after Moses confirming what was before it which guides to the truth and to a straight path

locale.transliteration: Ya qawmana ajeeboo daAAiya Allahi waaminoo bihi yaghfir lakum min thunoobikum wayujirkum min AAathabin aleemin
locale.translation: O our people, respond to the Messenger of Allah and believe in him; Allah will forgive for you your sins and protect you from a painful punishment

locale.transliteration: Waman la yujib daAAiya Allahi falaysa bimuAAjizin fee alardi walaysa lahu min doonihi awliyaa olaika fee dalalin mubeenin
locale.translation: But he who does not respond to the Caller of Allah will not cause failure [to Him] upon earth, and he will not have besides Him any protectors. Those are in manifest error

locale.transliteration: Awalam yaraw anna Allaha allathee khalaqa alssamawati waalarda walam yaAAya bikhalqihinna biqadirin AAala an yuhyiya almawta bala innahu AAala kulli shayin qadeerun
locale.translation: Do they not see that Allah, who created the heavens and earth and did not fail in their creation, is able to give life to the dead? Yes. Indeed, He is over all things competent

locale.transliteration: Wayawma yuAAradu allatheena kafaroo AAala alnnari alaysa hatha bialhaqqi qaloo bala warabbina qala fathooqoo alAAathaba bima kuntum takfuroona
locale.translation: And the Day those who disbelieved are exposed to the Fire [it will be said], "Is this not the truth?" They will say, "Yes, by our Lord." He will say, "Then taste the punishment because you used to disbelieve

locale.transliteration: Faisbir kama sabara oloo alAAazmi mina alrrusuli wala tastaAAjil lahum kaannahum yawma yarawna ma yooAAadoona lam yalbathoo illa saAAatan min naharin balaghun fahal yuhlaku illa alqawmu alfasiqoona
locale.translation: So be patient, [O Muhammad], as were those of determination among the messengers and do not be impatient for them. It will be - on the Day they see that which they are promised - as though they had not remained [in the world] except an hour of a day. [This is] notification. And will [any] be destroyed except the defiantly disobedient people

locale.transliteration: Muhammad
locale.translation: Muhammad

locale.transliteration: Allatheena kafaroo wasaddoo AAan sabeeli Allahi adalla aAAmalahum
locale.translation: Those who disbelieve and avert [people] from the way of Allah - He will waste their deeds

locale.transliteration: Waallatheena amanoo waAAamiloo alssalihati waamanoo bima nuzzila AAala muhammadin wahuwa alhaqqu min rabbihim kaffara AAanhum sayyiatihim waaslaha balahum
locale.translation: And those who believe and do righteous deeds and believe in what has been sent down upon Muhammad - and it is the truth from their Lord - He will remove from them their misdeeds and amend their condition

locale.transliteration: Thalika bianna allatheena kafaroo ittabaAAoo albatila waanna allatheena amanoo ittabaAAoo alhaqqa min rabbihim kathalika yadribu Allahu lilnnasi amthalahum
locale.translation: That is because those who disbelieve follow falsehood, and those who believe follow the truth from their Lord. Thus does Allah present to the people their comparisons

locale.transliteration: Faitha laqeetumu allatheena kafaroo fadarba alrriqabi hatta itha athkhantumoohum fashuddoo alwathaqa faimma mannan baAAdu waimma fidaan hatta tadaAAa alharbu awzaraha thalika walaw yashao Allahu laintasara minhum walakin liyabluwa baAAdakum bibaAAdin waallatheena qutiloo fee sabeeli Allahi falan yudilla aAAmalahum
locale.translation: So when you meet those who disbelieve [in battle], strike [their] necks until, when you have inflicted slaughter upon them, then secure their bonds, and either [confer] favor afterwards or ransom [them] until the war lays down its burdens. That [is the command]. And if Allah had willed, He could have taken vengeance upon them [Himself], but [He ordered armed struggle] to test some of you by means of others. And those who are killed in the cause of Allah - never will He waste their deeds

locale.transliteration: Sayahdeehim wayuslihu balahum
locale.translation: He will guide them and amend their condition

locale.transliteration: Wayudkhiluhumu aljannata AAarrafaha lahum
locale.translation: And admit them to Paradise, which He has made known to them

locale.transliteration: Ya ayyuha allatheena amanoo in tansuroo Allaha yansurkum wayuthabbit aqdamakum
locale.translation: O you who have believed, if you support Allah, He will support you and plant firmly your feet

locale.transliteration: Waallatheena kafaroo fataAAsan lahum waadalla aAAmalahum
locale.translation: But those who disbelieve - for them is misery, and He will waste their deeds

locale.transliteration: Thalika biannahum karihoo ma anzala Allahu faahbata aAAmalahum
locale.translation: That is because they disliked what Allah revealed, so He rendered worthless their deeds

locale.transliteration: Afalam yaseeroo fee alardi fayanthuroo kayfa kana AAaqibatu allatheena min qablihim dammara Allahu AAalayhim walilkafireena amthaluha
locale.translation: Have they not traveled through the land and seen how was the end of those before them? Allah destroyed [everything] over them, and for the disbelievers is something comparable

locale.transliteration: Thalika bianna Allaha mawla allatheena amanoo waanna alkafireena la mawla lahum
locale.translation: That is because Allah is the protector of those who have believed and because the disbelievers have no protector

locale.transliteration: Inna Allaha yudkhilu allatheena amanoo waAAamiloo alssalihati jannatin tajree min tahtiha alanharu waallatheena kafaroo yatamattaAAoona wayakuloona kama takulu alanAAamu waalnnaru mathwan lahum
locale.translation: Indeed, Allah will admit those who have believed and done righteous deeds to gardens beneath which rivers flow, but those who disbelieve enjoy themselves and eat as grazing livestock eat, and the Fire will be a residence for them

locale.transliteration: Wakaayyin min qaryatin hiya ashaddu quwwatan min qaryatika allatee akhrajatka ahlaknahum fala nasira lahum
locale.translation: And how many a city was stronger than your city [Makkah] which drove you out? We destroyed them; and there was no helper for them

locale.transliteration: Afaman kana AAala bayyinatin min rabbihi kaman zuyyina lahu sooo AAamalihi waittabaAAoo ahwaahum
locale.translation: So is he who is on clear evidence from his Lord like him to whom the evil of his work has been made attractive and they follow their [own] desires

locale.transliteration: Mathalu aljannati allatee wuAAida almuttaqoona feeha anharun min main ghayri asinin waanharun min labanin lam yataghayyar taAAmuhu waanharun min khamrin laththatin lilshsharibeena waanharun min AAasalin musaffan walahum feeha min kulli alththamarati wamaghfiratun min rabbihim kaman huwa khalidun fee alnnari wasuqoo maan hameeman faqattaAAa amAAaahum
locale.translation: Is the description of Paradise, which the righteous are promised, wherein are rivers of water unaltered, rivers of milk the taste of which never changes, rivers of wine delicious to those who drink, and rivers of purified honey, in which they will have from all [kinds of] fruits and forgiveness from their Lord, like [that of] those who abide eternally in the Fire and are given to drink scalding water that will sever their intestines

locale.transliteration: Waminhum man yastamiAAu ilayka hatta itha kharajoo min AAindika qaloo lillatheena ootoo alAAilma matha qala anifan olaika allatheena tabaAAa Allahu AAala quloobihim waittabaAAoo ahwaahum
locale.translation: And among them, [O Muhammad], are those who listen to you, until when they depart from you, they say to those who were given knowledge, "What has he said just now?" Those are the ones of whom Allah has sealed over their hearts and who have followed their [own] desires

locale.transliteration: Waallatheena ihtadaw zadahum hudan waatahum taqwahum
locale.translation: And those who are guided - He increases them in guidance and gives them their righteousness

locale.transliteration: Fahal yanthuroona illa alssaAAata an tatiyahum baghtatan faqad jaa ashratuha faanna lahum itha jaathum thikrahum
locale.translation: Then do they await except that the Hour should come upon them unexpectedly? But already there have come [some of] its indications. Then what good to them, when it has come, will be their remembrance

locale.transliteration: FaiAAlam annahu la ilaha illa Allahu waistaghfir lithanbika walilmumineena waalmuminati waAllahu yaAAlamu mutaqallabakum wamathwakum
locale.translation: So know, [O Muhammad], that there is no deity except Allah and ask forgiveness for your sin and for the believing men and believing women. And Allah knows of your movement and your resting place

locale.transliteration: Wayaqoolu allatheena amanoo lawla nuzzilat sooratun faitha onzilat sooratun muhkamatun wathukira feeha alqitalu raayta allatheena fee quloobihim maradun yanthuroona ilayka nathara almaghshiyyi AAalayhi mina almawti faawla lahum
locale.translation: Those who believe say, "Why has a surah not been sent down? But when a precise surah is revealed and fighting is mentioned therein, you see those in whose hearts is hypocrisy looking at you with a look of one overcome by death. And more appropriate for them [would have been]

locale.transliteration: TaAAatun waqawlun maAAroofun faitha AAazama alamru falaw sadaqoo Allaha lakana khayran lahum
locale.translation: Obedience and good words. And when the matter [of fighting] was determined, if they had been true to Allah, it would have been better for them

locale.transliteration: Fahal AAasaytum in tawallaytum an tufsidoo fee alardi watuqattiAAoo arhamakum
locale.translation: So would you perhaps, if you turned away, cause corruption on earth and sever your [ties of] relationship

locale.transliteration: Olaika allatheena laAAanahumu Allahu faasammahum waaAAma absarahum
locale.translation: Those [who do so] are the ones that Allah has cursed, so He deafened them and blinded their vision

locale.transliteration: Afala yatadabbaroona alqurana am AAala quloobin aqfaluha
locale.translation: Then do they not reflect upon the Qur'an, or are there locks upon [their] hearts

locale.transliteration: Inna allatheena irtaddoo AAala adbarihim min baAAdi ma tabayyana lahumu alhuda alshshaytanu sawwala lahum waamla lahum
locale.translation: Indeed, those who reverted back [to disbelief] after guidance had become clear to them - Satan enticed them and prolonged hope for them

locale.transliteration: Thalika biannahum qaloo lillatheena karihoo ma nazzala Allahu sanuteeAAukum fee baAAdi alamri waAllahu yaAAlamu israrahum
locale.translation: That is because they said to those who disliked what Allah sent down, "We will obey you in part of the matter." And Allah knows what they conceal

locale.transliteration: Fakayfa itha tawaffathumu almalaikatu yadriboona wujoohahum waadbarahum
locale.translation: Then how [will it be] when the angels take them in death, striking their faces and their backs

locale.transliteration: Thalika biannahumu ittabaAAoo ma askhata Allaha wakarihoo ridwanahu faahbata aAAmalahum
locale.translation: That is because they followed what angered Allah and disliked [what earns] His pleasure, so He rendered worthless their deeds

locale.transliteration: Am hasiba allatheena fee quloobihim maradun an lan yukhrija Allahu adghanahum
locale.translation: Or do those in whose hearts is disease think that Allah would never expose their [feelings of] hatred

locale.transliteration: Walaw nashao laaraynakahum falaAAaraftahum biseemahum walataAArifannahum fee lahni alqawli waAllahu yaAAlamu aAAmalakum
locale.translation: And if We willed, We could show them to you, and you would know them by their mark; but you will surely know them by the tone of [their] speech. And Allah knows your deeds

locale.transliteration: Walanabluwannakum hatta naAAlama almujahideena minkum waalssabireena wanabluwa akhbarakum
locale.translation: And We will surely test you until We make evident those who strive among you [for the cause of Allah] and the patient, and We will test your affairs

locale.transliteration: Inna allatheena kafaroo wasaddoo AAan sabeeli Allahi washaqqoo alrrasoola min baAAdi ma tabayyana lahumu alhuda lan yaduroo Allaha shayan wasayuhbitu aAAmalahum
locale.translation: Indeed, those who disbelieved and averted [people] from the path of Allah and opposed the Messenger after guidance had become clear to them - never will they harm Allah at all, and He will render worthless their deeds

locale.transliteration: Ya ayyuha allatheena amanoo ateeAAoo Allaha waateeAAoo alrrasoola wala tubtiloo aAAmalakum
locale.translation: O you who have believed, obey Allah and obey the Messenger and do not invalidate your deeds

locale.transliteration: Inna allatheena kafaroo wasaddoo AAan sabeeli Allahi thumma matoo wahum kuffarun falan yaghfira Allahu lahum
locale.translation: Indeed, those who disbelieved and averted [people] from the path of Allah and then died while they were disbelievers - never will Allah forgive them

locale.transliteration: Fala tahinoo watadAAoo ila alssalmi waantumu alaAAlawna waAllahu maAAakum walan yatirakum aAAmalakum
locale.translation: So do not weaken and call for peace while you are superior; and Allah is with you and will never deprive you of [the reward of] your deeds

locale.transliteration: Innama alhayatu alddunya laAAibun walahwun wain tuminoo watattaqoo yutikum ojoorakum wala yasalkum amwalakum
locale.translation: [This] worldly life is only amusement and diversion. And if you believe and fear Allah, He will give you your rewards and not ask you for your properties

locale.transliteration: In yasalkumooha fayuhfikum tabkhaloo wayukhrij adghanakum
locale.translation: If He should ask you for them and press you, you would withhold, and He would expose your unwillingness

locale.transliteration: Haantum haolai tudAAawna litunfiqoo fee sabeeli Allahi faminkum man yabkhalu waman yabkhal fainnama yabkhalu AAan nafsihi waAllahu alghaniyyu waantumu alfuqarao wain tatawallaw yastabdil qawman ghayrakum thumma la yakoonoo amthalakum
locale.translation: Here you are - those invited to spend in the cause of Allah - but among you are those who withhold [out of greed]. And whoever withholds only withholds [benefit] from himself; and Allah is the Free of need, while you are the needy. And if you turn away, He will replace you with another people; then they will not be the likes of you

locale.transliteration: Al-Fath
locale.translation: The Victory

locale.transliteration: Inna fatahna laka fathan mubeenan
locale.translation: Indeed, We have given you, [O Muhammad], a clear conquest

locale.transliteration: Liyaghfira laka Allahu ma taqaddama min thanbika wama taakhkhara wayutimma niAAmatahu AAalayka wayahdiyaka siratan mustaqeeman
locale.translation: That Allah may forgive for you what preceded of your sin and what will follow and complete His favor upon you and guide you to a straight path

locale.transliteration: Wayansuraka Allahu nasran AAazeezan
locale.translation: And [that] Allah may aid you with a mighty victory

locale.transliteration: Huwa allathee anzala alssakeenata fee quloobi almumineena liyazdadoo eemanan maAAa eemanihim walillahi junoodu alssamawati waalardi wakana Allahu AAaleeman hakeeman
locale.translation: It is He who sent down tranquillity into the hearts of the believers that they would increase in faith along with their [present] faith. And to Allah belong the soldiers of the heavens and the earth, and ever is Allah Knowing and Wise

locale.transliteration: Liyudkhila almumineena waalmuminati jannatin tajree min tahtiha alanharu khalideena feeha wayukaffira AAanhum sayyiatihim wakana thalika AAinda Allahi fawzan AAatheeman
locale.translation: [And] that He may admit the believing men and the believing women to gardens beneath which rivers flow to abide therein eternally and remove from them their misdeeds - and ever is that, in the sight of Allah, a great attainment

locale.transliteration: WayuAAaththiba almunafiqeena waalmunafiqati waalmushrikeena waalmushrikati alththanneena biAllahi thanna alssawi AAalayhim dairatu alssawi waghadiba Allahu AAalayhim walaAAanahum waaAAadda lahum jahannama wasaat maseeran
locale.translation: And [that] He may punish the hypocrite men and hypocrite women, and the polytheist men and polytheist women - those who assume about Allah an assumption of evil nature. Upon them is a misfortune of evil nature; and Allah has become angry with them and has cursed them and prepared for them Hell, and evil it is as a destination

locale.transliteration: Walillahi junoodu alssamawati waalardi wakana Allahu AAazeezan hakeeman
locale.translation: And to Allah belong the soldiers of the heavens and the earth. And ever is Allah Exalted in Might and Wise

locale.transliteration: Inna arsalnaka shahidan wamubashshiran wanatheeran
locale.translation: Indeed, We have sent you as a witness and a bringer of good tidings and a warner

locale.transliteration: Lituminoo biAllahi warasoolihi watuAAazziroohu watuwaqqiroohu watusabbihoohu bukratan waaseelan
locale.translation: That you [people] may believe in Allah and His Messenger and honor him and respect the Prophet and exalt Allah morning and afternoon

locale.transliteration: Inna allatheena yubayiAAoonaka innama yubayiAAoona Allaha yadu Allahi fawqa aydeehim faman nakatha fainnama yankuthu AAala nafsihi waman awfa bima AAahada AAalayhu Allaha fasayuteehi ajran AAatheeman
locale.translation: Indeed, those who pledge allegiance to you, [O Muhammad] - they are actually pledging allegiance to Allah. The hand of Allah is over their hands. So he who breaks his word only breaks it to the detriment of himself. And he who fulfills that which he has promised Allah - He will give him a great reward

locale.transliteration: Sayaqoolu laka almukhallafoona mina alaAArabi shaghalatna amwaluna waahloona faistaghfir lana yaqooloona bialsinatihim ma laysa fee quloobihim qul faman yamliku lakum mina Allahi shayan in arada bikum darran aw arada bikum nafAAan bal kana Allahu bima taAAmaloona khabeeran
locale.translation: Those who remained behind of the bedouins will say to you, "Our properties and our families occupied us, so ask forgiveness for us." They say with their tongues what is not within their hearts. Say, "Then who could prevent Allah at all if He intended for you harm or intended for you benefit? Rather, ever is Allah, with what you do, Acquainted

locale.transliteration: Bal thanantum an lan yanqaliba alrrasoolu waalmuminoona ila ahleehim abadan wazuyyina thalika fee quloobikum wathanantum thanna alssawi wakuntum qawman booran
locale.translation: But you thought that the Messenger and the believers would never return to their families, ever, and that was made pleasing in your hearts. And you assumed an assumption of evil and became a people ruined

locale.transliteration: Waman lam yumin biAllahi warasoolihi fainna aAAtadna lilkafireena saAAeeran
locale.translation: And whoever has not believed in Allah and His Messenger - then indeed, We have prepared for the disbelievers a Blaze

locale.transliteration: Walillahi mulku alssamawati waalardi yaghfiru liman yashao wayuAAaththibu man yashao wakana Allahu ghafooran raheeman
locale.translation: And to Allah belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth. He forgives whom He wills and punishes whom He wills. And ever is Allah Forgiving and Merciful

locale.transliteration: Sayaqoolu almukhallafoona itha intalaqtum ila maghanima litakhuthooha tharoona nattabiAAkum yureedoona an yubaddiloo kalama Allahi qul lan tattabiAAoona kathalikum qala Allahu min qablu fasayaqooloona bal tahsudoonana bal kanoo la yafqahoona illa qaleelan
locale.translation: Those who remained behind will say when you set out toward the war booty to take it, "Let us follow you." They wish to change the words of Allah. Say, "Never will you follow us. Thus did Allah say before." So they will say, "Rather, you envy us." But [in fact] they were not understanding except a little

locale.transliteration: Qul lilmukhallafeena mina alaAArabi satudAAawna ila qawmin olee basin shadeedin tuqatiloonahum aw yuslimoona fain tuteeAAoo yutikumu Allahu ajran hasanan wain tatawallaw kama tawallaytum min qablu yuAAaththibkum AAathaban aleeman
locale.translation: Say to those who remained behind of the bedouins, "You will be called to [face] a people of great military might; you may fight them, or they will submit. So if you obey, Allah will give you a good reward; but if you turn away as you turned away before, He will punish you with a painful punishment
