locale.transliteration: Laysa AAala alaAAma harajun wala AAala alaAAraji harajun wala AAala almareedi harajun waman yutiAAi Allaha warasoolahu yudkhilhu jannatin tajree min tahtiha alanharu waman yatawalla yuAAaththibhu AAathaban aleeman
locale.translation: There is not upon the blind any guilt or upon the lame any guilt or upon the ill any guilt [for remaining behind]. And whoever obeys Allah and His Messenger - He will admit him to gardens beneath which rivers flow; but whoever turns away - He will punish him with a painful punishment

locale.transliteration: Laqad radiya Allahu AAani almumineena ith yubayiAAoonaka tahta alshshajarati faAAalima ma fee quloobihim faanzala alsakeenata AAalayhim waathabahum fathan qareeban
locale.translation: Certainly was Allah pleased with the believers when they pledged allegiance to you, [O Muhammad], under the tree, and He knew what was in their hearts, so He sent down tranquillity upon them and rewarded them with an imminent conquest

locale.transliteration: Wamaghanima katheeratan yakhuthoonaha wakana Allahu AAazeezan hakeeman
locale.translation: And much war booty which they will take. And ever is Allah Exalted in Might and Wise

locale.transliteration: WaAAadakumu Allahu maghanima katheeratan takhuthoonaha faAAajjala lakum hathihi wakaffa aydiya alnnasi AAankum walitakoona ayatan lilmumineena wayahdiyakum siratan mustaqeeman
locale.translation: Allah has promised you much booty that you will take [in the future] and has hastened for you this [victory] and withheld the hands of people from you - that it may be a sign for the believers and [that] He may guide you to a straight path

locale.transliteration: Waokhra lam taqdiroo AAalayha qad ahata Allahu biha wakana Allahu AAala kulli shayin qadeeran
locale.translation: And [He promises] other [victories] that you were [so far] unable to [realize] which Allah has already encompassed. And ever is Allah, over all things, competent

locale.transliteration: Walaw qatalakumu allatheena kafaroo lawallawoo aladbara thumma la yajidoona waliyyan wala naseeran
locale.translation: And if those [Makkans] who disbelieve had fought you, they would have turned their backs [in flight]. Then they would not find a protector or a helper

locale.transliteration: Sunnata Allahi allatee qad khalat min qablu walan tajida lisunnati Allahi tabdeelan
locale.translation: [This is] the established way of Allah which has occurred before. And never will you find in the way of Allah any change

locale.transliteration: Wahuwa allathee kaffa aydiyahum AAankum waaydiyakum AAanhum bibatni makkata min baAAdi an athfarakum AAalayhim wakana Allahu bima taAAmaloona baseeran
locale.translation: And it is He who withheld their hands from you and your hands from them within [the area of] Makkah after He caused you to overcome them. And ever is Allah of what you do, Seeing

locale.transliteration: Humu allatheena kafaroo wasaddookum AAani almasjidi alharami waalhadya maAAkoofan an yablugha mahillahu walawla rijalun muminoona wanisaon muminatun lam taAAlamoohum an tataoohum fatuseebakum minhum maAAarratun bighayri AAilmin liyudkhila Allahu fee rahmatihi man yashao law tazayyaloo laAAaththabna allatheena kafaroo minhum AAathaban aleeman
locale.translation: They are the ones who disbelieved and obstructed you from al-Masjid al-Haram while the offering was prevented from reaching its place of sacrifice. And if not for believing men and believing women whom you did not know - that you might trample them and there would befall you because of them dishonor without [your] knowledge - [you would have been permitted to enter Makkah]. [This was so] that Allah might admit to His mercy whom He willed. If they had been apart [from them], We would have punished those who disbelieved among them with painful punishment

locale.transliteration: Ith jaAAala allatheena kafaroo fee quloobihimu alhamiyyata hamiyyata aljahiliyyati faanzala Allahu sakeenatahu AAala rasoolihi waAAala almumineena waalzamahum kalimata alttaqwa wakanoo ahaqqa biha waahlaha wakana Allahu bikulli shayin AAaleeman
locale.translation: When those who disbelieved had put into their hearts chauvinism - the chauvinism of the time of ignorance. But Allah sent down His tranquillity upon His Messenger and upon the believers and imposed upon them the word of righteousness, and they were more deserving of it and worthy of it. And ever is Allah, of all things, Knowing

locale.transliteration: Laqad sadaqa Allahu rasoolahu alrruya bialhaqqi latadkhulunna almasjida alharama in shaa Allahu amineena muhalliqeena ruoosakum wamuqassireena la takhafoona faAAalima ma lam taAAlamoo fajaAAala min dooni thalika fathan qareeban
locale.translation: Certainly has Allah showed to His Messenger the vision in truth. You will surely enter al-Masjid al-Haram, if Allah wills, in safety, with your heads shaved and [hair] shortened, not fearing [anyone]. He knew what you did not know and has arranged before that a conquest near [at hand]

locale.transliteration: Huwa allathee arsala rasoolahu bialhuda wadeeni alhaqqi liyuthhirahu AAala alddeeni kullihi wakafa biAllahi shaheedan
locale.translation: It is He who sent His Messenger with guidance and the religion of truth to manifest it over all religion. And sufficient is Allah as Witness

locale.transliteration: Muhammadun rasoolu Allahi waallatheena maAAahu ashiddao AAala alkuffari ruhamao baynahum tarahum rukkaAAan sujjadan yabtaghoona fadlan mina Allahi waridwanan seemahum fee wujoohihim min athari alssujoodi thalika mathaluhum fee alttawrati wamathaluhum fee alinjeeli kazarAAin akhraja shatahu faazarahu faistaghlatha faistawa AAala sooqihi yuAAjibu alzzurraAAa liyagheetha bihimu alkuffara waAAada Allahu allatheena amanoo waAAamiloo alssalihati minhum maghfiratan waajran AAatheeman
locale.translation: Muhammad is the Messenger of Allah; and those with him are forceful against the disbelievers, merciful among themselves. You see them bowing and prostrating [in prayer], seeking bounty from Allah and [His] pleasure. Their mark is on their faces from the trace of prostration. That is their description in the Torah. And their description in the Gospel is as a plant which produces its offshoots and strengthens them so they grow firm and stand upon their stalks, delighting the sowers - so that Allah may enrage by them the disbelievers. Allah has promised those who believe and do righteous deeds among them forgiveness and a great reward

locale.transliteration: Al-Hujurat
locale.translation: The Rooms

locale.transliteration: Ya ayyuha allatheena amanoo la tuqaddimoo bayna yadayi Allahi warasoolihi waittaqoo Allaha inna Allaha sameeAAun AAaleemun
locale.translation: O you who have believed, do not put [yourselves] before Allah and His Messenger but fear Allah. Indeed, Allah is Hearing and Knowing

locale.transliteration: Ya ayyuha allatheena amanoo la tarfaAAoo aswatakum fawqa sawti alnnabiyyi wala tajharoo lahu bialqawli kajahri baAAdikum libaAAdin an tahbata aAAmalukum waantum la tashAAuroona
locale.translation: O you who have believed, do not raise your voices above the voice of the Prophet or be loud to him in speech like the loudness of some of you to others, lest your deeds become worthless while you perceive not

locale.transliteration: Inna allatheena yaghuddoona aswatahum AAinda rasooli Allahi olaika allatheena imtahana Allahu quloobahum lilttaqwa lahum maghfiratun waajrun AAatheemun
locale.translation: Indeed, those who lower their voices before the Messenger of Allah - they are the ones whose hearts Allah has tested for righteousness. For them is forgiveness and great reward

locale.transliteration: Inna allatheena yunadoonaka min warai alhujurati aktharuhum la yaAAqiloona
locale.translation: Indeed, those who call you, [O Muhammad], from behind the chambers - most of them do not use reason

locale.transliteration: Walaw annahum sabaroo hatta takhruja ilayhim lakana khayran lahum waAllahu ghafoorun raheemun
locale.translation: And if they had been patient until you [could] come out to them, it would have been better for them. But Allah is Forgiving and Merciful

locale.transliteration: Ya ayyuha allatheena amanoo in jaakum fasiqun binabain fatabayyanoo an tuseeboo qawman bijahalatin fatusbihoo AAala ma faAAaltum nadimeena
locale.translation: O you who have believed, if there comes to you a disobedient one with information, investigate, lest you harm a people out of ignorance and become, over what you have done, regretful

locale.transliteration: WaiAAlamoo anna feekum rasoola Allahi law yuteeAAukum fee katheerin mina alamri laAAanittum walakinna Allaha habbaba ilaykumu aleemana wazayyanahu fee quloobikum wakarraha ilaykumu alkufra waalfusooqa waalAAisyana olaika humu alrrashidoona
locale.translation: And know that among you is the Messenger of Allah. If he were to obey you in much of the matter, you would be in difficulty, but Allah has endeared to you the faith and has made it pleasing in your hearts and has made hateful to you disbelief, defiance and disobedience. Those are the [rightly] guided

locale.transliteration: Fadlan mina Allahi waniAAmatan waAllahu AAaleemun hakeemun
locale.translation: [It is] as bounty from Allah and favor. And Allah is Knowing and Wise

locale.transliteration: Wain taifatani mina almumineena iqtataloo faaslihoo baynahuma fain baghat ihdahuma AAala alokhra faqatiloo allatee tabghee hatta tafeea ila amri Allahi fain faat faaslihoo baynahuma bialAAadli waaqsitoo inna Allaha yuhibbu almuqsiteena
locale.translation: And if two factions among the believers should fight, then make settlement between the two. But if one of them oppresses the other, then fight against the one that oppresses until it returns to the ordinance of Allah. And if it returns, then make settlement between them in justice and act justly. Indeed, Allah loves those who act justly

locale.transliteration: Innama almuminoona ikhwatun faaslihoo bayna akhawaykum waittaqoo Allaha laAAallakum turhamoona
locale.translation: The believers are but brothers, so make settlement between your brothers. And fear Allah that you may receive mercy

locale.transliteration: Ya ayyuha allatheena amanoo la yaskhar qawmun min qawmin AAasa an yakoonoo khayran minhum wala nisaon min nisain AAasa an yakunna khayran minhunna wala talmizoo anfusakum wala tanabazoo bialalqabi bisa alismu alfusooqu baAAda aleemani waman lam yatub faolaika humu alththalimoona
locale.translation: O you who have believed, let not a people ridicule [another] people; perhaps they may be better than them; nor let women ridicule [other] women; perhaps they may be better than them. And do not insult one another and do not call each other by [offensive] nicknames. Wretched is the name of disobedience after [one's] faith. And whoever does not repent - then it is those who are the wrongdoers

locale.transliteration: Ya ayyuha allatheena amanoo ijtaniboo katheeran mina alththanni inna baAAda alththanni ithmun wala tajassasoo wala yaghtab baAAdukum baAAdan ayuhibbu ahadukum an yakula lahma akheehi maytan fakarihtumoohu waittaqoo Allaha inna Allaha tawwabun raheemun
locale.translation: O you who have believed, avoid much [negative] assumption. Indeed, some assumption is sin. And do not spy or backbite each other. Would one of you like to eat the flesh of his brother when dead? You would detest it. And fear Allah; indeed, Allah is Accepting of repentance and Merciful

locale.transliteration: Ya ayyuha alnnasu inna khalaqnakum min thakarin waontha wajaAAalnakum shuAAooban waqabaila litaAAarafoo inna akramakum AAinda Allahi atqakum inna Allaha AAaleemun khabeerun
locale.translation: O mankind, indeed We have created you from male and female and made you peoples and tribes that you may know one another. Indeed, the most noble of you in the sight of Allah is the most righteous of you. Indeed, Allah is Knowing and Acquainted

locale.transliteration: Qalati alaAArabu amanna qul lam tuminoo walakin qooloo aslamna walamma yadkhuli aleemanu fee quloobikum wain tuteeAAoo Allaha warasoolahu la yalitkum min aAAmalikum shayan inna Allaha ghafoorun raheemun
locale.translation: The bedouins say, "We have believed." Say, "You have not [yet] believed; but say [instead], 'We have submitted,' for faith has not yet entered your hearts. And if you obey Allah and His Messenger, He will not deprive you from your deeds of anything. Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful

locale.transliteration: Innama almuminoona allatheena amanoo biAllahi warasoolihi thumma lam yartaboo wajahadoo biamwalihim waanfusihim fee sabeeli Allahi olaika humu alssadiqoona
locale.translation: The believers are only the ones who have believed in Allah and His Messenger and then doubt not but strive with their properties and their lives in the cause of Allah. It is those who are the truthful

locale.transliteration: Qul atuAAallimoona Allaha bideenikum waAllahu yaAAlamu ma fee alssamawati wama fee alardi waAllahu bikulli shayin AAaleemun
locale.translation: Say, "Would you acquaint Allah with your religion while Allah knows whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth, and Allah is Knowing of all things

locale.transliteration: Yamunnoona AAalayka an aslamoo qul la tamunnoo AAalayya islamakum bali Allahu yamunnu AAalaykum an hadakum lileemani in kuntum sadiqeena
locale.translation: They consider it a favor to you that they have accepted Islam. Say, "Do not consider your Islam a favor to me. Rather, Allah has conferred favor upon you that He has guided you to the faith, if you should be truthful

locale.transliteration: Inna Allaha yaAAlamu ghayba alssamawati waalardi waAllahu baseerun bima taAAmaloona
locale.translation: Indeed, Allah knows the unseen [aspects] of the heavens and the earth. And Allah is Seeing of what you do

locale.transliteration: Qaf
locale.translation: The Letter "Qaf"

locale.transliteration: Qaf waalqurani almajeedi
locale.translation: Qaf. By the honored Qur'an

locale.transliteration: Bal AAajiboo an jaahum munthirun minhum faqala alkafiroona hatha shayon AAajeebun
locale.translation: But they wonder that there has come to them a warner from among themselves, and the disbelievers say, "This is an amazing thing

locale.transliteration: Aitha mitna wakunna turaban thalika rajAAun baAAeedun
locale.translation: When we have died and have become dust, [we will return to life]? That is a distant return

locale.transliteration: Qad AAalimna ma tanqusu alardu minhum waAAindana kitabun hafeethun
locale.translation: We know what the earth diminishes of them, and with Us is a retaining record

locale.transliteration: Bal kaththaboo bialhaqqi lamma jaahum fahum fee amrin mareejin
locale.translation: But they denied the truth when it came to them, so they are in a confused condition

locale.transliteration: Afalam yanthuroo ila alssamai fawqahum kayfa banaynaha wazayyannaha wama laha min furoojin
locale.translation: Have they not looked at the heaven above them - how We structured it and adorned it and [how] it has no rifts

locale.transliteration: Waalarda madadnaha waalqayna feeha rawasiya waanbatna feeha min kulli zawjin baheejin
locale.translation: And the earth - We spread it out and cast therein firmly set mountains and made grow therein [something] of every beautiful kind

locale.transliteration: Tabsiratan wathikra likulli AAabdin muneebin
locale.translation: Giving insight and a reminder for every servant who turns [to Allah]

locale.transliteration: Wanazzalna mina alssamai maan mubarakan faanbatna bihi jannatin wahabba alhaseedi
locale.translation: And We have sent down blessed rain from the sky and made grow thereby gardens and grain from the harvest

locale.transliteration: Waalnnakhla basiqatin laha talAAun nadeedun
locale.translation: And lofty palm trees having fruit arranged in layers

locale.transliteration: Rizqan lilAAibadi waahyayna bihi baldatan maytan kathalika alkhurooju
locale.translation: As provision for the servants, and We have given life thereby to a dead land. Thus is the resurrection

locale.transliteration: Kaththabat qablahum qawmu noohin waashabu alrrassi wathamoodu
locale.translation: The people of Noah denied before them, and the companions of the well and Thamud

locale.transliteration: WaAAadun wafirAAawnu waikhwanu lootin
locale.translation: And 'Aad and Pharaoh and the brothers of Lot

locale.transliteration: Waashabu alaykati waqawmu tubbaAAin kullun kaththaba alrrusula fahaqqa waAAeedi
locale.translation: And the companions of the thicket and the people of Tubba'. All denied the messengers, so My threat was justly fulfilled

locale.transliteration: AfaAAayeena bialkhalqi alawwali bal hum fee labsin min khalqin jadeedin
locale.translation: Did We fail in the first creation? But they are in confusion over a new creation

locale.transliteration: Walaqad khalaqna alinsana wanaAAlamu ma tuwaswisu bihi nafsuhu wanahnu aqrabu ilayhi min habli alwareedi
locale.translation: And We have already created man and know what his soul whispers to him, and We are closer to him than [his] jugular vein

locale.transliteration: Ith yatalaqqa almutalaqqiyani AAani alyameeni waAAani alshshimali qaAAeedun
locale.translation: When the two receivers receive, seated on the right and on the left

locale.transliteration: Ma yalfithu min qawlin illa ladayhi raqeebun AAateedun
locale.translation: Man does not utter any word except that with him is an observer prepared [to record]

locale.transliteration: Wajaat sakratu almawti bialhaqqi thalika ma kunta minhu taheedu
locale.translation: And the intoxication of death will bring the truth; that is what you were trying to avoid

locale.transliteration: Wanufikha fee alssoori thalika yawmu alwaAAeedi
locale.translation: And the Horn will be blown. That is the Day of [carrying out] the threat

locale.transliteration: Wajaat kullu nafsin maAAaha saiqun washaheedun
locale.translation: And every soul will come, with it a driver and a witness

locale.transliteration: Laqad kunta fee ghaflatin min hatha fakashafna AAanka ghitaaka fabasaruka alyawma hadeedun
locale.translation: [It will be said], "You were certainly in unmindfulness of this, and We have removed from you your cover, so your sight, this Day, is sharp

locale.transliteration: Waqala qareenuhu hatha ma ladayya AAateedun
locale.translation: And his companion, [the angel], will say, "This [record] is what is with me, prepared

locale.transliteration: Alqiya fee jahannama kulla kaffarin AAaneedin
locale.translation: [Allah will say], "Throw into Hell every obstinate disbeliever

locale.transliteration: MannaAAin lilkhayri muAAtadin mureebin
locale.translation: Preventer of good, aggressor, and doubter

locale.transliteration: Allathee jaAAala maAAa Allahi ilahan akhara faalqiyahu fee alAAathabi alshshadeedi
locale.translation: Who made [as equal] with Allah another deity; then throw him into the severe punishment

locale.transliteration: Qala qareenuhu rabbana ma atghaytuhu walakin kana fee dalalin baAAeedin
locale.translation: His [devil] companion will say, "Our Lord, I did not make him transgress, but he [himself] was in extreme error

locale.transliteration: Qala la takhtasimoo ladayya waqad qaddamtu ilaykum bialwaAAeedi
locale.translation: [Allah] will say, "Do not dispute before Me, while I had already presented to you the warning

locale.transliteration: Ma yubaddalu alqawlu ladayya wama ana bithallamin lilAAabeedi
locale.translation: The word will not be changed with Me, and never will I be unjust to the servants

locale.transliteration: Yawma naqoolu lijahannama hali imtalati wataqoolu hal min mazeedin
locale.translation: On the Day We will say to Hell, "Have you been filled?" and it will say, "Are there some more

locale.transliteration: Waozlifati aljannatu lilmuttaqeena ghayra baAAeedin
locale.translation: And Paradise will be brought near to the righteous, not far

locale.transliteration: Hatha ma tooAAadoona likulli awwabin hafeethin
locale.translation: [It will be said], "This is what you were promised - for every returner [to Allah] and keeper [of His covenant]

locale.transliteration: Man khashiya alrrahmana bialghaybi wajaa biqalbin muneebin
locale.translation: Who feared the Most Merciful unseen and came with a heart returning [in repentance]

locale.transliteration: Odkhulooha bisalamin thalika yawmu alkhuloodi
locale.translation: Enter it in peace. This is the Day of Eternity

locale.transliteration: Lahum ma yashaoona feeha waladayna mazeedun
locale.translation: They will have whatever they wish therein, and with Us is more

locale.transliteration: Wakam ahlakna qablahum min qarnin hum ashaddu minhum batshan fanaqqaboo fee albiladi hal min maheesin
locale.translation: And how many a generation before them did We destroy who were greater than them in [striking] power and had explored throughout the lands. Is there any place of escape

locale.transliteration: Inna fee thalika lathikra liman kana lahu qalbun aw alqa alssamAAa wahuwa shaheedun
locale.translation: Indeed in that is a reminder for whoever has a heart or who listens while he is present [in mind]

locale.transliteration: Walaqad khalaqna alssamawati waalarda wama baynahuma fee sittati ayyamin wama massana min lughoobin
locale.translation: And We did certainly create the heavens and earth and what is between them in six days, and there touched Us no weariness

locale.transliteration: Faisbir AAala ma yaqooloona wasabbih bihamdi rabbika qabla tulooAAi alshshamsi waqabla alghuroobi
locale.translation: So be patient, [O Muhammad], over what they say and exalt [Allah] with praise of your Lord before the rising of the sun and before its setting

locale.transliteration: Wamina allayli fasabbihhu waadbara alssujoodi
locale.translation: And [in part] of the night exalt Him and after prostration

locale.transliteration: WaistamiAA yawma yunadi almunadi min makanin qareebin
locale.translation: And listen on the Day when the Caller will call out from a place that is near

locale.transliteration: Yawma yasmaAAoona alssayhata bialhaqqi thalika yawmu alkhurooji
locale.translation: The Day they will hear the blast [of the Horn] in truth. That is the Day of Emergence [from the graves]

locale.transliteration: Inna nahnu nuhyee wanumeetu wailayna almaseeru
locale.translation: Indeed, it is We who give life and cause death, and to Us is the destination

locale.transliteration: Yawma tashaqqaqu alardu AAanhum siraAAan thalika hashrun AAalayna yaseerun
locale.translation: On the Day the earth breaks away from them [and they emerge] rapidly; that is a gathering easy for Us

locale.transliteration: Nahnu aAAlamu bima yaqooloona wama anta AAalayhim bijabbarin fathakkir bialqurani man yakhafu waAAeedi
locale.translation: We are most knowing of what they say, and you are not over them a tyrant. But remind by the Qur'an whoever fears My threat

locale.transliteration: Adh-Dhariyat
locale.translation: The Winnowing Winds

locale.transliteration: Waalththariyati tharwan
locale.translation: By those [winds] scattering [dust] dispersing

locale.transliteration: Faalhamilati wiqran
locale.translation: And those [clouds] carrying a load [of water]

locale.transliteration: Faaljariyati yusran
locale.translation: And those [ships] sailing with ease

locale.transliteration: Faalmuqassimati amran
locale.translation: And those [angels] apportioning [each] matter

locale.transliteration: Innama tooAAadoona lasadiqun
locale.translation: Indeed, what you are promised is true

locale.transliteration: Wainna alddeena lawaqiAAun
locale.translation: And indeed, the recompense is to occur

locale.transliteration: Waalssamai thati alhubuki
locale.translation: By the heaven containing pathways

locale.transliteration: Innakum lafee qawlin mukhtalifin
locale.translation: Indeed, you are in differing speech

locale.transliteration: Yufaku AAanhu man ofika
locale.translation: Deluded away from the Qur'an is he who is deluded

locale.transliteration: Qutila alkharrasoona
locale.translation: Destroyed are the falsifiers

locale.transliteration: Allatheena hum fee ghamratin sahoona
locale.translation: Who are within a flood [of confusion] and heedless

locale.transliteration: Yasaloona ayyana yawmu alddeeni
locale.translation: They ask, "When is the Day of Recompense

locale.transliteration: Yawma hum AAala alnnari yuftanoona
locale.translation: [It is] the Day they will be tormented over the Fire

locale.transliteration: Thooqoo fitnatakum hatha allathee kuntum bihi tastaAAjiloona
locale.translation: [And will be told], "Taste your torment. This is that for which you were impatient

locale.transliteration: Inna almuttaqeena fee jannatin waAAuyoonin
locale.translation: Indeed, the righteous will be among gardens and springs

locale.transliteration: Akhitheena ma atahum rabbuhum innahum kanoo qabla thalika muhsineena
locale.translation: Accepting what their Lord has given them. Indeed, they were before that doers of good

locale.transliteration: Kanoo qaleelan mina allayli ma yahjaAAoona
locale.translation: They used to sleep but little of the night

locale.transliteration: Wabialashari hum yastaghfiroona
locale.translation: And in the hours before dawn they would ask forgiveness

locale.transliteration: Wafee amwalihim haqqun lilssaili waalmahroomi
locale.translation: And from their properties was [given] the right of the [needy] petitioner and the deprived

locale.transliteration: Wafee alardi ayatun lilmooqineena
locale.translation: And on the earth are signs for the certain [in faith]

locale.transliteration: Wafee anfusikum afala tubsiroona
locale.translation: And in yourselves. Then will you not see

locale.transliteration: Wafee alssamai rizqukum wama tooAAadoona
locale.translation: And in the heaven is your provision and whatever you are promised

locale.transliteration: Fawarabbi alssamai waalardi innahu lahaqqun mithla ma annakum tantiqoona
locale.translation: Then by the Lord of the heaven and earth, indeed, it is truth - just as [sure as] it is that you are speaking

locale.transliteration: Hal ataka hadeethu dayfi ibraheema almukrameena
locale.translation: Has there reached you the story of the honored guests of Abraham

locale.transliteration: Ith dakhaloo AAalayhi faqaloo salaman qala salamun qawmun munkaroona
locale.translation: When they entered upon him and said, "[We greet you with] peace." He answered, "[And upon you] peace, [you are] a people unknown

locale.transliteration: Faragha ila ahlihi fajaa biAAijlin sameenin
locale.translation: Then he went to his family and came with a fat [roasted] calf

locale.transliteration: Faqarrabahu ilayhim qala ala takuloona
locale.translation: And placed it near them; he said, "Will you not eat

locale.transliteration: Faawjasa minhum kheefatan qaloo la takhaf wabashsharoohu bighulamin AAaleemin
locale.translation: And he felt from them apprehension. They said, "Fear not," and gave him good tidings of a learned boy

locale.transliteration: Faaqbalati imraatuhu fee sarratin fasakkat wajhaha waqalat AAajoozun AAaqeemun
locale.translation: And his wife approached with a cry [of alarm] and struck her face and said, "[I am] a barren old woman

locale.transliteration: Qaloo kathaliki qala rabbuki innahu huwa alhakeemu alAAaleemu
locale.translation: They said, "Thus has said your Lord; indeed, He is the Wise, the Knowing

locale.transliteration: Qala fama khatbukum ayyuha almursaloona
locale.translation: [Abraham] said, "Then what is your business [here], O messengers

locale.transliteration: Qaloo inna orsilna ila qawmin mujrimeena
locale.translation: They said, "Indeed, we have been sent to a people of criminals

locale.transliteration: Linursila AAalayhim hijaratan min teenin
locale.translation: To send down upon them stones of clay

locale.transliteration: Musawwamatan AAinda rabbika lilmusrifeena
locale.translation: Marked in the presence of your Lord for the transgressors

locale.transliteration: Faakhrajna man kana feeha mina almumineena
locale.translation: So We brought out whoever was in the cities of the believers

locale.transliteration: Fama wajadna feeha ghayra baytin mina almuslimeena
locale.translation: And We found not within them other than a [single] house of Muslims

locale.transliteration: Watarakna feeha ayatan lillatheena yakhafoona alAAathaba alaleema
locale.translation: And We left therein a sign for those who fear the painful punishment

locale.transliteration: Wafee moosa ith arsalnahu ila firAAawna bisultanin mubeenin
locale.translation: And in Moses [was a sign], when We sent him to Pharaoh with clear authority

locale.transliteration: Fatawalla biruknihi waqala sahirun aw majnoonun
locale.translation: But he turned away with his supporters and said," A magician or a madman

locale.transliteration: Faakhathnahu wajunoodahu fanabathnahum fee alyammi wahuwa muleemun
locale.translation: So We took him and his soldiers and cast them into the sea, and he was blameworthy

locale.transliteration: Wafee AAadin ith arsalna AAalayhimu alrreeha alAAaqeema
locale.translation: And in 'Aad [was a sign], when We sent against them the barren wind

locale.transliteration: Ma tatharu min shayin atat AAalayhi illa jaAAalathu kaalrrameemi
locale.translation: It left nothing of what it came upon but that it made it like disintegrated ruins

locale.transliteration: Wafee thamooda ith qeela lahum tamattaAAoo hatta heenin
locale.translation: And in Thamud, when it was said to them, "Enjoy yourselves for a time

locale.transliteration: FaAAataw AAan amri rabbihim faakhathathumu alssaAAiqatu wahum yanthuroona
locale.translation: But they were insolent toward the command of their Lord, so the thunderbolt seized them while they were looking on

locale.transliteration: Fama istataAAoo min qiyamin wama kanoo muntasireena
locale.translation: And they were unable to arise, nor could they defend themselves

locale.transliteration: Waqawma noohin min qablu innahum kanoo qawman fasiqeena
locale.translation: And [We destroyed] the people of Noah before; indeed, they were a people defiantly disobedient

locale.transliteration: Waalssamaa banaynaha biaydin wainna lamoosiAAoona
locale.translation: And the heaven We constructed with strength, and indeed, We are [its] expander

locale.transliteration: Waalarda farashnaha faniAAma almahidoona
locale.translation: And the earth We have spread out, and excellent is the preparer

locale.transliteration: Wamin kulli shayin khalaqna zawjayni laAAallakum tathakkaroona
locale.translation: And of all things We created two mates; perhaps you will remember

locale.transliteration: Fafirroo ila Allahi innee lakum minhu natheerun mubeenun
locale.translation: So flee to Allah. Indeed, I am to you from Him a clear warner

locale.transliteration: Wala tajAAaloo maAAa Allahi ilahan akhara innee lakum minhu natheerun mubeenun
locale.translation: And do not make [as equal] with Allah another deity. Indeed, I am to you from Him a clear warner

locale.transliteration: Kathalika ma ata allatheena min qablihim min rasoolin illa qaloo sahirun aw majnoonun
locale.translation: Similarly, there came not to those before them any messenger except that they said, "A magician or a madman

locale.transliteration: Atawasaw bihi bal hum qawmun taghoona
locale.translation: Did they suggest it to them? Rather, they [themselves] are a transgressing people

locale.transliteration: Fatawalla AAanhum fama anta bimaloomin
locale.translation: So leave them, [O Muhammad], for you are not to be blamed

locale.transliteration: Wathakkir fainna alththikra tanfaAAu almumineena
locale.translation: And remind, for indeed, the reminder benefits the believers

locale.transliteration: Wama khalaqtu aljinna waalinsa illa liyaAAbudooni
locale.translation: And I did not create the jinn and mankind except to worship Me

locale.transliteration: Ma oreedu minhum min rizqin wama oreedu an yutAAimooni
locale.translation: I do not want from them any provision, nor do I want them to feed Me

locale.transliteration: Inna Allaha huwa alrrazzaqu thoo alquwwati almateenu
locale.translation: Indeed, it is Allah who is the [continual] Provider, the firm possessor of strength

locale.transliteration: Fainna lillatheena thalamoo thanooban mithla thanoobi ashabihim fala yastaAAjiloona
locale.translation: And indeed, for those who have wronged is a portion [of punishment] like the portion of their predecessors, so let them not impatiently urge Me

locale.transliteration: Fawaylun lillatheena kafaroo min yawmihimu allathee yooAAadoona
locale.translation: And woe to those who have disbelieved from their Day which they are promised

locale.transliteration: At-Tur
locale.translation: The Mount

locale.transliteration: Waalttoori
locale.translation: By the mount

locale.transliteration: Wakitabin mastoorin
locale.translation: And [by] a Book inscribed

locale.transliteration: Fee raqqin manshoorin
locale.translation: In parchment spread open

locale.transliteration: Waalbayti almaAAmoori
locale.translation: And [by] the frequented House

locale.transliteration: Waalssaqfi almarfooAAi
locale.translation: And [by] the heaven raised high

locale.transliteration: Waalbahri almasjoori
locale.translation: And [by] the sea filled [with fire]

locale.transliteration: Inna AAathaba rabbika lawaqiAAun
locale.translation: Indeed, the punishment of your Lord will occur

locale.transliteration: Ma lahu min dafiAAin
locale.translation: Of it there is no preventer

locale.transliteration: Yawma tamooru alssamao mawran
locale.translation: On the Day the heaven will sway with circular motion

locale.transliteration: Wataseeru aljibalu sayran
locale.translation: And the mountains will pass on, departing

locale.transliteration: Fawaylun yawmaithin lilmukaththibeena
locale.translation: Then woe, that Day, to the deniers

locale.transliteration: Allatheena hum fee khawdin yalAAaboona
locale.translation: Who are in [empty] discourse amusing themselves

locale.transliteration: Yawma yudaAAAAoona ila nari jahannama daAAAAan
locale.translation: The Day they are thrust toward the fire of Hell with a [violent] thrust, [its angels will say]

locale.transliteration: Hathihi alnnaru allatee kuntum biha tukaththiboona
locale.translation: This is the Fire which you used to deny

locale.transliteration: Afasihrun hatha am antum la tubsiroona
locale.translation: Then is this magic, or do you not see

locale.transliteration: Islawha faisbiroo aw la tasbiroo sawaon AAalaykum innama tujzawna ma kuntum taAAmaloona
locale.translation: [Enter to] burn therein; then be patient or impatient - it is all the same for you. You are only being recompensed [for] what you used to do

locale.transliteration: Inna almuttaqeena fee jannatin wanaAAeemin
locale.translation: Indeed, the righteous will be in gardens and pleasure

locale.transliteration: Fakiheena bima atahum rabbuhum wawaqahum rabbuhum AAathaba aljaheemi
locale.translation: Enjoying what their Lord has given them, and their Lord protected them from the punishment of Hellfire

locale.transliteration: Kuloo waishraboo haneean bima kuntum taAAmaloona
locale.translation: [They will be told], "Eat and drink in satisfaction for what you used to do

locale.transliteration: Muttakieena AAala sururin masfoofatin wazawwajnahum bihoorin AAeenin
locale.translation: They will be reclining on thrones lined up, and We will marry them to fair women with large, [beautiful] eyes

locale.transliteration: Waallatheena amanoo waittabaAAathum thurriyyatuhum bieemanin alhaqna bihim thurriyyatahum wama alatnahum min AAamalihim min shayin kullu imriin bima kasaba raheenun
locale.translation: And those who believed and whose descendants followed them in faith - We will join with them their descendants, and We will not deprive them of anything of their deeds. Every person, for what he earned, is retained

locale.transliteration: Waamdadnahum bifakihatin walahmin mimma yashtahoona
locale.translation: And We will provide them with fruit and meat from whatever they desire

locale.transliteration: YatanazaAAoona feeha kasan la laghwun feeha wala tatheemun
locale.translation: They will exchange with one another a cup [of wine] wherein [results] no ill speech or commission of sin

locale.transliteration: Wayatoofu AAalayhim ghilmanun lahum kaannahum luluon maknoonun
locale.translation: There will circulate among them [servant] boys [especially] for them, as if they were pearls well-protected

locale.transliteration: Waaqbala baAAduhum AAala baAAdin yatasaaloona
locale.translation: And they will approach one another, inquiring of each other

locale.transliteration: Qaloo inna kunna qablu fee ahlina mushfiqeena
locale.translation: They will say, "Indeed, we were previously among our people fearful [of displeasing Allah]

locale.transliteration: Famanna Allahu AAalayna wawaqana AAathaba alssamoomi
locale.translation: So Allah conferred favor upon us and protected us from the punishment of the Scorching Fire

locale.transliteration: Inna kunna min qablu nadAAoohu innahu huwa albarru alrraheemu
locale.translation: Indeed, we used to supplicate Him before. Indeed, it is He who is the Beneficent, the Merciful

locale.transliteration: Fathakkir fama anta biniAAmati rabbika bikahin wala majnoonin
locale.translation: So remind [O Muhammad], for you are not, by the favor of your Lord, a soothsayer or a madman

locale.transliteration: Am yaqooloona shaAAirun natarabbasu bihi rayba almanooni
locale.translation: Or do they say [of you], "A poet for whom we await a misfortune of time

locale.transliteration: Qul tarabbasoo fainnee maAAakum mina almutarabbiseena
locale.translation: Say, "Wait, for indeed I am, with you, among the waiters

locale.transliteration: Am tamuruhum ahlamuhum bihatha am hum qawmun taghoona
locale.translation: Or do their minds command them to [say] this, or are they a transgressing people

locale.transliteration: Am yaqooloona taqawwalahu bal la yuminoona
locale.translation: Or do they say, "He has made it up"? Rather, they do not believe

locale.transliteration: Falyatoo bihadeethin mithlihi in kanoo sadiqeena
locale.translation: Then let them produce a statement like it, if they should be truthful

locale.transliteration: Am khuliqoo min ghayri shayin am humu alkhaliqoona
locale.translation: Or were they created by nothing, or were they the creators [of themselves]

locale.transliteration: Am khalaqoo alssamawati waalarda bal la yooqinoona
locale.translation: Or did they create the heavens and the earth? Rather, they are not certain

locale.transliteration: Am AAindahum khazainu rabbika am humu almusaytiroona
locale.translation: Or have they the depositories [containing the provision] of your Lord? Or are they the controllers [of them]

locale.transliteration: Am lahum sullamun yastamiAAoona feehi falyati mustamiAAuhum bisultanin mubeenin
locale.translation: Or have they a stairway [into the heaven] upon which they listen? Then let their listener produce a clear authority

locale.transliteration: Am lahu albanatu walakumu albanoona
locale.translation: Or has He daughters while you have sons

locale.transliteration: Am tasaluhum ajran fahum min maghramin muthqaloona
locale.translation: Or do you, [O Muhammad], ask of them a payment, so they are by debt burdened down

locale.transliteration: Am AAindahumu alghaybu fahum yaktuboona
locale.translation: Or have they [knowledge of] the unseen, so they write [it] down

locale.transliteration: Am yureedoona kaydan faallatheena kafaroo humu almakeedoona
locale.translation: Or do they intend a plan? But those who disbelieve - they are the object of a plan

locale.transliteration: Am lahum ilahun ghayru Allahi subhana Allahi AAamma yushrikoona
locale.translation: Or have they a deity other than Allah? Exalted is Allah above whatever they associate with Him

locale.transliteration: Wain yaraw kisfan mina alssamai saqitan yaqooloo sahabun markoomun
locale.translation: And if they were to see a fragment from the sky falling, they would say, "[It is merely] clouds heaped up

locale.transliteration: Fatharhum hatta yulaqoo yawmahumu allathee feehi yusAAaqoona
locale.translation: So leave them until they meet their Day in which they will be struck insensible

locale.transliteration: Yawma la yughnee AAanhum kayduhum shayan wala hum yunsaroona
locale.translation: The Day their plan will not avail them at all, nor will they be helped

locale.transliteration: Wainna lillatheena thalamoo AAathaban doona thalika walakinna aktharahum la yaAAlamoona
locale.translation: And indeed, for those who have wronged is a punishment before that, but most of them do not know

locale.transliteration: Waisbir lihukmi rabbika fainnaka biaAAyunina wasabbih bihamdi rabbika heena taqoomu
locale.translation: And be patient, [O Muhammad], for the decision of your Lord, for indeed, you are in Our eyes. And exalt [Allah] with praise of your Lord when you arise

locale.transliteration: Wamina allayli fasabbihhu waidbara alnnujoomi
locale.translation: And in a part of the night exalt Him and after [the setting of] the stars

locale.transliteration: An-Najm
locale.translation: The Star

locale.transliteration: Waalnnajmi itha hawa
locale.translation: By the star when it descends

locale.transliteration: Ma dalla sahibukum wama ghawa
locale.translation: Your companion [Muhammad] has not strayed, nor has he erred

locale.transliteration: Wama yantiqu AAani alhawa
locale.translation: Nor does he speak from [his own] inclination

locale.transliteration: In huwa illa wahyun yooha
locale.translation: It is not but a revelation revealed

locale.transliteration: AAallamahu shadeedu alquwa
locale.translation: Taught to him by one intense in strength

locale.transliteration: Thoo mirratin faistawa
locale.translation: One of soundness. And he rose to [his] true form

locale.transliteration: Wahuwa bialofuqi alaAAla
locale.translation: While he was in the higher [part of the] horizon

locale.transliteration: Thumma dana fatadalla
locale.translation: Then he approached and descended

locale.transliteration: Fakana qaba qawsayni aw adna
locale.translation: And was at a distance of two bow lengths or nearer

locale.transliteration: Faawha ila AAabdihi ma awha
locale.translation: And he revealed to His Servant what he revealed

locale.transliteration: Ma kathaba alfuadu ma raa
locale.translation: The heart did not lie [about] what it saw

locale.transliteration: Afatumaroonahu AAala ma yara
locale.translation: So will you dispute with him over what he saw

locale.transliteration: Walaqad raahu nazlatan okhra
locale.translation: And he certainly saw him in another descent

locale.transliteration: AAinda sidrati almuntaha
locale.translation: At the Lote Tree of the Utmost Boundary

locale.transliteration: AAindaha jannatu almawa
locale.translation: Near it is the Garden of Refuge

locale.transliteration: Ith yaghsha alssidrata ma yaghsha
locale.translation: When there covered the Lote Tree that which covered [it]

locale.transliteration: Ma zagha albasaru wama tagha
locale.translation: The sight [of the Prophet] did not swerve, nor did it transgress [its limit]

locale.transliteration: Laqad raa min ayati rabbihi alkubra
locale.translation: He certainly saw of the greatest signs of his Lord

locale.transliteration: Afaraaytumu allata waalAAuzza
locale.translation: So have you considered al-Lat and al-'Uzza

locale.transliteration: Wamanata alththalithata alokhra
locale.translation: And Manat, the third - the other one

locale.transliteration: Alakumu alththakaru walahu alontha
locale.translation: Is the male for you and for Him the female

locale.transliteration: Tilka ithan qismatun deeza
locale.translation: That, then, is an unjust division

locale.transliteration: In hiya illa asmaon sammaytumooha antum waabaokum ma anzala Allahu biha min sultanin in yattabiAAoona illa alththanna wama tahwa alanfusu walaqad jaahum min rabbihimu alhuda
locale.translation: They are not but [mere] names you have named them - you and your forefathers - for which Allah has sent down no authority. They follow not except assumption and what [their] souls desire, and there has already come to them from their Lord guidance

locale.transliteration: Am lilinsani ma tamanna
locale.translation: Or is there for man whatever he wishes

locale.transliteration: Falillahi alakhiratu waaloola
locale.translation: Rather, to Allah belongs the Hereafter and the first [life]

locale.transliteration: Wakam min malakin fee alssamawati la tughnee shafaAAatuhum shayan illa min baAAdi an yathana Allahu liman yashao wayarda
locale.translation: And how many angels there are in the heavens whose intercession will not avail at all except [only] after Allah has permitted [it] to whom He wills and approves

locale.transliteration: Inna allatheena la yuminoona bialakhirati layusammoona almalaikata tasmiyata alontha
locale.translation: Indeed, those who do not believe in the Hereafter name the angels female names

locale.transliteration: Wama lahum bihi min AAilmin in yattabiAAoona illa alththanna wainna alththanna la yughnee mina alhaqqi shayan
locale.translation: And they have thereof no knowledge. They follow not except assumption, and indeed, assumption avails not against the truth at all

locale.transliteration: FaaAArid AAan man tawalla AAan thikrina walam yurid illa alhayata alddunya
locale.translation: So turn away from whoever turns his back on Our message and desires not except the worldly life

locale.transliteration: Thalika mablaghuhum mina alAAilmi inna rabbaka huwa aAAlamu biman dalla AAan sabeelihi wahuwa aAAlamu bimani ihtada
locale.translation: That is their sum of knowledge. Indeed, your Lord is most knowing of who strays from His way, and He is most knowing of who is guided

locale.transliteration: Walillahi ma fee alssamawati wama fee alardi liyajziya allatheena asaoo bima AAamiloo wayajziya allatheena ahsanoo bialhusna
locale.translation: And to Allah belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is in the earth - that He may recompense those who do evil with [the penalty of] what they have done and recompense those who do good with the best [reward]

locale.transliteration: Allatheena yajtaniboona kabaira alithmi waalfawahisha illa allamama inna rabbaka wasiAAu almaghfirati huwa aAAlamu bikum ith anshaakum mina alardi waith antum ajinnatun fee butooni ommahatikum fala tuzakkoo anfusakum huwa aAAlamu bimani ittaqa
locale.translation: Those who avoid the major sins and immoralities, only [committing] slight ones. Indeed, your Lord is vast in forgiveness. He was most knowing of you when He produced you from the earth and when you were fetuses in the wombs of your mothers. So do not claim yourselves to be pure; He is most knowing of who fears Him

locale.transliteration: Afaraayta allathee tawalla
locale.translation: Have you seen the one who turned away

locale.transliteration: WaaAAta qaleelan waakda
locale.translation: And gave a little and [then] refrained

locale.transliteration: aAAindahu AAilmu alghaybi fahuwa yara
locale.translation: Does he have knowledge of the unseen, so he sees

locale.transliteration: Am lam yunabba bima fee suhufi moosa
locale.translation: Or has he not been informed of what was in the scriptures of Moses

locale.transliteration: Waibraheema allathee waffa
locale.translation: And [of] Abraham, who fulfilled [his obligations]

locale.transliteration: Alla taziru waziratun wizra okhra
locale.translation: That no bearer of burdens will bear the burden of another

locale.transliteration: Waan laysa lilinsani illa ma saAAa
locale.translation: And that there is not for man except that [good] for which he strives

locale.transliteration: Waanna saAAyahu sawfa yura
locale.translation: And that his effort is going to be seen

locale.transliteration: Thumma yujzahu aljazaa alawfa
locale.translation: Then he will be recompensed for it with the fullest recompense

locale.transliteration: Waanna ila rabbika almuntaha
locale.translation: And that to your Lord is the finality

locale.transliteration: Waannahu huwa adhaka waabka
locale.translation: And that it is He who makes [one] laugh and weep

locale.transliteration: Waannahu huwa amata waahya
locale.translation: And that it is He who causes death and gives life

locale.transliteration: Waannahu khalaqa alzzawjayni alththakara waalontha
locale.translation: And that He creates the two mates - the male and female

locale.transliteration: Min nutfatin itha tumna
locale.translation: From a sperm-drop when it is emitted

locale.transliteration: Waanna AAalayhi alnnashata alokhra
locale.translation: And that [incumbent] upon Him is the next creation

locale.transliteration: Waannahu huwa aghna waaqna
locale.translation: And that it is He who enriches and suffices

locale.transliteration: Waannahu huwa rabbu alshshiAAra
locale.translation: And that it is He who is the Lord of Sirius

locale.transliteration: Waannahu ahlaka AAadan aloola
locale.translation: And that He destroyed the first [people of] 'Aad

locale.transliteration: Wathamooda fama abqa
locale.translation: And Thamud - and He did not spare [them]

locale.transliteration: Waqawma noohin min qablu innahum kanoo hum athlama waatgha
locale.translation: And the people of Noah before. Indeed, it was they who were [even] more unjust and oppressing

locale.transliteration: Waalmutafikata ahwa
locale.translation: And the overturned towns He hurled down

locale.transliteration: Faghashshaha ma ghashsha
locale.translation: And covered them by that which He covered

locale.transliteration: Fabiayyi alai rabbika tatamara
locale.translation: Then which of the favors of your Lord do you doubt

locale.transliteration: Hatha natheerun mina alnnuthuri aloola
locale.translation: This [Prophet] is a warner like the former warners

locale.transliteration: Azifati alazifatu
locale.translation: The Approaching Day has approached

locale.transliteration: Laysa laha min dooni Allahi kashifatun
locale.translation: Of it, [from those] besides Allah, there is no remover

locale.transliteration: Afamin hatha alhadeethi taAAjaboona
locale.translation: Then at this statement do you wonder

locale.transliteration: Watadhakoona wala tabkoona
locale.translation: And you laugh and do not weep

locale.transliteration: Waantum samidoona
locale.translation: While you are proudly sporting

locale.transliteration: Faosjudoo lillahi waoAAbudoo
locale.translation: So prostrate to Allah and worship [Him]

locale.transliteration: Al-Qamar
locale.translation: The Moon

locale.transliteration: Iqtarabati alssaAAatu wainshaqqa alqamaru
locale.translation: The Hour has come near, and the moon has split [in two]

locale.transliteration: Wain yaraw ayatan yuAAridoo wayaqooloo sihrun mustamirrun
locale.translation: And if they see a miracle, they turn away and say, "Passing magic

locale.transliteration: Wakaththaboo waittabaAAoo ahwaahum wakullu amrin mustaqirrun
locale.translation: And they denied and followed their inclinations. But for every matter is a [time of] settlement

locale.transliteration: Walaqad jaahum mina alanbai ma feehi muzdajarun
locale.translation: And there has already come to them of information that in which there is deterrence

locale.transliteration: Hikmatun balighatun fama tughnee alnnuthuru
locale.translation: Extensive wisdom - but warning does not avail [them]

locale.transliteration: Fatawalla AAanhum yawma yadAAu alddaAAi ila shayin nukurin
locale.translation: So leave them, [O Muhammad]. The Day the Caller calls to something forbidding

locale.transliteration: KhushshaAAan absaruhum yakhrujoona mina alajdathi kaannahum jaradun muntashirun
locale.translation: Their eyes humbled, they will emerge from the graves as if they were locusts spreading

locale.transliteration: MuhtiAAeena ila alddaAAi yaqoolu alkafiroona hatha yawmun AAasirun
locale.translation: Racing ahead toward the Caller. The disbelievers will say, "This is a difficult Day

locale.transliteration: Kaththabat qablahum qawmu noohin fakaththaboo AAabdana waqaloo majnoonun waizdujira
locale.translation: The people of Noah denied before them, and they denied Our servant and said, "A madman," and he was repelled

locale.transliteration: FadaAAa rabbahu annee maghloobun faintasir
locale.translation: So he invoked his Lord, "Indeed, I am overpowered, so help

locale.transliteration: Fafatahna abwaba alssamai bimain munhamirin
locale.translation: Then We opened the gates of the heaven with rain pouring down

locale.transliteration: Wafajjarna alarda AAuyoonan failtaqa almao AAala amrin qad qudira
locale.translation: And caused the earth to burst with springs, and the waters met for a matter already predestined

locale.transliteration: Wahamalnahu AAala thati alwahin wadusurin
locale.translation: And We carried him on a [construction of] planks and nails

locale.transliteration: Tajree biaAAyunina jazaan liman kana kufira
locale.translation: Sailing under Our observation as reward for he who had been denied

locale.transliteration: Walaqad taraknaha ayatan fahal min muddakirin
locale.translation: And We left it as a sign, so is there any who will remember

locale.transliteration: Fakayfa kana AAathabee wanuthuri
locale.translation: And how [severe] were My punishment and warning

locale.transliteration: Walaqad yassarna alqurana lilththikri fahal min muddakirin
locale.translation: And We have certainly made the Qur'an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember

locale.transliteration: Kaththabat AAadun fakayfa kana AAathabee wanuthuri
locale.translation: Aad denied; and how [severe] were My punishment and warning

locale.transliteration: Inna arsalna AAalayhim reehan sarsaran fee yawmi nahsin mustamirrin
locale.translation: Indeed, We sent upon them a screaming wind on a day of continuous misfortune

locale.transliteration: TanziAAu alnnasa kaannahum aAAjazu nakhlin munqaAAirin
locale.translation: Extracting the people as if they were trunks of palm trees uprooted

locale.transliteration: Fakayfa kana AAathabee wanuthuri
locale.translation: And how [severe] were My punishment and warning

locale.transliteration: Walaqad yassarna alqurana lilththikri fahal min muddakirin
locale.translation: And We have certainly made the Qur'an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember

locale.transliteration: Kaththabat thamoodu bialnnuthuri
locale.translation: Thamud denied the warning

locale.transliteration: Faqaloo abasharan minna wahidan nattabiAAuhu inna ithan lafee dalalin wasuAAurin
locale.translation: And said, "Is it one human being among us that we should follow? Indeed, we would then be in error and madness

locale.transliteration: Aolqiya alththikru AAalayhi min baynina bal huwa kaththabun ashirun
locale.translation: Has the message been sent down upon him from among us? Rather, he is an insolent liar

locale.transliteration: SayaAAlamoona ghadan mani alkaththabu alashiru
locale.translation: They will know tomorrow who is the insolent liar

locale.transliteration: Inna mursiloo alnnaqati fitnatan lahum fairtaqibhum waistabir
locale.translation: Indeed, We are sending the she-camel as trial for them, so watch them and be patient

locale.transliteration: Wanabbihum anna almaa qismatun baynahum kullu shirbin muhtadarun
locale.translation: And inform them that the water is shared between them, each [day of] drink attended [by turn]

locale.transliteration: Fanadaw sahibahum fataAAata faAAaqara
locale.translation: But they called their companion, and he dared and hamstrung [her]

locale.transliteration: Fakayfa kana AAathabee wanuthuri
locale.translation: And how [severe] were My punishment and warning

locale.transliteration: Inna arsalna AAalayhim sayhatan wahidatan fakanoo kahasheemi almuhtathiri
locale.translation: Indeed, We sent upon them one blast from the sky, and they became like the dry twig fragments of an [animal] pen

locale.transliteration: Walaqad yassarna alqurana lilththikri fahal min muddakirin
locale.translation: And We have certainly made the Qur'an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember

locale.transliteration: Kaththabat qawmu lootin bialnnuthuri
locale.translation: The people of Lot denied the warning

locale.transliteration: Inna arsalna AAalayhim hasiban illa ala lootin najjaynahum bisaharin
locale.translation: Indeed, We sent upon them a storm of stones, except the family of Lot - We saved them before dawn

locale.transliteration: NiAAmatan min AAindina kathalika najzee man shakara
locale.translation: As favor from us. Thus do We reward he who is grateful

locale.transliteration: Walaqad antharahum batshatana fatamaraw bialnnuthuri
locale.translation: And he had already warned them of Our assault, but they disputed the warning

locale.transliteration: Walaqad rawadoohu AAan dayfihi fatamasna aAAyunahum fathooqoo AAathabee wanuthuri
locale.translation: And they had demanded from him his guests, but We obliterated their eyes, [saying], "Taste My punishment and warning

locale.transliteration: Walaqad sabbahahum bukratan AAathabun mustaqirrun
locale.translation: And there came upon them by morning an abiding punishment

locale.transliteration: Fathooqoo AAathabee wanuthuri
locale.translation: So taste My punishment and warning

locale.transliteration: Walaqad yassarna alqurana lilththikri fahal min muddakirin
locale.translation: And We have certainly made the Qur'an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember

locale.transliteration: Walaqad jaa ala firAAawna alnnuthuru
locale.translation: And there certainly came to the people of Pharaoh warning

locale.transliteration: Kaththaboo biayatina kulliha faakhathnahum akhtha AAazeezin muqtadirin
locale.translation: They denied Our signs, all of them, so We seized them with a seizure of one Exalted in Might and Perfect in Ability

locale.transliteration: Akuffarukum khayrun min olaikum am lakum baraatun fee alzzuburi
locale.translation: Are your disbelievers better than those [former ones], or have you immunity in the scripture

locale.transliteration: Am yaqooloona nahnu jameeAAun muntasirun
locale.translation: Or do they say, "We are an assembly supporting [each other]

locale.transliteration: Sayuhzamu aljamAAu wayuwalloona alddubura
locale.translation: [Their] assembly will be defeated, and they will turn their backs [in retreat]

locale.transliteration: Bali alssaAAatu mawAAiduhum waalssaAAatu adha waamarru
locale.translation: But the Hour is their appointment [for due punishment], and the Hour is more disastrous and more bitter

locale.transliteration: Inna almujrimeena fee dalalin wasuAAurin
locale.translation: Indeed, the criminals are in error and madness

locale.transliteration: Yawma yushaboona fee alnnari AAala wujoohihim thooqoo massa saqara
locale.translation: The Day they are dragged into the Fire on their faces [it will be said], "Taste the touch of Saqar

locale.transliteration: Inna kulla shayin khalaqnahu biqadarin
locale.translation: Indeed, all things We created with predestination

locale.transliteration: Wama amruna illa wahidatun kalamhin bialbasari
locale.translation: And Our command is but one, like a glance of the eye

locale.transliteration: Walaqad ahlakna ashyaAAakum fahal min muddakirin
locale.translation: And We have already destroyed your kinds, so is there any who will remember

locale.transliteration: Wakullu shayin faAAaloohu fee alzzuburi
locale.translation: And everything they did is in written records

locale.transliteration: Wakullu sagheerin wakabeerin mustatarun
locale.translation: And every small and great [thing] is inscribed

locale.transliteration: Inna almuttaqeena fee jannatin wanaharin
locale.translation: Indeed, the righteous will be among gardens and rivers

locale.transliteration: Fee maqAAadi sidqin AAinda maleekin muqtadirin
locale.translation: In a seat of honor near a Sovereign, Perfect in Ability

locale.transliteration: Ar-Rahman
locale.translation: The Beneficent

locale.transliteration: Alrrahmanu
locale.translation: The Most Merciful

locale.transliteration: AAallama alqurana
locale.translation: Taught the Qur'an

locale.transliteration: Khalaqa alinsana
locale.translation: Created man

locale.transliteration: AAallamahu albayana

locale.translation: Who is it that would loan Allah a goodly loan so He will multiply it for him and he will have a noble reward

locale.transliteration: Yawma tara almumineena waalmuminati yasAAa nooruhum bayna aydeehim wabiaymanihim bushrakumu alyawma jannatun tajree min tahtiha alanharu khalideena feeha thalika huwa alfawzu alAAatheemu
locale.translation: On the Day you see the believing men and believing women, their light proceeding before them and on their right, [it will be said], "Your good tidings today are [of] gardens beneath which rivers flow, wherein you will abide eternally." That is what is the great attainment

locale.transliteration: Yawma yaqoolu almunafiqoona waalmunafiqatu lillatheena amanoo onthuroona naqtabis min noorikum qeela irjiAAoo waraakum failtamisoo nooran faduriba baynahum bisoorin lahu babun batinuhu feehi alrrahmatu wathahiruhu min qibalihi alAAathabu
locale.translation: On the [same] Day the hypocrite men and hypocrite women will say to those who believed, "Wait for us that we may acquire some of your light." It will be said, "Go back behind you and seek light." And a wall will be placed between them with a door, its interior containing mercy, but on the outside of it is torment

locale.transliteration: Yunadoonahum alam nakun maAAakum qaloo bala walakinnakum fatantum anfusakum watarabbastum wairtabtum wagharratkumu alamaniyyu hatta jaa amru Allahi wagharrakum biAllahi algharooru
locale.translation: The hypocrites will call to the believers, "Were we not with you?" They will say, "Yes, but you afflicted yourselves and awaited [misfortune for us] and doubted, and wishful thinking deluded you until there came the command of Allah. And the Deceiver deceived you concerning Allah

locale.transliteration: Faalyawma la yukhathu minkum fidyatun wala mina allatheena kafaroo mawakumu alnnaru hiya mawlakum wabisa almaseeru
locale.translation: So today no ransom will be taken from you or from those who disbelieved. Your refuge is the Fire. It is most worthy of you, and wretched is the destination

locale.transliteration: Alam yani lillatheena amanoo an takhshaAAa quloobuhum lithikri Allahi wama nazala mina alhaqqi wala yakoonoo kaallatheena ootoo alkitaba min qablu fatala AAalayhimu alamadu faqasat quloobuhum wakatheerun minhum fasiqoona
locale.translation: Has the time not come for those who have believed that their hearts should become humbly submissive at the remembrance of Allah and what has come down of the truth? And let them not be like those who were given the Scripture before, and a long period passed over them, so their hearts hardened; and many of them are defiantly disobedient

locale.transliteration: IAAlamoo anna Allaha yuhyee alarda baAAda mawtiha qad bayyanna lakumu alayati laAAallakum taAAqiloona
locale.translation: Know that Allah gives life to the earth after its lifelessness. We have made clear to you the signs; perhaps you will understand

locale.transliteration: Inna almussaddiqeena waalmussaddiqati waaqradoo Allaha qardan hasanan yudaAAafu lahum walahum ajrun kareemun
locale.translation: Indeed, the men who practice charity and the women who practice charity and [they who] have loaned Allah a goodly loan - it will be multiplied for them, and they will have a noble reward

locale.transliteration: Waallatheena amanoo biAllahi warusulihi olaika humu alssiddeeqoona waalshshuhadao AAinda rabbihim lahum ajruhum wanooruhum waallatheena kafaroo wakaththaboo biayatina olaika ashabu aljaheemi
locale.translation: And those who have believed in Allah and His messengers - those are [in the ranks of] the supporters of truth and the martyrs, with their Lord. For them is their reward and their light. But those who have disbelieved and denied Our verses - those are the companions of Hellfire

locale.transliteration: IAAlamoo annama alhayatu alddunya laAAibun walahwun wazeenatun watafakhurun baynakum watakathurun fee alamwali waalawladi kamathali ghaythin aAAjaba alkuffara nabatuhu thumma yaheeju fatarahu musfarran thumma yakoonu hutaman wafee alakhirati AAathabun shadeedun wamaghfiratun mina Allahi waridwanun wama alhayatu alddunya illa mataAAu alghuroori
locale.translation: Know that the life of this world is but amusement and diversion and adornment and boasting to one another and competition in increase of wealth and children - like the example of a rain whose [resulting] plant growth pleases the tillers; then it dries and you see it turned yellow; then it becomes [scattered] debris. And in the Hereafter is severe punishment and forgiveness from Allah and approval. And what is the worldly life except the enjoyment of delusion

locale.transliteration: Sabiqoo ila maghfiratin min rabbikum wajannatin AAarduha kaAAardi alssamai waalardi oAAiddat lillatheena amanoo biAllahi warusulihi thalika fadlu Allahi yuteehi man yashao waAllahu thoo alfadli alAAatheemi
locale.translation: Race toward forgiveness from your Lord and a Garden whose width is like the width of the heavens and earth, prepared for those who believed in Allah and His messengers. That is the bounty of Allah which He gives to whom He wills, and Allah is the possessor of great bounty

locale.transliteration: Ma asaba min museebatin fee alardi wala fee anfusikum illa fee kitabin min qabli an nabraaha inna thalika AAala Allahi yaseerun
locale.translation: No disaster strikes upon the earth or among yourselves except that it is in a register before We bring it into being - indeed that, for Allah, is easy

locale.transliteration: Likayla tasaw AAala ma fatakum wala tafrahoo bima atakum waAllahu la yuhibbu kulla mukhtalin fakhoorin
locale.translation: In order that you not despair over what has eluded you and not exult [in pride] over what He has given you. And Allah does not like everyone self-deluded and boastful

locale.transliteration: Allatheena yabkhaloona wayamuroona alnnasa bialbukhli waman yatawalla fainna Allaha huwa alghaniyyu alhameedu
locale.translation: [Those] who are stingy and enjoin upon people stinginess. And whoever turns away - then indeed, Allah is the Free of need, the Praiseworthy

locale.transliteration: Laqad arsalna rusulana bialbayyinati waanzalna maAAahumu alkitaba waalmeezana liyaqooma alnnasu bialqisti waanzalna alhadeeda feehi basun shadeedun wamanafiAAu lilnnasi waliyaAAlama Allahu man yansuruhu warusulahu bialghaybi inna Allaha qawiyyun AAazeezun
locale.translation: We have already sent Our messengers with clear evidences and sent down with them the Scripture and the balance that the people may maintain [their affairs] in justice. And We sent down iron, wherein is great military might and benefits for the people, and so that Allah may make evident those who support Him and His messengers unseen. Indeed, Allah is Powerful and Exalted in Might

locale.transliteration: Walaqad arsalna noohan waibraheema wajaAAalna fee thurriyyatihima alnnubuwwata waalkitaba faminhum muhtadin wakatheerun minhum fasiqoona
locale.translation: And We have already sent Noah and Abraham and placed in their descendants prophethood and scripture; and among them is he who is guided, but many of them are defiantly disobedient

locale.transliteration: Thumma qaffayna AAala atharihim birusulina waqaffayna biAAeesa ibni maryama waataynahu alinjeela wajaAAalna fee quloobi allatheena ittabaAAoohu rafatan warahmatan warahbaniyyatan ibtadaAAooha ma katabnaha AAalayhim illa ibtighaa ridwani Allahi fama raAAawha haqqa riAAayatiha faatayna allatheena amanoo minhum ajrahum wakatheerun minhum fasiqoona
locale.translation: Then We sent following their footsteps Our messengers and followed [them] with Jesus, the son of Mary, and gave him the Gospel. And We placed in the hearts of those who followed him compassion and mercy and monasticism, which they innovated; We did not prescribe it for them except [that they did so] seeking the approval of Allah. But they did not observe it with due observance. So We gave the ones who believed among them their reward, but many of them are defiantly disobedient

locale.transliteration: Ya ayyuha allatheena amanoo ittaqoo Allaha waaminoo birasoolihi yutikum kiflayni min rahmatihi wayajAAal lakum nooran tamshoona bihi wayaghfir lakum waAllahu ghafoorun raheemun
locale.translation: O you who have believed, fear Allah and believe in His Messenger; He will [then] give you a double portion of His mercy and make for you a light by which you will walk and forgive you; and Allah is Forgiving and Merciful

locale.transliteration: Lialla yaAAlama ahlu alkitabi alla yaqdiroona AAala shayin min fadli Allahi waanna alfadla biyadi Allahi yuteehi man yashao waAllahu thoo alfadli alAAatheemi
locale.translation: [This is] so that the People of the Scripture may know that they are not able [to obtain] anything from the bounty of Allah and that [all] bounty is in the hand of Allah; He gives it to whom He wills. And Allah is the possessor of great bounty

locale.transliteration: Al-Mujadila
locale.translation: The Pleading Woman

locale.transliteration: Qad samiAAa Allahu qawla allatee tujadiluka fee zawjiha watashtakee ila Allahi waAllahu yasmaAAu tahawurakuma inna Allaha sameeAAun baseerun
locale.translation: Certainly has Allah heard the speech of the one who argues with you, [O Muhammad], concerning her husband and directs her complaint to Allah. And Allah hears your dialogue; indeed, Allah is Hearing and Seeing

locale.transliteration: Allatheena yuthahiroona minkum min nisaihim ma hunna ommahatihim in ommahatuhum illa allaee waladnahum wainnahum layaqooloona munkaran mina alqawli wazooran wainna Allaha laAAafuwwun ghafoorun
locale.translation: Those who pronounce thihar among you [to separate] from their wives - they are not [consequently] their mothers. Their mothers are none but those who gave birth to them. And indeed, they are saying an objectionable statement and a falsehood. But indeed, Allah is Pardoning and Forgiving

locale.transliteration: Waallatheena yuthahiroona min nisaihim thumma yaAAoodoona lima qaloo fatahreeru raqabatin min qabli an yatamassa thalikum tooAAathoona bihi waAllahu bima taAAmaloona khabeerun
locale.translation: And those who pronounce thihar from their wives and then [wish to] go back on what they said - then [there must be] the freeing of a slave before they touch one another. That is what you are admonished thereby; and Allah is Acquainted with what you do

locale.transliteration: Faman lam yajid fasiyamu shahrayni mutatabiAAayni min qabli an yatamassa faman lam yastatiAA faitAAamu sitteena miskeenan thalika lituminoo biAllahi warasoolihi watilka hudoodu Allahi walilkafireena AAathabun aleemun
locale.translation: And he who does not find [a slave] - then a fast for two months consecutively before they touch one another; and he who is unable - then the feeding of sixty poor persons. That is for you to believe [completely] in Allah and His Messenger; and those are the limits [set by] Allah. And for the disbelievers is a painful punishment

locale.transliteration: Inna allatheena yuhaddoona Allaha warasoolahu kubitoo kama kubita allatheena min qablihim waqad anzalna ayatin bayyinatin walilkafireena AAathabun muheenun
locale.translation: Indeed, those who oppose Allah and His Messenger are abased as those before them were abased. And We have certainly sent down verses of clear evidence. And for the disbelievers is a humiliating punishment

locale.transliteration: Yawma yabAAathuhumu Allahu jameeAAan fayunabbiohum bima AAamiloo ahsahu Allahu wanasoohu waAllahu AAala kulli shayin shaheedun
locale.translation: On the Day when Allah will resurrect them all and inform them of what they did. Allah had enumerated it, while they forgot it; and Allah is, over all things, Witness

locale.transliteration: Alam tara anna Allaha yaAAlamu ma fee alssamawati wama fee alardi ma yakoonu min najwa thalathatin illa huwa rabiAAuhum wala khamsatin illa huwa sadisuhum wala adna min thalika wala akthara illa huwa maAAahum ayna ma kanoo thumma yunabbiohum bima AAamiloo yawma alqiyamati inna Allaha bikulli shayin AAaleemun
locale.translation: Have you not considered that Allah knows what is in the heavens and what is on the earth? There is in no private conversation three but that He is the fourth of them, nor are there five but that He is the sixth of them - and no less than that and no more except that He is with them [in knowledge] wherever they are. Then He will inform them of what they did, on the Day of Resurrection. Indeed Allah is, of all things, Knowing

locale.transliteration: Alam tara ila allatheena nuhoo AAani alnnajwa thumma yaAAoodoona lima nuhoo AAanhu wayatanajawna bialithmi waalAAudwani wamaAAsiyati alrrasooli waitha jaooka hayyawka bima lam yuhayyika bihi Allahu wayaqooloona fee anfusihim lawla yuAAaththibuna Allahu bima naqoolu hasbuhum jahannamu yaslawnaha fabisa almaseeru
locale.translation: Have you not considered those who were forbidden from private conversation, then they return to that which they were forbidden and converse among themselves about sin and aggression and disobedience to the Messenger? And when they come to you, they greet you with that [word] by which Allah does not greet you and say among themselves, "Why does Allah not punish us for what we say?" Sufficient for them is Hell, which they will [enter to] burn, and wretched is the destination

locale.transliteration: Ya ayyuha allatheena amanoo itha tanajaytum fala tatanajaw bialithmi waalAAudwani wamaAAsiyati alrrasooli watanajaw bialbirri waalttaqwa waittaqoo Allaha allathee ilayhi tuhsharoona
locale.translation: O you who have believed, when you converse privately, do not converse about sin and aggression and disobedience to the Messenger but converse about righteousness and piety. And fear Allah, to whom you will be gathered

locale.transliteration: Innama alnnajwa mina alshshaytani liyahzuna allatheena amanoo walaysa bidarrihim shayan illa biithni Allahi waAAala Allahi falyatawakkali almuminoona
locale.translation: Private conversation is only from Satan that he may grieve those who have believed, but he will not harm them at all except by permission of Allah. And upon Allah let the believers rely

locale.transliteration: Ya ayyuha allatheena amanoo itha qeela lakum tafassahoo fee almajalisi faifsahoo yafsahi Allahu lakum waitha qeela onshuzoo faonshuzoo yarfaAAi Allahu allatheena amanoo minkum waallatheena ootoo alAAilma darajatin waAllahu bima taAAmaloona khabeerun
locale.translation: O you who have believed, when you are told, "Space yourselves" in assemblies, then make space; Allah will make space for you. And when you are told, "Arise," then arise; Allah will raise those who have believed among you and those who were given knowledge, by degrees. And Allah is Acquainted with what you do

locale.transliteration: Ya ayyuha allatheena amanoo itha najaytumu alrrasoola faqaddimoo bayna yaday najwakum sadaqatan thalika khayrun lakum waatharu fain lam tajidoo fainna Allaha ghafoorun raheemun
locale.translation: O you who have believed, when you [wish to] privately consult the Messenger, present before your consultation a charity. That is better for you and purer. But if you find not [the means] - then indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful

locale.transliteration: Aashfaqtum an tuqaddimoo bayna yaday najwakum sadaqatin faith lam tafAAaloo wataba Allahu AAalaykum faaqeemoo alssalata waatoo alzzakata waateeAAoo Allaha warasoolahu waAllahu khabeerun bima taAAmaloona
locale.translation: Have you feared to present before your consultation charities? Then when you do not and Allah has forgiven you, then [at least] establish prayer and give zakah and obey Allah and His Messenger. And Allah is Acquainted with what you do

locale.transliteration: Alam tara ila allatheena tawallaw qawman ghadiba Allahu AAalayhim ma hum minkum wala minhum wayahlifoona AAala alkathibi wahum yaAAlamoona
locale.translation: Have you not considered those who make allies of a people with whom Allah has become angry? They are neither of you nor of them, and they swear to untruth while they know [they are lying]

locale.transliteration: aAAadda Allahu lahum AAathaban shadeedan innahum saa ma kanoo yaAAmaloona
locale.translation: Allah has prepared for them a severe punishment. Indeed, it was evil that they were doing

locale.transliteration: Ittakhathoo aymanahum junnatan fasaddoo AAan sabeeli Allahi falahum AAathabun muheenun
locale.translation: They took their [false] oaths as a cover, so they averted [people] from the way of Allah, and for them is a humiliating punishment

locale.transliteration: Lan tughniya AAanhum amwaluhum wala awladuhum mina Allahi shayan olaika ashabu alnnari hum feeha khalidoona
locale.translation: Never will their wealth or their children avail them against Allah at all. Those are the companions of the Fire; they will abide therein eternally

locale.transliteration: Yawma yabAAathuhumu Allahu jameeAAan fayahlifoona lahu kama yahlifoona lakum wayahsaboona annahum AAala shayin ala innahum humu alkathiboona
locale.translation: On the Day Allah will resurrect them all, and they will swear to Him as they swear to you and think that they are [standing] on something. Unquestionably, it is they who are the liars

locale.transliteration: Istahwatha AAalayhimu alshshaytanu faansahum thikra Allahi olaika hizbu alshshaytani ala inna hizba alshshaytani humu alkhasiroona
locale.translation: Satan has overcome them and made them forget the remembrance of Allah. Those are the party of Satan. Unquestionably, the party of Satan - they will be the losers

locale.transliteration: Inna allatheena yuhaddoona Allaha warasoolahu olaika fee alathalleena
locale.translation: Indeed, the ones who oppose Allah and His Messenger - those will be among the most humbled

locale.transliteration: Kataba Allahu laaghlibanna ana warusulee inna Allaha qawiyyun AAazeezun
locale.translation: Allah has written, "I will surely overcome, I and My messengers." Indeed, Allah is Powerful and Exalted in Might

locale.transliteration: La tajidu qawman yuminoona biAllahi waalyawmi alakhiri yuwaddoona man hadda Allaha warasoolahu walaw kanoo abaahum aw abnaahum aw ikhwanahum aw AAasheeratahum olaika kataba fee quloobihimu aleemana waayyadahum biroohin minhu wayudkhiluhum jannatin tajree min tahtiha alanharu khalideena feeha radiya Allahu AAanhum waradoo AAanhu olaika hizbu Allahi ala inna hizba Allahi humu almuflihoona
locale.translation: You will not find a people who believe in Allah and the Last Day having affection for those who oppose Allah and His Messenger, even if they were their fathers or their sons or their brothers or their kindred. Those - He has decreed within their hearts faith and supported them with spirit from Him. And We will admit them to gardens beneath which rivers flow, wherein they abide eternally. Allah is pleased with them, and they are pleased with Him - those are the party of Allah. Unquestionably, the party of Allah - they are the successful

locale.transliteration: Al-Hashr
locale.translation: The Exile

locale.transliteration: Sabbaha lillahi ma fee alssamawati wama fee alardi wahuwa alAAazeezu alhakeemu
locale.translation: Whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth exalts Allah, and He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise

locale.transliteration: Huwa allathee akhraja allatheena kafaroo min ahli alkitabi min diyarihim liawwali alhashri ma thanantum an yakhrujoo wathannoo annahum maniAAatuhum husoonuhum mina Allahi faatahumu Allahu min haythu lam yahtasiboo waqathafa fee quloobihimu alrruAAba yukhriboona buyootahum biaydeehim waaydee almumineena faiAAtabiroo ya olee alabsari
