locale.translation: It is He who expelled the ones who disbelieved among the People of the Scripture from their homes at the first gathering. You did not think they would leave, and they thought that their fortresses would protect them from Allah; but [the decree of] Allah came upon them from where they had not expected, and He cast terror into their hearts [so] they destroyed their houses by their [own] hands and the hands of the believers. So take warning, O people of vision

locale.transliteration: Walawla an kataba Allahu AAalayhimu aljalaa laAAaththabahum fee alddunya walahum fee alakhirati AAathabu alnnari
locale.translation: And if not that Allah had decreed for them evacuation, He would have punished them in [this] world, and for them in the Hereafter is the punishment of the Fire

locale.transliteration: Thalika biannahum shaqqoo Allaha warasoolahu waman yushaqqi Allaha fainna Allaha shadeedu alAAiqabi
locale.translation: That is because they opposed Allah and His Messenger. And whoever opposes Allah - then indeed, Allah is severe in penalty

locale.transliteration: Ma qataAAtum min leenatin aw taraktumooha qaimatan AAala osooliha fabiithni Allahi waliyukhziya alfasiqeena
locale.translation: Whatever you have cut down of [their] palm trees or left standing on their trunks - it was by permission of Allah and so He would disgrace the defiantly disobedient

locale.transliteration: Wama afaa Allahu AAala rasoolihi minhum fama awjaftum AAalayhi min khaylin wala rikabin walakinna Allaha yusallitu rusulahu AAala man yashao waAllahu AAala kulli shayin qadeerun
locale.translation: And what Allah restored [of property] to His Messenger from them - you did not spur for it [in an expedition] any horses or camels, but Allah gives His messengers power over whom He wills, and Allah is over all things competent

locale.transliteration: Ma afaa Allahu AAala rasoolihi min ahli alqura falillahi walilrrasooli walithee alqurba waalyatama waalmasakeeni waibni alssabeeli kay la yakoona doolatan bayna alaghniyai minkum wama atakumu alrrasoolu fakhuthoohu wama nahakum AAanhu faintahoo waittaqoo Allaha inna Allaha shadeedu alAAiqabi
locale.translation: And what Allah restored to His Messenger from the people of the towns - it is for Allah and for the Messenger and for [his] near relatives and orphans and the [stranded] traveler - so that it will not be a perpetual distribution among the rich from among you. And whatever the Messenger has given you - take; and what he has forbidden you - refrain from. And fear Allah; indeed, Allah is severe in penalty

locale.transliteration: Lilfuqarai almuhajireena allatheena okhrijoo min diyarihim waamwalihim yabtaghoona fadlan mina Allahi waridwanan wayansuroona Allaha warasoolahu olaika humu alssadiqoona
locale.translation: For the poor emigrants who were expelled from their homes and their properties, seeking bounty from Allah and [His] approval and supporting Allah and His Messenger, [there is also a share]. Those are the truthful

locale.transliteration: Waallatheena tabawwaoo alddara waaleemana min qablihim yuhibboona man hajara ilayhim wala yajidoona fee sudoorihim hajatan mimma ootoo wayuthiroona AAala anfusihim walaw kana bihim khasasatun waman yooqa shuhha nafsihi faolaika humu almuflihoona
locale.translation: And [also for] those who were settled in al-Madinah and [adopted] the faith before them. They love those who emigrated to them and find not any want in their breasts of what the emigrants were given but give [them] preference over themselves, even though they are in privation. And whoever is protected from the stinginess of his soul - it is those who will be the successful

locale.transliteration: Waallatheena jaoo min baAAdihim yaqooloona rabbana ighfir lana waliikhwanina allatheena sabaqoona bialeemani wala tajAAal fee quloobina ghillan lillatheena amanoo rabbana innaka raoofun raheemun
locale.translation: And [there is a share for] those who came after them, saying, "Our Lord, forgive us and our brothers who preceded us in faith and put not in our hearts [any] resentment toward those who have believed. Our Lord, indeed You are Kind and Merciful

locale.transliteration: Alam tara ila allatheena nafaqoo yaqooloona liikhwanihimu allatheena kafaroo min ahli alkitabi lain okhrijtum lanakhrujanna maAAakum wala nuteeAAu feekum ahadan abadan wain qootiltum lanansurannakum waAllahu yashhadu innahum lakathiboona
locale.translation: Have you not considered those who practice hypocrisy, saying to their brothers who have disbelieved among the People of the Scripture, "If you are expelled, we will surely leave with you, and we will not obey, in regard to you, anyone - ever; and if you are fought, we will surely aid you." But Allah testifies that they are liars

locale.transliteration: Lain okhrijoo la yakhrujoona maAAahum walain qootiloo la yansuroonahum walain nasaroohum layuwallunna aladbara thumma la yunsaroona
locale.translation: If they are expelled, they will not leave with them, and if they are fought, they will not aid them. And [even] if they should aid them, they will surely turn their backs; then [thereafter] they will not be aided

locale.transliteration: Laantum ashaddu rahbatan fee sudoorihim mina Allahi thalika biannahum qawmun la yafqahoona
locale.translation: You [believers] are more fearful within their breasts than Allah. That is because they are a people who do not understand

locale.transliteration: La yuqatiloonakum jameeAAan illa fee quran muhassanatin aw min warai judurin basuhum baynahum shadeedun tahsabuhum jameeAAan waquloobuhum shatta thalika biannahum qawmun la yaAAqiloona
locale.translation: They will not fight you all except within fortified cities or from behind walls. Their violence among themselves is severe. You think they are together, but their hearts are diverse. That is because they are a people who do not reason

locale.transliteration: Kamathali allatheena min qablihim qareeban thaqoo wabala amrihim walahum AAathabun aleemun
locale.translation: [Theirs is] like the example of those shortly before them: they tasted the bad consequence of their affair, and they will have a painful punishment

locale.transliteration: Kamathali alshshaytani ith qala lilinsani okfur falamma kafara qala innee bareeon minka innee akhafu Allaha rabba alAAalameena
locale.translation: [The hypocrites are] like the example of Satan when he says to man, "Disbelieve." But when he disbelieves, he says, "Indeed, I am disassociated from you. Indeed, I fear Allah, Lord of the worlds

locale.transliteration: Fakana AAaqibatahuma annahuma fee alnnari khalidayni feeha wathalika jazao alththalimeena
locale.translation: So the outcome for both of them is that they will be in the Fire, abiding eternally therein. And that is the recompense of the wrong-doers

locale.transliteration: Ya ayyuha allatheena amanoo ittaqoo Allaha waltanthur nafsun ma qaddamat lighadin waittaqoo Allaha inna Allaha khabeerun bima taAAmaloona
locale.translation: O you who have believed, fear Allah. And let every soul look to what it has put forth for tomorrow - and fear Allah. Indeed, Allah is Acquainted with what you do

locale.transliteration: Wala takoonoo kaallatheena nasoo Allaha faansahum anfusahum olaika humu alfasiqoona
locale.translation: And be not like those who forgot Allah, so He made them forget themselves. Those are the defiantly disobedient

locale.transliteration: La yastawee ashabu alnnari waashabu aljannati ashabu aljannati humu alfaizoona
locale.translation: Not equal are the companions of the Fire and the companions of Paradise. The companions of Paradise - they are the attainers [of success]

locale.transliteration: Law anzalna hatha alqurana AAala jabalin laraaytahu khashiAAan mutasaddiAAan min khashyati Allahi watilka alamthalu nadribuha lilnnasi laAAallahum yatafakkaroona
locale.translation: If We had sent down this Qur'an upon a mountain, you would have seen it humbled and coming apart from fear of Allah. And these examples We present to the people that perhaps they will give thought

locale.transliteration: Huwa Allahu allathee la ilaha illa huwa AAalimu alghaybi waalshshahadati huwa alrrahmanu alrraheemu
locale.translation: He is Allah, other than whom there is no deity, Knower of the unseen and the witnessed. He is the Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful

locale.transliteration: Huwa Allahu allathee la ilaha illa huwa almaliku alquddoosu alssalamu almuminu almuhayminu alAAazeezu aljabbaru almutakabbiru subhana Allahi AAamma yushrikoona
locale.translation: He is Allah, other than whom there is no deity, the Sovereign, the Pure, the Perfection, the Bestower of Faith, the Overseer, the Exalted in Might, the Compeller, the Superior. Exalted is Allah above whatever they associate with Him

locale.transliteration: Huwa Allahu alkhaliqu albario almusawwiru lahu alasmao alhusna yusabbihu lahu ma fee alssamawati waalardi wahuwa alAAazeezu alhakeemu
locale.translation: He is Allah, the Creator, the Inventor, the Fashioner; to Him belong the best names. Whatever is in the heavens and earth is exalting Him. And He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise

locale.transliteration: Al-Mumtahanah
locale.translation: She that is to be examined

locale.transliteration: Ya ayyuha allatheena amanoo la tattakhithoo AAaduwwee waAAaduwwakum awliyaa tulqoona ilayhim bialmawaddati waqad kafaroo bima jaakum mina alhaqqi yukhrijoona alrrasoola waiyyakum an tuminoo biAllahi rabbikum in kuntum kharajtum jihadan fee sabeelee waibtighaa mardatee tusirroona ilayhim bialmawaddati waana aAAlamu bima akhfaytum wama aAAlantum waman yafAAalhu minkum faqad dalla sawaa alssabeeli
locale.translation: O you who have believed, do not take My enemies and your enemies as allies, extending to them affection while they have disbelieved in what came to you of the truth, having driven out the Prophet and yourselves [only] because you believe in Allah, your Lord. If you have come out for jihad in My cause and seeking means to My approval, [take them not as friends]. You confide to them affection, but I am most knowing of what you have concealed and what you have declared. And whoever does it among you has certainly strayed from the soundness of the way

locale.transliteration: In yathqafookum yakoonoo lakam aAAdaan wayabsutoo ilaykum aydiyahum waalsinatahum bialssooi wawaddoo law takfuroona
locale.translation: If they gain dominance over you, they would be to you as enemies and extend against you their hands and their tongues with evil, and they wish you would disbelieve

locale.transliteration: Lan tanfaAAakum arhamukum wala awladukum yawma alqiyamati yafsilu baynakum waAllahu bima taAAmaloona baseerun
locale.translation: Never will your relatives or your children benefit you; the Day of Resurrection He will judge between you. And Allah, of what you do, is Seeing

locale.transliteration: Qad kanat lakum oswatun hasanatun fee ibraheema waallatheena maAAahu ith qaloo liqawmihim inna buraao minkum wamimma taAAbudoona min dooni Allahi kafarna bikum wabada baynana wabaynakumu alAAadawatu waalbaghdao abadan hatta tuminoo biAllahi wahdahu illa qawla ibraheema liabeehi laastaghfiranna laka wama amliku laka mina Allahi min shayin rabbana AAalayka tawakkalna wailayka anabna wailayka almaseeru
locale.translation: There has already been for you an excellent pattern in Abraham and those with him, when they said to their people, "Indeed, we are disassociated from you and from whatever you worship other than Allah. We have denied you, and there has appeared between us and you animosity and hatred forever until you believe in Allah alone" except for the saying of Abraham to his father, "I will surely ask forgiveness for you, but I have not [power to do] for you anything against Allah. Our Lord, upon You we have relied, and to You we have returned, and to You is the destination

locale.transliteration: Rabbana la tajAAalna fitnatan lillatheena kafaroo waighfir lana rabbana innaka anta alAAazeezu alhakeemu
locale.translation: Our Lord, make us not [objects of] torment for the disbelievers and forgive us, our Lord. Indeed, it is You who is the Exalted in Might, the Wise

locale.transliteration: Laqad kana lakum feehim oswatun hasanatun liman kana yarjoo Allaha waalyawma alakhira waman yatawalla fainna Allaha huwa alghanniyyu alhameedu
locale.translation: There has certainly been for you in them an excellent pattern for anyone whose hope is in Allah and the Last Day. And whoever turns away - then indeed, Allah is the Free of need, the Praiseworthy

locale.transliteration: AAasa Allahu an yajAAala baynakum wabayna allatheena AAadaytum minhum mawaddatan waAllahu qadeerun waAllahu ghafoorun raheemun
locale.translation: Perhaps Allah will put, between you and those to whom you have been enemies among them, affection. And Allah is competent, and Allah is Forgiving and Merciful

locale.transliteration: La yanhakumu Allahu AAani allatheena lam yuqatilookum fee alddeeni walam yukhrijookum min diyarikum an tabarroohum watuqsitoo ilayhim inna Allaha yuhibbu almuqsiteena
locale.translation: Allah does not forbid you from those who do not fight you because of religion and do not expel you from your homes - from being righteous toward them and acting justly toward them. Indeed, Allah loves those who act justly

locale.transliteration: Innama yanhakumu Allahu AAani allatheena qatalookum fee alddeeni waakhrajookum min diyarikum wathaharoo AAala ikhrajikum an tawallawhum waman yatawallahum faolaika humu alththalimoona
locale.translation: Allah only forbids you from those who fight you because of religion and expel you from your homes and aid in your expulsion - [forbids] that you make allies of them. And whoever makes allies of them, then it is those who are the wrongdoers

locale.transliteration: Ya ayyuha allatheena amanoo itha jaakumu almuminatu muhajiratin faimtahinoohunna Allahu aAAlamu bieemanihinna fain AAalimtumoohunna muminatin fala tarjiAAoohunna ila alkuffari la hunna hillun lahum wala hum yahilloona lahunna waatoohum ma anfaqoo wala junaha AAalaykum an tankihoohunna itha ataytumoohunna ojoorahunna wala tumsikoo biAAisami alkawafiri waisaloo ma anfaqtum walyasaloo ma anfaqoo thalikum hukmu Allahi yahkumu baynakum waAllahu AAaleemun hakeemun
locale.translation: O you who have believed, when the believing women come to you as emigrants, examine them. Allah is most knowing as to their faith. And if you know them to be believers, then do not return them to the disbelievers; they are not lawful [wives] for them, nor are they lawful [husbands] for them. But give the disbelievers what they have spent. And there is no blame upon you if you marry them when you have given them their due compensation. And hold not to marriage bonds with disbelieving women, but ask for what you have spent and let them ask for what they have spent. That is the judgement of Allah; He judges between you. And Allah is Knowing and Wise

locale.transliteration: Wain fatakum shayon min azwajikum ila alkuffari faAAaqabtum faatoo allatheena thahabat azwajuhum mithla ma anfaqoo waittaqoo Allaha allathee antum bihi muminoona
locale.translation: And if you have lost any of your wives to the disbelievers and you subsequently obtain [something], then give those whose wives have gone the equivalent of what they had spent. And fear Allah, in whom you are believers

locale.transliteration: Ya ayyuha alnnabiyyu itha jaaka almuminatu yubayiAAnaka AAala an la yushrikna biAllahi shayan wala yasriqna wala yazneena wala yaqtulna awladahunna wala yateena bibuhtanin yaftareenahu bayna aydeehinna waarjulihinna wala yaAAseenaka fee maAAroofin fabayiAAhunna waistaghfir lahunna Allaha inna Allaha ghafoorun raheemun
locale.translation: O Prophet, when the believing women come to you pledging to you that they will not associate anything with Allah, nor will they steal, nor will they commit unlawful sexual intercourse, nor will they kill their children, nor will they bring forth a slander they have invented between their arms and legs, nor will they disobey you in what is right - then accept their pledge and ask forgiveness for them of Allah. Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful

locale.transliteration: Ya ayyuha allatheena amanoo la tatawallaw qawman ghadiba Allahu AAalayhim qad yaisoo mina alakhirati kama yaisa alkuffaru min ashabi alquboori
locale.translation: O you who have believed, do not make allies of a people with whom Allah has become angry. They have despaired of [reward in] the Hereafter just as the disbelievers have despaired of [meeting] the inhabitants of the graves

locale.transliteration: As-Saf
locale.translation: The Ranks

locale.transliteration: Sabbaha lillahi ma fee alssamawati wama fee alardi wahuwa alAAazeezu alhakeemu
locale.translation: Whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth exalts Allah, and He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise

locale.transliteration: Ya ayyuha allatheena amanoo lima taqooloona ma la tafAAaloona
locale.translation: O you who have believed, why do you say what you do not do

locale.transliteration: Kabura maqtan AAinda Allahi an taqooloo ma la tafAAaloona
locale.translation: Great is hatred in the sight of Allah that you say what you do not do

locale.transliteration: Inna Allaha yuhibbu allatheena yuqatiloona fee sabeelihi saffan kaannahum bunyanun marsoosun
locale.translation: Indeed, Allah loves those who fight in His cause in a row as though they are a [single] structure joined firmly

locale.transliteration: Waith qala moosa liqawmihi ya qawmi lima tuthoonanee waqad taAAlamoona annee rasoolu Allahi ilaykum falamma zaghoo azagha Allahu quloobahum waAllahu la yahdee alqawma alfasiqeena
locale.translation: And [mention, O Muhammad], when Moses said to his people, "O my people, why do you harm me while you certainly know that I am the messenger of Allah to you?" And when they deviated, Allah caused their hearts to deviate. And Allah does not guide the defiantly disobedient people

locale.transliteration: Waith qala AAeesa ibnu maryama ya banee israeela innee rasoolu Allahi ilaykum musaddiqan lima bayna yadayya mina alttawrati wamubashshiran birasoolin yatee min baAAdee ismuhu ahmadu falamma jaahum bialbayyinati qaloo hatha sihrun mubeenun
locale.translation: And [mention] when Jesus, the son of Mary, said, "O children of Israel, indeed I am the messenger of Allah to you confirming what came before me of the Torah and bringing good tidings of a messenger to come after me, whose name is Ahmad." But when he came to them with clear evidences, they said, "This is obvious magic

locale.transliteration: Waman athlamu mimmani iftara AAala Allahi alkathiba wahuwa yudAAa ila alislami waAllahu la yahdee alqawma alththalimeena
locale.translation: And who is more unjust than one who invents about Allah untruth while he is being invited to Islam. And Allah does not guide the wrongdoing people

locale.transliteration: Yureedoona liyutfioo noora Allahi biafwahihim waAllahu mutimmu noorihi walaw kariha alkafiroona
locale.translation: They want to extinguish the light of Allah with their mouths, but Allah will perfect His light, although the disbelievers dislike it

locale.transliteration: Huwa allathee arsala rasoolahu bialhuda wadeeni alhaqqi liyuthhirahu AAala alddeeni kullihi walaw kariha almushrikoona
locale.translation: It is He who sent His Messenger with guidance and the religion of truth to manifest it over all religion, although those who associate others with Allah dislike it

locale.transliteration: Ya ayyuha allatheena amanoo hal adullukum AAala tijaratin tunjeekum min AAathabin aleemin
locale.translation: O you who have believed, shall I guide you to a transaction that will save you from a painful punishment

locale.transliteration: Tuminoona biAllahi warasoolihi watujahidoona fee sabeeli Allahi biamwalikum waanfusikum thalikum khayrun lakum in kuntum taAAlamoona
locale.translation: [It is that] you believe in Allah and His Messenger and strive in the cause of Allah with your wealth and your lives. That is best for you, if you should know

locale.transliteration: Yaghfir lakum thunoobakum wayudkhilkum jannatin tajree min tahtiha alanharu wamasakina tayyibatan fee jannati AAadnin thalika alfawzu alAAatheemu
locale.translation: He will forgive for you your sins and admit you to gardens beneath which rivers flow and pleasant dwellings in gardens of perpetual residence. That is the great attainment

locale.transliteration: Waokhra tuhibboonaha nasrun mina Allahi wafathun qarreebun wabashshiri almumineena
locale.translation: And [you will obtain] another [favor] that you love - victory from Allah and an imminent conquest; and give good tidings to the believers

locale.transliteration: Ya ayyuha allatheena amanoo koonoo ansara Allahi kama qala AAeesa ibnu maryama lilhawariyyeena man ansaree ila Allahi qala alhawariyyoona nahnu ansaru Allahi faamanat taifatun min banee israeela wakafarat taifatun faayyadna allatheena amanoo AAala AAaduwwihim faasbahoo thahireena
locale.translation: O you who have believed, be supporters of Allah, as when Jesus, the son of Mary, said to the disciples, "Who are my supporters for Allah?" The disciples said, "We are supporters of Allah." And a faction of the Children of Israel believed and a faction disbelieved. So We supported those who believed against their enemy, and they became dominant

locale.transliteration: Al-Jumu'ah
locale.translation: The Congregation, Friday

locale.transliteration: Yusabbihu lillahi ma fee alssamawati wama fee alardi almaliki alquddoosi alAAazeezi alhakeemi
locale.translation: Whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth is exalting Allah, the Sovereign, the Pure, the Exalted in Might, the Wise

locale.transliteration: Huwa allathee baAAatha fee alommiyyeena rasoolan minhum yatloo AAalayhim ayatihi wayuzakkeehim wayuAAallimuhumu alkitaba waalhikmata wain kanoo min qablu lafee dalalin mubeenin
locale.translation: It is He who has sent among the unlettered a Messenger from themselves reciting to them His verses and purifying them and teaching them the Book and wisdom - although they were before in clear error

locale.transliteration: Waakhareena minhum lamma yalhaqoo bihim wahuwa alAAazeezu alhakeemu
locale.translation: And [to] others of them who have not yet joined them. And He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise

locale.transliteration: Thalika fadlu Allahi yuteehi man yashao waAllahu thoo alfadli alAAatheemi
locale.translation: That is the bounty of Allah, which He gives to whom He wills, and Allah is the possessor of great bounty

locale.transliteration: Mathalu allatheena hummiloo alttawrata thumma lam yahmilooha kamathali alhimari yahmilu asfaran bisa mathalu alqawmi allatheena kaththaboo biayati Allahi waAllahu la yahdee alqawma alththalimeena
locale.translation: The example of those who were entrusted with the Torah and then did not take it on is like that of a donkey who carries volumes [of books]. Wretched is the example of the people who deny the signs of Allah. And Allah does not guide the wrongdoing people

locale.transliteration: Qul ya ayyuha allatheena hadoo in zaAAamtum annakum awliyao lillahi min dooni alnnasi fatamannawoo almawta in kuntum sadiqeena
locale.translation: Say, "O you who are Jews, if you claim that you are allies of Allah, excluding the [other] people, then wish for death, if you should be truthful

locale.transliteration: Wala yatamannawnahu abadan bima qaddamat aydeehim waAllahu AAaleemun bialththalimeena
locale.translation: But they will not wish for it, ever, because of what their hands have put forth. And Allah is Knowing of the wrongdoers

locale.transliteration: Qul inna almawta allathee tafirroona minhu fainnahu mulaqeekum thumma turaddoona ila AAalimi alghaybi waalshshahadati fayunabbiokum bima kuntum taAAmaloona
locale.translation: Say, "Indeed, the death from which you flee - indeed, it will meet you. Then you will be returned to the Knower of the unseen and the witnessed, and He will inform you about what you used to do

locale.transliteration: Ya ayyuha allatheena amanoo itha noodiya lilssalati min yawmi aljumuAAati faisAAaw ila thikri Allahi watharoo albayAAa thalikum khayrun lakum in kuntum taAAlamoona
locale.translation: O you who have believed, when [the adhan] is called for the prayer on the day of Jumu'ah [Friday], then proceed to the remembrance of Allah and leave trade. That is better for you, if you only knew

locale.transliteration: Faitha qudiyati alssalatu faintashiroo fee alardi waibtaghoo min fadli Allahi waothkuroo Allaha katheeran laAAallakum tuflihoona
locale.translation: And when the prayer has been concluded, disperse within the land and seek from the bounty of Allah, and remember Allah often that you may succeed

locale.transliteration: Waitha raaw tijaratan aw lahwan infaddoo ilayha watarakooka qaiman qul ma AAinda Allahi khayrun mina allahwi wamina alttijarati waAllahu khayru alrraziqeena
locale.translation: But when they saw a transaction or a diversion, [O Muhammad], they rushed to it and left you standing. Say, "What is with Allah is better than diversion and than a transaction, and Allah is the best of providers

locale.transliteration: Al-Munafiqun
locale.translation: The Hypocrites

locale.transliteration: Itha jaaka almunafiqoona qaloo nashhadu innaka larasoolu Allahi waAllahu yaAAlamu innaka larasooluhu waAllahu yashhadu inna almunafiqeena lakathiboona
locale.translation: When the hypocrites come to you, [O Muhammad], they say, "We testify that you are the Messenger of Allah." And Allah knows that you are His Messenger, and Allah testifies that the hypocrites are liars

locale.transliteration: Ittakhathoo aymanahum junnatan fasaddoo AAan sabeeli Allahi innahum saa ma kanoo yaAAmaloona
locale.translation: They have taken their oaths as a cover, so they averted [people] from the way of Allah. Indeed, it was evil that they were doing

locale.transliteration: Thalika biannahum amanoo thumma kafaroo fatubiAAa AAala quloobihim fahum la yafqahoona
locale.translation: That is because they believed, and then they disbelieved; so their hearts were sealed over, and they do not understand

locale.transliteration: Waitha raaytahum tuAAjibuka ajsamuhum wain yaqooloo tasmaAA liqawlihim kaannahum khushubun musannadatun yahsaboona kulla sayhatin AAalayhim humu alAAaduwwu faihtharhum qatalahumu Allahu anna yufakoona
locale.translation: And when you see them, their forms please you, and if they speak, you listen to their speech. [They are] as if they were pieces of wood propped up - they think that every shout is against them. They are the enemy, so beware of them. May Allah destroy them; how are they deluded

locale.transliteration: Waitha qeela lahum taAAalaw yastaghfir lakum rasoolu Allahi lawwaw ruoosahum waraaytahum yasuddoona wahum mustakbiroona
locale.translation: And when it is said to them, "Come, the Messenger of Allah will ask forgiveness for you," they turn their heads aside and you see them evading while they are arrogant

locale.transliteration: Sawaon AAalayhim astaghfarta lahum am lam tastaghfir lahum lan yaghfira Allahu lahum inna Allaha la yahdee alqawma alfasiqeena
locale.translation: It is all the same for them whether you ask forgiveness for them or do not ask forgiveness for them; never will Allah forgive them. Indeed, Allah does not guide the defiantly disobedient people

locale.transliteration: Humu allatheena yaqooloona la tunfiqoo AAala man AAinda rasooli Allahi hatta yanfaddoo walillahi khazainu alssamawati waalardi walakinna almunafiqeena la yafqahoona
locale.translation: They are the ones who say, "Do not spend on those who are with the Messenger of Allah until they disband." And to Allah belongs the depositories of the heavens and the earth, but the hypocrites do not understand

locale.transliteration: Yaqooloona lain rajaAAna ila almadeenati layukhrijanna alaAAazzu minha alathalla walillahi alAAizzatu walirasoolihi walilmumineena walakinna almunafiqeena la yaAAlamoona
locale.translation: They say, "If we return to al-Madinah, the more honored [for power] will surely expel therefrom the more humble." And to Allah belongs [all] honor, and to His Messenger, and to the believers, but the hypocrites do not know

locale.transliteration: Ya ayyuha allatheena amanoo la tulhikum amwalukum wala awladukum AAan thikri Allahi waman yafAAal thalika faolaika humu alkhasiroona
locale.translation: O you who have believed, let not your wealth and your children divert you from remembrance of Allah. And whoever does that - then those are the losers

locale.transliteration: Waanfiqoo min ma razaqnakum min qabli an yatiya ahadakumu almawtu fayaqoola rabbi lawla akhkhartanee ila ajalin qareebin faassaddaqa waakun mina alssaliheena
locale.translation: And spend [in the way of Allah] from what We have provided you before death approaches one of you and he says, "My Lord, if only You would delay me for a brief term so I would give charity and be among the righteous

locale.transliteration: Walan yuakhkhira Allahu nafsan itha jaa ajaluha waAllahu khabeerun bima taAAmaloona
locale.translation: But never will Allah delay a soul when its time has come. And Allah is Acquainted with what you do

locale.transliteration: At-Taghabun
locale.translation: The Mutual Disillusion

locale.transliteration: Yusabbihu lillahi ma fee alssamawati wama fee alardi lahu almulku walahu alhamdu wahuwa AAala kulli shayin qadeerun
locale.translation: Whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth is exalting Allah. To Him belongs dominion, and to Him belongs [all] praise, and He is over all things competent

locale.transliteration: Huwa allathee khalaqakum faminkum kafirun waminkum muminun waAllahu bima taAAmaloona baseerun
locale.translation: It is He who created you, and among you is the disbeliever, and among you is the believer. And Allah, of what you do, is Seeing

locale.transliteration: Khalaqa alssamawati waalarda bialhaqqi wasawwarakum faahsana suwarakum wailayhi almaseeru
locale.translation: He created the heavens and earth in truth and formed you and perfected your forms; and to Him is the [final] destination

locale.transliteration: YaAAlamu ma fee alssamawati waalardi wayaAAlamu ma tusirroona wama tuAAlinoona waAllahu AAaleemun bithati alssudoori
locale.translation: He knows what is within the heavens and earth and knows what you conceal and what you declare. And Allah is Knowing of that within the breasts

locale.transliteration: Alam yatikum nabao allatheena kafaroo min qablu fathaqoo wabala amrihim walahum AAathabun aleemun
locale.translation: Has there not come to you the news of those who disbelieved before? So they tasted the bad consequence of their affair, and they will have a painful punishment

locale.transliteration: Thalika biannahu kanat tateehim rusuluhum bialbayyinati faqaloo abasharun yahdoonana fakafaroo watawallaw waistaghna Allahu waAllahu ghaniyyun hameedun
locale.translation: That is because their messengers used to come to them with clear evidences, but they said, "Shall human beings guide us?" and disbelieved and turned away. And Allah dispensed [with them]; and Allah is Free of need and Praiseworthy

locale.transliteration: ZaAAama allatheena kafaroo an lan yubAAathoo qul bala warabbee latubAAathunna thumma latunabbaonna bima AAamiltum wathalika AAala Allahi yaseerun
locale.translation: Those who disbelieve have claimed that they will never be resurrected. Say, "Yes, by my Lord, you will surely be resurrected; then you will surely be informed of what you did. And that, for Allah, is easy

locale.transliteration: Faaminoo biAllahi warasoolihi waalnnoori allathee anzalna waAllahu bima taAAmaloona khabeerun
locale.translation: So believe in Allah and His Messenger and the Qur'an which We have sent down. And Allah is Acquainted with what you do

locale.transliteration: Yawma yajmaAAukum liyawmi aljamAAi thalika yawmu alttaghabuni waman yumin biAllahi wayaAAmal salihan yukaffir AAanhu sayyiatihi wayudkhilhu jannatin tajree min tahtiha alanharu khalideena feeha abadan thalika alfawzu alAAatheemu
locale.translation: The Day He will assemble you for the Day of Assembly - that is the Day of Deprivation. And whoever believes in Allah and does righteousness - He will remove from him his misdeeds and admit him to gardens beneath which rivers flow, wherein they will abide forever. That is the great attainment

locale.transliteration: Waallatheena kafaroo wakaththaboo biayatina olaika ashabu alnnari khalideena feeha wabisa almaseeru
locale.translation: But the ones who disbelieved and denied Our verses - those are the companions of the Fire, abiding eternally therein; and wretched is the destination

locale.transliteration: Ma asaba min museebatin illa biithni Allahi waman yumin biAllahi yahdi qalbahu waAllahu bikulli shayin AAaleemun
locale.translation: No disaster strikes except by permission of Allah. And whoever believes in Allah - He will guide his heart. And Allah is Knowing of all things

locale.transliteration: WaateeAAoo Allaha waateeAAoo alrrasoola fain tawallaytum fainnama AAala rasoolina albalaghu almubeenu
locale.translation: And obey Allah and obey the Messenger; but if you turn away - then upon Our Messenger is only [the duty of] clear notification

locale.transliteration: Allahu la ilaha illa huwa waAAala Allahi falyatawakkali almuminoona
locale.translation: Allah - there is no deity except Him. And upon Allah let the believers rely

locale.transliteration: Ya ayyuha allatheena amanoo inna min azwajikum waawladikum AAaduwwan lakum faihtharoohum wain taAAfoo watasfahoo wataghfiroo fainna Allaha ghafoorun raheemun
locale.translation: O you who have believed, indeed, among your wives and your children are enemies to you, so beware of them. But if you pardon and overlook and forgive - then indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful

locale.transliteration: Innama amwalukum waawladukum fitnatun waAllahu AAindahu ajrun AAatheemun
locale.translation: Your wealth and your children are but a trial, and Allah has with Him a great reward

locale.transliteration: Faittaqoo Allaha ma istataAAtum waismaAAoo waateeAAoo waanfiqoo khayran lianfusikum waman yooqa shuhha nafsihi faolaika humu almuflihoona
locale.translation: So fear Allah as much as you are able and listen and obey and spend [in the way of Allah]; it is better for your selves. And whoever is protected from the stinginess of his soul - it is those who will be the successful

locale.transliteration: In tuqridoo Allaha qardan hasanan yudaAAifhu lakum wayaghfir lakum waAllahu shakoorun haleemun
locale.translation: If you loan Allah a goodly loan, He will multiply it for you and forgive you. And Allah is Most Appreciative and Forbearing

locale.transliteration: AAalimu alghaybi waalshshahadati alAAazeezu alhakeemu
locale.translation: Knower of the unseen and the witnessed, the Exalted in Might, the Wise

locale.transliteration: At-Talaq
locale.translation: The Divorce

locale.transliteration: Ya ayyuha alnnabiyyu itha tallaqtumu alnnisaa fatalliqoohunna liAAiddatihinna waahsoo alAAiddata waittaqoo Allaha rabbakum la tukhrijoohunna min buyootihinna wala yakhrujna illa an yateena bifahishatin mubayyinatin watilka hudoodu Allahi waman yataAAadda hudooda Allahi faqad thalama nafsahu la tadree laAAalla Allaha yuhdithu baAAda thalika amran
locale.translation: O Prophet, when you [Muslims] divorce women, divorce them for [the commencement of] their waiting period and keep count of the waiting period, and fear Allah, your Lord. Do not turn them out of their [husbands'] houses, nor should they [themselves] leave [during that period] unless they are committing a clear immorality. And those are the limits [set by] Allah. And whoever transgresses the limits of Allah has certainly wronged himself. You know not; perhaps Allah will bring about after that a [different] matter

locale.transliteration: Faitha balaghna ajalahunna faamsikoohunna bimaAAroofin aw fariqoohunna bimaAAroofin waashhidoo thaway AAadlin minkum waaqeemoo alshshahadata lillahi thalikum yooAAathu bihi man kana yuminu biAllahi waalyawmi alakhiri waman yattaqi Allaha yajAAal lahu makhrajan
locale.translation: And when they have [nearly] fulfilled their term, either retain them according to acceptable terms or part with them according to acceptable terms. And bring to witness two just men from among you and establish the testimony for [the acceptance of] Allah. That is instructed to whoever should believe in Allah and the Last day. And whoever fears Allah - He will make for him a way out

locale.transliteration: Wayarzuqhu min haythu la yahtasibu waman yatawakkal AAala Allahi fahuwa hasbuhu inna Allaha balighu amrihi qad jaAAala Allahu likulli shayin qadran
locale.translation: And will provide for him from where he does not expect. And whoever relies upon Allah - then He is sufficient for him. Indeed, Allah will accomplish His purpose. Allah has already set for everything a [decreed] extent

locale.transliteration: Waallaee yaisna mina almaheedi min nisaikum ini irtabtum faAAiddatuhunna thalathatu ashhurin waallaee lam yahidna waolatu alahmali ajaluhunna an yadaAAna hamlahunna waman yattaqi Allaha yajAAal lahu min amrihi yusran
locale.translation: And those who no longer expect menstruation among your women - if you doubt, then their period is three months, and [also for] those who have not menstruated. And for those who are pregnant, their term is until they give birth. And whoever fears Allah - He will make for him of his matter ease

locale.transliteration: Thalika amru Allahi anzalahu ilaykum waman yattaqi Allaha yukaffir AAanhu sayyiatihi wayuAAthim lahu ajran
locale.translation: That is the command of Allah, which He has sent down to you; and whoever fears Allah - He will remove for him his misdeeds and make great for him his reward

locale.transliteration: Askinoohunna min haythu sakantum min wujdikum wala tudarroohunna litudayyiqoo AAalayhinna wain kunna olati hamlin faanfiqoo AAalayhinna hatta yadaAAna hamlahunna fain ardaAAna lakum faatoohunna ojoorahunna watamiroo baynakum bimaAAroofin wain taAAasartum fasaturdiAAu lahu okhra
locale.translation: Lodge them [in a section] of where you dwell out of your means and do not harm them in order to oppress them. And if they should be pregnant, then spend on them until they give birth. And if they breastfeed for you, then give them their payment and confer among yourselves in the acceptable way; but if you are in discord, then there may breastfeed for the father another woman

locale.transliteration: Liyunfiq thoo saAAatin min saAAatihi waman qudira AAalayhi rizquhu falyunfiq mimma atahu Allahu la yukallifu Allahu nafsan illa ma ataha sayajAAalu Allahu baAAda AAusrin yusran
locale.translation: Let a man of wealth spend from his wealth, and he whose provision is restricted - let him spend from what Allah has given him. Allah does not charge a soul except [according to] what He has given it. Allah will bring about, after hardship, ease

locale.transliteration: Wakaayyin min qaryatin AAatat AAan amri rabbiha warusulihi fahasabnaha hisaban shadeedan waAAaththabnaha AAathaban nukran
locale.translation: And how many a city was insolent toward the command of its Lord and His messengers, so We took it to severe account and punished it with a terrible punishment

locale.transliteration: Fathaqat wabala amriha wakana AAaqibatu amriha khusran
locale.translation: And it tasted the bad consequence of its affair, and the outcome of its affair was loss

locale.transliteration: aAAadda Allahu lahum AAathaban shadeedan faittaqoo Allaha ya olee alalbabi allatheena amanoo qad anzala Allahu ilaykum thikran
locale.translation: Allah has prepared for them a severe punishment; so fear Allah, O you of understanding who have believed. Allah has sent down to you the Qur'an

locale.transliteration: Rasoolan yatloo AAalaykum ayati Allahi mubayyinatin liyukhrija allatheena amanoo waAAamiloo alssalihati mina alththulumati ila alnnoori waman yumin biAllahi wayaAAmal salihan yudkhilhu jannatin tajree min tahtiha alanharu khalideena feeha abadan qad ahsana Allahu lahu rizqan
locale.translation: [He sent] a Messenger [Muhammad] reciting to you the distinct verses of Allah that He may bring out those who believe and do righteous deeds from darknesses into the light. And whoever believes in Allah and does righteousness - He will admit him into gardens beneath which rivers flow to abide therein forever. Allah will have perfected for him a provision

locale.transliteration: Allahu allathee khalaqa sabAAa samawatin wamina alardi mithlahunna yatanazzalu alamru baynahunna litaAAlamoo anna Allaha AAala kulli shayin qadeerun waanna Allaha qad ahata bikulli shayin AAilman
locale.translation: It is Allah who has created seven heavens and of the earth, the like of them. [His] command descends among them so you may know that Allah is over all things competent and that Allah has encompassed all things in knowledge

locale.transliteration: At-Tahrim
locale.translation: The Prohibition

locale.transliteration: Ya ayyuha alnnabiyyu lima tuharrimu ma ahalla Allahu laka tabtaghee mardata azwajika waAllahu ghafoorun raheemun
locale.translation: O Prophet, why do you prohibit [yourself from] what Allah has made lawful for you, seeking the approval of your wives? And Allah is Forgiving and Merciful

locale.transliteration: Qad farada Allahu lakum tahillata aymanikum waAllahu mawlakum wahuwa alAAaleemu alhakeemu
locale.translation: Allah has already ordained for you [Muslims] the dissolution of your oaths. And Allah is your protector, and He is the Knowing, the Wise

locale.transliteration: Waith asarra alnnabiyyu ila baAAdi azwajihi hadeethan falamma nabbaat bihi waathharahu Allahu AAalayhi AAarrafa baAAdahu waaAArada AAan baAAdin falamma nabbaaha bihi qalat man anbaaka hatha qala nabbaaniya alAAaleemu alkhabeeru
locale.translation: And [remember] when the Prophet confided to one of his wives a statement; and when she informed [another] of it and Allah showed it to him, he made known part of it and ignored a part. And when he informed her about it, she said, "Who told you this?" He said, "I was informed by the Knowing, the Acquainted

locale.transliteration: In tatooba ila Allahi faqad saghat quloobukuma wain tathahara AAalayhi fainna Allaha huwa mawlahu wajibreelu wasalihu almumineena waalmalaikatu baAAda thalika thaheerun
locale.translation: If you two [wives] repent to Allah, [it is best], for your hearts have deviated. But if you cooperate against him - then indeed Allah is his protector, and Gabriel and the righteous of the believers and the angels, moreover, are [his] assistants

locale.transliteration: AAasa rabbuhu in tallaqakunna an yubdilahu azwajan khayran minkunna muslimatin muminatin qanitatin taibatin AAabidatin saihatin thayyibatin waabkaran
locale.translation: Perhaps his Lord, if he divorced you [all], would substitute for him wives better than you - submitting [to Allah], believing, devoutly obedient, repentant, worshipping, and traveling - [ones] previously married and virgins

locale.transliteration: Ya ayyuha allatheena amanoo qoo anfusakum waahleekum naran waqooduha alnnasu waalhijaratu AAalayha malaikatun ghilathun shidadun la yaAAsoona Allaha ma amarahum wayafAAaloona ma yumaroona
locale.translation: O you who have believed, protect yourselves and your families from a Fire whose fuel is people and stones, over which are [appointed] angels, harsh and severe; they do not disobey Allah in what He commands them but do what they are commanded

locale.transliteration: Ya ayyuha allatheena kafaroo la taAAtathiroo alyawma innama tujzawna ma kuntum taAAmaloona
locale.translation: O you who have disbelieved, make no excuses that Day. You will only be recompensed for what you used to do

locale.transliteration: Ya ayyuha allatheena amanoo tooboo ila Allahi tawbatan nasoohan AAasa rabbukum an yukaffira AAankum sayyiatikum wayudkhilakum jannatin tajree min tahtiha alanharu yawma la yukhzee Allahu alnnabiyya waallatheena amanoo maAAahu nooruhum yasAAa bayna aydeehim wabiaymanihim yaqooloona rabbana atmim lana noorana waighfir lana innaka AAala kulli shayin qadeerun
locale.translation: O you who have believed, repent to Allah with sincere repentance. Perhaps your Lord will remove from you your misdeeds and admit you into gardens beneath which rivers flow [on] the Day when Allah will not disgrace the Prophet and those who believed with him. Their light will proceed before them and on their right; they will say, "Our Lord, perfect for us our light and forgive us. Indeed, You are over all things competent

locale.transliteration: Ya ayyuha alnnabiyyu jahidi alkuffara waalmunafiqeena waoghluth AAalayhim wamawahum jahannamu wabisa almaseeru
locale.translation: O Prophet, strive against the disbelievers and the hypocrites and be harsh upon them. And their refuge is Hell, and wretched is the destination

locale.transliteration: Daraba Allahu mathalan lillatheena kafaroo imraata noohin waimraata lootin kanata tahta AAabdayni min AAibadina salihayni fakhanatahuma falam yughniya AAanhuma mina Allahi shayan waqeela odkhula alnnara maAAa alddakhileena
locale.translation: Allah presents an example of those who disbelieved: the wife of Noah and the wife of Lot. They were under two of Our righteous servants but betrayed them, so those prophets did not avail them from Allah at all, and it was said, "Enter the Fire with those who enter

locale.transliteration: Wadaraba Allahu mathalan lillatheena amanoo imraata firAAawna ith qalat rabbi ibni lee AAindaka baytan fee aljannati wanajjinee min firAAawna waAAamalihi wanajjinee mina alqawmi alththalimeena
locale.translation: And Allah presents an example of those who believed: the wife of Pharaoh, when she said, "My Lord, build for me near You a house in Paradise and save me from Pharaoh and his deeds and save me from the wrongdoing people

locale.transliteration: Wamaryama ibnata AAimrana allatee ahsanat farjaha fanafakhna feehi min roohina wasaddaqat bikalimati rabbiha wakutubihi wakanat mina alqaniteena
locale.translation: And [the example of] Mary, the daughter of 'Imran, who guarded her chastity, so We blew into [her garment] through Our angel, and she believed in the words of her Lord and His scriptures and was of the devoutly obedient

locale.transliteration: Al-Mulk
locale.translation: The Sovereignty

locale.transliteration: Tabaraka allathee biyadihi almulku wahuwa AAala kulli shayin qadeerun
locale.translation: Blessed is He in whose hand is dominion, and He is over all things competent

locale.transliteration: Allathee khalaqa almawta waalhayata liyabluwakum ayyukum ahsanu AAamalan wahuwa alAAazeezu alghafooru
locale.translation: [He] who created death and life to test you [as to] which of you is best in deed - and He is the Exalted in Might, the Forgiving

locale.transliteration: Allathee khalaqa sabAAa samawatin tibaqan ma tara fee khalqi alrrahmani min tafawutin fairjiAAi albasara hal tara min futoorin
locale.translation: [And] who created seven heavens in layers. You do not see in the creation of the Most Merciful any inconsistency. So return [your] vision [to the sky]; do you see any breaks

locale.transliteration: Thumma irjiAAi albasara karratayni yanqalib ilayka albasaru khasian wahuwa haseerun
locale.translation: Then return [your] vision twice again. [Your] vision will return to you humbled while it is fatigued

locale.transliteration: Walaqad zayyanna alssamaa alddunya bimasabeeha wajaAAalnaha rujooman lilshshayateeni waaAAtadna lahum AAathaba alssaAAeeri
locale.translation: And We have certainly beautified the nearest heaven with stars and have made [from] them what is thrown at the devils and have prepared for them the punishment of the Blaze

locale.transliteration: Walillatheena kafaroo birabbihim AAathabu jahannama wabisa almaseeru
locale.translation: And for those who disbelieved in their Lord is the punishment of Hell, and wretched is the destination

locale.transliteration: Itha olqoo feeha samiAAoo laha shaheeqan wahiya tafooru
locale.translation: When they are thrown into it, they hear from it a [dreadful] inhaling while it boils up

locale.transliteration: Takadu tamayyazu mina alghaythi kullama olqiya feeha fawjun saalahum khazanatuha alam yatikum natheerun
locale.translation: It almost bursts with rage. Every time a company is thrown into it, its keepers ask them, "Did there not come to you a warner

locale.transliteration: Qaloo bala qad jaana natheerun fakaththabna waqulna ma nazzala Allahu min shayin in antum illa fee dalalin kabeerin
locale.translation: They will say," Yes, a warner had come to us, but we denied and said, 'Allah has not sent down anything. You are not but in great error

locale.transliteration: Waqaloo law kunna nasmaAAu aw naAAqilu ma kunna fee ashabi alssaAAeeri
locale.translation: And they will say, "If only we had been listening or reasoning, we would not be among the companions of the Blaze

locale.transliteration: FaiAAtarafoo bithanbihim fasuhqan liashabi alssaAAeeri
locale.translation: And they will admit their sin, so [it is] alienation for the companions of the Blaze

locale.transliteration: Inna allatheena yakhshawna rabbahum bialghaybi lahum maghfiratun waajrun kabeerun
locale.translation: Indeed, those who fear their Lord unseen will have forgiveness and great reward

locale.transliteration: Waasirroo qawlakum awi ijharoo bihi innahu AAaleemun bithati alssudoori
locale.translation: And conceal your speech or publicize it; indeed, He is Knowing of that within the breasts

locale.transliteration: Ala yaAAlamu man khalaqa wahuwa allateefu alkhabeeru
locale.translation: Does He who created not know, while He is the Subtle, the Acquainted

locale.transliteration: Huwa allathee jaAAala lakumu alarda thaloolan faimshoo fee manakibiha wakuloo min rizqihi wailayhi alnnushooru
locale.translation: It is He who made the earth tame for you - so walk among its slopes and eat of His provision - and to Him is the resurrection

locale.transliteration: Aamintum man fee alssamai an yakhsifa bikumu alarda faitha hiya tamooru
locale.translation: Do you feel secure that He who [holds authority] in the heaven would not cause the earth to swallow you and suddenly it would sway

locale.transliteration: Am amintum man fee alssamai an yursila AAalaykum hasiban fasataAAlamoona kayfa natheeri
locale.translation: Or do you feel secure that He who [holds authority] in the heaven would not send against you a storm of stones? Then you would know how [severe] was My warning

locale.transliteration: Walaqad kaththaba allatheena min qablihim fakayfa kana nakeeri
locale.translation: And already had those before them denied, and how [terrible] was My reproach

locale.transliteration: Awalam yaraw ila alttayri fawqahum saffatin wayaqbidna ma yumsikuhunna illa alrrahmanu innahu bikulli shayin baseerun
locale.translation: Do they not see the birds above them with wings outspread and [sometimes] folded in? None holds them [aloft] except the Most Merciful. Indeed He is, of all things, Seeing

locale.transliteration: Amman hatha allathee huwa jundun lakum yansurukum min dooni alrrahmani ini alkafiroona illa fee ghuroorin
locale.translation: Or who is it that could be an army for you to aid you other than the Most Merciful? The disbelievers are not but in delusion

locale.transliteration: Amman hatha allathee yarzuqukum in amsaka rizqahu bal lajjoo fee AAutuwwin wanufoorin
locale.translation: Or who is it that could provide for you if He withheld His provision? But they have persisted in insolence and aversion

locale.transliteration: Afaman yamshee mukibban AAala wajhihi ahda amman yamshee sawiyyan AAala siratin mustaqeemin
locale.translation: Then is one who walks fallen on his face better guided or one who walks erect on a straight path

locale.transliteration: Qul huwa allathee anshaakum wajaAAala lakumu alssamAAa waalabsara waalafidata qaleelan ma tashkuroona
locale.translation: Say, "It is He who has produced you and made for you hearing and vision and hearts; little are you grateful

locale.transliteration: Qul huwa allathee tharaakum fee alardi wailayhi tuhsharoona
locale.translation: Say, "It is He who has multiplied you throughout the earth, and to Him you will be gathered

locale.transliteration: Wayaqooloona mata hatha alwaAAdu in kuntum sadiqeena
locale.translation: And they say, "When is this promise, if you should be truthful

locale.transliteration: Qul innama alAAilmu AAinda Allahi wainnama ana natheerun mubeenun
locale.translation: Say, "The knowledge is only with Allah, and I am only a clear warner

locale.transliteration: Falamma raawhu zulfatan seeat wujoohu allatheena kafaroo waqeela hatha allathee kuntum bihi taddaAAoona
locale.translation: But when they see it approaching, the faces of those who disbelieve will be distressed, and it will be said, "This is that for which you used to call

locale.transliteration: Qul araaytum in ahlakaniya Allahu waman maAAiya aw rahimana faman yujeeru alkafireena min AAathabin aleemin
locale.translation: Say, [O Muhammad], "Have you considered: whether Allah should cause my death and those with me or have mercy upon us, who can protect the disbelievers from a painful punishment

locale.transliteration: Qul huwa alrrahmanu amanna bihi waAAalayhi tawakkalna fasataAAlamoona man huwa fee dalalin mubeenin
locale.translation: Say, "He is the Most Merciful; we have believed in Him, and upon Him we have relied. And you will [come to] know who it is that is in clear error

locale.transliteration: Qul araaytum in asbaha maokum ghawran faman yateekum bimain maAAeenin
locale.translation: Say, "Have you considered: if your water was to become sunken [into the earth], then who could bring you flowing water

locale.transliteration: Al-Qalam
locale.translation: The Pen

locale.transliteration: Noon waalqalami wama yasturoona
locale.translation: Nun. By the pen and what they inscribe

locale.transliteration: Ma anta biniAAmati rabbika bimajnoonin
locale.translation: You are not, [O Muhammad], by the favor of your Lord, a madman

locale.transliteration: Wainna laka laajran ghayra mamnoonin
locale.translation: And indeed, for you is a reward uninterrupted

locale.transliteration: Wainnaka laAAala khuluqin AAatheemin
locale.translation: And indeed, you are of a great moral character

locale.transliteration: Fasatubsiru wayubsiroona
locale.translation: So you will see and they will see

locale.transliteration: Biayyikumu almaftoonu
locale.translation: Which of you is the afflicted [by a devil]

locale.transliteration: Inna rabbaka huwa aAAlamu biman dalla AAan sabeelihi wahuwa aAAlamu bialmuhtadeena
locale.translation: Indeed, your Lord is most knowing of who has gone astray from His way, and He is most knowing of the [rightly] guided

locale.transliteration: Fala tutiAAi almukaththibeena
locale.translation: Then do not obey the deniers

locale.transliteration: Waddoo law tudhinu fayudhinoona
locale.translation: They wish that you would soften [in your position], so they would soften [toward you]

locale.transliteration: Wala tutiAA kulla hallafin maheenin
locale.translation: And do not obey every worthless habitual swearer

locale.transliteration: Hammazin mashshain binameemin
locale.translation: [And] scorner, going about with malicious gossip

locale.transliteration: MannaAAin lilkhayri muAAtadin atheemin
locale.translation: A preventer of good, transgressing and sinful

locale.transliteration: AAutullin baAAda thalika zaneemin
locale.translation: Cruel, moreover, and an illegitimate pretender

locale.transliteration: An kana tha malin wabaneena
locale.translation: Because he is a possessor of wealth and children

locale.transliteration: Itha tutla AAalayhi ayatuna qala asateeru alawwaleena
locale.translation: When Our verses are recited to him, he says, "Legends of the former peoples

locale.transliteration: Sanasimuhu AAala alkhurtoomi
locale.translation: We will brand him upon the snout

locale.transliteration: Inna balawnahum kama balawna ashaba aljannati ith aqsamoo layasrimunnaha musbiheena
locale.translation: Indeed, We have tried them as We tried the companions of the garden, when they swore to cut its fruit in the [early] morning

locale.transliteration: Wala yastathnoona
locale.translation: Without making exception

locale.transliteration: Fatafa AAalayha taifun min rabbika wahum naimoona
locale.translation: So there came upon the garden an affliction from your Lord while they were asleep

locale.transliteration: Faasbahat kaalssareemi
locale.translation: And it became as though reaped

locale.transliteration: Fatanadaw musbiheena
locale.translation: And they called one another at morning

locale.transliteration: Ani ighdoo AAala harthikum in kuntum sarimeena
locale.translation: [Saying], "Go early to your crop if you would cut the fruit

locale.transliteration: Faintalaqoo wahum yatakhafatoona
locale.translation: So they set out, while lowering their voices

locale.transliteration: An la yadkhulannaha alyawma AAalaykum miskeenun
locale.translation: [Saying], "There will surely not enter it today upon you [any] poor person

locale.transliteration: Waghadaw AAala hardin qadireena
locale.translation: And they went early in determination, [assuming themselves] able

locale.transliteration: Falamma raawha qaloo inna ladalloona
locale.translation: But when they saw it, they said, "Indeed, we are lost

locale.transliteration: Bal nahnu mahroomoona
locale.translation: Rather, we have been deprived

locale.transliteration: Qala awsatuhum alam aqul lakum lawla tusabbihoona
locale.translation: The most moderate of them said, "Did I not say to you, 'Why do you not exalt [Allah]

locale.transliteration: Qaloo subhana rabbina inna kunna thalimeena
locale.translation: They said, "Exalted is our Lord! Indeed, we were wrongdoers

locale.transliteration: Faaqbala baAAduhum AAala baAAdin yatalawamoona
locale.translation: Then they approached one another, blaming each other

locale.transliteration: Qaloo ya waylana inna kunna tagheena
locale.translation: They said, "O woe to us; indeed we were transgressors

locale.transliteration: AAasa rabbuna an yubdilana khayran minha inna ila rabbina raghiboona
locale.translation: Perhaps our Lord will substitute for us [one] better than it. Indeed, we are toward our Lord desirous

locale.transliteration: Kathalika alAAathabu walaAAathabu alakhirati akbaru law kanoo yaAAlamoona
locale.translation: Such is the punishment [of this world]. And the punishment of the Hereafter is greater, if they only knew

locale.transliteration: Inna lilmuttaqeena AAinda rabbihim jannati alnnaAAeemi
locale.translation: Indeed, for the righteous with their Lord are the Gardens of Pleasure

locale.transliteration: AfanajAAalu almuslimeena kaalmujrimeena
locale.translation: Then will We treat the Muslims like the criminals

locale.transliteration: Ma lakum kayfa tahkumoona
locale.translation: What is [the matter] with you? How do you judge

locale.transliteration: Am lakum kitabun feehi tadrusoona
locale.translation: Or do you have a scripture in which you learn

locale.transliteration: Inna lakum feehi lama takhayyaroona
locale.translation: That indeed for you is whatever you choose

locale.transliteration: Am lakum aymanun AAalayna balighatun ila yawmi alqiyamati inna lakum lama tahkumoona
locale.translation: Or do you have oaths [binding] upon Us, extending until the Day of Resurrection, that indeed for you is whatever you judge

locale.transliteration: Salhum ayyuhum bithalika zaAAeemun
locale.translation: Ask them which of them, for that [claim], is responsible

locale.transliteration: Am lahum shurakao falyatoo bishurakaihim in kanoo sadiqeena
locale.translation: Or do they have partners? Then let them bring their partners, if they should be truthful

locale.transliteration: Yawma yukshafu AAan saqin wayudAAawna ila alssujoodi fala yastateeAAoona
locale.translation: The Day the shin will be uncovered and they are invited to prostration but the disbelievers will not be able

locale.transliteration: KhashiAAatan absaruhum tarhaquhum thillatun waqad kanoo yudAAawna ila alssujoodi wahum salimoona
locale.translation: Their eyes humbled, humiliation will cover them. And they used to be invited to prostration while they were sound

locale.transliteration: Fatharnee waman yukaththibu bihatha alhadeethi sanastadrijuhum min haythu la yaAAlamoona
locale.translation: So leave Me, [O Muhammad], with [the matter of] whoever denies the Qur'an. We will progressively lead them [to punishment] from where they do not know

locale.transliteration: Waomlee lahum inna kaydee mateenun
locale.translation: And I will give them time. Indeed, My plan is firm

locale.transliteration: Am tasaluhum ajran fahum min maghramin muthqaloona
locale.translation: Or do you ask of them a payment, so they are by debt burdened down

locale.transliteration: Am AAindahumu alghaybu fahum yaktuboona
locale.translation: Or have they [knowledge of] the unseen, so they write [it] down

locale.transliteration: Faisbir lihukmi rabbika wala takun kasahibi alhooti ith nada wahuwa makthoomun
locale.translation: Then be patient for the decision of your Lord, [O Muhammad], and be not like the companion of the fish when he called out while he was distressed

locale.transliteration: Lawla an tadarakahu niAAmatun min rabbihi lanubitha bialAAarai wahuwa mathmoomun
locale.translation: If not that a favor from his Lord overtook him, he would have been thrown onto the naked shore while he was censured

locale.transliteration: Faijtabahu rabbuhu fajaAAalahu mina alssaliheena
locale.translation: And his Lord chose him and made him of the righteous

locale.transliteration: Wain yakadu allatheena kafaroo layuzliqoonaka biabsarihim lamma samiAAoo alththikra wayaqooloona innahu lamajnoonun
locale.translation: And indeed, those who disbelieve would almost make you slip with their eyes when they hear the message, and they say, "Indeed, he is mad

locale.transliteration: Wama huwa illa thikrun lilAAalameena
locale.translation: But it is not except a reminder to the worlds

locale.transliteration: Al-Haqqah
locale.translation: The Reality

locale.transliteration: Alhaqqatu
locale.translation: The Inevitable Reality

locale.transliteration: Ma alhaqqatu
locale.translation: What is the Inevitable Reality

locale.transliteration: Wama adraka ma alhaqqatu
locale.translation: And what can make you know what is the Inevitable Reality

locale.transliteration: Kaththabat thamoodu waAAadun bialqariAAati
locale.translation: Thamud and 'Aad denied the Striking Calamity

locale.transliteration: Faamma thamoodu faohlikoo bialttaghiyati
locale.translation: So as for Thamud, they were destroyed by the overpowering [blast]

locale.transliteration: Waamma AAadun faohlikoo bireehin sarsarin AAatiyatin
locale.translation: And as for 'Aad, they were destroyed by a screaming, violent wind

locale.transliteration: Sakhkharaha AAalayhim sabAAa layalin wathamaniyata ayyamin husooman fatara alqawma feeha sarAAa kaannahum aAAjazu nakhlin khawiyatun
locale.translation: Which Allah imposed upon them for seven nights and eight days in succession, so you would see the people therein fallen as if they were hollow trunks of palm trees

locale.transliteration: Fahal tara lahum min baqiyatin
locale.translation: Then do you see of them any remains

locale.transliteration: Wajaa firAAawnu waman qablahu waalmutafikatu bialkhatiati
locale.translation: And there came Pharaoh and those before him and the overturned cities with sin

locale.transliteration: FaAAasaw rasoola rabbihim faakhathahum akhthatan rabiyatan
locale.translation: And they disobeyed the messenger of their Lord, so He seized them with a seizure exceeding [in severity]

locale.transliteration: Inna lamma tagha almao hamalnakum fee aljariyati
locale.translation: Indeed, when the water overflowed, We carried your ancestors in the sailing ship

locale.transliteration: LinajAAalaha lakum tathkiratan wataAAiyaha othunun waAAiyatun
locale.translation: That We might make it for you a reminder and [that] a conscious ear would be conscious of it

locale.transliteration: Faitha nufikha fee alssoori nafkhatun wahidatun
locale.translation: Then when the Horn is blown with one blast

locale.transliteration: Wahumilati alardu waaljibalu fadukkata dakkatan wahidatan
locale.translation: And the earth and the mountains are lifted and leveled with one blow

locale.transliteration: Fayawmaithin waqaAAati alwaqiAAatu
locale.translation: Then on that Day, the Resurrection will occur

locale.transliteration: Wainshaqqati alssamao fahiya yawmaithin wahiyatun
locale.translation: And the heaven will split [open], for that Day it is infirm

locale.transliteration: Waalmalaku AAala arjaiha wayahmilu AAarsha rabbika fawqahum yawmaithin thamaniyatun
locale.translation: And the angels are at its edges. And there will bear the Throne of your Lord above them, that Day, eight [of them]

locale.transliteration: Yawmaithin tuAAradoona la takhfa minkum khafiyatun
locale.translation: That Day, you will be exhibited [for judgement]; not hidden among you is anything concealed

locale.transliteration: Faamma man ootiya kitabahu biyameenihi fayaqoolu haomu iqraoo kitabiyah
locale.translation: So as for he who is given his record in his right hand, he will say, "Here, read my record

locale.transliteration: Innee thanantu annee mulaqin hisabiyah
locale.translation: Indeed, I was certain that I would be meeting my account

locale.transliteration: Fahuwa fee AAeeshatin radiyatin
locale.translation: So he will be in a pleasant life

locale.transliteration: Fee jannatin AAaliyatin
locale.translation: In an elevated garden

locale.transliteration: Qutoofuha daniyatun
locale.translation: Its [fruit] to be picked hanging near

locale.transliteration: Kuloo waishraboo haneean bima aslaftum fee alayyami alkhaliyati
locale.translation: [They will be told], "Eat and drink in satisfaction for what you put forth in the days past

locale.transliteration: Waamma man ootiya kitabahu bishimalihi fayaqoolu ya laytanee lam oota kitabiyah
locale.translation: But as for he who is given his record in his left hand, he will say, "Oh, I wish I had not been given my record

locale.transliteration: Walam adri ma hisabiyah
locale.translation: And had not known what is my account

locale.transliteration: Ya laytaha kanati alqadiyatu
locale.translation: I wish my death had been the decisive one

locale.transliteration: Ma aghna AAannee maliyah
locale.translation: My wealth has not availed me

locale.transliteration: Halaka AAannee sultaniyah
locale.translation: Gone from me is my authority

locale.transliteration: Khuthoohu faghulloohu
locale.translation: [Allah will say], "Seize him and shackle him

locale.transliteration: Thumma aljaheema salloohu
locale.translation: Then into Hellfire drive him

locale.transliteration: Thumma fee silsilatin tharAAuha sabAAoona thiraAAan faoslukoohu
locale.translation: Then into a chain whose length is seventy cubits insert him

locale.transliteration: Innahu kana la yuminu biAllahi alAAatheemi
locale.translation: Indeed, he did not used to believe in Allah, the Most Great

locale.transliteration: Wala yahuddu AAala taAAami almiskeeni
locale.translation: Nor did he encourage the feeding of the poor

locale.transliteration: Falaysa lahu alyawma hahuna hameemun
locale.translation: So there is not for him here this Day any devoted friend

locale.transliteration: Wala taAAamun illa min ghisleenin
locale.translation: Nor any food except from the discharge of wounds

locale.transliteration: La yakuluhu illa alkhatioona
locale.translation: None will eat it except the sinners

locale.transliteration: Fala oqsimu bima tubsiroona
locale.translation: So I swear by what you see

locale.transliteration: Wama la tubsiroona
locale.translation: And what you do not see

locale.transliteration: Innahu laqawlu rasoolin kareemin
locale.translation: [That] indeed, the Qur'an is the word of a noble Messenger

locale.transliteration: Wama huwa biqawli shaAAirin qaleelan ma tuminoona
locale.translation: And it is not the word of a poet; little do you believe

locale.transliteration: Wala biqawli kahinin qaleelan ma tathakkaroona
locale.translation: Nor the word of a soothsayer; little do you remember

locale.transliteration: Tanzeelun min rabbi alAAalameena
locale.translation: [It is] a revelation from the Lord of the worlds

locale.transliteration: Walaw taqawwala AAalayna baAAda alaqaweeli
locale.translation: And if Muhammad had made up about Us some [false] sayings

locale.transliteration: Laakhathna minhu bialyameeni
locale.translation: We would have seized him by the right hand

locale.transliteration: Thumma laqataAAna minhu alwateena
locale.translation: Then We would have cut from him the aorta

locale.transliteration: Fama minkum min ahadin AAanhu hajizeena
locale.translation: And there is no one of you who could prevent [Us] from him

locale.transliteration: Wainnahu latathkiratun lilmuttaqeena
locale.translation: And indeed, the Qur'an is a reminder for the righteous

locale.transliteration: Wainna lanaAAlamu anna minkum mukaththibeena
locale.translation: And indeed, We know that among you are deniers

locale.transliteration: Wainnahu lahasratun AAala alkafireena
locale.translation: And indeed, it will be [a cause of] regret upon the disbelievers

locale.transliteration: Wainnahu lahaqqu alyaqeeni
locale.translation: And indeed, it is the truth of certainty

locale.transliteration: Fasabbih biismi rabbika alAAatheemi
locale.translation: So exalt the name of your Lord, the Most Great

locale.transliteration: Al-Ma'arij
locale.translation: The Ascending Stairways

locale.transliteration: Saala sailun biAAathabin waqiAAin
locale.translation: A supplicant asked for a punishment bound to happen

locale.transliteration: Lilkafireena laysa lahu dafiAAun
locale.translation: To the disbelievers; of it there is no preventer

locale.transliteration: Mina Allahi thee almaAAariji
locale.translation: [It is] from Allah, owner of the ways of ascent

locale.transliteration: TaAAruju almalaikatu waalrroohu ilayhi fee yawmin kana miqdaruhu khamseena alfa sanatin
locale.translation: The angels and the Spirit will ascend to Him during a Day the extent of which is fifty thousand years

locale.transliteration: Faisbir sabran jameelan
locale.translation: So be patient with gracious patience

locale.transliteration: Innahum yarawnahu baAAeedan
locale.translation: Indeed, they see it [as] distant

locale.transliteration: Wanarahu qareeban
locale.translation: But We see it [as] near

locale.transliteration: Yawma takoonu alssamao kaalmuhli
locale.translation: On the Day the sky will be like murky oil

locale.transliteration: Watakoonu aljibalu kaalAAihni
locale.translation: And the mountains will be like wool

locale.transliteration: Wala yasalu hameemun hameeman
locale.translation: And no friend will ask [anything of] a friend

locale.transliteration: Yubassaroonahum yawaddu almujrimu law yaftadee min AAathabi yawmiithin bibaneehi
locale.translation: They will be shown each other. The criminal will wish that he could be ransomed from the punishment of that Day by his children

locale.transliteration: Wasahibatihi waakheehi
locale.translation: And his wife and his brother

locale.transliteration: Wafaseelatihi allatee tuweehi
locale.translation: And his nearest kindred who shelter him

locale.transliteration: Waman fee alardi jameeAAan thumma yunjeehi
locale.translation: And whoever is on earth entirely [so] then it could save him

locale.transliteration: Kalla innaha latha
locale.translation: No! Indeed, it is the Flame [of Hell]

locale.transliteration: NazzaAAatan lilshshawa
locale.translation: A remover of exteriors

locale.transliteration: TadAAoo man adbara watawalla
locale.translation: It invites he who turned his back [on truth] and went away [from obedience]

locale.transliteration: WajamaAAa faawAAa
locale.translation: And collected [wealth] and hoarded

locale.transliteration: Inna alinsana khuliqa halooAAan
locale.translation: Indeed, mankind was created anxious

locale.transliteration: Itha massahu alshsharru jazooAAan
locale.translation: When evil touches him, impatient

locale.transliteration: Waitha massahu alkhayru manooAAan
locale.translation: And when good touches him, withholding [of it]

locale.transliteration: Illa almusalleena
locale.translation: Except the observers of prayer

locale.transliteration: Allatheena hum AAala salatihim daimoona
locale.translation: Those who are constant in their prayer

locale.transliteration: Waallatheena fee amwalihim haqqun maAAloomun
locale.translation: And those within whose wealth is a known right

locale.transliteration: Lilssaili waalmahroomi
locale.translation: For the petitioner and the deprived

locale.transliteration: Waallatheena yusaddiqoona biyawmi alddeeni
locale.translation: And those who believe in the Day of Recompense

locale.transliteration: Waallatheena hum min AAathabi rabbihim mushfiqoona
locale.translation: And those who are fearful of the punishment of their Lord

locale.transliteration: Inna AAathaba rabbihim ghayru mamoonin
locale.translation: Indeed, the punishment of their Lord is not that from which one is safe

locale.transliteration: Waallatheena hum lifuroojihim hafithoona
locale.translation: And those who guard their private parts

locale.transliteration: Illa AAala azwajihim aw ma malakat aymanuhum fainnahum ghayru maloomeena
locale.translation: Except from their wives or those their right hands possess, for indeed, they are not to be blamed

locale.transliteration: Famani ibtagha waraa thalika faolaika humu alAAadoona
locale.translation: But whoever seeks beyond that, then they are the transgressors

locale.transliteration: Waallatheena hum liamanatihim waAAahdihim raAAoona
locale.translation: And those who are to their trusts and promises attentive

locale.transliteration: Waallatheena hum bishahadatihim qaimoona
locale.translation: And those who are in their testimonies upright

locale.transliteration: Waallatheena hum AAala salatihim yuhafithoona
locale.translation: And those who [carefully] maintain their prayer

locale.transliteration: Olaika fee jannatin mukramoona
locale.translation: They will be in gardens, honored

locale.transliteration: Famali allatheena kafaroo qibalaka muhtiAAeena
locale.translation: So what is [the matter] with those who disbelieve, hastening [from] before you, [O Muhammad]

locale.transliteration: AAani alyameeni waAAani alshshimali AAizeena
locale.translation: [To sit] on [your] right and [your] left in separate groups

locale.transliteration: AyatmaAAu kullu imriin minhum an yudkhala jannata naAAeemin
locale.translation: Does every person among them aspire to enter a garden of pleasure

locale.transliteration: Kalla inna khalaqnahum mimma yaAAlamoona
locale.translation: No! Indeed, We have created them from that which they know

locale.transliteration: Fala oqsimu birabbi almashariqi waalmagharibi inna laqadiroona
locale.translation: So I swear by the Lord of [all] risings and settings that indeed We are able

locale.transliteration: AAala an nubaddila khayran minhum wama nahnu bimasbooqeena
locale.translation: To replace them with better than them; and We are not to be outdone

locale.transliteration: Fatharhum yakhoodoo wayalAAaboo hatta yulaqoo yawmahumu allathee yooAAadoona
locale.translation: So leave them to converse vainly and amuse themselves until they meet their Day which they are promised

locale.transliteration: Yawma yakhrujoona mina alajdathi siraAAan kaannahum ila nusubin yoofidoona
locale.translation: The Day they will emerge from the graves rapidly as if they were, toward an erected idol, hastening

locale.transliteration: KhashiAAatan absaruhum tarhaquhum thillatun thalika alyawmu allathee kanoo yooAAadoona
locale.translation: Their eyes humbled, humiliation will cover them. That is the Day which they had been promised

locale.transliteration: Nuh
locale.translation: Noah

locale.transliteration: Inna arsalna noohan ila qawmihi an anthir qawmaka min qabli an yatiyahum AAathabun aleemun
locale.translation: Indeed, We sent Noah to his people, [saying], "Warn your people before there comes to them a painful punishment

locale.transliteration: Qala ya qawmi innee lakum natheerun mubeenun
locale.translation: He said, "O my people, indeed I am to you a clear warner

locale.transliteration: Ani oAAbudoo Allaha waittaqoohu waateeAAooni
locale.translation: [Saying], 'Worship Allah, fear Him and obey me

locale.transliteration: Yaghfir lakum min thunoobikum wayuakhkhirkum ila ajalin musamman inna ajala Allahi itha jaa la yuakhkharu law kuntum taAAlamoona
locale.translation: Allah will forgive you of your sins and delay you for a specified term. Indeed, the time [set by] Allah, when it comes, will not be delayed, if you only knew

locale.transliteration: Qala rabbi innee daAAawtu qawmee laylan wanaharan
locale.translation: He said, "My Lord, indeed I invited my people [to truth] night and day

locale.transliteration: Falam yazidhum duAAaee illa firaran
locale.translation: But my invitation increased them not except in flight

locale.transliteration: Wainnee kullama daAAawtuhum litaghfira lahum jaAAaloo asabiAAahum fee athanihim waistaghshaw thiyabahum waasarroo waistakbaroo istikbaran
locale.translation: And indeed, every time I invited them that You may forgive them, they put their fingers in their ears, covered themselves with their garments, persisted, and were arrogant with [great] arrogance

locale.transliteration: Thumma innee daAAawtuhum jiharan
locale.translation: Then I invited them publicly

locale.transliteration: Thumma innee aAAlantu lahum waasrartu lahum israran
locale.translation: Then I announced to them and [also] confided to them secretly

locale.transliteration: Faqultu istaghfiroo rabbakum innahu kana ghaffaran
locale.translation: And said, 'Ask forgiveness of your Lord. Indeed, He is ever a Perpetual Forgiver

locale.transliteration: Yursili alssamaa AAalaykum midraran
locale.translation: He will send [rain from] the sky upon you in [continuing] showers

locale.transliteration: Wayumdidkum biamwalin wabaneena wayajAAal lakum jannatin wayajAAal lakum anharan
locale.translation: And give you increase in wealth and children and provide for you gardens and provide for you rivers

locale.transliteration: Ma lakum la tarjoona lillahi waqaran
locale.translation: What is [the matter] with you that you do not attribute to Allah [due] grandeur

locale.transliteration: Waqad khalaqakum atwaran
locale.translation: While He has created you in stages

locale.transliteration: Alam taraw kayfa khalaqa Allahu sabAAa samawatin tibaqan
locale.translation: Do you not consider how Allah has created seven heavens in layers

locale.transliteration: WajaAAala alqamara feehinna nooran wajaAAala alshshamsa sirajan
locale.translation: And made the moon therein a [reflected] light and made the sun a burning lamp

locale.transliteration: WaAllahu anbatakum mina alardi nabatan
locale.translation: And Allah has caused you to grow from the earth a [progressive] growth

locale.transliteration: Thumma yuAAeedukum feeha wayukhrijukum ikhrajan
locale.translation: Then He will return you into it and extract you [another] extraction

locale.transliteration: WaAllahu jaAAala lakumu alarda bisatan
locale.translation: And Allah has made for you the earth an expanse

locale.transliteration: Litaslukoo minha subulan fijajan
locale.translation: That you may follow therein roads of passage

locale.transliteration: Qala noohun rabbi innahum AAasawnee waittabaAAoo man lam yazidhu maluhu wawaladuhu illa khasaran
