locale.translation: Noah said, "My Lord, indeed they have disobeyed me and followed him whose wealth and children will not increase him except in loss

locale.transliteration: Wamakaroo makran kubbaran
locale.translation: And they conspired an immense conspiracy

locale.transliteration: Waqaloo la tatharunna alihatakum wala tatharunna waddan wala suwaAAan wala yaghootha wayaAAooqa wanasran
locale.translation: And said, 'Never leave your gods and never leave Wadd or Suwa' or Yaghuth and Ya'uq and Nasr

locale.transliteration: Waqad adalloo katheeran wala tazidi alththalimeena illa dalalan
locale.translation: And already they have misled many. And, [my Lord], do not increase the wrongdoers except in error

locale.transliteration: Mimma khateeatihim oghriqoo faodkhiloo naran falam yajidoo lahum min dooni Allahi ansaran
locale.translation: Because of their sins they were drowned and put into the Fire, and they found not for themselves besides Allah [any] helpers

locale.transliteration: Waqala noohun rabbi la tathar AAala alardi mina alkafireena dayyaran
locale.translation: And Noah said, "My Lord, do not leave upon the earth from among the disbelievers an inhabitant

locale.transliteration: Innaka in tatharhum yudilloo AAibadaka wala yalidoo illa fajiran kaffaran
locale.translation: Indeed, if You leave them, they will mislead Your servants and not beget except [every] wicked one and [confirmed] disbeliever

locale.transliteration: Rabbi ighfir lee waliwalidayya waliman dakhala baytiya muminan walilmumineena waalmuminati wala tazidi alththalimeena illa tabaran
locale.translation: My Lord, forgive me and my parents and whoever enters my house a believer and the believing men and believing women. And do not increase the wrongdoers except in destruction

locale.transliteration: Al-Jinn
locale.translation: The Jinn

locale.transliteration: Qul oohiya ilayya annahu istamaAAa nafarun mina aljinni faqaloo inna samiAAna quranan AAajaban
locale.translation: Say, [O Muhammad], "It has been revealed to me that a group of the jinn listened and said, 'Indeed, we have heard an amazing Qur'an

locale.transliteration: Yahdee ila alrrushdi faamanna bihi walan nushrika birabbina ahadan
locale.translation: It guides to the right course, and we have believed in it. And we will never associate with our Lord anyone

locale.transliteration: Waannahu taAAala jaddu rabbina ma ittakhatha sahibatan wala waladan
locale.translation: And [it teaches] that exalted is the nobleness of our Lord; He has not taken a wife or a son

locale.transliteration: Waannahu kana yaqoolu safeehuna AAala Allahi shatatan
locale.translation: And that our foolish one has been saying about Allah an excessive transgression

locale.transliteration: Waanna thananna an lan taqoola alinsu waaljinnu AAala Allahi kathiban
locale.translation: And we had thought that mankind and the jinn would never speak about Allah a lie

locale.transliteration: Waannahu kana rijalun mina alinsi yaAAoothoona birijalin mina aljinni fazadoohum rahaqan
locale.translation: And there were men from mankind who sought refuge in men from the jinn, so they [only] increased them in burden

locale.transliteration: Waannahum thannoo kama thanantum an lan yabAAatha Allahu ahadan
locale.translation: And they had thought, as you thought, that Allah would never send anyone [as a messenger]

locale.transliteration: Waanna lamasna alssamaa fawajadnaha muliat harasan shadeedan washuhuban
locale.translation: And we have sought [to reach] the heaven but found it filled with powerful guards and burning flames

locale.transliteration: Waanna kunna naqAAudu minha maqaAAida lilssamAAi faman yastamiAAi alana yajid lahu shihaban rasadan
locale.translation: And we used to sit therein in positions for hearing, but whoever listens now will find a burning flame lying in wait for him

locale.transliteration: Waanna la nadree asharrun oreeda biman fee alardi am arada bihim rabbuhum rashadan
locale.translation: And we do not know [therefore] whether evil is intended for those on earth or whether their Lord intends for them a right course

locale.transliteration: Waanna minna alssalihoona waminna doona thalika kunna taraiqa qidadan
locale.translation: And among us are the righteous, and among us are [others] not so; we were [of] divided ways

locale.transliteration: Wanna thananna an lan nuAAjiza Allaha fee alardi walan nuAAjizahu haraban
locale.translation: And we have become certain that we will never cause failure to Allah upon earth, nor can we escape Him by flight

locale.transliteration: Waanna lamma samiAAna alhuda amanna bihi faman yumin birabbihi fala yakhafu bakhsan wala rahaqan
locale.translation: And when we heard the guidance, we believed in it. And whoever believes in his Lord will not fear deprivation or burden

locale.transliteration: Waanna minna almuslimoona waminna alqasitoona faman aslama faolaika taharraw rashadan
locale.translation: And among us are Muslims [in submission to Allah], and among us are the unjust. And whoever has become Muslim - those have sought out the right course

locale.transliteration: Waama alqasitoona fakanoo lijahannama hataban
locale.translation: But as for the unjust, they will be, for Hell, firewood

locale.transliteration: Waallawi istaqamoo AAala alttareeqati laasqaynahum maan ghadaqan
locale.translation: And [Allah revealed] that if they had remained straight on the way, We would have given them abundant provision

locale.transliteration: Linaftinahum feehi waman yuAArid AAan thikri rabbihi yaslukhu AAathaban saAAadan
locale.translation: So We might test them therein. And whoever turns away from the remembrance of his Lord He will put into arduous punishment

locale.transliteration: Waanna almasajida lillahi fala tadAAoo maAAa Allahi ahadan
locale.translation: And [He revealed] that the masjids are for Allah, so do not invoke with Allah anyone

locale.transliteration: Waannahu lamma qama AAabdu Allahi yadAAoohu kadoo yakoonoona AAalayhi libadan
locale.translation: And that when the Servant of Allah stood up supplicating Him, they almost became about him a compacted mass

locale.transliteration: Qul innama adAAoo rabbee wala oshriku bihi ahadan
locale.translation: Say, [O Muhammad], "I only invoke my Lord and do not associate with Him anyone

locale.transliteration: Qul innee la amliku lakum darran wala rashadan
locale.translation: Say, "Indeed, I do not possess for you [the power of] harm or right direction

locale.transliteration: Qul innee lan yujeeranee mina Allahi ahadun walan ajida min doonihi multahadan
locale.translation: Say, "Indeed, there will never protect me from Allah anyone [if I should disobey], nor will I find in other than Him a refuge

locale.transliteration: Illa balaghan mina Allahi warisalatihi waman yaAAsi Allaha warasoolahu fainna lahu nara jahannama khalideena feeha abadan
locale.translation: But [I have for you] only notification from Allah, and His messages." And whoever disobeys Allah and His Messenger - then indeed, for him is the fire of Hell; they will abide therein forever

locale.transliteration: Hatta itha raaw ma yooAAadoona fasayaAAlamoona man adAAafu nasiran waaqallu AAadadan
locale.translation: [The disbelievers continue] until, when they see that which they are promised, then they will know who is weaker in helpers and less in number

locale.transliteration: Qul in adree aqareebun ma tooAAadoona am yajAAalu lahu rabbee amadan
locale.translation: Say, "I do not know if what you are promised is near or if my Lord will grant for it a [long] period

locale.transliteration: AAalimu alghaybi fala yuthhiru AAala ghaybihi ahadan
locale.translation: [He is] Knower of the unseen, and He does not disclose His [knowledge of the] unseen to anyone

locale.transliteration: Illa mani irtada min rasoolin fainnahu yasluku min bayni yadayhi wamin khalfihi rasadan
locale.translation: Except whom He has approved of messengers, and indeed, He sends before each messenger and behind him observers

locale.transliteration: LiyaAAlama an qad ablaghoo risalati rabbihim waahata bima ladayhim waahsa kulla shayin AAadadan
locale.translation: That he may know that they have conveyed the messages of their Lord; and He has encompassed whatever is with them and has enumerated all things in number

locale.transliteration: Al-Muzzammil
locale.translation: The Enshrouded One

locale.transliteration: Ya ayyuha almuzzammilu
locale.translation: O you who wraps himself [in clothing]

locale.transliteration: Qumi allayla illa qaleelan
locale.translation: Arise [to pray] the night, except for a little

locale.transliteration: Nisfahu awi onqus minhu qaleelan
locale.translation: Half of it - or subtract from it a little

locale.transliteration: Aw zid AAalayhi warattili alqurana tarteelan
locale.translation: Or add to it, and recite the Qur'an with measured recitation

locale.transliteration: Inna sanulqee AAalayka qawlan thaqeelan
locale.translation: Indeed, We will cast upon you a heavy word

locale.transliteration: Inna nashiata allayli hiya ashaddu watan waaqwamu qeelan
locale.translation: Indeed, the hours of the night are more effective for concurrence [of heart and tongue] and more suitable for words

locale.transliteration: Inna laka fee alnnahari sabhan taweelan
locale.translation: Indeed, for you by day is prolonged occupation

locale.transliteration: Waothkuri isma rabbika watabattal ilayhi tabteelan
locale.translation: And remember the name of your Lord and devote yourself to Him with [complete] devotion

locale.transliteration: Rabbu almashriqi waalmaghribi la ilaha illa huwa faittakhithhu wakeelan
locale.translation: [He is] the Lord of the East and the West; there is no deity except Him, so take Him as Disposer of [your] affairs

locale.transliteration: Waisbir AAala ma yaqooloona waohjurhum hajran jameelan
locale.translation: And be patient over what they say and avoid them with gracious avoidance

locale.transliteration: Watharnee waalmukaththibeena olee alnnaAAmati wamahhilhum qaleelan
locale.translation: And leave Me with [the matter of] the deniers, those of ease [in life], and allow them respite a little

locale.transliteration: Inna ladayna ankalan wajaheeman
locale.translation: Indeed, with Us [for them] are shackles and burning fire

locale.transliteration: WataAAaman tha ghussatin waAAathaban aleeman
locale.translation: And food that chokes and a painful punishment

locale.transliteration: Yawma tarjufu alardu waaljibalu wakanati aljibalu katheeban maheelan
locale.translation: On the Day the earth and the mountains will convulse and the mountains will become a heap of sand pouring down

locale.transliteration: Inna arsalna ilaykum rasoolan shahidan AAalaykum kama arsalna ila firAAawna rasoolan
locale.translation: Indeed, We have sent to you a Messenger as a witness upon you just as We sent to Pharaoh a messenger

locale.transliteration: FaAAasa firAAawnu alrrasoola faakhathnahu akhthan wabeelan
locale.translation: But Pharaoh disobeyed the messenger, so We seized him with a ruinous seizure

locale.transliteration: Fakayfa tattaqoona in kafartum yawman yajAAalu alwildana sheeban
locale.translation: Then how can you fear, if you disbelieve, a Day that will make the children white- haired

locale.transliteration: Alssamao munfatirun bihi kana waAAduhu mafAAoolan
locale.translation: The heaven will break apart therefrom; ever is His promise fulfilled

locale.transliteration: Inna hathihi tathkiratun faman shaa ittakhatha ila rabbihi sabeelan
locale.translation: Indeed, this is a reminder, so whoever wills may take to his Lord a way

locale.transliteration: Inna rabbaka yaAAlamu annaka taqoomu adna min thuluthayi allayli wanisfahu wathuluthahu wataifatun mina allatheena maAAaka waAllahu yuqaddiru allayla waalnnahara AAalima an lan tuhsoohu fataba AAalaykum faiqraoo ma tayassara mina alqurani AAalima an sayakoonu minkum marda waakharoona yadriboona fee alardi yabtaghoona min fadli Allahi waakharoona yuqatiloona fee sabeeli Allahi faiqraoo ma tayassara minhu waaqeemoo alssalata waatoo alzzakata waaqridoo Allaha qardan hasanan wama tuqaddimoo lianfusikum min khayrin tajidoohu AAinda Allahi huwa khayran waaAAthama ajran waistaghfiroo Allaha inna Allaha ghafoorun raheemun
locale.translation: Indeed, your Lord knows, [O Muhammad], that you stand [in prayer] almost two thirds of the night or half of it or a third of it, and [so do] a group of those with you. And Allah determines [the extent of] the night and the day. He has known that you [Muslims] will not be able to do it and has turned to you in forgiveness, so recite what is easy [for you] of the Qur'an. He has known that there will be among you those who are ill and others traveling throughout the land seeking [something] of the bounty of Allah and others fighting for the cause of Allah. So recite what is easy from it and establish prayer and give zakah and loan Allah a goodly loan. And whatever good you put forward for yourselves - you will find it with Allah. It is better and greater in reward. And seek forgiveness of Allah. Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful

locale.transliteration: Al-Muddaththir
locale.translation: The Cloaked One

locale.transliteration: Ya ayyuha almuddaththiru
locale.translation: O you who covers himself [with a garment]

locale.transliteration: Qum faanthir
locale.translation: Arise and warn

locale.transliteration: Warabbaka fakabbir
locale.translation: And your Lord glorify

locale.transliteration: Wathiyabaka fatahhir
locale.translation: And your clothing purify

locale.transliteration: Waalrrujza faohjur
locale.translation: And uncleanliness avoid

locale.transliteration: Wala tamnun tastakthiru
locale.translation: And do not confer favor to acquire more

locale.transliteration: Walirabbika faisbir
locale.translation: But for your Lord be patient

locale.transliteration: Faitha nuqira fee alnnaqoori
locale.translation: And when the trumpet is blown

locale.transliteration: Fathalika yawmaithin yawmun AAaseerun
locale.translation: That Day will be a difficult day

locale.transliteration: AAala alkafireena ghayru yaseerin
locale.translation: For the disbelievers - not easy

locale.transliteration: Tharnee waman khalaqtu waheedan
locale.translation: Leave Me with the one I created alone

locale.transliteration: WajaAAaltu lahu malan mamdoodan
locale.translation: And to whom I granted extensive wealth

locale.transliteration: Wabaneena shuhoodan
locale.translation: And children present [with him]

locale.transliteration: Wamahhadtu lahu tamheedan
locale.translation: And spread [everything] before him, easing [his life]

locale.transliteration: Thumma yatmaAAu an azeeda
locale.translation: Then he desires that I should add more

locale.transliteration: Kalla innahu kana liayatina AAaneedan
locale.translation: No! Indeed, he has been toward Our verses obstinate

locale.transliteration: Saorhiquhu saAAoodan
locale.translation: I will cover him with arduous torment

locale.transliteration: Innahu fakkara waqaddara
locale.translation: Indeed, he thought and deliberated

locale.transliteration: Faqutila kayfa qaddara
locale.translation: So may he be destroyed [for] how he deliberated

locale.transliteration: Thumma qutila kayfa qaddara
locale.translation: Then may he be destroyed [for] how he deliberated

locale.transliteration: Thumma nathara
locale.translation: Then he considered [again]

locale.transliteration: Thumma AAabasa wabasara
locale.translation: Then he frowned and scowled

locale.transliteration: Thumma adbara waistakbara
locale.translation: Then he turned back and was arrogant

locale.transliteration: Faqala in hatha illa sihrun yutharu
locale.translation: And said, "This is not but magic imitated [from others]

locale.transliteration: In hatha illa qawlu albashari
locale.translation: This is not but the word of a human being

locale.transliteration: Saosleehi saqara
locale.translation: I will drive him into Saqar

locale.transliteration: Wama adraka ma saqaru
locale.translation: And what can make you know what is Saqar

locale.transliteration: La tubqee wala tatharu
locale.translation: It lets nothing remain and leaves nothing [unburned]

locale.transliteration: Lawwahatun lilbashari
locale.translation: Blackening the skins

locale.transliteration: AAalayha tisAAata AAashara
locale.translation: Over it are nineteen [angels]

locale.transliteration: Wama jaAAalna ashaba alnnari illa malaikatan wama jaAAalna AAiddatahum illa fitnatan lillatheena kafaroo liyastayqina allatheena ootoo alkitaba wayazdada allatheena amanoo eemanan wala yartaba allatheena ootoo alkitaba waalmuminoona waliyaqoola allatheena fee quloobihim maradun waalkafiroona matha arada Allahu bihatha mathalan kathalika yudillu Allahu man yashao wayahdee man yashao wama yaAAlamu junooda rabbika illa huwa wama hiya illa thikra lilbashari
locale.translation: And We have not made the keepers of the Fire except angels. And We have not made their number except as a trial for those who disbelieve - that those who were given the Scripture will be convinced and those who have believed will increase in faith and those who were given the Scripture and the believers will not doubt and that those in whose hearts is hypocrisy and the disbelievers will say, "What does Allah intend by this as an example?" Thus does Allah leave astray whom He wills and guides whom He wills. And none knows the soldiers of your Lord except Him. And mention of the Fire is not but a reminder to humanity

locale.transliteration: Kalla waalqamari
locale.translation: No! By the moon

locale.transliteration: Waallayli ith adbara
locale.translation: And [by] the night when it departs

locale.transliteration: Waalssubhi itha asfara
locale.translation: And [by] the morning when it brightens

locale.transliteration: Innaha laihda alkubari
locale.translation: Indeed, the Fire is of the greatest [afflictions]

locale.transliteration: Natheeran lilbashari
locale.translation: As a warning to humanity

locale.transliteration: Liman shaa minkum an yataqaddama aw yataakhkhara
locale.translation: To whoever wills among you to proceed or stay behind

locale.transliteration: Kullu nafsin bima kasabat raheenatun
locale.translation: Every soul, for what it has earned, will be retained

locale.transliteration: Illa ashaba alyameeni
locale.translation: Except the companions of the right

locale.transliteration: Fee jannatin yatasaaloona
locale.translation: [Who will be] in gardens, questioning each other

locale.transliteration: AAani almujrimeena
locale.translation: About the criminals

locale.transliteration: Ma salakakum fee saqara
locale.translation: [And asking them], "What put you into Saqar

locale.transliteration: Qaloo lam naku mina almusalleena
locale.translation: They will say, "We were not of those who prayed

locale.transliteration: Walam naku nutAAimu almiskeena
locale.translation: Nor did we used to feed the poor

locale.transliteration: Wakunna nakhoodu maAAa alkhaideena
locale.translation: And we used to enter into vain discourse with those who engaged [in it]

locale.transliteration: Wakunna nukaththibu biyawmi alddeeni
locale.translation: And we used to deny the Day of Recompense

locale.transliteration: Hatta atana alyaqeenu
locale.translation: Until there came to us the certainty

locale.transliteration: Fama tanfaAAuhum shafaAAatu alshshafiAAeena
locale.translation: So there will not benefit them the intercession of [any] intercessors

locale.transliteration: Fama lahum AAani alttathkirati muAArideena
locale.translation: Then what is [the matter] with them that they are, from the reminder, turning away

locale.transliteration: Kaannahum humurun mustanfiratun
locale.translation: As if they were alarmed donkeys

locale.transliteration: Farrat min qaswaratin
locale.translation: Fleeing from a lion

locale.transliteration: Bal yureedu kullu imriin minhum an yuta suhufan munashsharatan
locale.translation: Rather, every person among them desires that he would be given scriptures spread about

locale.transliteration: Kalla bal la yakhafoona alakhirata
locale.translation: No! But they do not fear the Hereafter

locale.transliteration: Kalla innahu tathkiratun
locale.translation: No! Indeed, the Qur'an is a reminder

locale.transliteration: Faman shaa thakarahu
locale.translation: Then whoever wills will remember it

locale.transliteration: Wama yathkuroona illa an yashaa Allahu huwa ahlu alttaqwa waahlu almaghfirati
locale.translation: And they will not remember except that Allah wills. He is worthy of fear and adequate for [granting] forgiveness

locale.transliteration: Al-Qiyamah
locale.translation: The Resurrection

locale.transliteration: La oqsimu biyawmi alqiyamati
locale.translation: I swear by the Day of Resurrection

locale.transliteration: Wala oqsimu bialnnafsi allawwamati
locale.translation: And I swear by the reproaching soul [to the certainty of resurrection]

locale.transliteration: Ayahsabu alinsanu allan najmaAAa AAithamahu
locale.translation: Does man think that We will not assemble his bones

locale.transliteration: Bala qadireena AAala an nusawwiya bananahu
locale.translation: Yes. [We are] Able [even] to proportion his fingertips

locale.transliteration: Bal yureedu alinsanu liyafjura amamahu
locale.translation: But man desires to continue in sin

locale.transliteration: Yasalu ayyana yawmu alqiyamati
locale.translation: He asks, "When is the Day of Resurrection

locale.transliteration: Faitha bariqa albasaru
locale.translation: So when vision is dazzled

locale.transliteration: Wakhasafa alqamaru
locale.translation: And the moon darkens

locale.transliteration: WajumiAAa alshshamsu waalqamaru
locale.translation: And the sun and the moon are joined

locale.transliteration: Yaqoolu alinsanu yawmaithin ayna almafarru
locale.translation: Man will say on that Day, "Where is the [place of] escape

locale.transliteration: Kalla la wazara
locale.translation: No! There is no refuge

locale.transliteration: Ila rabbika yawmaithin almustaqarru
locale.translation: To your Lord, that Day, is the [place of] permanence

locale.transliteration: Yunabbao alinsanu yawmaithin bima qaddama waakhkhara
locale.translation: Man will be informed that Day of what he sent ahead and kept back

locale.transliteration: Bali alinsanu AAala nafsihi baseeratun
locale.translation: Rather, man, against himself, will be a witness

locale.transliteration: Walaw alqa maAAatheerahu
locale.translation: Even if he presents his excuses

locale.transliteration: La tuharrik bihi lisanaka litaAAjala bihi
locale.translation: Move not your tongue with it, [O Muhammad], to hasten with recitation of the Qur'an

locale.transliteration: Inna AAalayna jamAAahu waquranahu
locale.translation: Indeed, upon Us is its collection [in your heart] and [to make possible] its recitation

locale.transliteration: Faitha qaranahu faittabiAA quranahu
locale.translation: So when We have recited it [through Gabriel], then follow its recitation

locale.transliteration: Thumma inna AAalayna bayanahu
locale.translation: Then upon Us is its clarification [to you]

locale.transliteration: Kalla bal tuhibboona alAAajilata
locale.translation: No! But you love the immediate

locale.transliteration: Watatharoona alakhirata
locale.translation: And leave the Hereafter

locale.transliteration: Wujoohun yawmaithin nadiratun
locale.translation: [Some] faces, that Day, will be radiant

locale.transliteration: Ila rabbiha nathiratun
locale.translation: Looking at their Lord

locale.transliteration: Wawujoohun yawmaithin basiratun
locale.translation: And [some] faces, that Day, will be contorted

locale.transliteration: Tathunnu an yufAAala biha faqiratun
locale.translation: Expecting that there will be done to them [something] backbreaking

locale.transliteration: Kalla itha balaghati alttaraqiya
locale.translation: No! When the soul has reached the collar bones

locale.transliteration: Waqeela man raqin
locale.translation: And it is said, "Who will cure [him]

locale.transliteration: Wathanna annahu alfiraqu
locale.translation: And the dying one is certain that it is the [time of] separation

locale.transliteration: Wailtaffati alssaqu bialssaqi
locale.translation: And the leg is wound about the leg

locale.transliteration: Ila rabbika yawmaithin almasaqu
locale.translation: To your Lord, that Day, will be the procession

locale.transliteration: Fala saddaqa wala salla
locale.translation: And the disbeliever had not believed, nor had he prayed

locale.transliteration: Walakin kaththaba watawalla
locale.translation: But [instead], he denied and turned away

locale.transliteration: Thumma thahaba ila ahlihi yatamatta
locale.translation: And then he went to his people, swaggering [in pride]

locale.transliteration: Awla laka faawla
locale.translation: Woe to you, and woe

locale.transliteration: Thumma awla laka faawla
locale.translation: Then woe to you, and woe

locale.transliteration: Ayahsabu alinsanu an yutraka sudan
locale.translation: Does man think that he will be left neglected

locale.transliteration: Alam yaku nutfatan min manayyin yumna
locale.translation: Had he not been a sperm from semen emitted

locale.transliteration: Thumma kana AAalaqatan fakhalaqa fasawwa
locale.translation: Then he was a clinging clot, and [Allah] created [his form] and proportioned [him]

locale.transliteration: FajaAAala minhu alzzawjayni alththakara waalontha
locale.translation: And made of him two mates, the male and the female

locale.transliteration: Alaysa thalika biqadirin AAala an yuhyiya almawta
locale.translation: Is not that [Creator] Able to give life to the dead

locale.transliteration: Al-Insan
locale.translation: The Man

locale.transliteration: Hal ata AAala alinsani heenun mina alddahri lam yakun shayan mathkooran
locale.translation: Has there [not] come upon man a period of time when he was not a thing [even] mentioned

locale.transliteration: Inna khalaqna alinsana min nutfatin amshajin nabtaleehi fajaAAalnahu sameeAAan baseeran
locale.translation: Indeed, We created man from a sperm-drop mixture that We may try him; and We made him hearing and seeing

locale.transliteration: Inna hadaynahu alssabeela imma shakiran waimma kafooran
locale.translation: Indeed, We guided him to the way, be he grateful or be he ungrateful

locale.transliteration: Inna aAAtadna lilkafireena salasila waaghlalan wasaAAeeran
locale.translation: Indeed, We have prepared for the disbelievers chains and shackles and a blaze

locale.transliteration: Inna alabrara yashraboona min kasin kana mizajuha kafooran
locale.translation: Indeed, the righteous will drink from a cup [of wine] whose mixture is of Kafur

locale.transliteration: AAaynan yashrabu biha AAibadu Allahi yufajjiroonaha tafjeeran
locale.translation: A spring of which the [righteous] servants of Allah will drink; they will make it gush forth in force [and abundance]

locale.transliteration: Yoofoona bialnnathri wayakhafoona yawman kana sharruhu mustateeran
locale.translation: They [are those who] fulfill [their] vows and fear a Day whose evil will be widespread

locale.transliteration: WayutAAimona alttaAAama AAala hubbihi miskeenan wayateeman waaseeran
locale.translation: And they give food in spite of love for it to the needy, the orphan, and the captive

locale.transliteration: Innama nutAAimukum liwajhi Allahi la nureedu minkum jazaan wala shukooran
locale.translation: [Saying], "We feed you only for the countenance of Allah. We wish not from you reward or gratitude

locale.transliteration: Inna nakhafu min rabbina yawman AAaboosan qamtareeran
locale.translation: Indeed, We fear from our Lord a Day austere and distressful

locale.transliteration: Fawaqahumu Allahu sharra thalika alyawmi walaqqahum nadratan wasurooran
locale.translation: So Allah will protect them from the evil of that Day and give them radiance and happiness

locale.transliteration: Wajazahum bima sabaroo jannatan wahareeran
locale.translation: And will reward them for what they patiently endured [with] a garden [in Paradise] and silk [garments]

locale.transliteration: Muttakieena feeha AAala alaraiki la yarawna feeha shamsan wala zamhareeran
locale.translation: [They will be] reclining therein on adorned couches. They will not see therein any [burning] sun or [freezing] cold

locale.transliteration: Wadaniyatan AAalayhim thilaluha wathullilat qutoofuha tathleelan
locale.translation: And near above them are its shades, and its [fruit] to be picked will be lowered in compliance

locale.transliteration: Wayutafu AAalayhim bianiyatin min fiddatin waakwabin kanat qawareera
locale.translation: And there will be circulated among them vessels of silver and cups having been [created] clear [as glass]

locale.transliteration: Qawareera min fiddatin qaddarooha taqdeeran
locale.translation: Clear glasses [made] from silver of which they have determined the measure

locale.transliteration: Wayusqawna feeha kasan kana mizajuha zanjabeelan
locale.translation: And they will be given to drink a cup [of wine] whose mixture is of ginger

locale.transliteration: AAaynan feeha tusamma salsabeelan
locale.translation: [From] a fountain within Paradise named Salsabeel

locale.transliteration: Wayatoofu AAalayhim wildanun mukhalladoona itha raaytahum hasibtahum luluan manthooran
locale.translation: There will circulate among them young boys made eternal. When you see them, you would think them [as beautiful as] scattered pearls

locale.transliteration: Waitha raayta thamma raayta naAAeeman wamulkan kabeeran
locale.translation: And when you look there [in Paradise], you will see pleasure and great dominion

locale.transliteration: AAaliyahum thiyabu sundusin khudrun waistabraqun wahulloo asawira min fiddatin wasaqahum rabbuhum sharaban tahooran
locale.translation: Upon the inhabitants will be green garments of fine silk and brocade. And they will be adorned with bracelets of silver, and their Lord will give them a purifying drink

locale.transliteration: Inna hatha kana lakum jazaan wakana saAAyukum mashkooran
locale.translation: [And it will be said], "Indeed, this is for you a reward, and your effort has been appreciated

locale.transliteration: Inna nahnu nazzalna AAalayka alqurana tanzeelan
locale.translation: Indeed, it is We who have sent down to you, [O Muhammad], the Qur'an progressively

locale.transliteration: Faisbir lihukmi rabbika wala tutiAA minhum athiman aw kafooran
locale.translation: So be patient for the decision of your Lord and do not obey from among them a sinner or ungrateful [disbeliever]

locale.transliteration: Waothkuri isma rabbika bukratan waaseelan
locale.translation: And mention the name of your Lord [in prayer] morning and evening

locale.transliteration: Wamina allayli faosjud lahu wasabbihhu laylan taweelan
locale.translation: And during the night prostrate to Him and exalt Him a long [part of the] night

locale.transliteration: Inna haolai yuhibboona alAAajilata wayatharoona waraahum yawman thaqeelan
locale.translation: Indeed, these [disbelievers] love the immediate and leave behind them a grave Day

locale.transliteration: Nahnu khalaqnahum washadadna asrahum waitha shina baddalna amthalahum tabdeelan
locale.translation: We have created them and strengthened their forms, and when We will, We can change their likenesses with [complete] alteration

locale.transliteration: Inna hathihi tathkiratun faman shaa ittakhatha ila rabbihi sabeelan
locale.translation: Indeed, this is a reminder, so he who wills may take to his Lord a way

locale.transliteration: Wama tashaoona illa an yashaa Allahu inna Allaha kana AAaleeman hakeeman
locale.translation: And you do not will except that Allah wills. Indeed, Allah is ever Knowing and Wise

locale.transliteration: Yudkhilu man yashao fee rahmatihi waalththalimeena aAAadda lahum AAathaban aleeman
locale.translation: He admits whom He wills into His mercy; but the wrongdoers - He has prepared for them a painful punishment

locale.transliteration: Al-Mursalat
locale.translation: The Emissaries

locale.transliteration: Waalmursalati AAurfan
locale.translation: By those [winds] sent forth in gusts

locale.transliteration: FaalAAasifati AAasfan
locale.translation: And the winds that blow violently

locale.transliteration: Waalnnashirati nashran
locale.translation: And [by] the winds that spread [clouds]

locale.transliteration: Faalfariqati farqan
locale.translation: And those [angels] who bring criterion

locale.transliteration: Faalmulqiyati thikran
locale.translation: And those [angels] who deliver a message

locale.transliteration: AAuthran aw nuthran
locale.translation: As justification or warning

locale.transliteration: Innama tooAAadoona lawaqiAAun
locale.translation: Indeed, what you are promised is to occur

locale.transliteration: Faitha alnnujoomu tumisat
locale.translation: So when the stars are obliterated

locale.transliteration: Waitha alssamao furijat
locale.translation: And when the heaven is opened

locale.transliteration: Waitha aljibalu nusifat
locale.translation: And when the mountains are blown away

locale.transliteration: Waitha alrrusulu oqqitat
locale.translation: And when the messengers' time has come

locale.transliteration: Liayyi yawmin ojjilat
locale.translation: For what Day was it postponed

locale.transliteration: Liyawmi alfasli
locale.translation: For the Day of Judgement

locale.transliteration: Wama adraka ma yawmu alfasli
locale.translation: And what can make you know what is the Day of Judgement

locale.transliteration: Waylun yawmaithin lilmukaththibeena
locale.translation: Woe, that Day, to the deniers

locale.transliteration: Alam nuhliki alawwaleena
locale.translation: Did We not destroy the former peoples

locale.transliteration: Thumma nutbiAAuhumu alakhireena
locale.translation: Then We will follow them with the later ones

locale.transliteration: Kathalika nafAAalu bialmujrimeena
locale.translation: Thus do We deal with the criminals

locale.transliteration: Waylun yawmaithin lilmukaththibeena
locale.translation: Woe, that Day, to the deniers

locale.transliteration: Alam nakhluqkum min main maheenin
locale.translation: Did We not create you from a liquid disdained

locale.transliteration: FajaAAalnahu fee qararin makeenin
locale.translation: And We placed it in a firm lodging

locale.transliteration: Ila qadarin maAAloomin
locale.translation: For a known extent

locale.transliteration: Faqadarna faniAAma alqadiroona
locale.translation: And We determined [it], and excellent [are We] to determine

locale.transliteration: Waylun yawmaithin lilmukaththibeena
locale.translation: Woe, that Day, to the deniers

locale.transliteration: Alam najAAali alarda kifatan
locale.translation: Have We not made the earth a container

locale.transliteration: Ahyaan waamwatan
locale.translation: Of the living and the dead

locale.transliteration: WajaAAalna feeha rawasiya shamikhatin waasqaynakum maan furatan
locale.translation: And We placed therein lofty, firmly set mountains and have given you to drink sweet water

locale.transliteration: Waylun yawmaithin lilmukaththibeena
locale.translation: Woe, that Day, to the deniers
